original: Complete a level with 20 powered Shadow Plants

添加\r\n增益

original: Touch plants on the map for Almanac access as well
translation: 点击地图上的植物也可以访问图鉴

original: Great! You can also drag and drop to target attacks

original: Tap on the banana to select it

original: Tap to pick target tile for attack

original: If things get rough, stock up on Plant Food!

original: Tap on the key to pick it up!

original: Drag a seed packet to the grass!

original: Drag a peashooter seed packet\r\nto plant another one!

original: Drag the shovel onto a plant to remove it!

original: Drag a seed packet to the grass!
translation: 将一株植物拖到草坪上!

original: Those backwards plants are in the way!\r\nDrag the shovel onto a plant to remove it!
translation: 那些反向的植物太碍事了!\r\n将铲子拖到一株植物上铲除它!
你发现了一株幼苗!

original: Keep collecting sun! You'll\r\nneed it to grow more plants!
translation: 继续收集阳光吧!要想种植\r\n更多植物,阳光必不可少!

original: Collect coins to buy cool stuff later!

original: Tap on the plant to add\r\nit to your collection!
translation: 点击一株植物来将它\r\n添加到你的收藏!

original: It will be waiting in your Zen Garden.
translation: 它将在禅境花园内等着你.

original: Touch the falling sun to collect it!

original: Big Bad Butte is now available!

original: La Brainsa Tarpits is now available!
translation: 脑子焦油坑现已开放!

original: Pyramid of Doom is now available!

精选唱片集现已开放!

original: Terror from Tomorrow is now available!

冰封战场现已开放!

original: Temple of Bloom is now available!
translation: 鲜花神殿现已开放!

original: Highway to the Danger Room is now available!

无尽梦魇现已开放!

original: Community Endless Zone is now available!
translation: 社区无尽地带现已开放!

original: Dead Man's Booty is now available!
translation: 逝者的宝藏现已开放!

original: Pyramid of Doom is now available!
translation: 厄运金字塔现已开放!

original: Potato Mines are powerful explosives that\r\nneed time to prepare. Try them out!
translation: 土豆地雷是很强大的爆炸植物\r\n只不过需要一些时间来准备.来试试吧!

original: How far can you travel in the Endless Zones?
translation: 你能在无尽地带里坚持多久?

original: Great job!\r\nGet ready to defend your house!
translation: 干得好!\r\n准备保卫你的房子!

original: Good job, Star number two! Stars\r\nare used to unlock cool rewards!
translation: 干得漂亮, 拿到第二颗星了!\r\n星星可以用来解锁丰厚的奖励!

original: You earned a Star by \r\nsurviving a level!
translation: 在你的艰苦生存下,\r\n你获得了一颗星星!

original: Use Butter to stop zombies for a few seconds!
translation: 黄油指可以定身僵尸一段时间!

original: Use Move to relocate vases to protected lanes!
translation: 罐子移动可以帮助你保护一些植物!

original: Reveal Vase helps you plan your next move!
translation: 罐子查看可以帮助你决定接下来的操作!

original: Excellent! You've collected\r\nenough sun for your next plant!
translation: 太棒了! 你已经为你的下一株植物收集了足够的阳光!

original: Escape Roots can't swap to where they can't be planted.
translation: 逃脱树根不能交换到不能种植的地方.

original: Escape Roots can't swap captured or transformed plants.
translation: 逃脱树根不能与被控制的植物交换.

original: Escape Roots can't swap a plant using Plant Food.
translation: 逃脱树根不能与使用了叶绿素的植物交换.

original: Escape Roots can't swap with that plant.
translation: 逃脱树根不能与这个植物交换.

original: More Stars are unlocked! Replay levels to get them!
translation: 更多星星已解锁! 重玩关卡来获得它们!
查看一下图鉴吧!
查看一下砸罐子模式吧!
查看一下旅行原木吧!
查看疯狂戴夫的花哨小玩意儿!

original: You finished Egypt! Tap the Universe Button!
translation: 你通关了埃及! 点击宇宙按钮!
探访一下你的禅境花园吧!

original: Grave Busters can only be planted on graves
translation: 噬碑藤只能种在墓碑上

original: Hot Potato can only be planted on ice blocks.
translation: 热土豆只能种在冰块上!

original: Hot Potato can only be planted on ice blocks or octopuses.
translation: 热土豆只能种在冰块和章鱼上

original: A HUGE WAVE OF ZOMBIES IS APPROACHING!
translation: 一大波僵尸即将来袭!

original: You can only plant this on defeated plants.
translation: 复活萝卜只能种在死去的植物上.

original: Keep digging until your\r\nlawn is clear of plants!
translation: 继续挖吧, 直到你的草坪上没有植物!

original: Keep digging until your\r\nlawn is clear of plants!
translation: 继续挖吧, 直到你的草坪上没有植物!

original: Keep using Power Ups to protect your brains!
translation: 继续使用金手指来保护你的脑子吧!

original: Generate plenty of sun to power your attacks
translation: 多生产一些阳光, 让他的攻击更加游刃有余吧

original: Remember, there are still levels to play in other Worlds
translation: 不要忘了, 在其他世界还有许多别的关卡可以游玩

original: More Sunflowers mean more sun.\r\nMore sun means MORE PLANTS!
translation: 更多的向日葵就意味着有更多的阳光.\r\n而有更多的阳光就意味着更多的植物!
请先种莲叶
下一关解锁了!
查看一下你的新植物吧!

original: You need to collect more sun to plant that!
translation: 你需要收集更多的阳光来种植那个!

original: You can't plant that plant there!
translation: 你不能在那儿种那种植物!

original: You can't put that zombie there!
translation: 你不能把这只僵尸放在那里!

original: Underground Plants cannot be planted on Lily Pads.
translation: 地下植物不能种植在莲叶上.

original: Bananas are too slippery for mine carts.
translation: 香蕉太滑了,不能种在矿车里.

original: Escape Roots can't be planted on mine carts.
translation: 逃狱树根不能种在矿车上.

original: You can't plant Jack O' Lanterns on rail carts.
translation: 你不能在矿车上种植杰克南瓜灯.
岩浆会把矿车融化掉.

original: Missile Toes are too icy for mine carts.
translation: 爆冰槲寄生对矿车而言太冷了.

original: Olive Pits make holes. No railcarts!
translation: 油橄榄坑会把矿车钻坏. 别种在那里!
点击大门来解锁它!

original: One of your peashooters died!\r\nTry planting them further to the left!
translation: 你有一株豌豆射手阵亡了!\r\n试试在更左边的地方种植他们吧!

original: Nicely done! You can also plant by tapping\r\nthe seed packet and then the lawn
translation: 干得好!你也可以通过先后点击\r\n种子包和草地以种植

original: Spikeweeds can only be planted on solid ground
translation: 地刺只能种植在坚实的地面上

original: Place your bulbs and nuts to the left of the line
translation: 在线的左边释放保龄球

original: Plant Food full! Use one before picking up more.
translation: 叶绿素满了! 先使用一个再收集吧!

original: Plant Food would create too many plants

original: Lily Pads can only be planted to the right of the tide line
translation: 莲叶只能种在潮汐线右边

original: Lily Pads can't be planted on Lily Pads

尝试种植更多莲叶

original: You can't plant on an arcade machine.

original: You can't plant on a backpack.

original: You can't plant on a Fisherman Zombie

original: You can't plant on a Zombie King

original: You can't plant on a lava puddle

original: You can't plant on the mold colonies

original: You can't plant on evil potions

original: You can't plant on tracks without a cart

original: You can't plant on scorched tiles

original: You can't plant on school of sharks
translation: 你不能把植物种在鲨鱼群上

original: You can't plant on a speaker.
translation: 你不能把植物种在音响上
你不能把植物种在冲浪板上

original: You can't plant on a tent.

original: You can't plant this on the tide
translation: 你不能把植物种在潮水上

original: Too many plants to plant now
translation: 现在要种的植物太多了

original: Aquatic plants can only be planted in water
translation: 水生植物只能种在水里

original: Sunflowers are very important plants.\r\nPlant one!
translation: 向日葵是十分重要的植物.\r\n快种一株吧!
向日葵生产阳光!

original: Plant at least 1 Sunflower per row!
translation: 每行至少种植1个向日葵!

original: Plant at least 1 Sunflower per row!
translation: 每行至少种植1个向日葵!

original: Tangle Kelp can only be planted in water
translation: 缠绕水草只能种在水上

original: You are at your planting limit! Shovel a plant to plant more.
translation: 已经达到种植上限了! 必须铲掉植物才能种更多.

original: Underground plants cannot be planted on planks.
translation: 地下植物不能种在甲板上.

original: Tile Turnip cannot be planted on a Power Tile
translation: 地砖芜菁不能种在能量地砖上

original: Use World Keys to unlock new Worlds

叶绿素可以重置所有小喷菇的生存时长
回到你的禅境花园!

original: You have a World Key! Tap to view Time-Space Map
translation: 你获得了世界钥匙!点击以查看时空地图

original: Seeds need time to refresh\r\nbefore planting again
translation: 种子需要时间冷却\r\n以再次种植

original: Tap on the new Level to start it!
translation: 点击新的关卡开始吧!

original: More Stars are available in many completed levels.
translation: 现在可以在已经完成的关卡里赢得更多星星了.

original: Explosions can damage plants and zombies
translation: 阳光炸弹爆炸能伤害植物和僵尸

original: Wait for Sun Bombs to land to collect the sun
translation: 等到阳光炸弹完全落地后再去点击收集

original: Patience and precision are needed in Sun Bomb levels.
translation: 要想打好阳光炸弹关卡, 你需要有足够的耐心和清晰的头脑.

original: Wait for Sun Bombs to land or they will explode on touch
translation: 等到阳光炸弹完全落地后再去点击, 否则它们会爆炸

original: Swap plants to make matches of three!
translation: 拖拽植物使三株相同的植物配对!

original: Tap on the Butter Zombie Power Up!
translation: 点击黄油指!

original: Looks like you need more Stars. Tap back to Egypt!
translation: 看起来你需要更多星星. 点击回到埃及!

original: Tap on the Move Vase Power Up!
translation: 点击移瓶指!
点击海盗港湾世界!
点击金手指!

original: Tap on the Reveal Vase Power Up!
translation: 点击透瓶指!
点击查看玉米卷地图
点击星星门!

original: Tile plants cannot be planted on existing tiles
translation: 地砖类植物不能种在已经存在的地砖上

original: Tap an active Turbo button to turn it off
translation: 再次点击加速按钮来关闭它

original: Tap the Turbo button to activate it
translation: 点击加速按钮来启动它

original: Tap the zombie to butter it!
translation: 点击僵尸给它涂上黄油!

original: Swipe your finger across a zombie
translation: 用你的手指在僵尸身上划动

original: Swipe the zombie in the direction you want it to move!
translation: 你想让僵尸到哪边去, 就把它往哪边划!

original: Tap to spend sun on attack
translation: 点击一下他就能花费阳光进行攻击
现在击碎罐子吧!

original: Move the vase to the row protected by Repeaters!
translation: 把罐子移动到有双发豌豆保护的一行!
现在点击罐子吧!

original: Pinch your fingers on a zombie
translation: 用手指捏僵尸

original: Pinch your fingers right over the zombie!
translation: 在稍微高于僵尸的地方捏合手指!
现在点击罐子吧!

original: Hold your finger down near your target
translation: 把你的手指按在目标的附近

original: Make sure to hold your finger on the screen!
translation: 你的手指要一直按在屏幕上!

original: Tap on a vase to see what's inside!
translation: 点击罐子, 看看里面有什么吧!

original: Destroy all zombies and vases to complete the level!
translation: 消灭全部僵尸和罐子, 即可完成关卡!
等等!!!

original: World Keys can unlock new Worlds when they are available
translation: 当你可以前往其他世界时, 你就可以用世界钥匙来解锁它

original: Don't let the zombies reach your house!
translation: 不要让僵尸抵达你的房子!

original: applies to my use of EA's services.
translation: 应用于我的 EA 服务使用情况.
隐私和 Cookie 政策
我同意更新后的协议
并了解 EA 做出的更新
继续
年龄

original: I consent to any personal data collected through my use of EA's services being transferred to EA in the United States, as further explained in the Privacy and Cookie Policy.
translation: 我同意如隐私和 Cookie 政策中进一步解释的一样, 把使用EA服务时收集到的所有个人数据转移至位于美国的EA.
我们更新了用户协议!
请告诉我们你的年龄.

original:

original: Garlimites divert zombies that ate them into other lanes. They have very low health, so use them as instants.
translation: 蒜瓣驱赶僵尸到其他路. 他们的生命值很低, 像一次性植物那样使用吧.

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}loses 5 damage for each bounce\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Autonomous Katapulting Ejectomatic Emitter is actively looking for a different acronym for A.K.E.E. because let's face it, \Katapulting\" is just not working."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}子弹每次弹射都将衰减5点伤害\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}阿门·开丹·木汗·木德正在积极寻找除A.K.E.E.以外的其他缩写, 因为她想让我们知道, \"Katapulting\" 并不是最确切的代名词.

original: A.K.E.E.s lob projectiles that bounce from zombie to zombie, slowing them down slightly.
translation: 阿开木木向僵尸发射可以减速的弹射子弹.

original:

{FLAVOR}Aloe likes to soothe. He likes to alleviate, he likes to restore, he likes to mend. But don't ask him to revive. He's touchy about revival.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}顶多过量治疗到原来的两倍血量

original: Aloes heal injured plants to their immediate right. They also overheal surrounding plants upon being planted.
translation: 芦荟可以治愈在他们右边受伤的植物. 他们在种植时也会治愈周围的植物.

original: Heals rightward plant; overheals surrounding plants when planted
translation: 治愈右侧的植物; 种植时治愈周围的植物

{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击一次瞄准, 再点击一次发射
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}BNN-6

{FLAVOR}尽量避免刻板印象很重要. 因为这些刻板印象很多时候根本不正确, 而且还很伤人. 但是 ... 香蕉火箭炮确实是香蕉.

original: Banana Launchers can fire bananas at any tile on the lawn. They explode on impact, doing massive damage over a medium area.
translation: 香蕉火箭炮可以向草坪上任意一格发射炮弹, 撞击时爆炸. 对3x3范围内的僵尸造成大量伤害.

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}Blastberry Vine snickers to himself. He imagines lobbing bomblets. He's been reading up on it and he knows it's gonna make a big splash when it happens. \Soon,\" he whispers."
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR} 爆莓藤蔓时常在那里自娱自乐, 最近. 他就在想象自己可以投射炸弹. 他看了很多关于这个的书, 知道自己一旦练成, 一定会惹所有人的注目. \"很快,\" 他小声喃喃道.

original: Blastberry Vines can be planted on top of other plants to provide increased defense and an additional attack in the form of lobbed projectiles that break into explosive bomblets.
translation: 爆莓藤蔓可以种在其他植物上面, 增强他们的攻击和防御, 还可以发射子弹, 这些子弹会分裂成小子弹然后爆炸.

{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}stuns zombies for 0.15s upon hit
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Ancient Egypt 4

{FLAVOR}As the first new member to your home defense team, Bloomerang enjoys long walkabouts with his friend, Koala Bear, and listening to his Bob Barley albums out back.

translation: 回旋镖射手可以攻击一条线上的最多三个目标, 并且一来一回攻击两次!

translation: 攻击并定身最多3个目标, 两次

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}direct damage increases the more they hit (+5 every hit, max +120)\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Blooming Heart loves zombies. She gets guff from her fellow plants over it, but she stands firm. She's into zombies and makes no apologies about it.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对命中过的目标伤害会逐渐递增 (每次+5, 最多+120)\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}心之蕊爱僵尸. 她在这件事上受到其他植物们的嘲笑, 但她很坚定. 她喜欢僵尸, 对此绝不后悔.

original: Blooming Hearts lob projectiles that infatuate zombies, lightly stunning them.

original: Lobs projectiles that lightly stun and do more damage the more they hit
translation: 投抛具有定身效果且伤害逐渐递增的花朵

original: {FLAVOR}The luckiest stunt clover around, Blover is the most recent recipient of the Stunty Award. You can see his work in \Bulb Fiction,\" \"Rooty,\" and \"Finding Flower.\" He also teaches a stunt class on Tuesdays at the community center."
translation: {FLAVOR}他是最幸运的三叶草, 最近还刚被授予了最佳特技奖的荣誉. 他的特技表演家喻户晓, 像是 \"球茎小说\", \"寻根究底\", \"找花\" 等大作中都有他的身影. 不仅如此, 每周二他还在社区中心讲授一门有关特技技巧的课程.

original: Blovers instantly blow away all zombies in the air.

original:

{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}对章鱼, 冲浪板或者墓碑造成高额伤害

{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}种植时影响全场, 随后只影响所在行

original: Boingsettas slam the ground in a \boing\" that heavily damages grid items, bounces zombies back and chills them."
translation: 一品轰可以 \"轰\" 地一声猛击地面, 击退僵尸, 并让他们冷却.
击退并冷却僵尸
寒冰菇

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}only available at night time
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated

{FLAVOR}Brought into all these time-traveling shenanigans, Ice-shroom has become shier and more withdrawn. When asked, he just said in a gruff voice: \I'm just scared of meeting new plants ok? Paralyzed facial nerves, remember?""
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚关卡使用
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}在这些穿越时空的闹剧中, 寒冰菇变得越来越害羞, 越来越孤僻 - 他隐藏的非常好, 你甚至看不清他的脸! 当被问及时, 他只是冷冷地说: "我只是害怕遇到新的植物, 好吗? 这不是面瘫, 明白吗?"

original: Ice-shrooms freeze all zombies on the lawn, then disappear.
translation: 寒冰菇冰冻全屏的僵尸, 然后消失.

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Pure Modern Day Night 1\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Bombegranate is fierce and a go-getter. She will always try to be one step ahead of everyone else. Sometimes, she even wishes that she could multiply herself with her seeds, so she can do even MORE things with a bunch of mini-Bombe! Alas, she wouldn't trade her sentinel seeds for anything else in the world - she loves them too much for that.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}MD-N1\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}爆炸石榴很凶猛且富有野心的植物. 她将永远努力领先于其他植物一步. 有时, 她甚至希望自己能用种子繁殖, 这样她就能用一堆迷你炸弹做更多的事情! 唉, 她不会用她的哨兵种子来交易世界上的任何东西 - 她太爱他们了.

original: Bombegranates instantly explode and leave 3x3 grids of exploding seeds that damage zombies.
translation: 爆炸石榴在3x3范围内爆炸, 并留下可以伤害僵尸的种子.

original: This plant is already boosted! Use it in a level!
translation: 这株植物已经获得过强化了! 先在一个关卡里用一次吧!

对攻击有额外防护

original: Zombies defeated by this plant drop coins. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 被该植物击杀的僵尸将会掉落硬币. 该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Extra protection from zombies. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 该植物将拥有更高的生命值. 该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Recharges more quickly. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 该植物的冷却时间将会变短. 该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Gets free Plant Food effect when planted. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 该植物将在种植时免费获得一次植物养料效果. 该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Attacks at a faster rate. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后,该植物的攻击速度将会得到提升.该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Explodes when shoveled. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 该植物被铲除时将会发生爆炸. 该强化只在一关内有效.

original: Costs less sun to plant. This boost lasts for 1 level.
translation: 强化后, 种植该植物将花费更少的阳光. 该强化只在一关内有效.
赏金猎人
额外生命值

开战猛攻
快速开火

original: Inflicts up to {DAMAGE} damage to bosses every {TIME} seconds!
translation: 每 {TIME} 秒对 BOSS 造成高达 {DAMAGE} 的伤害!
保龄泡泡

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can only detect targets 3 tiles in front
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Jurassic Marsh 1

{FLAVOR}Guess which team has won the League Championship for five years running now? Team Bowling Bulb, that's who. They are on a ROLL. You and your pals think you got what it takes to stop 'em? Yeah, sure. Keep dreamin, bub.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}前方3x1范围内有僵尸才会攻击
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}JM-1

{FLAVOR}猜猜哪个队直到现在蝉联五次冠军? 没错, 就是保龄泡泡队. 他们现在如日中天. 你和你的队友以为可以有什么办法打败他们吗? 呵呵, 继续做梦去吧, 伙计.

original: Bowling Bulbs roll shots that can bounce into multiple zombies.
translation: 发射可以在僵尸之间弹射的保龄球.

original: Rolls bouncing shots that can hit multiple zombies
translation: 保龄球可以在僵尸之间弹射

original: {FLAVOR}Cabbage-pult received his doctorate in pulting from Harvest University. He knows a thing or two about launching his way to the top. He also makes a mean soup.
translation: {FLAVOR}卷心菜投手在丰收大学获得了博士学位. 他对如何登顶略知一二. 他还做了一道难吃的汤.

original: Cabbage-pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.
translation: 卷心菜投手向敌人投掷卷心菜.

original: Hurls cabbages over obstacles at the enemy
translation: 投射可以越过障碍物的卷心菜

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can only detect targets in a 4x3 area in front
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hides into the ground when there's a zombie nearby

{FLAVOR}Things have really changed for Cactus lately. Book deals, movies, truck show appearances... she's just trying to focus on staying humble and launching thorns like always.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}前方4x3范围内有僵尸才会攻击
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}僵尸靠近时缩进地里

{FLAVOR}仙人掌最近真的发生了变化. 交易图书, 电影, 卡车表演... 她只是想像往常一样专注于保持谦逊和发射尖刺.

original: Cactuses fire a penetrating thorn that can damage up to 5 enemies!
translation: 仙人掌的刺可以穿透 5 个目标!

original: Fires a penetrating thorn, hides for ground damage

original: Tap on a zombie to flip its panel
translation: 点击任意一只僵尸, 翻转他手里的卡牌!

original: Great! Now tap on another one
translation: 干得漂亮! 现在试试点击另一个

original: Great! Now blow up as many zombies as you can
translation: 棒极了! 现在尽你所能击杀僵尸吧!
超能花菜

original:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot target Gargantuars
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hovers above ground or water
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Jurassic Marsh 20

{FLAVOR}A general misconception is that his eyes are spinning because of him casting too many spells. See, Caulipower enjoys writing books in his spare time. One day, he thought of a really great ending for his latest novel... but he was afraid that his cousin won't understand it. He has been trying to fix the part since then, and it gave him so much of a headache that his eyes started spinning with distress!
translation:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}不能魅惑巨人僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}JM-20

{FLAVOR}一个普遍的误解是, 他的眼睛在转, 这是他施了太多的魔法的缘故. 超能花菜喜欢在业余时间写书. 有一天, 他想到了他的最新小说的一个非常好的结局... 但他担心他的堂兄听不懂. 从那以后, 他一直在试着修改这个部分, 这让他头疼得眼睛开始痛苦地转!

original: Caulipowers use their mental powers to hypnotize random zombies, prioritizing normal zombies first.
translation: 超能花菜随机魅惑僵尸, 优先魅惑一般僵尸.
随机魅惑一般僵尸

original: We need to update game data. This may take a short while. The game will return to the Main Menu when the update is complete.
translation: 我们需要更新游戏数据,这可能会花一点时间.更新完成后,游戏将返回到主菜单.

original: Downloading update data. The game will return to the Main Menu when the download is complete.
translation: 我们需要更新游戏数据, 这可能会花一点时间. 更新完成后, 游戏将返回到主菜单.

translation: 下载功能已禁用. 请稍后再试.

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Wild West 4

{FLAVOR}Celery Stalker resents the implication that there's anything unsavory about his attack style. He simply believes that discretion is the better part of vegetation.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}WW-4

{FLAVOR}潜伏芹菜对那些觉得自己的攻击方式不光彩的植物感到不满. 他只是认为, 谨慎是植物中更好的部分.

original: Celery Stalkers wait until zombies pass, then pop up and bash them from behind.
translation: 潜伏芹菜等待僵尸经过, 然后起身背刺僵尸.

甜菜护卫

original: {FLAVOR}You might remember Chard Guard from his days in the WWF (that's World Wrestling Foliage). When he was in the ring - boy-oh-boy - he was something to behold! His moves! His style! His attitude! The crowd loved him. He was quite the star for a while there. Sure, those days are behind him. But if you watch carefully, when Chard Guard is fighting zombies, you'll see him use the wrestling move he made famous. The ol' Knock 'Em Dead maneuver - it gets 'em every time.
translation: {FLAVOR}你也许还记得WWF里 (那是世界蔬叶摔角大赛) 甜菜护卫的闪光时代. 当时他获得 \"男仔中的男仔\" 金腰带, 那真的是嗨翻全场, 万众瞩目! 他的动作! 他的战风! 他的气势! 大家爱死他了. 那个时候他确实是人气明星. 当然, 那也已经是之前的事情了. 但是如今如果你仔细观察, 当甜菜护卫和僵尸战斗的时候, 你会看到他使用的正是看家招式 - 摔跤动作. 称之为 \"一击入魂\" 的秘技 - 真是百用百中.

original: Chard Guards are defensive blockers that can hurl zombies backwards with 3 leaves.
translation: 甜菜护卫可以把僵尸扔回去 3 次.
阻挡并把僵尸往回扔
樱桃炸弹

original: {FLAVOR}The Cherry Bomb Brothers attempted to start their own band. \We tried to figure out what the sound would be, but we kept explodonating speakers, stages, fans, and of course, zombies. Look for our LP next year.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}组建乐队是樱桃炸弹兄弟的梦想. \"我们很想知道每种爆炸的节奏. 我们颠覆音乐, 引爆粉丝, 轰动舞台, 当然还有摧毁僵尸! 喂, 别忘记买明年的唱片!\"

original: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.
translation: 樱桃炸弹在3x3的范围内爆炸. 尽可能把他们种的离僵尸近一些.

original: Blows up all zombies in a 3x3 area
translation: 炸飞3x3范围内的僵尸
辣椒豆

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}zombies that ate it are destroyed and release stunning gas
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}has no effect on most mechs

{FLAVOR}He's not blushing, he's trying to hold it in.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}吃掉它的僵尸会死亡, 并会放出定身气体
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}不会对大部分机甲生效

{FLAVOR}他不是天生脸红, 那是憋红的.

original: Chili Beans deliver a crippling bout of gastrointestinal distress.
translation: 辣椒豆会引起严重的肠胃疼痛.

original: Defeats zombies that eat it, making them release gas
translation: 消灭吃掉它的僵尸, 并让他们放出气体

大嘴花

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can't eat zombies that are too big, will deal damage to them instead\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Everyone appreciates what Chomper does. His appetite has saved them on numerous occasions. But truth be told, Chomper's friends think that eating zombies is gross. And his breath! No one has the heart to tell him, and he never gets the hint when you offer him a mint.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}对某些不能吃掉的僵尸造成每口200伤害\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}每个人都很欣赏大嘴花的所作所为, 因为他的大胃口在很多场合都曾拯救过他们. 但说句真心话, 大嘴花的朋友们认为他吃僵尸是件很粗鄙的事情. 更何况他的口气! 当他不理解别人为什么会送他薄荷的时候, 实在没有人忍心告诉他真相.

original: Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but take a while to chew and are vulnerable while chewing.
translation: 大嘴花可以吃掉一只僵尸, 但需要时间消化.

original: Devours a zombie, then chews on it for a while
translation: 吃掉一只僵尸, 然后消化一段时间

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Ci-Tron 3\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}As the owner and primary user of \Vitamin C-U-Later\" 20-hour energy shots, Citron is always on and always ready for action. \"Let's make this happen!!\""
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}CTR-3\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}作为 \"维它命 C-U-Later\" 的原始用户, 充能柚子总是随时准备着行动. \"让我们开始吧!!\"

original: Citrons shoot powerful balls of plasma.
translation: 充能柚子发射强大的离子球.

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to fire\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Sure, he's a hairy old man, but Coconut Cannon can still fire on all cylinders. The reason he's so hairy: he's in-between waxings.
translation: {KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击以开火\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}椰子加农炮不再年轻, 却有着一头秀发, 他依然活跃在最前线. 至于秀发闪亮的原因, 我们猜测大概是上了蜡了.

original: Coconut Cannons fire down a single lane, causing an explosion on impact.
translation: 椰子加农炮可以向所在行开火, 炮弹撞向僵尸后对僵尸造成爆炸伤害.

translation: 点击以发射爆炸的椰子炮

translation: 缺少硬币? 使用钻石来兑换硬币吧!

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Cold Snapdragon gets chilly when anyone brings up his cousin Snapdragon. \We just view temperature very differently, and I'd really rather not discuss it,\" he says. Yikes."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}当有人提到他堂兄火龙草的时候, 冰龙草就会浑身散发出寒意. \"我们对温度的概念很不一样, 我不想讨论这个.\" 他说. 哎呀.

original: Cold Snapdragons breathe icy mist into 6 adjacent tiles in front of it.
translation: 冰龙草可以向六格地砖内的僵尸喷出冰雾

translation: 向前方一片区域内喷出冰雾

translation: 仲冬圣诞节日庆典怎么来了这么多宝藏雪人? 击败他们, 赢取 100 包冰系植物种子, 并为社区挑战献力!

translation: 试玩爆裂葡萄, 赢取 60 包葡萄爆弹种子包, 并为社区挑战献力!

translation: 试玩金蟾菇, 赢取 60 包金蟾菇种子, 并为社区挑战献力!

暗影叶

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Shadow Leaf ducks ninja-like out of the party without telling a soul. \Where's Shadow Leaf?\" ask the other plants. They don't know. Nobody does. Shadow Leaf is just that sneaky."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}暗影叶如同忍者一样地离开了派对, 没有被一个人察觉到. 暗影叶在哪? 试试问问其他植物, 没人知道. 暗影叶就是这么狡猾.

original: Shadow Leaves instantly power up shadow plants in a large area.
translation: 暗影叶强化一片区域内的暗影植物.

蒲公英

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}reacts to Hurrikale, releasing a barrage of seeds but will take a while to regenerate\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\Look,\" says Dandelion, shaking his head. \"I'm not a leprechaun and I'm not a genie. You can blow my seeds off all you want, but I can't make your wish come true. I don't even know how that rumor got started.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}飓风甘蓝可以让蒲公英释放大量种子炸弹, 但需要一段时间恢复\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"看吧,\" 蒲公英摇着头说. \"我不是什么妖精, 也不是精灵. 你可以把我的种子吹掉, 但我没法让你的愿望成真. 我甚至不知道这个谣言是怎么开始的.\"

original: Dandelions send explosive seeds down three different lanes, one lane at a time.
translation: 蒲公英向三条路发射爆炸种子, 每次攻击一条路.

original: Sends explosive seeds down three different lanes, one lane at a time.

飞镖洋蓟

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}each shot has a chance to do critical damage
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}has a limited supply of darts, then must recharge
{KEYWORD}Dartichoke Priority Targets:
{STAT}All-Star Zombie
{STAT}Explorer Zombie
{STAT}Fisherman Zombie
{STAT}Octo Zombie
{STAT}Pirate Captain Zombie
{STAT}Prospector Zombie
{STAT}Roman Healer Zombie
{STAT}Treasure Yeti
{STAT}Wizard Zombie

{FLAVOR}\Why waste shots on foot soldiers when you can win the battle with one well-chosen dart to the dome?" wonders Dartichoke. "Why would you do it? Why would ANYONE do it?""
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}每次发射都有几率产生暴击
{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}飞镖的数量有限, 发射完之后需要时间来重新填装
{KEYWORD}飞镖洋蓟的优先攻击目标:
{STAT}全明星僵尸
{STAT}探险家僵尸
{STAT}渔夫僵尸
{STAT}章鱼僵尸
{STAT}海盗船长僵尸
{STAT}勘探者僵尸
{STAT}罗马治疗师僵尸
{STAT}宝藏雪人
{STAT}巫师僵尸

{FLAVOR}"如果能绕过前面的炮灰, 直接一镖先擒王, 那又何必浪费子弹去打那些炮灰呢?" 飞镖洋蓟心想. "为什么? 为什么就是有人想不通这个道理? 为! 什! 么!"

original: Dartichokes fire high-damage darts down the lane, prioritizing especially dangerous zombies such as Wizards, Octo Zombies, and Healers.
translation: 飞镖洋蓟可以向所在行发射高伤害的飞镖, 并且会优先攻击诸如巫师 章鱼僵尸 治疗师等高危险度的僵尸.
攻击高优先级的目标
无人能敌!
哇啊啊啊!
舒服!
酷!
不错!
还行!
太疯狂了!
太棒了!
疯狂!
酷极了!
我为连击而疯狂!
哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊!
天
迷乱雏菊

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}release a stalling puff of gas at each stage\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Whenever they sneeze, nobody really knows whether it's their allergies to pollens acting up again, or they have an actual cold. Either way, others try to stay away because no one wants a face full of petals, making Spring Dazey Chain's least favorite season.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}每进入一个阶段释放一次失速紫雾\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}每当他们打喷嚏时, 没有人知道他们是花粉过敏发作了, 还是他们感冒了. 不论怎么样, 人们都试图远离他, 因为没人想要一脸的花粉, 这使春天成为迷乱雏菊最讨厌的季节.

original: Dazey Chains fire multiple stalling petals around themselves. They also grow to become more powerful after firing enough petals.
translation: 迷乱雏菊会在他的周围发射能够减速僵尸的花瓣. 当发射足够多的花瓣之后就会变得更强.
生长并使周围区域的僵尸减速
你击败了僵尸!
关卡完成!
超级天王赛季!
他们根本不符合计算机图形标准!
击杀8位僵尸!

original: Their team spirit is too overwhelming!
translation: 他们的团队精神太过头了!
击杀全明星僵尸!

original: Gamers in a game? Too meta!
translation: 游戏里的玩家? 这也太疯狂了!
击杀街机僵尸!
他们的气球也太耐用了!
击杀气球僵尸!

original: Barrels are for storing things, not for smushing plants!
translation: 桶是用来放东西的, 不是用来碾扁植物的!
击杀滚桶僵尸!

original: Time to get back to basics, and thin out the zombie horde!
translation: 把视线放回普通僵尸身上吧, 是时候削弱成群的僵尸了!
击杀普通僵尸!

original: Their pompadours and bikinis may be stylish, but they're still brain-eaters!
translation: 他们的蓬巴杜发型和比基尼可能确实很时髦, 不过他们仍然是一群食脑者!

original: Defeat Basic Big Wave Beach Zombies!
translation: 击杀巨浪海滩普通僵尸!

original: Teach these zombies that buckets are for making sand castles.
translation: 教教那些僵尸, 桶是用来堆沙堡的.
击杀海滩铁桶僵尸!

original: Better beat these beach blanket bozos!
translation: 最好击败这些沙滩毯傻瓜!
击杀海滩路障僵尸!

original: They're zombies, but they look like weird crabs! Ick!
translation: 他们是僵尸, 但是看着像诡异的螃蟹! 恶心!
击杀深海巨人僵尸!

original: Half fish, half imp. Entirely gross.
translation: 半鱼半小鬼. 真够恶心的.
击杀小鬼人鱼僵尸!

original: Their headgear is simply too geometric!
translation: 他们的头饰简直不要太几何了!
击杀冰块僵尸!

original: Their emotions are too raw, too honest!
translation: 他们的情感太原始, 太诚实了!
击杀音响僵尸!

original: Their fly moves are simply intolerable!
translation: 他们的飞行动作真让人难受!
击杀霹雳舞僵尸!

original: Time to make these zombies kick the bucket!
translation: 是时候踢掉这些僵尸桶了!
击杀铁桶僵尸!

original: Bug/zombie symbiosis is just too creepy!
translation: 飞虫和僵尸居然能互利共生... 真是令人不寒而栗!
击杀飞虫僵尸!

original: They look like bulls, but they're actually robots! GET 'EM!
translation: 看上去像牛, 但它们其实是机器人! 干掉它们!
击杀僵尸牛!

original: Bones in beards are questionably fashionable!
translation: 胡子里的骨头可能算不上时髦!
击杀侏罗纪暴徒僵尸!
击杀 {NUMBER} 只凯撒.

original: That camel-flauge isn't fooling anyone. Show those zombies they can't hide from you!
translation: 小样, 躲牌后面我就认不出你了? 快, 把那些躲在牌背后的僵尸给揪出来!
击杀骆驼牌僵尸!
击杀 {NUMBER} 只有氧运动僵尸.

original: They wrangled just one too many chickens!
translation: 他们养的鸡也太多了吧!
击杀牧鸡僵尸!

original: Practice a little garden safety by culling out Conehead Zombies!
translation: 把路障僵尸清理出你的草坪, 保障你花园的安全!
击杀路障僵尸!

original: These cow-punching, boot-wearing ghouls need some good ol' fashioned frontier justice!
translation: 这些穿靴子赶牛的僵尸需要被一位老派的边境法官制裁!
击杀狂野西部普通僵尸!

original: In my day, buckets were for mucking the stables!
translation: 我们那个年代啊, 铁桶是用来清扫马厩的!
击杀铁桶牛仔僵尸!

original: Send these cone rangers to the pokey!
translation: 把这些路障骑警送到监狱去!
击杀路障牛仔僵尸!

original: Those weird skulls shouldn't be able to do what they do!
translation: 这些奇怪的头骨不应该有这种能力!
击杀碧骷髅僵尸!

original: They're not pleasant, they're peasant! And that's terrible!
translation: 他们不是农民, 他们是农冥! 大大的坏事!
击杀农民僵尸!

original: They'll never be knights with low-tier equipment like that!
translation: 他们永远不会成为那种只有低级装备的骑士!
击杀铁桶农民僵尸!
他们的抵抗迂腐不堪!
击杀路障农夫僵尸!

original: Their big stone hammers are clumsy and all too effective!
translation: 他们的大石锤笨拙但有效!
击杀黑暗时代巨人僵尸!

original: These monks ain't funky! Except for their smell.
translation: 这些僧侣一点都不时髦! 除了他们的气味.
击杀小鬼僧侣僵尸!
他们的服装完全不符合历史!
击杀侏罗纪沼泽普通僵尸!
额. 铁桶太讨厌了. 把它们砸碎!
击杀侏罗纪铁桶僵尸!

original: Zombie like cone. You not a zombie. Crush cone!
translation: 僵尸喜欢路障. 但你又不是僵尸. 所以把那些路障打得稀巴烂吧!
击杀侏罗纪路障僵尸!
他们的骨头棒也太钝了吧!
击杀侏罗纪巨人僵尸!

original: Their mean little giggles are super unsettling!
translation: 他们卑鄙的傻笑真是让人不安!
击杀侏罗纪小鬼僵尸!

original: Their 70s disco rhythms don't belong in their far-future era!
translation: 他们那70年代的迪斯科旋律与这个遥远的未来时代格格不入!
击杀迪斯科3000僵尸!

original: Who knew dodos could be such jerks?
translation: 谁知道渡渡鸟也这么混蛋呢?
击杀渡渡鸟骑手僵尸!

original: Bare-headed, cone-wearing or bucket-bearing, these basic bandaged brutes have got to go!
translation: 普通, 路障或者铁桶, 这些木乃伊三人组我看着就烦!
击杀远古埃及普通僵尸!

original: These pail-packers need to go pound sand!
translation: 这些装桶的人该滚了!
击杀木乃伊铁桶僵尸!

original: Don't they have a pyramid to build, or something?
translation: 他们不应该去建金字塔什么的吗!
击杀木乃伊路障僵尸!

original: Wrap things up by taking care of some Mummified Gargantuars!
translation: 击败木乃伊巨人, 终结这一切!
击杀木乃伊巨人僵尸!

original: They're always growling about obscure bands!
translation: 他们总是为小众乐队尖叫!

original: Defeat Basic Neon Mixtape Tour Zombies!
translation: 击杀霓虹普通僵尸!

original: They don't know what it means to be a metalhead!
translation: 他们才不知道金属头代表着什么!
击杀霓虹铁桶僵尸!

original: Their traffic cone and denim look is SO out of style.
translation: 他们头上的路障和身上的牛仔裤实在是太过时了.
击杀霓虹路障僵尸!

original: They need to learn at least two chords!
translation: 他们至少得学习两种和弦!
击杀重金属巨人僵尸!

original: Shovels just shouldn't be that effective! Punish them!
translation: 铲子不应该那么高效! 教训他们!
击杀铲子僵尸!

original: Use your leveled-up plants to tackle extra-tough veteran zombies in expert levels! Warning: May Be Tense!
translation: 使用你升级的植物来解决扩展关卡中的额外强硬的老兵僵尸! 警告: 可能会紧张!
游玩世界扩展关卡!

original: Somebody needs to teach these zombies that playing with fire is dangerous. That somebody is you!
translation: 得有人去教育那些僵尸玩火很危险. 就你了!
击杀探险家僵尸!

original: Because seriously. These guys. They need to go away.
translation: 因为说真的. 这些家伙. 他们应该滚蛋.
击杀渔夫僵尸!

original: How dare they shove your plants like they do?
translation: 他们怎么敢推走你的植物?
击杀机甲橄榄僵尸!

original: A skull on a head is one skull too many!
translation: 脑袋上再套一个头骨, 头骨何其多!
击杀侏罗纪龙骨化石僵尸!

original: They have shiny jumpsuits and awful, carnivorous intentions!
translation: 他们有着闪亮的连身衣和可怕的食肉之欲!
击杀遥远未来普通僵尸!
消灭! 消灭!
击杀未来铁桶僵尸!

original: They need to upgrade to the zCone 7 anyway.
translation: 不管怎样, 他们必须得升级到 zCone 7了.
击杀未来路障僵尸!

original: They have telephone poles for arms! TELEPHONE POLES!
translation: 他们把电线杆当作手臂! 电线杆诶!
击杀精英巨人僵尸!

original: They scamper around in creepy little spider-bots! Brrrrrr!
translation: 他们坐在那令人毛骨悚然的机器蛛虫里蹦蹦跳跳! 呕!
击杀遥远未来小鬼僵尸!

original: Take on the big boys by taking out some random Gargantuars!
translation: 随便击败几只巨人僵尸来让这些大个子臣服!
击杀巨人僵尸!
击杀 {ZOMBIE} {NUMBER} 次.

original: Roller skates are more of a 70s thing anyway!
translation: 旱冰鞋不过只是70年代的老东西了吧!
击杀闪光僵尸!

original: Because snowballs are preposterous hunting gear!
translation: 因为雪球是什么奇奇怪怪的狩猎工具啊!
击杀猎人僵尸!

original: They lack technological sophistication! Punish them for it!
translation: 他们缺乏科技复杂度! 让他们长长教训!
击杀极寒冰窟普通僵尸!

original: I've heard of ice buckets, but this is ridiculous!
translation: 我听说过冰桶挑战, 但这也太荒谬了!
击杀洞穴铁桶僵尸!

original: They're all just evolutionary dead ends!
translation: 他们已经掉进进化的死胡同里了!
击杀洞穴路障僵尸!

original: These lunkheads don't even have the decency to be slothful!
translation: 这些呆子也配用 \"地懒\" 来称呼自己?
击杀地懒巨人僵尸!

original: Unfortunately these yetis are anything but scarce.
translation: 不幸的是这些雪人一点都不稀有.
击杀雪人小鬼!

original: How do they pack all those zombies in there? It strains credulity!
translation: 他们是怎么把那些僵尸装起来的? 太不可思议了!
击杀脚夫小鬼僵尸!

original: These things are just weird. Please get rid of them!
translation: 这些东西太奇怪了. 把他们统统赶走!
击杀小鬼僵尸!
莫霍克发型的小鬼僵尸? 呕!
击杀朋克小鬼僵尸!

original: Why do they get jetpacks? It's so unfair!
translation: 为什么他们有喷气背包? 太不公平了!
击杀飞行器僵尸!

original: They're constantly ripping off other funnier zombies' material!
translation: 他们不断地剽窃其他更有趣的僵尸的材料!
击杀弄臣僵尸!

original: They refuse to govern with the consent of the governed!
translation: 他们竟然拒绝在被统治者的同意下进行统治!
击杀国王僵尸!

original: They work too hard upholding a regressive feudal system!
translation: 他们还在不遗余力地维护那倒退的封建制度!
击杀骑士僵尸!

original: Their exploratory efforts are highly questionable!
translation: 他们的探索精神值得被世人质疑!
击杀失落之城普通僵尸!

original: Buckets. Why did it have to be buckets?
translation: 铁桶. 为什么老是铁桶?
击杀探险家铁桶僵尸!

original: Impressive mustache or no, these guys have got to go!
translation: 不管有没有留着令人印象深刻的胡子, 这些家伙都得滚了!
击杀探险家路障僵尸!

original: They just lug too much stuff around!
translation: 他们不过是随身带着太多东西罢了!
击杀脚夫巨人僵尸!

original: Their helmets are just the piths!
translation: 他们的安全帽都是渣渣!
击杀失落之城小鬼僵尸!

original: Nobody should have ever issued them a license to fly!
translation: 任何人都不应该给他们颁发飞行执照!
击杀失落飞行员僵尸!

original: How dare they spin their mics that way!
translation: 他们怎么敢那样转他们的麦克风!
击杀说唱僵尸!

original: Robo-cone zombies are too cylindrical to be allowed!
translation: 机器路障僵尸太圆柱形了, 不允许存在!
击杀机器路障僵尸!

original: Their contemporary crimes may not be countenanced!
translation: 他们在当代犯下的罪行可不会得到包容!
击杀现代年华普通僵尸!

original: Make them kick the... well, you know.
translation: 让这些僵尸桶飞... 呃, 你懂的.
击杀现代年华铁桶僵尸!

original: A traffic cone is a timeless look for a zombie. But you're not a zombie, so smash 'em!
translation: 一顶路障是僵尸永恒的造型. 但你又不是僵尸, 所以揍扁它们!
击杀现代年华路障僵尸!

original: They're really just big softies. Make sure they know that.
translation: 他们真的就只是一群大软蛋. 让他们瞧瞧自己有几斤几两.
击杀现代年华巨人僵尸!

original: They already threw out the comics section!
translation: 他们已经把里面的漫画撕掉了!
击杀读报僵尸!

original: Enslaving octopuses for zombie purposes is just not cool!
translation: 为了僵尸的想法而奴役章鱼一点也不正道!
击杀章鱼僵尸!

original: Those parasols are just too fancy and expensive!
translation: 那些阳伞太花哨, 太昂贵了!
击杀阳伞僵尸!

original: These Pharaohs think that they rule, but they'll never defeat you in a duel!
translation: 这些法老觉得自己才是主宰, 但他们永远不会在决斗中打败你!
击杀法老僵尸!

original: They can't even read sheet music!
translation: 他们连乐谱都看不懂!
击杀钢琴僵尸!
给这些臭海盗一点颜色瞧瞧!
击杀海盗港湾普通僵尸!

original: Swab the decks with their leaky headgear!
translation: 用他们漏水的头盔来清洁甲板吧!
击杀海盗铁桶僵尸!

original: Do it before they mutate into Pirate Admiral Zombies!
translation: 在他们变异成海盗僵尸上将之前动手吧!
击败海盗船长僵尸!

original: Cross their crossbones off the list!
translation: 把他们的交叉骨从名单上叉掉!
击杀海盗路障僵尸!
他们也太庞大了!
击杀海盗巨人僵尸!

original: Turn these cannoneers into cannon fodder!
translation: 把这些炮手通通变成炮灰!
击杀海盗小鬼僵尸!

original: What are they hiding under their ponchos? You can never tell!
translation: 他们的斗篷下面藏着什么? 你永远不会知道!
击杀斗篷僵尸!

original: And defeat their scruffy prospector beards, too!
translation: 还要打败他们那邋遢的淘金者胡子!
击杀淘金僵尸!

original: E.M.Peaches make short work of these technological terrors!
translation: 脉冲黄桃能让这些恐怖的机械短路!
击杀屏障僵尸!

original: Their jackets and boots have too many spikes!
translation: 他们的夹克和靴子上的钉刺实在是太多了!
击杀朋克僵尸!

original: Ra Zombies are out to soak up your sun - time to make them ancient history!
translation: 太阳神僵尸出来吸收你的阳光了 - 让他们被遗忘在历史的长河里吧!
击杀太阳神僵尸!

original: Teach them it's better to leave relics where they are!
translation: 告诉他们最好把宝物留在原地!
击杀遗物猎人僵尸!

original: How can a seagull that small carry a zombie? It's ridiculous!
translation: 这么小的海鸥怎么能吊起一只僵尸? 离谱!
击杀海鸥僵尸!

original: They wear snorkels when they don't even need to breathe!
translation: 他们都不需要呼吸, 干嘛含着根呼吸管!
击杀潜水僵尸!
仅仅因为!
击杀超级球迷小鬼僵尸!

original: They're throwing away a perfectly good post-secondary education!
translation: 他们抛弃了一个非常好的高等教育!
击杀冲浪僵尸!

original: Who do they think they are, buckling those swashes?
translation: 他们以为自己是谁, 扣着那些斜扣?
击杀飞索僵尸!

original: It's time for these Tomb Raisers to learn that messing with you was a grave mistake!
translation: 是时候让这些造墓者僵尸明白跟你捣乱是个严重的错误了!
击杀造墓者僵尸!

original: What secrets are contained within its lunchbox? Only one way to find out!
translation: 它的午餐盒里藏着什么秘密? 只有一种方法可以知道!
击杀宝藏雪人!

original: That iceblock-shoving trick of theirs is way over the line.
translation: 他们的推冰把戏有点过分了!
击杀穴居僵尸!

original: Who hoards weasels inside a log? WHO???
translation: 到底是谁在原木里囤冰鼬? 谁???
击杀囤鼬僵尸!

original: Get them before they get you!
translation: 在他们抓住你之前抓住他们!
击杀狂野西部巨人僵尸!

original: Their dark transformative powers must not be abided!
translation: 绝不能容忍他们的黑暗变形术!
击杀法师僵尸!
击杀 {NUMBER} 只鸡
击杀 {NUMBER} 个Z公司顾问僵尸
击杀 {NUMBER} 个巨人僵尸
击杀 {NUMBER} 个Z公司技术支持僵尸

击杀 {NUMBER} 个国王僵尸
击杀 {NUMBER} 个淘金僵尸

translation: 由于不允许多个档案的存在, 接下来将会删除主档案之外的所有档案. 你确定要这么做吗?

translation: 你之前玩过植物大战僵尸吗?

translation: 这个按钮加速你的游戏. 更快的阳光, 更快的植物, 以及更快的僵尸!

translation: {KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}影响一整行的恐龙\r\n{FLAVOR}香水菇会放出纯净浓缩的爱情之雾

original: Perfume-shrooms enchant dinosaurs and charm them into working against the zombies.
translation: 香水菇催眠一条线上的恐龙来对抗僵尸.
催眠恐龙对抗僵尸
脑子焦油坑

original: No update available at this time. Please try again later.
translation: 现在还没有可用更新. 请稍后再试.

original: Could not retrieve update information. Check that you are connected to the internet or try again at another time.
translation: 无法取得更新信息. 请检查你是否已经连接到了互联网, 或者稍后再试.

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}briefly stuns non-flying zombies\r\n{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}air cannon knocks critters, imps and shrunken zombies off the lawn\r\n{FLAVOR}Draftodil looks like she's full of hot air, but she isn't. She's full of highly compressed air. There's a difference!
translation: {KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}可以短暂眩晕在地面上的僵尸\r\n{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}空气炮可以击飞小动物, 小鬼僵尸, 以及被缩小的僵尸\r\n{FLAVOR}气流水仙发射出来的看起来是热气, 但实际上却是高压气. 这两者之间可是有差别的哦!

original: Draftodils windmill constantly, slowing flying zombies, and also shoot air cannon blasts that knock flying zombies off the lawn.
translation: 气流水仙可以不断地吹出气流, 减速飞行僵尸, 并且可以释放空气炮把飞行僵尸吹出草坪.
减速并消灭飞行僵尸
立即购买
{COUNT} 硬币!

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}powered Dusk Lobbers lob buds down 3 lanes instead
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can't be eaten by most zombies
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}The Concealment 3

{FLAVOR}Lobbing comes easily to Dusk Lobber, but that's only because she's had extensive training and really enjoys parabolas.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}被强化的幽暮投手可以向三条路同时发动攻击
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不会被僵尸啃食 (会被砸击, 碾压)
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD} 阶级解锁: {STAT}SDL-3

{FLAVOR}投掷东西对幽暮投手来说再容易不过, 但这仅仅是因为她接受了大量的训练, 并且非常喜欢抛物线.

original: Dusk Lobbers are shadow plants that lob explosive buds down the lane.
translation: 幽暮投手是会向前路抛掷溅射花蕾的暗影植物.

original: Lobs explosive buds, has more range when powered
translation: 投射具有溅射效果的子弹, 加强后范围更大

original: Return on occasion for more free coins!
translation: 常来看看吧, 说不定还有更多硬币在等着你!

translation: 留意更多史诗任务!

电击蓝莓

original:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}targets Gargantuars last
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}High AP Berry 3

{FLAVOR}Electric Blueberry prides herself on being eclectic as well as electric. \I like to keep 'em guessing," she says. "A zombie should always be like, 'Whoa, didn't see that coming,' when it's disintegrated.""
translation:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}最后攻击巨人僵尸
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}EBL-3

{FLAVOR}电击蓝莓为自己既能够保持中性又能够带电的能力感到无比自豪, "我喜欢让僵尸们不断猜测", 她说道, "僵尸们总是在被我的闪电劈得四分五裂的时候惊叹道, '天哪, 我可没看见那玩意儿向我劈来!'"

original: Electric Blueberries create thunderclouds that electrocute random zombies, prioritizing special zombies first.
translation: 电击蓝莓制造一片雷云电击随机的僵尸, 优先选择特殊僵尸.
随机电击僵尸, 优先电击特殊僵尸
电流醋栗

original: {FLAVOR}\Electricity is all very well and fine as a phenomenon,\" says Electric Currant, \"but electromagnetism as a whole is where it's really at.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}\"电是一种很好的现象.\" 电流醋栗说道, \"但电击这一整体才是它真正所在.\"

original: Electric Currants create electrical fences between ones planted on the same row or column.
translation: 电流醋栗与同行和同列的电流醋栗制造电场.

original: Creates electric fences & zaps eating zombies
translation: 制造电场并电击啃食他的僵尸
电能茶

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}\I want to be eaten. I NEED to be eaten,\" says Electrici-tea. \"However, I am perfectly content to fry nearby zombies in the meantime.\""
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}\"我想要被吃掉, 我也需要被吃掉.\" 电能茶说. \"不过, 我很乐意在这段时间里尽情地电击僵尸.\"

original: Electrici-teas wait and emit zaps of electrical energy until they are eaten, at which point the eating zombies explode in a flurry of electrical discharges.
translation: 电力绿茶会在他的周围释放雷电, 如果僵尸把他吃掉了, 那么那只吃掉他的僵尸会在他的电击中变成灰烬.
电击附近僵尸, 被吃掉后爆炸
电能豌豆

original: {FLAVOR}As the latest member of the Electric Family, he's all about puns and jokes. But in battle, he's all serious and concentrated. To him, their resistance is futile, and they'd better be shocked about his ability. But, at the end of the day, he just wants to get back to his ohm sweet home, eat some light snacks and learn watt are the current jokes.
translation: {FLAVOR}作为电系家族的最新成员, 他热衷于双关语和笑话. 但在战斗中, 他非常认真专注. 对他来说, 僵尸的反抗是徒劳的, 他们最好对他的能力感到震惊. 但是, 在一天结束时, 他只想回到他甜蜜的家, 吃一些电力零食, 学习一些电流笑话.

original: Electric Peas fire pea-like orbs that zap all nearby zombies until they collide.
translation: 电能豌豆发射像豌豆一样的电球, 摧毁附近所有僵尸, 直到他们发生碰撞.

original: Fires electric orbs that zap all nearby zombies
translation: 发射电球, 消灭附近的所有僵尸
通电
脉冲黄桃

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}also stops all zombies faster than 160% speed
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated

{FLAVOR}Has grown tired of people lazily calling him E.M. Pea. \There's a C and H there for a reason people! And I've got the stone to prove it!""
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}还能停止所有速度超过160%的僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}他已经厌倦了人们叫他 E.M.Pea. "明明后面还有个 C 和 H! 我有足够的证据来证明这一点!"

original: E.M.Peaches instantly explode, disabling all machines in an area.
translation: 脉冲黄桃种下即爆炸, 使一片范围内的机甲瘫痪.

original: Disables all machines and fast zombies in an area
translation: 使一片范围内的机甲瘫痪, 并定身那些速度较快的僵尸

original: Take a leveled-up poison-boosting Ail-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试高等级的可以加强毒类植物的疾病薄荷, 赢取奖励!

original: Try a Leveled-Up Ail-mint for Free!
translation: 免费试用升级后的疾病薄荷!

original: Take a poison-boosting Ail-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试加强剧毒类植物的疾病薄荷, 赢取奖励!
免费试用疾病薄荷!

original: Take a leveled-up pea-boosting Appease-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试升级的能加强豌豆类植物的豌豆薄荷, 并赢取奖励!

original: Try a Leveled-Up Appease-mint for Free!
translation: 免费试用高等级的豌豆薄荷!

original: Take a shooter-boosting Appease-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试可以加强射击类植物的豌豆薄荷, 赢取奖励!
免费试用豌豆薄荷!

original: Take a leveled-up lobber-boosting Arma-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试高等级的军械薄荷, 赢取奖励!

original: Try a Leveled-Up Arma-mint for Free!
translation: 免费试用高等级的军械薄荷!

original: Take a lobber-boosting Arma-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试用军械薄荷, 看看他是如何强化投掷类植物的!
免费试用军械薄荷!

original: Take a leveled-up explosive-boosting Bombard-mint for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
translation: 试试高等级的轰炸薄荷, 赢取奖励!

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Wild West 2\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\When other plants talk about me, they say I'm too gruff. They say I'm difficult to approach, that I'm afraid to let others get too close to me. Also, I smell terrible,\" said Endurian. But deep down inside, he knows that he's so much more than that. He's also short-tempered."
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}WW-2\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"当别人提到我的时候, 他们说我太难以接近了, 因为我总是很害怕别人的接近. 并且, 我的气味有点难闻.\" 榴莲这么说着. 但是实际上, 他知道他比自己说的更糟糕: 他的脾气也非常暴躁.

original: Endurians are defensive plants that deal damage to zombies attacking them.

original: {FLAVOR}\I was once the champion of the League Championship in bowling, that was five years ago...\", says Explode-O-Nut, \"and then, the Bulb team from the Northern Shores showed up. I kept trying, harder and harder\", but all that effort got him nowhere near to them. \"We haven't really talked much since we met each other. They are good kids, though\"."
translation: {FLAVOR}我曾经是保龄球锦标赛冠军, 但那是五年前的事了... 爆炸坚果说, \"在那之后, 北海岸的保龄泡泡团队出现了. 我一直在努力, 越来越努力, 但所有的努力都让我离他们更远. 自从我们认识之后, 我们就没怎么说话了. 不过他们是好孩子.\"

{FLAVOR}Fire Pea knows that what she does looks exciting. But working with an open flame is serious and, more importantly, dangerous business.  That's why, in her spare time, she talks to children about the importance of fire safety. \I'm a trained professional," she explains. "Don't try this at home, kids." "

original: {FLAVOR}\I think of myself as a pretty confident shroom and an all-around fungi,\" says Fume-shroom. \"But sometimes, when I'm eating Plant Food, I hear them chuckling. I hear them calling me 'Balloon-shroom'. I don't think they know how much that hurts.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}\"我是一个充满自信, 无所不能的蘑菇.\" 大喷菇说, \"但是有时候, 当我使用叶绿素, 我听到有植物在窃窃私语, 他们居然叫我 '气球菇'! 他们根本不知道这有多伤菇.\"

translation: {FLAVOR}对抗僵尸的利器, 也能抵挡住任何不慎游荡过来的吸血鬼.

original: Garlics divert zombies that ate them into other lanes.
translation: 大蒜把啃食他的僵尸驱赶到相邻路.
把僵尸驱赶到相邻路

你想要购买 {THING_TO_PURCHASE} 吗?

original: Low on gems? Convert coins to gems!
translation: 缺少钻石? 用金币兑换钻石!
你获得了 {NUMBER} 颗钻石!
幽灵辣椒

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can hover above ground or water and phase through a few grid items
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Lost City 14

{FLAVOR}You might not know it looking at her, but Ghost Pepper didn't always wear that white sheet everywhere she went. She first put it on as a lark for a Halloween party one year. Everyone else had these elaborate costumes, and she thought it would be funny to dress like a plain ol' ghost. But she fell in love with that costume. It spoke to her. She'd found her calling.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}能够在地面货水面上悬浮, 并且能够恐吓一整行僵尸
{KEYWORD}解锁阶级: {STAT}LC-14

{FLAVOR}看着她的样子, 你可能没有多少印象, 幽灵甜椒并不是次次穿着那条白床单逛遍每一处. 她第一次穿上它是在一年的万圣节派对上. 其他人都身着精致的节日服装, 而她觉得穿得像个普通的鬼魂会很有意思. 但她从那以后爱上了那套服装. 她与那件服装坠入了爱河, 她似乎找到了她自己的使命.

original: Ghost Peppers haunt all zombies in their lane. They can also be planted on other plants to hide them from zombie attacks. After a while, it will explode and deal damage to surrounding zombies.
translation: 幽灵辣椒会恐吓出没于她所在路线的所有僵尸. 并且也可以被种植在其他植物上, 使这株植物避开僵尸的攻击. 一段时间后就会爆炸, 对周围的僵尸造成伤害.

original: Haunts all zombies in her lane and hides plants underneath
translation: 恐吓出没于这条线的所有僵尸, 并且隐藏下面的植物.
一盒额外的好东西.
神秘礼盒
紫泡蓓蕾

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can't be eaten by most zombies\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Despite their gloomy exterior, Burple Bloom are not really a shadow plant, and it irks them whenever people asked about their \siblings\". The whole shadow family annoys them greatly anyway and they will stay as far away from them as possible."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不会被大多数僵尸吃掉\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}尽管他们外表阴郁, 但他们并不是真正的暗影植物, 每当人们问起他们的 \"兄弟姐妹\" 时, 他们都会感到厌烦. 只要有人把他和暗影家族相提并论都让他们大为恼火, 他们会尽可能地远离那些家伙.

original: Burple Blooms shoot hovering bubbles as long as there are zombies or grid items on the lawn.
translation: 当紫泡蓓蕾所在的路线有僵尸时, 他就会射出悬浮的泡泡.
发射和堆叠悬浮的泡泡
黄金蓓蕾

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannot be imitated\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\Your botanists were so preoccupied with whether they could,\" says Gold Bloom, about nothing and to nobody in particular, \"they didn't stop to think if they should.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"你们的植物学家如此全神贯注的研究他们是否可以这样做,\" 黄金蓓蕾说, 不关任何事, 也不针对任何人, \"他们没有停下来想一想他们是否应该这样做.\"

original: Gold Blooms instantly produce a burst of sun all at once.
translation: 黄金蓓蕾能够瞬间爆出大量的阳光.

original: Gives an instant burst of sun
translation: 瞬间释放出阳光
黄金叶

original: {FLAVOR}\For a small initial investment, you too can generate huge sun,\" says Gold Leaf. She's a firm believer in solar markets."
translation: {FLAVOR}\"一笔小小的投资, 也能换来巨大的收获.\" 黄金叶说. 因为她是太阳能市场的坚定信徒.

original: Gold Leaves instantly create Gold Tiles on planting.
translation: 黄金叶在种植时会立刻变成黄金地砖.

original: Creates a Gold Tile on planting
translation: 种植时创造一个黄金地砖

original: You must connect to Google Play to access achievements and leaderboards.
translation: 你必须连接到 Google Play 才能访问成就和排行榜.
未连接到 Google Play
获得升级!

original: You got a new POWER UP!
translation: 你得到了新的强化!
进入活动
总奖励:
这些钥匙能解锁新的世界!

original: You already have all your keys!
translation: 你已经获得了所有的钥匙!

original: You just got keys for all the worlds! Check them out!
translation: 你刚拿到了所有世界的钥匙! 去瞧瞧吧!

original: You shouldn't be seeing this message, it is only for older players.
translation: 你不应该看到这个消息, 这只对老玩家开放.

original: Hey, time traveler! Here's all the world keys.
translation: 嘿, 时光旅行者! 这里是所有世界的钥匙.
爆裂葡萄

original: {FLAVOR}\Spa-BOOM!\" enthuses Grapeshot. \"You like that? I got a million of 'em! Wa-POW!  Buh-BLAM! Za-... um... Ker-... hmmm... Okay, I guess I've only got the three.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}\"啪, 轰!\" 爆裂葡萄热情似火. \"你喜欢这声儿吗? 我有上百种爆炸声音! 哇, 砰! 蚌, 砰! 炸... 额... 吭... 呃呃呃... 好吧, 我只有三种这样的声音.\"

original: Grapeshots instantly explode and scatter bouncing projectiles in eight directions.
translation: 爆裂葡萄会立即爆炸, 并向八个方向发射反弹葡萄.
爆炸并散射会反弹的葡萄
噬碑藤

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}deals damage to nearby grid items when finished
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Daytime Dark Ages 6

{FLAVOR}He may appear spiky or ill-tempered, but Grave Buster just wants to give you a big hug. Unless you're a puppy. He's terrified of those.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}吃完后对附近的障碍物造成伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}DA-6

{FLAVOR}尽管看上去外表凶恶, 脾气暴躁, 但噬碑藤其实只是想给你个温柔的拥抱. 除非你是一只小狗. 没错, 他怕狗.

original: Grave Busters consume graves and surfboards they're planted on.
translation: 噬碑藤可以摧毁墓碑或者冲浪板.
无法使用叶绿素
移除墓碑和冲浪板

original: Disperse {COUNT} three-use Boost Tile every {TIME} seconds!
translation: 每 {TIME} 秒产生 {COUNT} 个能用三次的强化瓷砖!

original: Disperse {COUNT} single-use Boost Tiles every {TIME} seconds!
translation: 每 {TIME} 秒产生 {COUNT} 个一次性的强化地砖!
暗樱草

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}deals damage to every other zombie instead
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}powered Grimroses can drag 4 zombies before expiring
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}\When you think about it, the proper place for a zombie is in the ground," says Grimrose. "So, really, I'm just expediting the process.""
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对特殊僵尸会造成伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}被强化时可以多拖下2个
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}"你可以想一下, 僵尸最适合的位置就是在土里," 暗樱草说. "所以我真的只是加快了这个过程而已."

original: Grimroses are shadow plants that drag 2 zombies on their lanes into the dirt, prioritizing more dangerous zombies first.
translation: 暗樱草是一株可以把这条线上的两只僵尸拖入地里的暗影植物, 优先选择更危险的僵尸.

original: Drags zombies into the ground; drags more when powered
translation: 将僵尸拖进地下; 被强化时可以拖的更多
鳄梨

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Ask Guacodile to tell you a little bit about himself and he'll give you a wry smile. \I'm a Guacodile. I've got a bite like a bear trap. Heck, I've been known to walk on water. I'm pretty much the whole enchilada.\" Yeah, the guy is a bit of a braggart but he's good at what he does."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}问起鳄梨自己的事情, 他就会呵呵道: \"我是一只鳄梨. 我的咬合力就像捕熊器一样. 见鬼, 人们说我能在水上漂. 我基本上就是整个墨西哥卷饼.\" 是的, 这家伙有点吹牛, 但他擅长他的工作.

original: When attacked, Guacodiles will rush off the lawn, biting any zombies they encounter.
translation: 受到攻击时, 鳄梨会直线向前冲咬所有遇到的僵尸.

original: Rushes all zombies ahead of him when attacked
translation: 受到攻击时向前冲咬所有遇到的僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}stronger zombies form stronger barriers
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}best used against Gargantuars & Football Mechs

{FLAVOR}\I only chew ham-flavored gum," exudes Gumnut. "Ham and salt.""
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}僵尸越强, 形成的阻碍能力越强
{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}针对巨人僵尸和机甲橄榄球僵尸

{FLAVOR}"我只嚼火腿味的口香糖," 粘液桉果嘟囔着. "火腿加盐."

original: Gumnuts pop sticky gum onto zombies, pinning them in place and causing them to block other zombies behind them.
translation: 粘液桉果会把粘稠的口香糖粘在僵尸身上, 让他们定在原地, 挡住身后的其他僵尸.
制造黏胶黏住僵尸, 被黏住的僵尸会阻碍其他僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}resists damage with high health\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Headbutter Lettuce yawns. \Oh, is it that time? Time to headbutt zombies? Let me put on my butting face and I'll be right out!\" He's a champ."
translation: {KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}有很高的生命值承受伤害\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}黄油生菜打了个哈欠. \"哦, 可以了吗? 我可以用头去捶一顿僵尸了吗? 我只需要把脸糊上去, 马上就能完事!\" 真是个勇士呢!

original: Headbutter Lettuces bash zombies in front and behind while occasionally buttering zombies.
translation: 黄油生菜可以攻击前后僵尸, 偶尔还可以扔出黄油糊住僵尸.
猛击前方或后方的僵尸, 向僵尸投掷黄油
种子包冷却时间减少 {NUMBER} %
隐藏草坪
魔术番红花

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}attack with one big pellet from the front when planted on other columns\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Being a magician and doing actual magic are things some simple-minded people can never truly grasp, and Chrocus HATES those people. He and Witch Hazel bond over this fact, and god bless anyone who invokes both of their ires - they will never find one whole pair of socks ever again.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}每次传送时会同时造成伤害\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}作为一个魔术师, 做真正的魔术是一些头脑简单的人永远无法真正理解的事情, 而藏红花讨厌这些人. 他和金缕梅女巫对这一事实感同身受, 上帝保佑任何召唤他们两个兄弟的人 - 他们再也找不到一整双袜子了.

original: Chrocuses attack zombies from behind with 13 pellets when planted on two leftmost columns.
translation: 魔术番红花可以使用魔法, 将离你房子最近的僵尸送回草坪的最右侧.

original: Attacks zombies from behind when close to home
translation: 将离房子最近的僵尸送回草坪的最右侧
冬青屏障

original:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
{KEYWORD}{STAT}Note: {STAT}Holly leaves cannot be revived with Intensive Carrot

{FLAVOR}Holly Barrier would like to advise folks not to eat his berries. \It's rude to eat somebody's berries without asking," he says. "In addition, they are highly toxic.""
translation:
{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}点击一次瞄准, 再点击一次发射
{KEYWORD}{STAT}注意: {STAT}冬青叶不响应复活萝卜

{FLAVOR}冬青骑士建议大家不要吃他的浆果. 他说: "不经询问就吃别人的浆果是不礼貌的. 另外, 他们是剧毒的."

original: Holly Barrier deals damage to zombies attacking him, and can launch 3 prickly barrier leaves to knock back and damage zombies.
translation: 冬青骑士伤害靠近他的僵尸, 且可以发射 3 发可以击退僵尸并造成伤害的冬青叶

original: Damages attacking zombies and launches barriers
translation: 伤害靠近他的僵尸并可以发射冬青叶
全息坚果

original:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can't protect plants planted after Infi-nut
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}As a young nut he spent way too much time standing between two mirrors and trying to look into infinity.
translation:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}无法防护种在全息坚果后面的植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}作为一颗年轻的坚果, 他花了太多的时间站在两面镜子之间, 试图看到无限.

original: Infi-nuts can protect plants 2 tiles forward and backward while regaining health over time.
translation: 全息坚果可以保护前后两格的植物, 并随时间恢复血量.

original: Protects plants 2 tiles forward and backward while regaining health over time
translation: 保护前后两格的植物, 随时间恢复血量
导向蓟

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Plant Puzzle 8\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Don't even think about trying to pull one over on Homing Thistle. He's got a bead on you. He sees right through your facade. It's like he has a laser beam ... aimed at your soul.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}移花接木 8\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}不要想着捉弄导向蓟. 他早就盯着你了. 他能看穿任何伪装. 就好像带着激光枪一样 ... 瞄准着你的灵魂.

original: Homing Thistles fire seeking shots at targets that are the closest to home in his range.
translation: 导向蓟在他的射程内向离家最近的僵尸发射跟踪导弹.

original: Attacks farthest left target in his range
translation: 在射程内向离家最近的僵尸发射跟踪导弹
热辣海枣

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Ancient Egypt 15

{FLAVOR}Hot Date's a charmer. He's polite, well-read, has lots of interesting opinions, and practices active listening. He's the life of every single party - you should have seen him dance! Girls line up around him to talk to him wherever he goes.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}AE-15

{FLAVOR}热辣海枣很迷人. 他很有礼貌, 博览群书, 有很多有趣的意见, 并且积极倾听他人. 他是每个派对的主角 - 你真应该看看他跳舞! 无论他走到哪里, 女孩们都在他身边排队和他说话.

original: Hot Dates instantly attract nearby zombies from adjacent lanes to its lane.
translation: 辣海枣快速聚集相邻线上的僵尸.

original: Instantly attracts zombies to its lane
translation: 大范围聚集附近的僵尸
热土豆

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}How does Hot Potato stay so positive and even-peeled all the time? Yoga, that's how. She never misses a class. Also, regular meditation. It's the only way she can handle the hard work of fighting zombies, day in and day out, without melting down.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}热土豆即使在去皮时也能保持积极的心态, 为什么? 瑜伽, 这就是答案. 她从来没有错过哪怕一堂瑜伽课. 此外, 还有定期冥想. 这就是她能够面对僵尸战斗, 日复一日辛勤工作而没有倒下去的唯一方法.

original: Hot Potatoes melt the ice blocks and octopi they're planted on. They also deal damage to passing zombies.
translation: 热土豆可以融化冰块和章鱼. 还可以对经过的僵尸造成伤害.

original: Melts iceblocks and octopi; deals damage to passing zombies
translation: 融化冰块和章鱼; 对经过的僵尸造成伤害
小时
飓风甘蓝

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}blows away most flying zombies in lane\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}You could say Hurrikale is a \blow hard\" in the truest sense of the phrase. He is the first chair trombonist in the Biennial Philharmonic Orchestra. He is also proficient in the trumpet, saxophone and the tuba. But man o' man, you should really see him on the flugelhorn. Dude absolutely kills it."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以直接吹飞飞行僵尸\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}你可以说飓风甘蓝是真正意义上的 \"用力吹\". 他是两年一度的爱乐乐团中第一位长号手. 他还精通小号, 萨克斯管和大号. 但伙计, 你真该看看他在活塞军号上的表现. 那完全让他感到痛苦.

original: Hurrikales instantly push back all zombies in their lane with a chilling wind.
translation: 飓风甘蓝击退并冷却一条线上的僵尸.

original: Blows a chilling wind that pushes back zombies in lane
translation: 击退并冷却一条线上的僵尸
魅惑菇

original: {FLAVOR}Hypno-shroom has no trouble persuading zombies to fight on behalf of the plants. But he has yet to convince one to cluck like a chicken. \One day,\" he says. \"One day.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}魅惑菇很容易就能说服僵尸为植物而战, 但他却还没能让任何一只僵尸误以为自身是只鸡并咯咯叫. \"会有那么一天的,\" 他说, \"一定会有那么一天的.\"

original: When zombies eat Hypno-shrooms, they will turn around and fight for you.
translation: 当僵尸吃掉魅惑菇时, 它会为你而战.
魅惑吃完他的僵尸
魁惑
魁惑
极寒冰窟
冰封战场
极寒冰窟 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
冰封
寒冰蓓蕾

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}weak zombies in 3x3 area are iceblocked when defeated\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}The last time Ice Bloom had pancakes for breakfast, she wasn't satisfied. She can't say why, exactly, but there was something subtly wrong with them. The shocking reason? Substandard maple syrup.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}虚弱的僵尸在3x3范围内被击败后会被冰封\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}上次寒冰蓓蕾早餐吃煎饼时, 她并不是很满意. 她说不出确切的原因, 只知道有一些很微妙的问题. 所以到底是啥这么玄学? 原来是因为里面的枫糖浆不合格.

original: Ice Blooms freeze, chill, and damage all zombies on the board, and more so in a 3x3 area around where they're planted
translation: 寒冰蓓蕾可以冻结, 冷却, 并对草坪上的所有的僵尸造成伤害, 而在3x3范围内则会有更强力的效果.
冰冻与冷却
冰冻生菜

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Ancient Egypt 9\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Don't get lost staring into Iceberg's adorably cute eyes. If you do, it will be your last step... but only if you're a zombie.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}AE-9\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}千万别沉迷于盯着冰冻生菜可爱的大眼睛. 如果你这样做了, 这将是你的最后一步... 除非你是一只僵尸.

original: Iceberg Lettuces freeze zombies when stepped on.
translation: 冰冻生菜可以冰冻踩到她的僵尸

original: Flash freezes all zombies on the lawn.
translation: 冰冻全屏僵尸

original: Freezes zombies that step on it
translation: 冰冻踩到她的僵尸

original: We have detected multiple different identities associated with you. On the following screen please review the data with each identity and select which one you would like to proceed with.
translation: 我们检测到有多个不同的身份与你相关连.请在之后的界面上检查每个身份的数据,并选择你想继续使用的.

original: Identity save has failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translation: 身份保存失败.请检查你的互联网连接,然后再试一次.

original: Are you sure you would like to proceed with this identity? This will be the permanent identity associated with you. All Arena Winstreak, Arena League, and Adventure progress will be lost on other identities.
translation: 你确定想要用这个身份来进行游戏吗? 一旦确认, 这个身份将会永远和您绑定. 其他身份的竞技场连胜数, 竞技场段位, 甚至冒险进度都将会永远丢失.

模仿者

original: {FLAVOR}Having studied French Theater at Julienne, the Imitater went to the streets with his art, and has perfected his technique he calls \Potato stuck in a box.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}在瑞丽安学习法国戏剧后, 这位模仿者走上街头表演他的艺术, 并完善了他称之为 \"关在盒子里的洋芋\" 的表演.

original: Imitaters let you use two of the same plant during a level!
translation: 模仿者让你在一关内携带两株相同的植物!

original: Performs Plant Food effect of the plant it's imitating.
translation: 被复制的植物立即开大.

original: Lets you have two of the same plant
translation: 让你携带两株相同的植物
小鬼梨

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}Imp Pear impairs zombies. Of course, Imps don't appreciate this characterization, but who cares?
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}小鬼梨可以让僵尸变弱. 当然, 小鬼僵尸才不喜欢这种设定. 不过... 谁管他们啊.

original: When zombies eat Imp Pears, they become Imps. When Imps eat Imp Pears, they are destroyed, releasing stunning gas.
translation: 吃了小鬼梨的僵尸会变成小鬼僵尸. 而如果小鬼僵尸吃了小鬼梨, 他们会释放肠气并死亡.
将僵尸变成小鬼僵尸
地狱火蕨

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost\r\n{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}warms nearby plants\r\n{FLAVOR}Inferno doesn't feel like he gets enough credit. \Of course I burn zombies,\" he fumes. \"That's a given. But what about how I sweep them down the lane through the sheer force of hot air? Where's my prize for that?\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫被冻结\r\n{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以温暖附近的植物\r\n{FLAVOR}地狱火蕨觉得自己没有得到充分的认可. \"我当然能烧伤僵尸,\" 他恼火地说, \"不用说你也知道. 但是我用热气的强大力量击退僵尸的事情呢? 不该因此给我一份额外的奖励吗?\"

original: Infernos swirl up devastating fire tornados that sweep zombies back, burning and damaging them.
translation: 地狱火蕨可以制造毁灭性的火龙卷,并且击退并烧伤僵尸.
烧伤并击退僵尸.
让僵尸灰飞烟灭 {ACTIONS_LEFT} 次!

original: Use Cherry Bombs, Lightning Reeds, Jalapenos and more to incinerate ghastly ghouls!
translation: 使用樱桃炸弹, 闪电芦苇, 火爆辣椒等植物焚烧那些罪恶的食尸鬼!
把僵尸炸成灰!
给 {ACTIONS_LEFT} 只僵尸砸黄油!

original: Butter, Sap or Stall Zombies {ACTIONS_LEFT} Times!
translation: 让僵尸失速, 被砸黄油或树脂减速 {ACTIONS_LEFT} 次!
电死僵尸 {ACTIONS_LEFT} 次!

original: Use Lightning Reeds, Electric Blueberries and more to zap zealous zombies!
translation: 使用闪电芦苇, 电击蓝莓等植物电死来势汹汹的僵尸大军!
电死僵尸!
击退 {ACTIONS_LEFT} 只僵尸!

original: Use Primal Peashooter, Chard Guard, Hurrikale and more to bounce back pesky zombies!
translation: 使用原始豌豆射手, 甜菜护卫, 飓风甘蓝等植物击退可恶的僵尸!
击退僵尸!

original: Use Winter Melons, Iceberg Lettuce, Snow Peas and more to chill, freeze and otherwise cool down the undead!
translation: 使用冰瓜投手, 冰冻生菜, 寒冰射手等植物来冷却, 冻结前来的不死军团!
冷却僵尸!

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\How do I revive defeated plants?\" asks Intensive Carrot. \"In a word: vitamins. Vitamins and sorcery.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"我怎么复活死去的植物?\" 复活萝卜问道. \"简单来说, 就是用维生素. 维生素加上魔法.\"

玉米投手

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}50% chance to fling butter which immobilizes zombies for 4s
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Daytime Dark Ages 3

{FLAVOR}While working as an usher at the local movieplex, he saw \Fried Green Tomatoes" and found his higher calling. He packed up his husks, his kernels, his butter, and enlisted."
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}有50%概率投出定身僵尸4秒的黄油
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}DA-3

{FLAVOR}玉米投手原来是电影院的引座员, 不过自从看了 "油炸绿番茄" 这个电影后, 他发现自己是天生演戏的料, 于是他带着他的黄油和玉米粒, 向演艺圈进军.

original: Kernel-pults fling corn kernels and butter at zombies.
translation: 玉米投手向僵尸投掷玉米粒和黄油.

original: Triggers a butter storm that stuns every zombie on the lawn for a few seconds.
translation: 触发一场黄油风暴,使草坪上的所有僵尸昏迷几秒钟.

original: Flings corn kernels and butter at zombies
translation: 向僵尸投掷玉米粒和黄油
钥匙
钥匙门
野兽猕猴桃

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}knocks back zombies during growth\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\I like to keep an even keel,\" says Kiwibeast. \"But zombies... oooh... zombies make me so mad! And when I get mad... RARRRRRGGG!\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}长大时可以击退僵尸\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"我是想冷静的啊! 但那些僵尸...\" 猕猴桃野兽愤怒地说道: \"啊啊... 那些僵尸弄得我好生气! 我只要一生气... 就... 哼哼... 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊\"

original: Kiwibeasts emit damaging thumps, and become bigger and more powerful the more they are hurt by zombies.
translation: 猕猴桃野兽可以发出具有极大破坏力的撞击声, 僵尸对他的伤害得越多, 他就会变得越强.

original: Becomes more powerful as it takes damage
translation: 震击附近僵尸,随着受到伤害变得更强力
激光豆

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}High AP Berry 5\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}After a laser eye surgery had gone horribly right, Laser Bean gained a sense of purpose and a new-found affinity for competitive staring contests.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}EBL-5\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}经过了激光眼科手术后, 他获得了不可思议的能力. 现在激光豆拥有了强大的能量, 以及不眨眼游戏中的压倒性实力.

original: Laser Beans fire down a lane, hitting all zombies ahead of it.
translation: 激光豆对前方整条线上的僵尸造成伤害.

original: Shoots a laser that pierces through zombies
translation: 发射穿透僵尸的激光
岩浆番石榴

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Lava Guava frowns with barely-repressed rage. He's trying to keep it in check. He's trying so hard. But one day some zombie's going to push him too far, and he can't be held responsible for the consequences.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}岩浆番石榴皱着眉头压抑着愤怒. 他尝试保持冷静. 他是那么的努力, 但当僵尸对他得寸进尺时, 他就不能忍了.

original: Lava Guavas erupt on contact, damaging nearby zombies and creating a burning lava pool in its tile that incinerates zombies.
translation: 岩浆番石榴会喷射岩浆, 并生成一个岩浆坑对僵尸造成伤害.

original: Erupts and leaves behind a burning lava pool
translation: 喷发并留下岩浆坑伤害僵尸

original: You must complete Ancient Egypt - Day 5 before you can start the event.
translation: 你必须在完成神秘埃及第五日安后才能开始事件.
闪电芦苇

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on top of other plants
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Daytime Dark Ages 17

{FLAVOR}This may come as a shock, but Lightning Reed has a serious passion for ham radio. His call sign is El3ctric H1ccup. You can tune in every Tuesday to hear him read the classics to elderly plants. This week: Seeds and Sensibility.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在其他植物上
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}DA-17

{FLAVOR}这可能会让人感到震惊, 但是闪电芦苇对无线电收音机怀有强烈的热情. 他的呼叫信号是 "El3ctric H1ccup". 你可以在每个星期二收听他为老植物朗读经典读物. 本周朗读的主题: 种子与感性.

original: Lightning Reeds shoot lightning at the nearest zombie up to three lanes away and 5 tiles ahead. The bolt will then arc and hit other zombies.
translation: 闪电芦苇向最远三行外和前方五格内最近的僵尸发射闪电. 闪电会波及到附近的其他僵尸.

original: Launches a cloud that travels around the lawn, zapping zombies with lightning as it hovers over them.
translation: 喷出一朵雷云环绕草坪, 盘旋在僵尸上空时用闪电轰击僵尸.

original: Zaps several chickens or zombies per strike
translation: 每次攻击会电击多只鸡或僵尸
莲叶

original: {FLAVOR}Not many people know this, but Lily Pad absolutely loves square dancing. There he is, a circular plant gliding across the dance floor making squares. He loves how it pushes his boundaries and really makes him think outside the sphere.
translation: {FLAVOR}知道这件事的人不多, 其实莲叶超级喜欢广场舞. 他一上场, 就仿佛舞池里滑动的圆盘横扫全场. 他特爱这种可以令自己突破极限, 飘飘欲仙的感觉.

original: Lily Pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them.
translation: 莲叶允许你在上面种植非水生植物.

original: Lets you plant non-aquatic plants on top of it
translation: 允许你在上面种植非水生植物

original: Leave spaces in the back columns for bigger shooters.
translation: 留些空间, 把更强大的射手放在后排.

original: Try for at least 2 columns of sun producers.
translation: 试着种植两排阳光生产植物.

original: Try to save sun for costlier but more powerful plants.
translation: 试着为更贵但更强的植物积攒阳光.

original: A plant becomes invulnerable during its Plant Food effect.
translation: 正在进行叶绿素效果的植物暂时不会受到伤害.

original: Don't be afraid to plant on the right half of the lawn.
translation: 不要害怕把植物种在草坪的右半边.

original: Thrown Imps tend to land in the same spots.
translation: 被扔出的小鬼僵尸往往落在相同的位置.

original: Stop or slow early zombies to give more time to generate sun.
translation: 前期让僵尸减速或者停下来可以让你有充分的时间来积累阳光.

original: Build sun production as fast and early as you can.
translation: 尽快, 尽早建立阳光生产体系.

original: Replace sun producers with offensive plants later in the level.
translation: 在关卡后期将阳光生产植物替换成攻击植物.

original: Back up barrier plants with short-range melee plants behind them.

original: The current tournament has ended, and a new one begins!
translation: 当前赛程已经结束, 下一赛程即将开始!

original: The current tournament ends tomorrow! Last chance to compete!
translation: 当季的赛程将于明天结束! 抓住最后机会完成任务吧!

translation: 你又可以免费游玩竞技场了!

original: Your pinatas have refreshed! Replay levels to win World pinatas!

translation: 当前的潘妮的追击任务已经结束, 新的任务又开始了!

original: The current Penny Pursuit event ends tomorrow! Last chance to earn awards!
translation: 当前的潘妮的追击任务将在明天结束, 抓住最后机会赢取奖励吧!

original: The current season ends soon! Last chance for awards!
translation: 当季彩陶活动即将终止! 抓紧最后机会赢取丰厚奖励吧!

translation: 新一季度的彩陶盛宴现已开启!完成他们来获得丰厚奖励吧!

original: Travel Log Update: Onward to {WORLD}! {QUEST_TITLE} to earn {XP_GRANTED} points.
translation: 旅行原木更新: 向 {WORLD} 前进! {QUEST_TITLE} 以获取 {XP_GRANTED} 点数.

original: Travel Log Update: You've defeated {DEFEATED_COUNT} brain-hungry zombies! Only {DEFEATS_NEEDED} left to complete the Quest.
translation: 旅行原木更新: 你已经击败 {DEFEATED_COUNT} 只饥渴的僵尸了! 再击败 {DEFEATS_NEEDED} 只即可完成任务.

original: Travel Log Update: You're almost there! Earn {XP_NEEDED} points and level up to Rank {NEXT_RANK}.
translation: 旅行原木更新: 马上就好了! 再获取 {XP_NEEDED} 点数, 就能升级到 {NEXT_RANK} 段位了.

original: Your Daily Gift is available in the store! Collect it now!
translation: 你的每日礼物已经在商店里了! 快去收集吧!

original: Don't forget to collect your Daily Gift from the store!
translation: 别忘了去商店收集你的每日礼物!

original: New Adventure Seeds are now available in the store!
translation: 新的冒险种子包现已在商店上架!

original: Come back for a new FREE pinata in the store!
translation: 回到商店领取免费彩陶吧!

original: Play Vasebreaker today! Those vases won't smash themselves.
translation: 畅玩本日的破罐者! 那些罐子可不会砸自己.

original: You're smashing it up in Vasebreaker! Play now to break your all-time zombie-wave record.
translation: 你在破罐者中势如破竹! 继续游玩, 打破你曾经的僵尸波数记录.

original: Take another go at Vasebreaker! Stand up. Dust off your plants. The zombies are waiting.
translation: 再来试试破罐者吧! 起身. 重新振作你的植物. 僵尸都等不及了.

original: Unlock the Butterizer! Defeat three Vasebreaker levels and all the butter is yours.
translation: 解锁黄油指! 完成三个破罐者关卡后, 黄油之力将由你掌控.

original: Take on the Vasebreaker again to unlock the mighty Butterizer!
translation: 再玩一关破罐者, 即可获得非凡的黄油指!

original: Don't stop Vasebreaking now! One more level and Butterizer and its mighty butter are yours!
translation: 别在现在停止砸罐! 仅需一关便可解锁闪耀非凡的黄油指, 它那巨多的黄油将就此归你所有!

original: The zombies are coming in Vasebreaker! Defeat {ENDLESS_WAVE} waves to take control with the Vase Displacer!
translation: 破罐者中的僵尸来了! 砸破 {ENDLESS_WAVE} 波罐子以掌握移瓶指!

original: See hidden zombies. Finish the Vasebreaker tutorial now and get X-Ray power!
translation: 窥见藏匿于罐中的僵尸. 立即完成破罐者教程关即可获得透罐指!

translation: 宝藏雪人觉得你太拉了. 向他证明自己!

translation: 快! 击败宝藏雪人, 夺取他的午餐盒!

磁力菇

original: {FLAVOR}Despite his unusual appearance, Magnet-shroom doesn't have a problem attracting girlfriends. But he does have a problem keeping them. It's the same thing every time. In the end, they always find him too clingy.
translation: {FLAVOR}虽然磁力菇外形奇特, 但是对找女朋友完全没有影响. 可真谈了恋爱却都维持不长, 每个姑娘都因为同一个理由和他分手: 太粘人.

original: Magnet-shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies around them.
translation: 磁力菇移除僵尸的头盔, 也能吸一些别的金属制品.

translation: 移除僵尸的头盔, 也能吸一些别的金属制品

original: {FLAVOR}Marigold has dedicated herself to the Zen lifestyle. She's a team player, and gives it her best there in the garden. But if she never has to confront another zombie on the lawn again it will be too soon.
translation: {FLAVOR}金盏花致力于禅境花园的运作. 她是一个团队合作者, 在花园里倾尽全力. 但是她没必要在草坪上再面对另一只僵尸, 那太早了.

西瓜投手!

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Secret Level 8\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\Everyone says my head looks like a melon,\" said the middle child of the Pult family, \"and they would be right.\" Don't ask him if he's seedless or not though, it offends him and frankly it's none of your business."
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}S-8\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"人人都说我的头长得像个西瓜\", 投手家族的二把手说. \"可能是真的吧.\" 千万别问他是不是无籽西瓜, 这冒犯了他, 坦白说, 这不关你的事.

original: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.
translation: 西瓜投手对成群的僵尸造成巨大伤害.

original: Heavy melons are launched up that target every zombie on the lawn.
translation: 发射大量沉重的西瓜,砸向草坪上的每只僵尸.

translation: 成群的僵尸造成巨大伤害

{FLAVOR}Other plants often make fun of her, because she doesn't really have any toes despite her name being \Missile Toe". THAT makes her a bit mad... so she took vengeance, in her own way - by hanging herself up as an ornament right above the door during last year's Christmas party. After mortifying several couples and a zombie, she was sure that others wouldn't mess with her again."
translation:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击一次瞄准, 再点击一次发射
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}其他植物经常取笑她, 因为尽管她的另一个名字叫 "导弹脚趾", 但她实际上没有脚趾. 这让她有点生气... 因此, 她以自己的方式复仇 - 在去年的圣诞派对上, 她把自己挂在门上作为装饰品. 在羞辱了几对情侣和一只僵尸之后, 她确信其他人不会再惹她了.

original: Missile Toes launch cold blasts at any tile on the lawn. They deal damage to zombies on the impact tile & can freeze/chill in a 3x3 area.
translation: 槲寄生可以发射冰弹. 它可以在目标格内杀伤僵尸并在3x3的范围内造成冷却与冰冻.

original: You've completed a pile of quests! Have a pile of rewards!
translation: 你完成了一堆挑战!拿走一堆奖励吧!
黑暗夏威夷果

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}damaged murk regrows over time\r\n{FLAVOR}\r\n\Some say that encasing yourself in gelatin is no way to conduct an offense,\" says Murkadamia Nut with an infectious twinkle. \"I say they just haven't planted ME yet!\""
translation: {KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}可以随时间黑暗再生\r\n{FLAVOR}\r\n\"有的人说, 你真以为把自己放在果冻里就可以刀枪不入了?\" 黑暗夏威夷果的眼中闪了一道不屑而又自信的光, 说道: \"那他们可能还没见过我.\"

original: Murkadamia Nuts are defensive shadow plants who, when powered, grow jelly murk to damage attacking zombies.
translation: 黑暗夏威夷果是一株防御性植物,在被暗影强化时 可以生长出黑暗果冻对僵尸造成伤害.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Now, listen carefully. The next part is important.
translation: {SAY} 现在, 注意听. 下一部分非常重要.

original: {SAY}Tiers are like alternate versions for plants. Some stats will be better, while some stats will be worse.
translation: {SAY} 阶级就像植物的不同版本, 有些属性会变得强大, 同时有的属性也会变得糟糕.

original: {SAY}Plant tiers can have a great impact on your strategies. Think wisely before choosing the plant tiers.
translation: {SAY}植物的阶级对你的作战计划有很大的影响. 要明智的选择植物的阶级.

original: {SAY}You need to buy Tier 2 and Tier 3 once before you can go back to Tier 1.
translation: {SAY}你需要同时花费金币购买二阶和三阶才能回到一阶.

original: {SAY}After that, you can switch the tier of a plant to whatever you want.
translation: {SAY}然后, 你就可以随意的切换植物的阶级啦.

original: {SAY}Some plants will require seed packets to unlock the tiering ability.
translation: {SAY}有些植物需要找到他们的种子包才能解锁他们的换阶能力.

original: {SAY}You can find the seed packets in the store or side quests.
translation: {SAY}你能在商店或是支线任务中找到种子包.

original: {SAY}Now, tap 'Find More' to end this tutorial.
translation: {SAY}现在, 点击 \"找到更多\" 来结束这段教程.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}你知道什么会很有帮助吗?

original: {EXCITED}A place where you can read about plants and zombies.
translation: {EXCITED}当然是一个可以查看关于植物和僵尸数据的地方了.
{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}你指的是图鉴吗?
不, 那不可能有用.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Bring your Peashooter to the next tier!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}让你的豌豆射手进入下一阶吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Looks like you can upgrade your Wallnut too!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}看起来你也可以给你的坚果墙升级!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}快看这绝美的沙滩!

original: {SAY:crazydave}It's got everything a growing plant needs!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这里拥有植物生长所需的一切!
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}阳光, 沙子, 以及大量的水!

original: {SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. My sensors indicate there are zombies on your beach...
translation: {SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫. 我的探测仪检测到这片沙滩有僵尸的出没...

original: {SAY:winnie}... and far too much water. It will overwhelm the plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 并且这里有太多的水. 这将淹没植物.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We have some Lily Pads left here... maybe we can work with that?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们这里还有些睡莲叶... 或许我们还能继续?

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Other plants can use Lily Pads to ride the waves!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}其他的植物可以通过睡莲叶来乘风破浪!

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Or as the vernacular of this era goes: They can \hang ten.\""
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}用这个时代的话来说就是: 他们能够 \"冲浪\".

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, data suggests that we should beware the tides.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 数据表明我们应该小心潮汐.

original: {SAY:crazydave}When the tide comes in, it'll be a WIPE OUT for our plant friends?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}当海水涨潮的时候, 难到会冲走我们的植物朋友?

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. The tide line indicates how high the water will rise. Plan accordingly.
translation: {SAY:winnie}确实如此, 潮汐线会显示海水的最高水位. 合理地规划吧.

original: {SAY:winnie}There may be zombies lurking underneath as well, so stay sharp.
translation: {SAY:winnie}并且还可能有僵尸在下方潜伏, 所以保持警惕.
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}和你一样敏锐呢, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The tide is overwhelming our plants, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 潮水都快淹没我们的植物了.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we bring in these Rotobagas over here.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我觉得我们应该拿出旋转芜菁.

original: {SAY:winnie}They can hover over the ground to stay above the water.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们可以悬停在空中, 保持在水面上.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So... time to declare this the \Floating Zone\"?"
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么... 是时候宣称这里是 \"悬浮区\" 了?
{SAY:winnie}也许是吧, 戴夫. 也许是吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! The water seems to be able to break their surfboards!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇! 海水似乎可以直接摧毁他们的冲浪板!
{SAY:crazydave}怎么会这样呢, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}I... truly have no clue. By all accounts, it does not make sense.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我... 真的毫无头绪. 从各个方面想. 这都说不通.

original: {SAY:winnie}Regardless, I have a feeling that is not going to help us with today's agenda.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不管怎样, 我都感觉这对我们今天的任务没有帮助.

original: {SAY:crazydave}And we are running outta sun too, Penny! How are we ever going to succeed?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们的阳光也快没有了, 潘妮! 接下来我们该怎么取得胜利呢?
