original: {SAY:winnie}I have faith in the other User, User Dave. They can figure something out.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我相信另一个用户, 戴夫. 他们总能想出办法.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Dudes, like, you're totally in for it now!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}伙计们, 你们现在已经陷入其中了!

original: {SAY}The Deep Sea Gargantuars have their slimy sights on you.
translation: {SAY}深海巨人用他那黏糊糊的眼睛盯上了你们.
{SAY}你们可以跑! 你们也可以游!

original: {SAY}But you can't escape their scaly grip!
translation: {SAY}但是你们逃不出他们的魔爪!
{SAY}待会见了, 失败者们! 署名, 僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}额. 那家伙真是太粗野了.

original: {TIRED:winnie}He is also quite unpleasant, User Dave. Quite unpleasant.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}而且他也不讨人喜欢, 戴夫. 非常不讨喜.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警报, 戴夫!

original: {SAY:winnie}These zombies will not back down until you have proven your worth.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在证明自己的价值之前, 这些僵尸是不会退缩的.

original: {SAY:winnie}You will need to kill them quick enough to dissuade them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你只有足够快地杀死他们才能让他们心服口服.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Sounds like it's gonna be a crowded beach party!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}听起来这将是一场拥挤的海滩派对!

original: {SAY:crazydave}... full of zombie corpses of course.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}... 当然全是僵尸残骸.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}深海在上升...

original: {SAY:winnie}The zombies lurking below it may be a problem.
translation: {SAY:winnie}潜伏在底下的僵尸可能是个大麻烦.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Forget the ones underneath, we have other zombies coming close as well!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}先别管下面的了, 我们还有其他逼近的僵尸要对付!

original: {SAY:winnie}This will be a huge and problematic attack.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这将是一个巨大并且麻烦的进攻.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们生存下来了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Take that, crazy beach! You can't drag us down!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}接招吧, 疯狂的海滩! 你无法把我们拖走了!

original: {SAY:winnie}I am also ready to travel to another era.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我也已经准备好去另一个时代旅行了.
{EXCITED:crazydave}那么, 快撤!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我一直在想...
{SAY:winnie}如今这种情况并不罕见.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I know, but hear me out... this is technically our lawn ages ago, right?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我知道, 但请听我说完... 确切意义上讲, 这是我们很久以前的草坪, 对吧?
{SAY:winnie}怎么?

original: {SAY:crazydave}How did it transform this much anyway?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}到底是怎么改变这么多的?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Boats and castles and cowboys and now... this!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}船只, 城堡和牛仔, 现在又有... 这玩意!

original: {SAY:winnie}... actually. Yeah. I question that sometimes too.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 确实. 也是. 我有时也想不通.

original: {SAY:winnie}And I say time shenanigans are the only acceptable answers for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那我只能说时间闹剧是目前唯一说得通的答案.
{TIRED:crazydave}*叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}We will have to come back to this later. For now, zombies bashing.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们将不得不在以后再来讨论这个问题. 现在, 僵尸正在蠢蠢欲动.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Seems like it is surfing season again.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}似乎又到了冲浪的季节.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that the plants will finally use my mini surfboards?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你认为植物最终会使用我的迷你冲浪板吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Unlikely. It is not a practical choice compared to Lily Pad.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不太可能. 与莲叶相比, 这是一个不切实际的选择.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But think of the implications... fighting zombies AND being rad at the same time!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但想想这意味着什么... 和僵尸战斗的同时还能表现得很酷!

original: {SAY:winnie}We simply cannot catch up with their speed normally.
translation: {SAY:winnie}正常来说我们根本无法赶上他们的速度.

original: {SAY:winnie}That is why we need Lily Pads - only a stable defense will do.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这就是为什么我们需要莲叶 - 只有稳定的防御才有效.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! It seems like Balloon Zombies have found their way to this era.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警告, 戴夫! 气球僵尸似乎已经找到了进入这个时代的方式.

original: {SAY:winnie}They do not fly as high as they used to, but tread lightly regardless.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们不像以前那样飞得那么高了, 但无论如何要小心行事.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Show them the might of our pult friends... and a dash of wind power, neighbor!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}向他们展示我们投手朋友的力量... 和一股风力, 邻居!

original: {SAY:crazydave}They will be blown away by our sheer force!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}他们会被我们的强大力量吹飞!
{SAY:winnie}...
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey there neighbor! We're playing a game today!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 邻居! 我们今天来玩个游戏!

original: {SAY:winnie}A game within a game, you can say.
translation: {SAY:winnie}可以说是游戏中的游戏.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yes! But, instead of monkeys, we have plants!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是的! 但是, 虽然我们没有猴子, 我们有植物!

original: {SAY:crazydave}And instead of balloons, we have Balloon Zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}而且虽然我们没有气球, 但有气球僵尸!

original: {SAY:crazydave}And instead of paths, we have the entire lawn!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}而且虽然没有小路, 但我们还有整块草坪!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now plant them plants, and pop me some zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在把植物种下去, 再给我抓几只僵尸!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That middle lane looks dangerous, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}中间那一路看起来很危险, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}I have detected that we will be getting a surplus of Plant Food today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我发现今天我们的叶绿素会过剩.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we can make use of some certain Plant Food abilities to defend.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们可以利用某些特定植物的叶绿素能力来抵御.
{SAY:crazydave}那么今天就没有植物挨饿了!

original: {SAY:winnie}I think we have bigger concerns than that, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我觉得我们有更需要担忧的事, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}What could be possibly be more important than feeding our plants, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}还有什么比给我们的植物喂食更重要的呢, 佩妮?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Yo beach bums! The beach's too rough for ya?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}哟, 海滩上的流浪汉们! 海滩对你们来说太猛烈了?
{SAY:zombossicon}现在将会变得更严重!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}For I make my mystery barrels rise up!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}因为我会使神秘的滚桶破土而出!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}What do they contain? A nasty surprise! Signed, Doc Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}他们包含什么? 一个危险的惊喜! 署名, 僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I am more surprised he is not pulling the evil laugh as a bad guy.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}我更惊讶的是, 他没有像一个反派那样邪恶地笑.

original: {TIRED:winnie}He means business. And so do we.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}他是认真的. 那我们也该如此了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Ugh. I think I got a starfish stuck in my system.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}啊. 我觉得有只海星卡在我体内了.

original: {SAY:winnie}That will take some time to clean. At least it is not a tentacle.
translation: {SAY:winnie}要花点时间才能清理干净. 至少它不是触手.

original: {SAY:winnie}I would have traumatized myself during the cleaning process otherwise.
translation: {SAY:winnie}否则我在清理过程中就会受到创伤.
{SAY:winnie}另一方面, 我们取得了胜利.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Back to the world of dinosaurs, then?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}然后, 回到恐龙的世界?

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. Or... what is left of it, after that meteor.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 或者说是... 那颗流星之后的它剩下的部分.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I hope they are ok! I DO want one as a pet, after all!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我希望它们都没事! 毕竟, 我确实想要一只作宠物!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Alert! I have detected a strange statue of surfing-era significance.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}警告! 我探测到了一具拥有冲浪时代意义的奇怪雕像.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie there! It's a tiki statue. With crazy eyes.
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}看啦! 这是一具提基雕像. 有着魔性的双瞳.

original: {SAY:winnie}Analysis indicates this tiki could inflict a challenge upon any who follow it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}分析表明, 这个提基会让任何信奉它的人面临一个可怕的挑战.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}So you're saying that a tiki torture awaits? Get it? A tiki TORCH-er?
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}提基 \"船沉\" 者是吧. 哈哈, 听懂这个笑话了吗? 提基 \"传承\" 者!

original: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave, I must say, your pun is...\r\nTORCH-er-ous.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}戴夫, 我不得不说...\r\n你的谐音梗说明了船沉的危险性.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I am picking up a grid of plants, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我正在收集整理一箩筐子的植物, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}My scans suggest that they can be swapped to create matches of three.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的雷达显示, 通过两两交换, 我们可以把三株相同的植物配对, 然后消去他们.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}I saw a game like that once on my telephoney!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}我曾在我的小手机上见过这款游戏!

original: {SAY:winnie}You can use sun to upgrade the plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}使用阳光可以提升场上植物的品质.
{SAY:winnie}通过制造 100 组匹配来战胜此关的僵尸吧!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们在哪, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这似乎是它自己的口袋维度...

original: {SAY:winnie}It is probably the machination of other time travellers.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这可能是其他时光旅行者的阴谋.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So... in Crazy Dave's tongue... Community Levels?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以... 用疯狂戴夫的话说... 社区关卡?
{SAY:winnie}确实.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}左轮手枪:\r\n上膛完毕
{SAY}怀旧钢琴小曲:\r\n下载完毕
{SAY}矿车:\r\n已重新入轨

original: {SAY}Chance of beating Zomboss once and for all:\r\n0.015%
translation: {SAY} 一劳永逸打败僵王博士的几率:\r\n0.015%
{TIRED}误差范围:\n0.016%

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}According to my data, zombies here are VERY fond of dancing.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}根据我的数据, 这里的僵尸非常喜欢跳舞.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be on the lookout for when they suddenly do so.
translation: {SAY:winnie}注意他们什么时候突然这么做.

original: {SAY:winnie}You cannot join it, if you are wondering.
translation: {SAY:winnie}当然你不能加入, 如果你有这想法的话.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. I've always wanted to know what it feels like to dance with the zombies.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哦. 我一直想知道和僵尸跳舞是什么感觉.
{SAY:crazydave}可能会很有趣!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}你们好, 植物偷马贼们,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Agents are arriving to mark your brains as my property.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我的特工马上就会来把你们的脑子划为我的财产了.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士.

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I do not want my brains all marked up.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我可不想脑子里全是记号.
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}花了很长时间才洗干净.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have a brand new challenge brought to us over here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们在这里面临着一个全新的挑战.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Killing zombies this time will score us some points.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}这次杀死僵尸会给我们加一些分.

original: {SAY:winnie}These marked tiles will grant double points if a zombie dies on those tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果僵尸死在这些标记的地砖上, 这些格子将授予双倍分数.

original: {SAY:winnie}To pass this challenge, we must kill nearly every zombie on the marked tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}为了通过这个挑战, 我们必须在标记地砖上击杀几乎所有僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}More marking! Except not on my brain! That sounds nice, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}更多的标记! 除非不是在我的大脑上! 这听起来不错, 佩妮!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Who could have possibly placed those endangered plants over there???
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}谁会把那些濒危的植物放在那里???
{PLAYFUL:winnie}值得庆幸的是... 他们在矿车上.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Still! Is it a trick from Zomboss?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是! 这是僵王博士的诡计吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Then we will simply have to outsmart him and his zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那我们就得智胜他和他的僵尸.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, it is time to saddle up and leave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 该骑马离开了.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL14}夕阳近在咫尺. 让我们策马前行吧!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Where do you think the future will take us?
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}你认为未来会把我们带向何方?
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}你说的是未来?

original: {SAY:crazydave}We should take another look at my Time-Space Map.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们应该再看看我的时空地图.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I say, Penny, old thing, tally ho! Pip-pip and such!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我是说, 潘妮, 旧东西, 扑克牌! 口哨等等!

original: {SAY:winnie} We are in the Wild West, User Dave. Not Victorian England.
translation: {SAY:winnie} 我们在蛮荒的西部, 戴夫. 不是维多利亚时代的英格兰.
{SAY:crazydave}有区别吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}We are likely to encounter far more ferocious former frontiersmen, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们可能会遇到更凶残的前拓荒者, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to sharpen our skills to stake any claim.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们将需要提高我们的技能以保证任何权利.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The West is full of animals, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}西部到处都是动物, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Not just bulls... chickens have also joined the battle!
translation: {SAY:winnie}不仅仅是公牛... 鸡也加入了战斗!

original: {SAY:winnie}They are too low to be shot by most straight-shooters, so be aware.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它们太小了以至于大多直线攻击的射手都射不中, 所以要注意.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! They are pecking good! We'll need to bring specific plants, then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}呵! 它们啄得很好! 那么我们需要带一些特定的植物!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that their meat is good, though?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不过你觉得它们的肉好吃吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Improbable. They are still zombies after all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不可能的. 毕竟它们还是僵尸.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}More chickens have joined the battle, directly this time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这一次, 更多的鸡直接加入了这场战斗.

original: {SAY:winnie}They may come randomly at any time as a form of ambushes.
translation: {SAY:winnie}作为一种伏击, 他们可能在任何时候随意出现.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I'll have a lot of fried chickens after this, then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}然后我要吃很多炸鸡!

original: {SAY:winnie}Please do not eat the zombified chickens, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}请不要吃僵尸鸡, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}It is as unsanitary and disgusting as it sounds.
translation: {SAY:winnie}听起来就很不卫生, 很恶心.
{SAY:crazydave}噢.

original: {SAY:winnie}On another note we have a new challenge upon us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}另一方面, 我们面临着新的挑战.

original: {SAY:winnie}We have to not spend any sun for a fixed amount of time to win.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们必须在一段固定的时间内不花任何太阳来赢得胜利.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So now we have protect our sun stash too?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以现在我们也要保护我们的太阳储藏吗?
{SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Protect the plants, protect the mold colonies, protect the sun stash...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}保护植物, 保护霉菌菌落, 保护阳光储藏...
{SAY:crazydave}要保护的东西可真多!

original: {SAY:winnie}Technically you do not have to protect your mo... never mind.
translation: {SAY:winnie}严格来说, 你不需要保护你的霉... 没啥.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫...
{SAY:crazydave}怎么了, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}It appears we have stumbled into Dr. Zomboss's farmhouse.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来我们闯入了僵王博士的农舍.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared for a GIANT pet swarm.
translation: {SAY:winnie}准备好迎接一个巨大的宠物群吧.
{SAY:crazydave}那就多吃些炸鸡吧!

original: {SAY:winnie}I still HEAVILY advise you against eating them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我仍然强烈建议你不要吃它们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But Penny! I'm hungry! We have been time travelling for ages!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是潘妮! 我饿了! 我们已经时光旅行很久了!

original: {SAY:winnie}No. I do not want you to become a zombie.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不. 我不希望你变成僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}噢.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我一直在想, 潘妮...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Why aren't there any zombie themed after trains?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}为什么没有以火车为主题的僵尸?

original: {SAY:crazydave}I want a good train raid just as much as a shoot-out too!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我也想看一场精彩的火车突袭战, 就像一场枪战一样!

original: {SAY:winnie}I do not know, User Dave. We can never guess anything when it comes to Zomboss.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我不知道, 戴夫. 如果是僵王博士的话, 我们永远也猜不透.

original: {SAY:winnie}Although we do not have train raids, we DO have Tumbleweeds this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}虽然我们没有火车突袭, 但这次我们有风滚草.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Good enough for me! Western stand-off, here I come!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}对我来说足够好了! 西部对峙, 我来了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Your logic confuses me as always, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你的逻辑总是让我困惑, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It appears that ALL zombies have become invisible today.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}现在似乎所有的僵尸都变得隐形了.
{SAY:crazydave}我也可以隐身吗, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}With a bit of radioactive waste? Probably.
translation: {SAY:winnie}用一些放射性废料? 可能吧.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Where can I find some in the middle of nowhere then, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么在这荒无人烟的地方哪里能找到呢, 潘妮?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final stand is near, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}快到最后一站了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}The whole country club is against us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}整个乡村俱乐部都与我们作对.

original: {SAY:winnie}Their piano music is even more in-tune today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们的钢琴音乐在今天更加合拍.

original: {SAY:winnie}Getting past them will be no easy task.
translation: {SAY:winnie}摆脱他们绝非易事.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Our spirit's strong though! We can make it!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不过我们的精神很强大! 我们能做到的!

original: {SAY:winnie}But theirs are also burning with hunger. We will see then.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但他们也饿得要命. 到时候我们会见识到的.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}没有什么能阻止我们!
{SAY:crazydave}甚至连这种饥饿感也不能!
{SAY:crazydave}那么现在那位博士先生在哪呢?
{SAY:winnie}我想, 不在这里.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So... I take it that we have to go back to another era to search for him?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以... 我认为我们必须回到另一个时代来找他?
{SAY:winnie}正确. 也许海滩可以.
{SAY:crazydave}更多的阳光假期! 好耶!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哦豁! 已经晚上了吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes, User Dave. The town looks even more desolated now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 这个小镇现在看上去更荒凉了.

original: {SAY:winnie}That will not stop the zombies from invading this place.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那不会阻止僵尸们入侵这里.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Day or night, we're always ready to swat them away!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不论白天还是黑夜, 我们都总是准备好把他们赶走!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}潘妮...
{SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Why do we have to deal with these micro managing challenges?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}为什么我们需要处理这些微操挑战?

original: {SAY:winnie}Zomboss's influence has spreaded far and wide... Maybe he set this up?
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士的影响可谓广泛而深远... 也许这是他一手设计的?

original: {SAY:crazydave}There may be another force at work as well, presumably?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}可能还会有别的力量作祟?
{SAY:winnie}可能是恶魔的力量.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这次只有雷管和机器 - 我的天!
{SAY:winnie}这些牛会有什么感觉吗?

original: {SAY:crazydave}I hope not. Those look quite nice for a ride!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别吧. 它们骑着应该挺不错!

original: {SAY:winnie}I doubt a robot build is better than an actual bull, but, your opinion I guess.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑机器制品到底会不会比真牛好, 但是, 我觉得你说的没错.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}别来无恙, 植物偷马贼们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Special traps have been equipped on the rails for the zombies.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我已经为僵尸们在轨道上安置了特殊的陷阱.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You're required to submit your brain to us; otherwise, your plants will suffer a blasting defeat.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们需要把脑子上交给我们; 不然, 你们的植物将遭受惨败.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}枪? 在狂野西部?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Finally! A gun slinging duel! Now where's my horse?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}终于! 一场举枪决斗! 现在我的骏马呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}A new plant has been found in this old town, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在这座古镇发现了一株新植物, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Any plant is always welcomed as a new friend! So what does this little guy do?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}欢迎任何植物新朋友! 那么这个小家伙能做什么呢?

original: {SAY:winnie}He will aim at only a specific spot 4 tiles ahead of him.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他只会向他4格前的方向投射子弹.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Splendid! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun with him!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}棒极了! 我相信我们会和他一起玩得很开心的!

original: {SAY:crazydave}But just in case, I'll also send more small friends to support him!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但以防万一, 我也会派更多的小伙伴来辅助他!

original: {SAY:crazydave}After all, small people have to stick together right?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟, 小家伙要团结在一起, 对吧?

original: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}If only he could be this profound and sane all the time...
translation: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}要是他能一直这么深刻和理智就好了...
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}你们好, 西部旅者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}More agents have arrived in the persuit of making you perish.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}更多的警官来找你要你们的命了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}The Rangers will dispatch you, and your brain will be ours.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}游骑兵会处决你们, 你们的脑子就是我们的了.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}他说的是老头联盟?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Ah, well. Our young and talented plants will fight back just as strong!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}啊, 行吧. 我们年轻而有才华的植物会同样顽强地反击的!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The town can rest easy for now.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这小镇现在可算消停了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Finally! Must be tiring for every one. It's 3 AM already!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}终于! 每个人都很累了吧. 已经凌晨3点了!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}When you are out time travelling, such concept does not matter anymore.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}当你外出时空旅行时, 这样的概念就不再重要了.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You're right Penny! Though it's definitely time we hit the timestream.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你说的对, 潘妮! 不过我们绝对是时候进入时间流了.
{SAY:crazydave}快马加鞭, 邻居! 你做的不错.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have once again returned to the Wild West, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们又一次回到了狂野西部, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be wary of the increasingly hungry and deadly horde of zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}要警惕日益饥饿, 十分致命的僵尸群.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Let's get to the usual business then, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那我们去干正事吧, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Gun Tiles have made a return, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}枪械地砖回归了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}As a reminder, they will continuously fire bullets to damage our plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}提醒一下, 它们将不断发射子弹来攻击我们的植物.

original: {SAY:crazydave}When will we ever get to use these tiles for our own good, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}什么时候我们也能利用这些地砖呀, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}Well... give me a couple of hours. I will see what I can do.
translation: {SAY:winnie}嗯... 给我几小时. 我看看能做些什么.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Ask and you shall receive, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有求必应, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}These reversed trap tiles will damage the zombies instead.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些反转的陷阱地砖反而会伤害僵尸了.

original: {SAY:winnie}They also fire much faster, so use them to fend off this massive horde.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它们的射速也加快了, 那就用它们来抵挡这庞大的尸潮吧.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now this is some gun-wielding action I have been looking for! Nice job, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这就是我一直在寻找的持枪行动! 干得漂亮, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}尽力而为.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! Looks like the zombies have abandoned all table manners today!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警告, 戴夫! 看来僵尸们今天完全抛弃了餐桌礼仪!

original: {SAY:winnie}I will buy some time to prepare, but be careful of the continuous zombie horde!
translation: {SAY:winnie}我会争取一些时间来准备, 但要小心持续不断的僵尸大军!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now where are the Reversed Gun Tiles when you need them?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在, 当你需要反向枪械地砖时, 它们在哪里?

original: {SAY:winnie}I am afraid we have run out of supplies, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}恐怕我们的弹药已经用完了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. Would have been *really* useful right now, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}噢. 现在本该 *非常* 有用的, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}你们好, 时间治安官们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Your attempts at defending this town have been admirable, but I'm afraid I must end this charade.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们为保卫这座小镇所做的努力令人钦佩, 但恐怕我必须结束这场游戏了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Time to face the enraged might of our endless supply of zombies!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候面对我们源源不断的僵尸了!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}哦豁...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Don't panic now neighbor, but giant zombies are coming again!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在可别乱了阵脚, 邻居, 但巨型僵尸又来了!
{SAY:winnie}只要... 专注于活下去, 好吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Well, it turns out his endless supply of zombies is not so endless.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}额, 事实证明他源源不断的僵尸并不是非常的源源不断.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are now safe to travel to other timeline branches.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们现在可以安全地前往其他时间线分支了.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}So long, Old West! Now where's gonna be our next adventure?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}别了, 老西部! 现在我们的下一个冒险将在哪里?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}My Uncle Milo used to have one these, he called it a boom box.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我的叔叔米洛曾经有一个这样的玩意, 他管这叫砰砰盒.

original: {SAY:winnie}Actually, that is close enough. I will allow it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}事实上, 这么称呼它已经够贴切了. 至少我认可这样.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}哦不, 僵尸吃掉了你的脑子!
{tutorial}
{SAY}还好你又得到了两个!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}Nice pick! Let's see how far you can get!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}明智之选! 让我们看看你能在这个模式中走多远!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Hi neighbor! Welcome to The Tiki Torch-er!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到提基文明传承者!

original: {SAY:crazydave}But beware! Zombies are selling seashells by this seashore!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是你可要小心! 僵尸正在海岸卖贝壳呢!

original: {SHOUT:crazydave}And they insist you pay in brains!
translation: {SHOUT:crazydave}他们还坚持要用你的脑子来付账!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Big Bad Butte!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到大孤峰!

original: {SAY}And by big I mean crawling with zombies...
translation: {SAY}我说的 \"大\" 是指这里僵尸横行...
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到亚瑟王的挑战!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Here you'll find that day is night and knights are zombies!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}这里你将会见到日夜颠倒, 骑士为尸的奇观异景!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Warning! Carafes containing chemical compounds of a malevolent makeup are detected!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}警告! 检测到含有有毒化合物的玻璃瓶!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Can you translate that into Crazy Dave Talk for me?
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}你能将这翻译成 \"疯言戴语\" 后讲给我听么?

original: {TIRED:winnie}There may be evil potions on the lawn, appearing once in a while!
translation: {TIRED:winnie}草坪上可能偶尔会出现邪恶药水!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Evil medieval potions! They're the most dangerous kind...
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}中世纪的邪恶魔药! 那可是最危险的品种啊...

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}On account of having twice the evil!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}那是因为它们蕴含着双倍的罪恶!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to La Brainsa Tarpits!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}你好啊, 邻居! 欢迎来到脑子焦油坑!

original: {PLAYFUL}I hope you're ready for a reptilian rumble!
translation: {PLAYFUL}我希望你准备好迎接一场恐龙大战了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Pyramid of Doom!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到厄运金字塔!

original: {SAY}It's just like a regular pyramid, but... you know... doomier.
translation: {SAY}它看上去真像个再普通不过的金字塔, 但... 你懂的... 它充斥着更多厄运.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to the GREATEST HITS!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}你好啊, 邻居! 欢迎来到最潮专辑!

original: {PLAYFUL}I hope you're ready for a righteously up-tempo experience!
translation: {PLAYFUL}我希望你已经准备好迎接真正快节奏的战斗体验了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Terror from Tomorrow!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到明日的恐惧!

original: {PLAYFUL}Making tomorrow's terror something terrible for today!
translation: {PLAYFUL}让明日的恐惧在今日就降临吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Icebound Battleground!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到冰封战场!

original: {SAY:crazydave}This place is cold as, uh, ICE ... not to mention chock full o' zombies.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这个地方像, 额, 冰块一样冰冷... 更别提还有源源不断的僵尸了.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Best bring some hot zombie-fightin' moves. And maybe a nice warm coat too.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}最好带些对僵尸 \"热\" 情的植物, 或许再带一件保暖的外套.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Temple of Bloom!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到鲜花神殿!

original: {PLAYFUL}Here you'll find that gold is good but brings out more zombies!
translation: {PLAYFUL}你可以在这儿找到值钱的黄金, 同时也会引来更多的僵尸.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to Highway to the Danger Room!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}你好啊, 邻居! 欢迎来到通往无尽的高速!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}All the eras in one spot... it's gonna be quite a show!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}所有时代都集中在一个地方... 这将是一场精彩的表演!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to the Undying Nightmare!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}你好啊, 邻居! 欢迎来到无尽梦魔!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}All the plants deal way less damage on zombies! What could go wrong?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}所有的植物对僵尸的伤害都降低了! 会出什么问题?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Please do not pick the mower card for this zone.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}请不要在这个区域挑选小推车卡片.

original: {SAY:winnie}Mowers are disabled for this area, and we cannot remove the card.
translation: {SAY:winnie}该区域的小推车已禁用, 但我们无法移除卡片.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to Community Endless Zone!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}你好啊, 邻居! 欢迎来到社区无尽地带!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}All the eras in one spot... it's gonna be quite a show!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}所有时代的聚集... 这将是一场精彩的演出!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to Dead Man's Booty!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}嗨, 邻居! 欢迎来到逝者的宝藏!
{PLAYFUL}我想把它占为己有.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}干得漂亮, 邻居!
{tutorial}

original: {SAY}Your Plant Food carries over to the next level!
translation: {SAY}你的叶绿素能保存到下一关!
{tutorial}

original: {PLAYFUL}Now it's time to pick another plant!
translation: {PLAYFUL}现在, 请挑选另一株植物!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}The Endless Zones are harder than usual!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}无尽地带会比一般的关卡更加困难!

original: {SAY:winnie}Power Ups and Plant Food can only be purchased once per level.
translation: {SAY:winnie}金手指和叶绿素每关只能各购买一次.
{EXCITED:winnie}祝你好运!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}干得漂亮, 邻居!
{tutorial}

original: {SAY}In the Endless Zones, your lawn mowers carry over to the next level!
translation: {SAY}在无尽地带, 你的小推车会保存到下一关!
{tutorial}

original: {SAY}Your Plant Food carries over to the next level as well!
translation: {SAY}你的叶绿素也一样!
{tutorial}

original: {PLAYFUL}Now it's time to pick another plant!
translation: {PLAYFUL}现在, 请挑选另一株植物!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{tutorial}
{EXCITED}这些是你的初始植物!

original: {SAY}Now you get to pick one more.
translation: {SAY}现在你可以多选一个.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}太让人惊讶了! 是谁把这处旮旯搞得这么暗?

original: {TIRED:winnie}No one, User Dave. We have simply arrived in the Dark Ages.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}然而并没有谁刻意这样做, 戴夫. 我们只不过是抵达了黑暗时代.
{SAY:crazydave}茫茫黑夜听起来就令我无比沮丧.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Indeed. According to my research, a plague has swept this era.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}确实如此. 根据调查, 一场瘟疫正好席卷了这个时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}Also, sun no longer falls from the sky.
translation: {SAY:winnie}同时, 阳光不再从天而降.

original: {SAY:winnie}Puff-shroom will be an excellent ally here as it is free.
translation: {SAY:winnie}小喷菇将是一个很好的盟友, 因为是免费的.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}那可真是太疯狂啦!!!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! I have detected some malicious statues!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警告, 戴夫! 我发现了一些恶意的雕像!

original: {SAY:winnie}We can touch the statues to damage them using some of our sun.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们可以通过点击雕像消耗阳光来破坏它们.

original: {SAY:winnie}If we do not destroy them quickly, something terrible will happen.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果我们不尽快摧毁它们, 可怕的事情就会发生.
{SAY:crazydave}是时候拿出阳光菇了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}These guys not only know how to brighten this place up...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这些家伙不仅知道如何点亮这个地方...

original: {SAY:crazydave}They are also excellent producers during these dark times!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}在这个黑暗的时代, 他们也是优秀的生产者!

original: {SAY:winnie}One of the rare cases where User Dave is sane. What are the odds?
translation: {SAY:winnie}疯狂戴夫罕见的理智了. 这是太阳打北边出来了?
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫!

original: {SAY:winnie}These gravestones here are much more dangerous than the ones at home.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这里的墓碑比家里的要危险得多.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared for unexpected surprises rising from them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}准备好迎接意想不到的惊喜.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Surprises? Do I need to get my hammer?
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}惊喜? 我需要拿锤子吗?
{SAY:winnie}我可以考虑一下.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Here is another tip on good defense.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这是另一个好的防御技巧.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may want to switch up your strategies to win the battle.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你可能需要改变策略来赢得这场战斗.

original: {SAY:winnie}Especially when it comes to picking offensive plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}尤其是在选择攻击性植物的时候.

original: {SAY:winnie}That way, your defense is more well-rounded and have fewer weaknesses!
translation: {SAY:winnie}这样的话, 你的防守就会更全面, 缺点也会更少!

original: {SAY:winnie}For example, the Dragon Imp here is immune to fire damage.
translation: {SAY:winnie}例如, 这里的小鬼龙僵尸免疫火焰伤害.

original: {SAY:winnie}So do not rely on only fire power as your offensive force.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以不要只依靠火力作为进攻力量.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}This will be the first Last Stand. There will be more lasts to come.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}这将是你的第一个坚不可摧关卡. 以后还会有更多.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}或者说是坚可以摧?
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}又一个传送带挑战开始了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Remember to try to maximize the usage of all the given plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}记住要将所有给定的植物的用处最大化.

original: {SAY:winnie}If you cannot use anything effectively at a moment, you should save it for later.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果你一时不能有效地使用任何东西, 你应该把它留到以后使用.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}今日幸会于此, 竖子!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It is my fervent medical opinion that your humours are out of balance!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}以余之拙见, 病在汝脑髓, 已入膏肓!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Methinks the siphoning of thine brains is the only way to correct this ailment!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}以虹吸之法亟治, 乃为疗养汝脑小恙之上道!
{SAY:zombossicon}不死何俟? 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Hey! I prefer my humors and my brains unbalanced!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}嘿! 我更加喜欢我那种幽默与脑子失衡的感觉了!
{EXCITED:crazydave}因为我疯了!

original: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Wait a minute, User Dave! Try not to...
translation: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}等一下, 戴夫! 千万不要...

original: {SAY:winnie}... use too much sun this time...
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 在这段时间使用太多的阳光...
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}This bonus sun upgrade will be useful in these dark times.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这个额外的太阳升级将在这些黑暗的时代有用.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should keep a lookout for similar upgrades as we move forward.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在前进的过程中我们应该继续关注类似的升级.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Massive graveyard... I expect a lot of Necromancies.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}巨大的墓地... 我预计会有很多死灵法术.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Where's my hammer when I need it?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我需要锤子的时候它又在哪里?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The knighty knight nights have finally been over!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}骑士之夜终于结束了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}But more importantly... is it gonna be vikings next?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但更重要的是... 下一次会是维京人吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Back to thee Dark Ages!... why is it still dark?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}回到了黑暗时代!... 为啥还是黑漆漆的?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is not how you speak in Medieval English, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}中世纪英语不是这么说的, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}But I believe that the zombies have managed to create a second plague.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但我相信僵尸们已经制造了第二场瘟疫.

original: {SAY:winnie}A smaller one, but, regardless, seems like we have some zombie bashing to do.
translation: {SAY:winnie}较小的一场, 但是, 无论如何, 看来我们要去痛击僵尸了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Grab yer shovel then! And hammer! I still can't find mine, sadly.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那就拿起你的铲子! 和锤子! 可惜我还是找不到我的.

original: {SAY:winnie}This will not be an easy fight.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这将不是一场轻松的战斗.

original: {SAY:winnie}And I feel like this is not gonna be the end of trickery.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我觉得这不会是诡计的终结.
{SAY:crazydave}和魔法!
{SAY:winnie}和魔法.
{SAY:crazydave}和封建主义!

original: {SAY:winnie}And feudalism. And a lot of other things that we do not have time to list.
translation: {SAY:winnie}和封建主义. 还有很多其他的事情我们没有时间一一列举.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}额, 我发现一些新的墓碑!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{SAY:winnie}我都不想多说.

original: {SAY:winnie}Zomboss seems to have managed to bring the tombstones from our backyard back.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士似乎已经把我们后院的墓碑带回来了.

original: {SAY:winnie}These will cause most plants to attack them...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些会使大多数植物攻击它们...

original: {SAY:winnie}... but every projectile will pass through them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 但每一发子弹都会穿过它们.
{SAY:crazydave}看起来像是噬碑藤最爱的大餐!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}It's getting darker and darker... More magic?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}越来越黑暗了... 更多的魔法?
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这可不妙.

original: {SAY:winnie}Better keep our eyes open, in case something slips by.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们最好睁大眼睛, 以防有什么东西溜走.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! A swarm of Shadow Zombies is about to launch an attack!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警报, 戴夫! 一群暗影僵尸即将发起攻击!

original: {SAY:winnie}Our endangered Chompers over here can take care of them with their sharp teeth.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们这边濒危的大嘴花可以用他们锋利的牙齿来对付他们.

original: {SAY:winnie}Also, Chomper's Plant Food can devour lots of zombies in a lane, so use it wisely.
translation: {SAY:winnie}另外, 大嘴花的叶绿素效果可以吞噬一行上的许多僵尸, 所以要明智地使用它.

original: {SAY:winnie}Just beware of other zombies and the gravestone lanes we will be greeted with.
translation: {SAY:winnie}只是要小心其他僵尸和迎接我们的墓碑小道.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared for a grueling battle up ahead.
translation: {SAY:winnie}为即将到来的艰苦战斗做好准备.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Good luck then, neighbor! See you soon!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么祝你好运了, 邻居! 待会见!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}别来无恙, 不那么尊贵的殿下!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Thou have fallen yet into another one of my traps!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}汝以如瓮中之鳖, 作困兽之斗!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Enchanted magic will grant everyone protection against thine puny defenses!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}太古法术源鸿蒙之秘, 并八荒之力. 当隳亿丈之城, 灭众生之愿!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Thine brain shall be mine, once and for all!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}尔侪脑与植俱灭, 不死僵河万古流!
{SAY:zombossicon}不死何俟? 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}哦豁. 敌人来了.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to find a way around this enchanted power.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们得想办法突破这个魔法力量.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware of the quickly rising graves as well.
translation: {SAY:winnie}同时也要注意频繁冒出的墓碑.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well, whatever Mr. Boss guy throws at us, we will prevail!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}也是, 无论那个博士先生有什么邪恶计划, 胜利总是属于我们的!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}城堡已经被净化了!
{SAY:crazydave}宝剑已经拿回来了!
{SAY:crazydave}这片土地, 终于消停了!

original: {SAY:winnie}The next energy spike spotted in Pirate Seas will guide us next.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在海盗港湾发现的下一个能量峰值将指引我们的下一步行动.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Of course it's the pirates! Let's go Penny - we have to teach them a lesson!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}当然得去会会海盗啦! 咱们走吧, 潘妮 - 我们得好好给他们上一课!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Whoa there! Who turned on the lights?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}哇塞! 谁把灯点开了?

original: {SAY:winnie}No one, User Dave. We simply have arrived in the Dark Ages... during day time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}没谁, 戴夫. 我们只是在白天... 到达了黑暗时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}This might be the moment right after the plague is cleared.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这可能是瘟疫被清除后的时刻.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will still encounter zombies around here though, so be vigilant.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过我们还是会在这附近遇到僵尸, 所以要保持警惕.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time to kick some medieval butts, medieval style!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候踢那些中世纪的屁股了, 用中世纪风格!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Even during the day, Necromancies will follow us.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}即使是在白天, 返乡的亡灵还是阴魂不散.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be on the lookout for unexpected attacks.
translation: {SAY:winnie}要警惕意外的袭击.

original: {SAY:winnie}Have you found your hammer yet, User Dave?
translation: {SAY:winnie}还没找到你的锤子吗, 戴夫?

original: {SAY:crazydave}No! I don't remember where I have placed it!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}没有! 我不记得我把它放在哪儿了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}On that note, my pot is also still missing too!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}对了, 我的锅也丢了!
{SAY:winnie}太可惜了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}Look, Penny! I see sheep! Lots of them!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}快看, 潘妮! 我看到羊了! 很多羊!

original: {SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. Those are no sheep. They are just cutboard cutouts.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看仔细了, 戴夫. 那些可不是羊. 它们只是砧板上的剪纸.

original: {SAY:winnie}More importantly, there seem to be some kind of amulets attached on top.
translation: {SAY:winnie}更重要的是, 上面好像挂有某种护身符.

original: {SAY:winnie}My scanners show that they will block most projectiles for the whole lane.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的扫描仪显示它们会挡住一行路中大部分的子弹.

original: {SAY:crazydave}That's no good! What will we throw at the zombies to defeat them then?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那可不妙! 那么我们要用什么来打败僵尸呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It is time we introduced a new plant into this battle, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}是时候在这场战斗中引入一种新植物了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Garlimites are very fragile, but any zombies that bite them will be diverted.
translation: {SAY:winnie}蒜瓣非常脆弱, 但任何咬了他们的僵尸都会被换行.

original: {SAY:winnie}We can use them to move zombies to lanes with more firepower, for example.
translation: {SAY:winnie}例如, 我们可以使用它们将僵尸转移到火力更强的道路上.

original: {SAY:crazydave}These little guys can pack quite a stinking punch! Great idea, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这些小家伙可以恶臭地重拳出击! 好主意, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}乐意效劳, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SPECIAL2:crazydave}Many amulet thingie on a lane! Now this is CRAZYYYYY!!!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SPECIAL2:crazydave}一行路上出现这么多护身符! 这也太疯狂了吧!!!

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we can make use of Garlimite once again, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们可以再次利用蒜瓣, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}More repulsion and diversion? I like it!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}更多的排斥和转移? 我喜欢!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}胜局已定, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}The Dark Ages is clear of zombies... for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}黑暗时代的僵尸都被清理干净了... 暂时.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Wouldn't this be called \Light Ages\" then, Penny?"
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}那这里会被叫做 \"光明时代\" 吗, 潘妮?

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Not quite, User Dave. But we don't have time for history lessons.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}并不会, 戴夫. 但是我们没有时间上历史课了.
{EXCITED:winnie}我们需要时间来杀僵尸.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}We ALWAYS have time for killing zombies! And the time is NOW!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}杀僵尸的时间总是会有的! 而且就是现在!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Whoa there! The lights are still there like last time!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}哇塞! 灯还在, 就像上次一样!

original: {SAY:winnie}Correct, User Dave. We have travelled to the Dark Ages at day time again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 我们又一次在白天穿越到了黑暗时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, we are now encountering a far more deadly zombie horde than ever before.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 我们现在遭遇的尸潮比以往任何时候都要致命得多.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to be cautious against their trickeries.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们需要提防他们的诡计.
{SAY:crazydave}那么, 是时候像往常一样了!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}嘿, 潘妮...

original: {SAY:crazydaveicon}Will we ever tell the neighbor that the \distorted reality\" thing is a ruse?"
translation: {SAY:crazydaveicon}我们会告诉邻居 \"扭曲的现实\" 是一个诡计吗?
{SAY:winnieicon}可能不会, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnieicon}I would rather continue seeing them handle the challenges we came up with.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}我宁愿继续看到他们处理我们提出的挑战.

original: {SAY:winnieicon}Provided that the challenges are still reasonable for their training.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}前提是这些挑战对他们的训练来说仍然是合理的.

original: {SAY:winnieicon}On that note, this is still not your turn to pick.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}话虽如此, 现在还不是你选择的时候.
{SAY:crazydaveicon}噢.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}小心, 戴夫!

original: {SAY:winnie}All of our sun producers have been disabled once again!
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们所有的太阳生产单位再次被禁用了!

original: {SAY:winnie}However, Ancient Egypt zombies have arrived. They themselves carry sun.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 上古埃及的僵尸也来了. 他们自己携带着阳光.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suspect we can defeat them to extract sun for our defense.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑我们能打败他们来提取阳光为我们防御添砖加瓦.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}这也太野蛮了吧!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这些墓碑的行为相当古怪.

original: {SAY:winnie}Pay attention to their positions, User Dave. We might be finding something.
translation: {SAY:winnie}注意他们的位置, 戴夫. 我们可能会有所发现.
{SAY:crazydave}我们能找到我丢失的锅吗?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}别来无恙, 不那么尊贵的殿下!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It is my fervent opinion that thine brains are quite delicious!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}窃以为汝之脑甚是鲜美!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Therefore, I shall send my fearsome army to siphon them once again!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}带巨锤兮挟杖翁, 首身离兮心不惩. 援玉枹兮击鸣鼓, 天时怼兮威灵怒.
{SAY:zombossicon}不死何俟? 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:winnie}没那么容易, 僵王博士!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}These gravestones containing Plant Foods will help us this time.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}这些含有叶绿素的墓碑这次会帮助我们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Onward, neighbor! Our victory will be fueled with green energy!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}行动吧, 邻居! 绿色能源是我们胜利的动力!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have remained triumphant as usual, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们一如既往地胜利了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I knew it! Those zombies are no match for our solar power!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我就知道! 那些僵尸根本不是我们太阳能量的对手!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Well done, neighbor! Time to move onto the next adventure!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}干得漂亮, 邻居! 是时候开始下一个冒险了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Why would anyone go and stick a nice sword into a dirty ol' rock?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}为何有人将这把圣剑插在这块肮脏的石头上?

original: {TIRED:winnie}I understand it to be a test, User Dave.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我认为这是一种考验, 戴夫.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Only someone with great physical strength and strength of character may remove it.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}唯独体格强壮, 力大无穷的勇士方有可能拔剑出石.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I bet someone with a jackhammer could remove it.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我敢说肯定会有一个携带手提钻的勇士能蛮力钻出此剑!
{EXCITED:crazydave}一个疯子!

original: {TIRED:winnie}An inelegant but no doubt effective solution to the test, User Dave.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这是一个优雅不足但效果显著的手段, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate we have moved 153,954,765 years into the past.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我的探测仪显示, 我们已经回到了153,954,765年前.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Yabbers! That's before I was even born!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}呀呼! 那时候我甚至还没有出生!

original: {SAY:winnie}Correct. We seem to have landed in some form of Jurassic Marsh.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是啊. 我们好像来到了侏罗纪沼泽.
{EXCITED:crazydave}我闻到了更多的氧气!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}This epoch is known for its unusual lifeforms, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这个时代以其不寻常的生命形式而闻名, 戴夫.
{EXCITED:crazydave}我知道一种! 裸子植物, 对吧?

original: {SAY:winnie}I was thinking more in terms of saurians, User Dave. Dinosaurs.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我想的是蜥蜴类, 戴夫. 恐龙.

original: {SAY:winnie}They will not attack us directly and we cannot affect them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们不会直接攻击我们, 我们也无法影响他们.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, they will definitely react to zombies. Be wary!
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 它们绝对会对僵尸们有所反应. 保持警惕!

original: {SAY:winnie}Especially when we have a problematic flower line to deal with this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}特别是这次我们有烦人的花坛要保护的时候.

original: {SAY:winnie}This flower line should be safe if there is a plant in front.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果前面有植物的话, 这条花坛应该还是安全的.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, it somehow refuses to let most ground or shadow plants be in front.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 不知怎的, 它拒绝让大多数地面或暗影植物出现在前面.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will have to adapt to this change on top of the approaching dinosaurs.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们必须在恐龙接近的同时适应这种变化.
{SAY:crazydave}更多的时间闹剧?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Not like I have any better explanations.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我也没有更好的解释了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The conveyor seems to be a bit off today.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今天传送带好像出了点毛病.

original: {SAY:winnie}Looks like it will slow itself down if there are too many plants on it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看起来如果上面有太多植物, 它就会减速.

original: {SAY:winnie}The conveyor will also give you only Jalapenos during the final wave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在最后一波时传送带也只会给火爆辣椒.
{SAY:winnie}在此之前仔细计划好一切.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, inane time stumblers, to my Jurassic garden.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 愚蠢的时间跌跤者们, 来到我的侏罗纪公园.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Surrender your brain, or suffer the fate of these terrible thunder lizards: EXTINCTION.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}乖乖交出你的大脑, 否则就会遭受这些雷蜥蜴的可怕命运: 灭绝.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}But I don't want to get extincted!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}但我不想灭绝!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Fight, neighbor, fight! It's the survival of the fittest!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}加油, 邻居, 加油! 这就是适者生存!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be cautious, User Dave! These giants are not the only ones wrecking havoc here.
translation: {SAY:winnie}小心点, 戴夫! 这些巨人并不是这里唯一的破坏者.

original: {SAY:winnie}Some Jurassic Imps are much faster and hungrier...
translation: {SAY:winnie}一些侏罗纪小鬼跑得更快也更饿...

original: {SAY:winnie}... and they have banded together for a coordinated attack.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 而且他们已经联合起来进行有组织的攻击.
{SAY:crazydave}你是说一群格格不入的家伙?

original: {SAY:winnie}Correct. I suggest that we use a combination of Primal Pea and a strong attacker.
translation: {SAY:winnie}正确. 我建议我们将原始豌豆射手和一个强大的输出植物组合起来.

original: {SAY:winnie}His knockback will be strong against all the armored zombies...
translation: {SAY:winnie}他的击退攻击对所有的装甲僵尸都是强效的...

original: {SAY:winnie}... while other plants can take care of the Imps and Gargantuar.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 而其他的植物可以解决小鬼和巨人.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I can feel the ground a-trembling, Penny! More dinos?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我能感觉到大地在颤抖, 佩妮! 又来了更多的恐龙吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. A herd of stegosaurs approaches.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 一群剑龙正在逼近.

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate they will snare zombies with their tail and flick them off.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测仪显示, 它们会用尾巴捕捉僵尸, 然后把他们弹开.
{EXCITED:crazydave}我也会这么做!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}If I had a tail, of course.
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}当然如果我有尾巴的话.

original: {SAY:winnie}I wish to do a lot of things, User Dave. This is not one of those.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我想做很多事情, 戴夫. 但这不是其中之一.
{TIRED:crazydave}真扫兴.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! I just remembered how much I love silent letters!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}潘妮! 我刚想起来我有多喜欢无声的信!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Coincidentally, User Dave, a flock of Pterodactyls is approaching.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}巧合的是, 戴夫, 一群翼龙正在靠近.
{EXCITED:crazydave}翼龙吗? 太棒了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Proper English does not work that way, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}话可不能这么讲, 戴夫.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}I know. I like to do it anyway!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}我知道. 不管怎样, 我就喜欢这样说!
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}因为我疯了!
{SAY:winnie}不愧是你.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}We are getting one heck of a fight upon us, Penny!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}我们要打一场大仗了, 佩妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. Little critters and Gargantuars have united to sow chaos.
translation: {SAY:winnie}确实. 小动物和巨人联合起来制造混乱了.

original: {SAY:winnie}This will require our knowledge thus far about the dinosaurs to succeed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这将需要我们迄今为止关于恐龙的知识才能成功.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We're not gonna be bested by some lizards, neighbor! Show them all!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们是不会被一些蜥蜴给打败的, 邻居! 展示给他们看!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}My sensors sensed that a meteor is coming here soon.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}我的探测仪检测到一颗流星很快就要飞过来了.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should probably get out of here quick.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那我们应该赶快离开这里.
{SAY:crazydave}我们能对抗流星吗?
{SAY:winnie}不. 我们不能.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! The past is still just when we left it!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿! 这远古时期还是我们上次离开时那样!

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps my sensors may have been incorrect, after all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许终究是我的探测仪出错了.

original: {SAY:winnie}There are some differences though. More Jurassic zombies have appeared, along with more dinos.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过还是有一些变化的. 更多的侏罗纪僵尸出现了, 还有更多的恐龙.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may need to be well-versed in gardening to give yourself sufficient protection.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你可能需要精通园艺才能给自己提供足够的保护.
{SAY:crazydave}该动铲子了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, be careful! Strange evolutions have happened since we last came here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 小心! 自从我们上次到访以来, 这里发生了奇怪的进化.

original: {SAY:winnie}Animated amber statues have now joined the attack!
translation: {SAY:winnie}活化的琥珀雕像现在也加入了攻击行列!

original: {SAY:winnie}When defeated, they will drop themselves onto tiles with no plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}当它们被击败时, 它们会堆积在没有植物的地砖上.

original: {SAY:winnie}Then, they will slowly rise back up for another attempt!
translation: {SAY:winnie}然后, 它们会慢慢地爬起来进行另一次尝试!

original: {SAY:winnie}Defeating them with the right plants will prevent them from dropping.
translation: {SAY:winnie}用合适的植物打败它们可以防止它们堆积在地.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Amber statues, eh, Penny? Would make a fine trophy for my lawn!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}琥珀雕像, 嗯, 潘妮? 做我草坪上的战利品正合适!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}They are NOT substitute garden gnomes. Please just defeat them and move on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它们不是花园侏儒的替代品. 请消灭它们, 然后继续前进.
{TIRED:crazydave}噢.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}A new type of dino has joined the fight... the mighty T-Rex!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}一种新型恐龙加入了这场战斗... 强大的霸王龙!

original: {SAY:crazydave}... doesn't look much like terror-rex to me.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}... 我看不太像是恐怖霸王龙.

original: {SAY:crazydave}More like an overgrown puppy! Can I keep it?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}更像是一只长得过大的小狗! 我能养一只吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Firstly, no, you cannot keep every single cute thing you come across.
translation: {SAY:winnie}首先, 不行, 你不能把你遇到的每件可爱的东西都带走.
{TIRED:crazydave}噢.

original: {SAY:winnie}Secondly, you should not underestimate it, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}其次, 你不应该低估了它, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Its thunderous roars can terrify zombies, increasing their speed fivefold.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它雷鸣般的咆哮能吓到僵尸, 将他们的速度提高五倍.
{SAY:winnie}即使是那些倒着走的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}... I still want one though. It can scare zombies away from my house!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}... 不过我还是想要一只. 它能把僵尸从我家吓走!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}The effects of these evolutions continue to ripple through the era.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}这些进化的影响继续波及着整个时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}This unstability has made the zombies discover fire before the humans.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这种不稳定性使得僵尸先于人类发现了火.

original: {SAY:winnie}Now they are planning to burn our defense down with it!
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在他们打算用它来摧毁我们的防线!

original: {SAY:crazydave}When in doubt, SEND OUT THE ICE PLANTS!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}有困难的时候, 就拿出冰系植物吧!

original: {TIRED:winnie}They may not even be able to counter this primitive technique of making fire.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}他们甚至可能无法对抗这种原始的取火技术.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Surely our modern plants will prevail, then!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}那么我们的现代植物肯定会占上风!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}One final type of dino to join the fray...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}最后一种加入战斗的恐龙...

original: {SAY:winnie}The Ankylosaurus can use its tails to push zombies forward.
translation: {SAY:winnie}甲龙可以用尾巴推动僵尸前进.

original: {SAY:winnie}But, unlike other dinos, it can interact with plants as well using the zombies!
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 不同于其他恐龙, 它还可以通过僵尸来影响植物!

original: {SAY:winnie}Something tells me that we are gonna have to be creative to get around them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}直觉告诉我, 我们必须要有创意才能应付它们.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Yes, yes, creative! How about hitting it with a pan?
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}对啊, 对啊, 要有创意! 用锅接住怎么样?
{SAY:winnie}...

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Be warned, User Dave! A massive horde of statues are arriving!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}警告, 戴夫! 一大群雕像即将到来!

original: {SAY:winnie}With this severe restriction we are placed under...
translation: {SAY:winnie}而且我们被置于这样严格的限制之下...

original: {SAY:winnie}... make use of their reduced bite damage. Pumpkin will be helpful once again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 好好利用他们较少的啃咬伤害. 南瓜头会再一次派上用场的.

original: {SAY:winnie}Remember that they can only drop bodies onto unplanted tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}记住, 它们只能把尸体堆积到未种植的地砖上.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Or maybe we just need to think outside the box, neighbor!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}或许我们只是需要跳出思维定势, 邻居!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time to bash and crack some statues!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候砸碎一些雕像了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}亲爱的时间园丁们,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Are you wondering why these creatures have not died from meteors?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们想知道为什么这些生物没有死于流星吗?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Or the fact that I am not speaking the language of the past?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}或者我不用过去的语言说话的真相?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I shall tell you. I have saved them from the meteors - to serve our horde!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我来告诉你们吧. 我把他们从流星中拯救出来 - 为我们的尸潮服务!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}And I am tired of talking like a caveman zombie. Not my favorite style.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}而且我受够了像个穴居僵尸一样说话. 这不是我喜欢的风格.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Anyhow - with dinos, zombies, and Meateors together, nothing can stop me!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}不管怎样 - 有恐龙, 僵尸和流星雨在一起, 没有什么能阻止我!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Depart from your beloved brain this instant, or suffer a painful death! Signed, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}马上放弃你们心爱的大脑, 否则就会痛苦地死去! 署名, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Roars and flints everywhere! Can we even win?
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}到处都是怒吼和燧石! 我们能赢吗?
{SAY:winnie}那只有一探究竟了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}We have triumphed once again in the dinos' land.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}我们又一次在恐龙的土地上取得了胜利.

original: {SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss have retreated into the technological terror of the future. We must follow him at once.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士已经退回到未来的科技恐怖中了. 我们必须马上跟上他.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think there will already be a future me over there?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你觉得那边已经有一个未来的我了吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Let us hope not. We do not need a paradox on top of all of this.
translation: {SAY:winnie}希望别吧. 我们不需要在这事上产生悖论.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}You just don't want to handle 2 Crazy Daves, do you?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}你只是不想应对两个疯狂戴夫, 是吧?
{SAY:winnie}可能吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}153,954,766 years into the past... one year before our first visit.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在过去153,954,766年... 在我们第一次来访的前一年.

original: {SAY:winnie}Does that fact technically make this visit the first one? This is confusing.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那么严格意义上来说, 这次到访才是第一次吗? 这很让人困惑.
{EXCITED:crazydave}别再提那些时间闹剧了, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}It is not time shenanigans. I am just pondering.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这不是时间闹剧. 我只是这么想想.

original: {SAY:crazydave}No time for pondering. We got zombies to put down!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别想了. 我们还有僵尸要对付!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这次仅有600阳光?

original: {SAY:winnie}We have leftover Spikeweeds this time... Perhaps we can make use of them?
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次我们有剩余的地刺... 也许我们可以利用他们?

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Only one way to find out, then!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}那只有一探究竟了!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}地面在震动! 发生什么事情了?

original: {SAY:winnie}I doubt that this is the sign of more dinos coming in...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑这是更多恐龙靠近的迹象...

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensors have detected seismic activities nearby. Be prepared for those.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测器检测到附近有地震活动. 为此做好准备吧.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}More forces of nature? Who knew the Marsh is so exciting!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}更多的自然力量? 谁知道沼泽是如此 \"震\" 奋人心!

original: {SAY:winnie}And deadly too, User Dave. Never forget that.
translation: {SAY:winnie}同时也是致命的, 戴夫. 不要忘了这点.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Protecting a plant in the middle of an earthquake... Now this is interesting.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie在地震中保护植物... 有意思.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Plants are flying everywhere! What will happen to that Sweet Potato then?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}植物被震得到处飞! 那甜薯会怎么样呢?

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}We shall have to IMPROVISE! ADAPT! OVERCOME!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}我们只能随机应变了! 适应吧! 克服吧!
{SAY:crazydave}是时候加入战斗了!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}... 他刚是不是... 无所谓了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}There is so much more rumbling today...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今天有更多的隆隆声...
{SAY:crazydave}超级大地震要来了?
{SAY:winnie}希望不是.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But bouncing around is so much fun!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是跳来跳去太好玩了!

original: {SAY:winnie}I doubt that our plants share the same sentiment.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑我们的植物是否也有同样的感受.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}恐龙, 地震和大群僵尸...

original: {SAY:winnie}Sounds like we are in for a battle.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来我们要打一场仗了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}When will we finally have Plants vs. Dinos then?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那我们什么时候才能有 \"植物大战恐龙\" 呢?

original: {SAY:winnie}We would lose in probably 3 seconds. 5, top.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们可能在3秒内就输了. 顶多5秒.
{SAY:crazydave}哦. 好吧. 毕竟有尺寸差异.

original: {SAY:winnie}Now can we please focus on surviving the night?
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在我们能专心熬过今晚了吗?
{SAY:crazydave}当然. 今天我已经够疯了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}The night is over. We are safe from these primitive zombies.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}夜晚已经结束了. 我们不会受到这些原始僵尸的威胁了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But I want to stay here! This looks so pretty...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但我想留在这里! 这里风景太棒了...
{SAY:winnie}戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}*sigh* You're right. Come on, neighbor - time to hit the road again.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}*叹气* 你说的也对. 来吧, 邻居 - 是时候再次上路了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It seems like we have returned to the Jurassic era again at night time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们似乎又在晚上回到了侏罗纪时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are more likely to be greeted with more gruesome battles from now on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 迎接我们的可能是更可怕的战斗.

original: {SAY:winnie}This, for example. It seems like something has reversed the conveyor setting.
translation: {SAY:winnie}就例如这个. 好像有什么东西把传送带的设置颠倒了.

original: {SAY:winnie}The more plants we have on the conveyor, the faster it will move.
translation: {SAY:winnie}传送带上的植物越多, 它就转得更快.
{EXCITED:crazydave}所以说... 得搞快点?
{SAY:winnie}正确, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}More fireflies! I have missed them so much.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}更多的萤火虫! 我太想念它们了.

original: {SAY:winnie}They make a pretty sight, I will admit.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我得承认, 它们看起来很漂亮.

original: {SAY:winnie}As pretty as my programming allows me to see, anyway.
translation: {SAY:winnie}反正我的程序能让我看到多漂亮就有多漂亮.

original: {SAY:winnie}On another note Meateors seem to have made a return as well.
translation: {SAY:winnie}另一方面, 燧石小鬼似乎也以流星的方式回归了.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}More crackling fireworks! I have also missed them too!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}更多噼里啪啦的烟火! 我也很想念这个!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Get me some popcorn for the show, will you?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}帮我拿点爆米花, 好吗?
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}More seismic activities have been detected, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}更多的地震活动已被探测到, 戴夫.
{SAY:crazydave}用疯狂戴夫的话讲...

original: {SAY:crazydave}That means we are having a free bouncy castle for our plants! Again!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这意味着我们的植物有了一个免费的充气城堡! 再次!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{SAY:winnie}你的逻辑永远使我迷惑.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今晚将是一场有趣的战斗...

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Zombies will only spawn on two spots, accompanied by a lot of dinosaurs.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}僵尸只会在两个地方刷出, 伴随着许多恐龙.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Forget about that! Who put our flower line over there?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别管那个了! 谁把我们的花坛放在那边的?

original: {SAY:winnie}I do not know, User Dave. The logic of flower lines confuses me as much as yours.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我不知道, 戴夫. 花坛的逻辑让我和你一样困惑.

original: {SAY:winnie}By all accounts, it does not make sense.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从各方面来看, 这都说不通.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}亲爱的时间乘客们,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}We have meet again at the beginning of time.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我们又在时间的起点相遇了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I must iterate once again that you are advised to surrender your brain.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我必须再次重申, 建议你们交出你们的脑子.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I have more Flint Imps than you can possibly imagine, or handle.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我有超乎你们的想象和应对能力的燧石小鬼.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Even longer than the previous Prolonging Meateor, you can say.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们将会看到, 我会把他们抛得比以前的燧石流星雨还远.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}And I will throw all of them at your defense if it means I get my way.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}如果能达到我的目的, 我会把他们都扔向你们的防线.
{SAY:zombossicon}署名, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Be prepared - we have a massive wave of Meateors incoming.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}做好准备 - 有一大场流星雨要来了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Where's Umbrella Leaf when you need him?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你需要叶子保护伞的时候他在哪里?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}We have secured our timeline from these primitive threats once again.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}我们再次从这些原始威胁中保护了我们的时间线.

original: {SAY:crazydave}And as usual, it's time we entered another era! Hit it, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}一如既往的, 我们是时候进入另一个时代了! 走吧, 佩妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I see a toenail! Of unusual size!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我看到一个不寻常的大小趾甲!

original: {SAY:winnie}This raptor claw bespeaks an ancient arena of dinosaurian dimensions, User Dave!
translation: {SAY:winnie}这只迅猛龙的爪子预示着一个恐龙规模的古老竞技场, 戴夫!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 潘妮! 这是什么?

original: {TIRED:winnie}This seems to be another Gate, User Dave.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这似乎是另一扇大门, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}We cannot get past this without 4 Plant Food slots.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果没有四个叶绿素槽, 我们是不能通过的.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we should return to other eras and search for the upgrade first.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们应该先回到其他时代寻找这个升级物品.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}那些植物看起来饿了.

original: {TIRED: crazydave}If only there was something that you could feed them...
translation: {TIRED: crazydave}要是有东西可以喂他们就好了...

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Zombies may spawn Plant Foods, which are packed with vitamins and minerals.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸可能携带者叶绿素, 它们富含维生素和矿物质.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}It's an essential part of a complete breakfast. Drag it onto a plant to use it.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}这是一顿完整早餐必不可少的一部分. 将其拖到植物上使用.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Then, the special ability of that plant will be activated.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}然后, 该植物的特殊能力将被激活.

original: {SAY:winnie}But, to prevent timelines from colliding, we must find their source first.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 为了防止时间线发生碰撞, 我们必须先找到它们的来源.

original: {SAY:winnie}Otherwise, we cannot get past this... little... puzzle?
translation: {SAY:winnie}不然, 我们不能解开这个... 小... 谜题?

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps you should travel to other timelines first to search for it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许你应该先穿越到其他时间线去寻找它.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}We may use Travel Log for checkpoints in our adventure.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我们可以使用旅行原木作为冒险中的存档点.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}欢迎来到上古埃及!

original: {SAY:winnie}We are 4500 years behind our modern time... more or less.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们落后于现代4500年... 差不多.

original: {SAY:crazydave}That doesn't smell right. Where's Mr. Boss guy?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不太对劲. 那位博士先生呢?

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}In the meantime... these plants were made for plantin'.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}与此同时... 这些植物是用来种植的.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}And those zombies are made for bashing!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}那些僵尸就是用来被揍的!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Time to demonstrate the power of tiering.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}是时候展示换阶的力量了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Cabbage Tier III is far more powerful than Cabbage Tier I, for example.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}例如, 三阶卷心菜比一阶卷心菜强太多了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}However, you need to pay more sun for that kind of power.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}但是, 你需要消费更多的太阳能来获得这种力量.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Since plants are coming from special delivery however...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}但是这次植物是来自于传送带...

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}... you get to try it out for free.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}... 你可以免费试用.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}Now, unleash the power on the zombie horde!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}现在, 向僵尸大军们展示力量吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies can now organize massive attacks, with 3 flags or more.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸们现在可以组织有3面或更多的旗帜的大规模攻击了.

original: {SAY:winnie}They are also getting more dangerous abilities.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们也获得了更多危险的能力.

original: {SAY:winnie}Sometimes, it might be a good idea to put attackers at the back.
translation: {SAY:winnie}有时, 将输出植物放在后面可能是个好主意.

original: {SAY:winnie}Zombies will have a harder time targetting those.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵尸们将更难直击要害了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Newly acquired plants also tend to help you greatly on the days after.
translation: {SAY:winnie}新获得的植物也会在之后的日子里给你很大的帮助.

original: {SAY:winnie}So keep this in mind as we receive more plants from the time stream.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以当我们从时间长河中获得更多植物时, 请记住这一点.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 沙子进眼睛了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Seems like the zombies can utilize sandstorms to get through our defense quickly.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来僵尸可以利用沙尘暴迅速突破我们的防线.

original: {SAY:winnie}Any kind of freeze or stun should stop the sandstorms prematurely.
translation: {SAY:winnie}任何形式的冰冻或眩晕都能提前阻止沙尘暴.

original: {SAY:winnie}Use this knowledge to fend off the massive sandstorm attacks today may bring.
translation: {SAY:winnie}利用这些知识来抵御今天可能到来的大规模沙尘暴袭击.
{SAY:winnie}... 和一些开局提供的阳光.

original: {SAY:winnie}You will need this as heavy attacks start early today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你会需要这些的, 因为今天猛烈的攻击会更早开始.
{TIRED:crazydave}我的眼睛啊!!!!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 沙子进眼睛了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Seems like the zombies can utilize sandstorms to get through our defense quickly.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来僵尸可以利用沙尘暴迅速突破我们的防线.

original: {SAY:winnie}Any kind of freeze or stun should stop the sandstorms prematurely.
translation: {SAY:winnie}任何形式的冰冻或眩晕都能提前阻止沙尘暴.

original: {SAY:winnie}Use this knowledge to fend off the massive sandstorm attacks today may bring.
translation: {SAY:winnie}利用这些知识来抵御今天可能到来的大规模沙尘暴袭击.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware - heavy attacks start early today, and we start with no sun!
translation: {SAY:winnie}注意 - 今天猛烈的攻击会更早开始, 而且我们开局不会有额外阳光!
{TIRED:crazydave}我的眼睛啊!!!!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}幸会, 时间乘客们,

original: {SAY}Special couriers have been dispatched to retrieve your brains.
translation: {SAY}专人已经被派来取走你们的脑子.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Please have your release forms signed before their arrival.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}请在他们到达前签好放行单.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士.

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Cool, that Mr. Boss guy wants your autograph!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}酷, 那个博士先生想要你的签名!
{TIRED:winnie}这一点也不酷.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we will need to maintain enough Sunflowers to weather the hordes.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们需要维持足够多的向日葵来抵御成群的僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}Two columns should be enough in most cases, but plant more if needed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在大多数情况下两列就足够了, 但如果需要可以多种一些.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Sometimes you will need to tread lightly around the zombie hordes.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有时候你需要在尸群周围小心行事.

original: {SAY:winnie}Try to wait until you have a good enough defense...
translation: {SAY:winnie}试着拖延到你有足够好的防守...

original: {SAY:winnie}... instead of attacking the zombies right away.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 而不是立马消灭僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}Iceberg Lettuces are excellent for stalling the zombies, for example.
translation: {SAY:winnie}例如, 冰冻生菜非常适合拖住僵尸.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Look Penny, I spot some yellow and black paint!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮, 我发现了一些黄黑相间的图案!

original: {SAY:winnie}... oh. Right. I forgot about the endangered plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 哦. 也对. 我都忘了濒危的植物了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Take action, and save them from being eaten.
translation: {SAY:winnie}采取行动吧, 让他们不要被吃掉.

original: {SAY:crazydave}After all, we can't deny the S.O.S call on the banana phone!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟, 我们不能拒绝香蕉手机上的求救电话!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That was the last mummy... for now.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}那是最后一只僵尸了... 到此为止.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL8}到此为纸了!
{SAY:winnie}我的仪表数据表明...

original: {TIRED:winnie}User Dave has been waiting to use that joke since we got here.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}自从我们来到这里, 戴夫就一直等着用这个笑话.
