original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Do you know what's better than a wrap? A warp.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你知道什么比纸更好吗? 把纸卷在身上.
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}让我们前往另一个时间线吧!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}木乃伊更多了! 囔囔叫的木乃伊!

original: {SAY:winnie}The time fissure is strengthening zombies from all epochs, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}时空裂隙强化了每个时代的僵尸, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should expect more powerful versions of some zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们将会遇到一些僵尸的强化形态.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, zombies may now spawn Plant Foods.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 现在僵尸会携带叶绿素.

original: {SAY:winnie}Packed with vitamins and minerals, Plant Foods will provide a huge power spike.
translation: {SAY:winnie}叶绿素含有丰富的维生素和矿物质, 它可以使植物获得巨大的力量.

original: {SAY:winnie}Drag it onto a plant to activate its special powerful ability.
translation: {SAY:winnie}把它拖到植物上就能激活它的特殊能力.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Great idea, Penny! No plant will ever go hungry again!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}好主意, 潘妮! 再也不会有植物挨饿了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}These Endangered Stunions are in some pretty precarious spots.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这些濒危的眩晕洋葱处于非常危险的位置.

original: {SAY:winnie}Hot Date should be able to attract zombies away from them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}热辣海枣应该能够把僵尸从他们身边吸引走.

original: {SAY:crazydave}First repulsion, now attraction! Plants are quite fascinating, right Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}起初是排斥, 现在是吸引! 植物们也太神奇了, 对吧, 佩妮?
{SAY:winnie}确实, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Be careful, User Dave! These Torchlights are burning so intensely...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}小心点, 戴夫! 这些火炬燃烧得太猛烈了...

original: {SAY:winnie}They are immune to our chilling attacks!
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们会免疫我们的冷却效果!

original: {SAY:winnie}Freezing attacks can still disable them, however.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是冰冻攻击仍然可以熄灭它们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}They will make great campfires then! ... when they are not biting us, of course.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}他们很适合举办篝火盛宴! ... 当然得是在他们不咬我们的时候.

original: {SAY:winnie}When have they ever stopped doing that?
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们曾几何时没这么做?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Massive sandstorm waves are upon us, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}巨大的沙尘暴浪潮正在向我们袭来, 戴夫.
{SAY:winnie}我建议我们带上冰龙草.

original: {SAY:winnie}His breath is so cold that it can stop sandstorms and disable Torchlights.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他的吐息非常寒冷, 可以停止沙尘暴并使火炬熄灭.
{SAY:crazydave}多冷酷的家伙啊, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}... note to self: Tell User Dave to get new joke material later.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 给自己的便条: 待会让戴夫去找新的笑话素材.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Look, Penny! That's a lot of glowing zombies!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮! 好多发光的僵尸啊!

original: {SAY:winnie}We should use these Plant Foods wisely then, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那我们应该明智地使用这些叶绿素了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Consider all the plants we get today, along with their Plant Food effects.
translation: {SAY:winnie}得考虑到我们今天能用到的所有植物, 以及他们的叶绿素效果.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yeah! And our plants won't ever starve anymore!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}太好了! 我们的植物再也不会挨饿了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Ancient Gardeners, to another one of my traps.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 上古园丁们, 光临我的又一个陷阱.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You think that zombies only rise up in Dark Ages?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们以为僵尸只会在黑暗时代破土而出?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Prepare to battle my giant army... straight from the ground!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}准备迎战我的庞大尸潮... 他们会直接拔地而起!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Combined with my giant tombstones containing Gargantuars, and surely you'll have no hope of victory!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}再加上我包含巨人的巨型墓碑, 你们肯定没有胜利的希望的!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}喔嚯...

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Don't be anxious! We got past it once...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}别慌张! 我们曾经熬过去了一次...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Surely we know how to win the second time!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们就一定知道如何赢得第二次胜利!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is the last mummy. At last.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一只木乃伊了. 终于啊.
{SAY:winnie}希望如此.

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensors show that the horde has moved back to Lost City. We will need to head there next.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测仪显示, 尸群已经回到了失落之城. 我们接下来要去那里.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Well, those temples won't protect themselves! Let's roll, Penny!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}好吧, 总得有人去保护那些神殿吧! 启程吧, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are back in the desert once more, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们又一次回到了沙漠, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}No time for talking! We still have zombies left to put down!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}没有时间闲聊了! 我们还有僵尸要对付呢!

original: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, please do not be hasty. Looks like Zomboss pulled his final trick.
translation: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 请不要着急. 看来僵王博士使出了最后一招.

original: {SAY:winnie}All seed packets will now have 50% more cooldown.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所有种子包的冷却时间增加50%.

original: {SAY:winnie}We may need to seriously reconsider our strategies to succeed from now on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 我们可能需要再次认真考虑我们的战略, 以取得成功.
{SAY:crazydave}没有什么能阻止我们这些园艺专家!
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}前进!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}It's sure getting hotter and hotter in the desert!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}沙漠里真是越来越热了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Zomboss is turning up the heat, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士把温度调高了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Chilling is now less effective against these zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在冷却对这些僵尸没那么有效了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! Better grab my sunscreen! And my Aloe!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 最好带上我的防晒霜! 还有我的芦荟!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Today's forecast: Dry, with a chance of Mega Gargantuars.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今天的天气预报: 干旱, 还可能伴有超级巨人僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}My sources detect a hidden sun reserve somewhere.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的资源探测器检测到某个隐藏的太阳储备.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we can use Ra Zombies to assist us in getting some resources.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们可以利用太阳神僵尸来帮助我们获得那些资源.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Let's hope that the conveyor won't disappoint us then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那就希望传送带不会让我们失望了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Somehow I think we are gonna get the exact opposite.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不知怎么的, 我觉得我们会得到完全相反的结果.

original: {SAY:winnie}At least everything on the conveyor is free today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}至少今天传送带上的东西都是免费的.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have a brand new challenge upon us.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们即将面临一个全新的挑战.

original: {SAY:winnie}Now, we have to not spend any sun for a fixed amount of time to win.
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在, 我们必须在一段固定的时间内不使用任何阳光才能获胜.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So now we have protect our sun stash too?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以现在我们也要保护我们的太阳储藏吗?
{SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Protect the plants, protect the mold colonies, protect the sun stash...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}保护植物, 保护霉菌菌落, 保护阳光储藏...
{SAY:crazydave}要保护的东西可真多!

original: {SAY:winnie}Technically you do not have to protect your mo... never mind.
translation: {SAY:winnie}严格来说, 你不需要保护你的霉... 没啥.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}啊哦...

original: {SAY:winnie}The zombies are getting a lot more impatient.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵尸们越来越不耐烦了.
{SAY:winnie}并且迫不及待了.
{SAY:winnie}并且饥肠辘辘了.

original: {SAY:winnie}So they take the calming part of a Last Stand... and remove it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以他们盯上了在坚不可摧中的布阵环节... 然后把它去除了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Our plants have also taken another hit to their packet cooldowns as well.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们植物的冷却时间也被延长了.
{SAY:winnie}这... 将会很棘手.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We have been doing fine so far with the cooldown attack! What's one more gonna do?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}到目前为止, 我们在冷却削弱方面应对得很好! 再多一个麻烦又如何?
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫...
{SAY:crazydave}怎么了, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}I seem to recall that I told you not to pick plants from now on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我好像记得我告诉过你从现在起不要乱选植物了.
{SAY:crazydave}嗯哼?

original: {SAY:winnie}So why... do we have these plants, when I clearly picked ones that actually work well?
translation: {SAY:winnie}我明明挑了几个效果很好的, 那为什么... 我们要用这些植物呢?
{SAY:crazydave}我也不知道?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}I am extending the ban to last forever now. And I WILL check the plants twice from now on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我现在要把禁令延长到永远. 从现在起我会再三检查植物选择的.

original: {SAY:winnie}And I WILL check the plants twice from now on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从现在起我会再三检查植物选择的.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. Busted. I thought it was gonna be funny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}噢. 讨厌. 我以为这样会很有意思的!
{SAY:winnie}不, 戴夫. 一点都不.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎回来, 远古守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}How are you faring so far with my released curse?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们有好好享受我的诅咒吗?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Time to seriously beat you down, with my horde of empowered Tomb Raisers.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候用我强大的造墓者僵尸群把你们彻底打败了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Rise, my zombies! Eat their brains, and claim our victory!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}起来吧, 我的僵尸们! 吃掉他们的脑袋, 然后宣告我们的胜利!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}And no plants shall block my path to total timeline domination!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}任何植物都不能阻挡我主宰时间线的道路!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Looks like he is sending more of his personal henchmen.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看起来他要派出他更多的左右爪牙了.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}我们会像往常一样打败他们的!

original: {SAY:winnie}We cannot afford any grave mistake, or it is all over.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在处理墓碑方面, 我们不能犯任何错误, 否则一切都完了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is the last mummy. At long last.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一只木乃伊了. 尘埃落定了.

original: {SAY:winnie}And hopefully I will not have to repeat this again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}希望我不用再重复这句话了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Looks like Zomboss has gone back to Lost City to arm himself.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来僵王博士回到失落之城去重整旗鼓了.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Back to the secrets of the jungle! Let's go, Penny!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}回到那个充满秘密的丛林吧! 咱们走吧, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! This is 4000 years ago... now at nighttime!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇塞! 这是4000年前... 的晚上!

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes, User Dave. The night at the desert may be calm and peaceful...
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 沙漠的夜晚可能是平静祥和的...

original: {SAY:winnie}But mummified zombies are here, and they will not give up their quest for brains.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是这里还有僵尸木乃伊, 而且他们不会放弃对大脑的追求.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time for nighttime battling! Bring out our Sun-shrooms and Puff-shrooms!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}夜间战斗的时间到了! 带好我们的小喷菇和阳光菇!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今天的墓碑都长得挺猛的...

original: {SAY:winnie}They will continue to rise from time to time, blocking our projectiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它们会不断冒出, 挡住我们的子弹.
{SAY:crazydave}那就把它们全打碎!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. Lest we allow the zombies to win.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确. 以免我们让僵尸得逞.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Look, Penny! The zombies are doing one of their \pyramid schemes\"!"
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}快看, 潘妮! 僵尸们正在做他们的 \"金字塔计划\"!

original: {SAY:winnie}That is not what it means, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这并不意味着这个, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, looks like they are planning something.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 看起来他们确实在计划什么.

original: {SAY:winnie}You should try to prepare carefully before attacking.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你应该在进攻前仔细准备.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Indeed, neighbor! There's no rush in bashing zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}对啊, 邻居! 不用急着揍僵尸的!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}你们好, 时间园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Special tombstones have been deployed with a nasty surprise inside.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}特殊的墓碑已经被部署, 里面有着可怕的惊喜.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Please hand over your brain, or my tombstones will destroy you and we'll get the brain anyway.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}请交出你们的脑子, 否则我的墓碑会毁了你们, 然后我们还是会拿到脑子的.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 那些是什么?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}These tombstones will be deadly if we do not break them in time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}如果我们不及时打碎这些墓碑, 它们将是致命的.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, they each contain a Gargantuar. So break wisely.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 它们每个都含有一只巨人僵尸. 所以要明智地打碎.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Double yikes! No pressure, neighbor, but be quick!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哎了个大呀! 别有压力, 邻居, 但还是要赶快点!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Sometimes the conveyor will stop supplying a certain type of plants.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有时传送带将停止供应某种类型的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}Use the ones you get wisely - you will not get them back.
translation: {SAY:winnie}明智地使用你得到的一切 - 你将不会再得到它们.
{SAY:crazydave}知道为什么会这样吗?
{SAY:winnie}不知道, 戴夫.
{SAY:crazydave}啊. 见鬼.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! That's a LOT of marked tiles!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇塞! 标记地砖也太多了吧!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. My sensors detect that we will need to plant Wall-nuts on ALL of these tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}确实. 我的探测仪显示我们需要在所有这些地砖上都种上坚果墙.

original: {SAY:winnie}Otherwise, we risk time being distorted beyond repair.
translation: {SAY:winnie}否则, 我们就有时间被扭曲到无法修复的风险.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should prepare them in time before the distort can happen.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们应该在扭曲发生之前及时做好准备.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Use those Wall-nuts wisely, neighbor! They are tough to crack!
translation: {SAY:crazydave明智地使用那些坚果墙, 邻居! 他们挺难敲开的!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们做到了, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. The peace has settled over the desert once more.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 这片沙漠又一次迎来了和平.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Time to continue on our main adventure, neighbor! Good job!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}是时候继续我们的主线冒险了, 邻居! 干得漂亮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! We are back in the desert once more!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇塞! 我们又一次回到了沙漠!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. However, be aware of the tougher zombie battles ahead of us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 但是, 要知道前方还有更艰难的僵尸大战.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to stay vigilant, and sharpen our skills to succeed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们需要保持警惕, 并提高我们的技能以取得成功.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Let's go then, neighbor! Show them what you have!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那咱们开始吧, 邻居! 给他们看看你的能耐!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! The zombies have rigged the lawn with special tombstones.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警报, 戴夫! 僵尸们在草坪上布置了特殊的墓碑.

original: {SAY:winnie}Plants cannot attack them, and Grave Busters cannot destroy them either.
translation: {SAY:winnie}植物打不到它们, 而且噬碑藤也无法摧毁它们.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, we can pay some sun to get rid of them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 我们可以花费一些阳光来除掉它们.

original: {SAY:winnie}A balance between building your defense and opening up new tiles is crucial.
translation: {SAY:winnie}建立你的防御和开辟新的地砖之间的平衡至关重要.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So... sun statues, but on the lawn this time? With no time limit?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}也就是说... 是阳光雕像, 但这次它们在草坪上? 也没有时间限制?
{SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Silly Penny! You could have just said this from the beginning!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我的傻潘妮! 你一开始这么说就好了!

original: {SAY:winnie}I... well. Excuse my tendency to over-explain things.
translation: {SAY:winnie}I... 额. 请原谅我有过度解释的倾向.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 上古园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Have you enjoyed the timeline mix-ups that I have concocted?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们喜欢我搞乱的时间线吗?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I hope that this has made your stay here unbearable.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我希望这会让你们在这里待得痛苦万分.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You know how to end this right here and now to relieve this pain.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们对减轻痛苦的办法心知肚明.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I will be waiting here for your brains anytime.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我会随时在这里等候你们的脑子.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That explains the appearance of zombies from other timelines.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这就解释了为什么其他时间线的僵尸会出现.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}No time to ponder Penny - we've got company!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}没时间思考了, 佩妮 - 敌人来了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have encountered more tricks from the zombies today.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们今天将遭遇到僵尸的更多诡计.

original: {SAY:winnie}Any grid item left on the lawn will damage the tombstones near our house.
translation: {SAY:winnie}任何留在草坪上的障碍物都会损坏我们家附近的那些墓碑.

original: {SAY:winnie}If they are destroyed, zombies will rise up and instantly defeat us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果他们被摧毁, 僵尸就会冒出并立即击败我们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}A deadly game of Hot Potato! I like it!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}热土豆的致命游戏! 我喜欢!
{SAY:winnie}我... 额.

original: {SAY:winnie}If I had a nickel for every time I was rendered speechless during this trip...
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果我在这次旅行中每次无言以对时就能得到五分钱...

original: {SAY:winnie}I would have two nickels. Which is not a lot.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我就有两个五分钱了. 虽然也不是很多.

original: {SAY:winnie}But it is weird that it happened twice.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但奇怪的是, 它发生了两次.
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}What has this world even come to...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这是个什么样的世界啊...
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 花园守卫者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}My study showed that giant tombstones containing zombies have been unpleasant for you.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我的研究表明, 包含着僵尸的巨大墓碑会让你们很不愉快.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Therefore, I shall throw an unlimited supply of that at you.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}因此, 我应该无穷无尽地给你们提供它们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Surrender now, or face the ancient wrath of the Pharaohs!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}马上投降, 否则将面对古老的法老之怒!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}哦豁.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! This is the 3rd time for us!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别担心, 潘妮! 这对我们来说是第3次了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Surely the neighbor can adapt to this!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}咱们邻居一定都已经轻车熟路了!
{SAY:winnie}希望如此吧, 戴夫.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}干得漂亮, 邻居! 我们又赢了.

original: {SAY:winnie}This is usually my line... But, yes, well done.
translation: {SAY:winnie}别抢我台词... 但, 不可否认, 好样的.

original: {SAY:winnie}Let us get out of here - I think I have enough of the desert for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}咱们离开此地吧 - 我觉得我现在已经受够了沙漠.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Anything for you, Penny! Time to blast off!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}如你所愿, 潘妮! 是时候起飞了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Though tetrahedrons are pyramids, this one is not a Platonic solid.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}虽然金字塔是四面体形状的, 但这不是一个正多面体.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Aw. I would love a Platonic solid.
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}噢. 我想要一个正多面体的.
{TIRED:winnie}只有你才会这么说.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}Now this looks like the map to my taco!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}这看起来像是我的玉米卷地图!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}To be precise this is a world map where we can find plants that can help us.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}准确地说, 这是一张世界地图, 在这里我们可以找到对我们有帮助的植物.
{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}{SPECIAL3}那咱们走吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Flashback! I remember this decor from when I chased squirbos as a kid!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}童年的味道! 我还记得这个装扮, 那时我还只是个追松鼠的小孩!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. We appear to have arrived in the midst of a Neon Mixtape Tour.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 我们似乎已经抵达了炫光魔音游.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suspect the musical tempo may affect the zombies' speeds.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑音乐节奏可能会影响僵尸的速度.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm feeding the rhythm, I'M FEEDING THE RHYTHM!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}我要跟上节奏, 我要跟上节奏!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Special zombies may display unique abilities while their preferred music is on.
translation: {SAY:winnie}特殊的僵尸在播放他们喜欢的音乐时可能会展现出独特的能力.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}You mean they'll jam their jam when their jam is jamming?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}你是说当他们的即兴演奏音乐被演奏时, 他们也会即兴演奏他们的音乐?

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes, correct, yes, and yes, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}嗯, 正确, 是的, 是的, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I believe it is time we deployed our new plant, Red Stinger.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我想是时候使用我们的新植物了, 红针花.

original: {SAY:winnie}He packs quite a punch, but only becomes offensive on the first two columns.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他的进攻相当有力, 但只在前两列才有攻击性.

original: {SAY:winnie}On other columns, he will become defensive instead and have elevated toughness.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在其他位置, 他将会做防守, 并有更高的血量.
{SAY:crazydave}所以说... 那他只是比较害羞吗?
{EXCITED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have encountered Boombox Zombies, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们遇到了音响僵尸, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}They can stun all plants with their charming music for a while.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们可以用迷人的音乐让所有的植物都晕眩一会儿.

original: {SAY:winnie}Moreover, they can rise from the ground to stun our defenses right away.
translation: {SAY:winnie}此外, 他们可以从地面冒出, 立即使我们的防御瘫痪.

original: {SAY:winnie}Measures should be taken, should that happen.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果发生这种情况, 就应该采取措施.

original: {SAY:crazydave}It's gonna be music to my ears... and our plants'!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不光我能听到音乐... 我们的植物们也能!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}This sun limit seems stifling, Penny! What should we do?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这阳光限制真令人窒息, 潘妮! 我们该怎么办?

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we can make use of Red Stinger's extremely low cost.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们可以利用红针花极低的造价.

original: {SAY:winnie}Do bring some stallers and instants to support him due to his high recharge.
translation: {SAY:winnie}由于他的冷却时间很长, 得带一些牵制植物和灰烬植物来辅助他.

original: {SAY:winnie}Especially against Punk Jam, since all zombies are much faster as seen earlier.
translation: {SAY:winnie}尤其是对阵朋克摇滚乐时, 因为所有僵尸都如之前看到的那样速度更快.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time to bang some zombies' heads then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候去敲飞僵尸的头了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Do you feel that you have grooved? Did you bang your head? Have you \dug it\"?"
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们觉得已经进入状态了吗? 你们有把你的头摇起来吗? 你们挖开看过了吗?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Now the party is over! Melt before the musical might of my majestic Hair Metal Gargantuar!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}现在派对结束了! 在我威严的重金属巨人僵尸的音乐力量面前融化吧!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I'm scared, Penny! It's two minutes to midnight!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我好害怕, 潘妮! 还有两分钟就午夜了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be brave, User Dave. We will jilt this ditty... on rock and roll!
translation: {SAY:winnie}勇敢点, 戴夫. 我们将会抛弃这种摇滚的... 小曲的!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}你说, 潘妮...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Why do we repeat everything we said when we visit certain zones again?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}为什么当我们再次访问某些区域时, 我们总是重复我们说过的话?
{SAY:winnie}我想这是个好问题.

original: {SAY:winnie}These are their own \dimensions\", I would say."
translation: {SAY:winnie}我想说, 这些是它们独有的维度.

original: {SAY:winnie}When you visit one, you are starting from the beginning of that dimension.
translation: {SAY:winnie}当你访问一个时, 你就会从那个维度的起点开始.

original: {SAY:winnie}Thus time has to flow, affecting everything in here, including us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因此, 时间不得不流动, 影响着这里的一切, 包括我们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Is that a made-up, cheesy, unscientific explanation?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这是一个编造的, 老套的, 不科学的解释吗?
{SAY:winnie}绝对不是, 戴夫. 绝对不是.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies have challenged us to a musical battle, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸们向我们发起了一场音乐大战, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}They will be bringing everything they have, and so should we.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们会竭尽所能, 我们也应该如此.

original: {SAY:crazydave}This is shaping up to be quite a concert then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这将是一场相当精彩的音乐会!
{SAY:winnie}可能吧. 但是我们也不能大意.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}All that time traveling and still no Mr. Boss guy!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}时光旅行了那么久, 还是找不到博士先生!

original: {SAY:winnie}Patience, User Dave. I have detected an unusual energy spike in Ancient Egypt.
translation: {SAY:winnie}要有耐心, 戴夫. 我在上古埃及发现了一个不寻常的能量峰值.

original: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies have regrouped there and become stronger for another push.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我相信僵尸已经在那里重新集结, 并变得更强大, 以进行另一波攻势.

original: {SAY:winnie}It is time we stepped up our game with this newly acquired source of Plant Food.
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在是时候用这个新获得的叶绿素来增进我们的游戏了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Plant Food, eh? No plant will go hungry anymore! I like the idea already!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}叶绿素, 嗯? 没有植物会挨饿了! 我已经喜欢上这个主意了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 你们这些派对狂.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Excuse me for my lack of rhymes and lyrics, but it appears you have discovered me at my most vulnerable time.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}抱歉我的歌词不够押韵, 但你们似乎在我最脆弱的时候发现了我.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}But no matter! For too long you have ruined all my plans of total timeline domination.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}不过没关系! 长久以来, 你们毁了我掌控时间线的计划.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It is time I turned the tide with my latest invention!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候用我的最新发明来扭转局面了!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}... which is a work of progress. But I am sure my zombie horde will buy enough time for me!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}... 但还在研发中. 但我相信我的僵尸大军会为我争取足够的时间!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Either way, you shall feel my wrath soon! Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}不管怎样, 你们很快就会感受到我的愤怒! 真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}潘妮...

original: {SAY:winnie}I already suspected this, but I am not sure what exactly he is planning.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我已经怀疑这一点了, 但我不确定他到底在计划什么.

original: {SAY:winnie}We'll just have to fight through his emboldened zombie horde.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们只得和他那群胆大妄为的僵尸战斗到底了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware that these hordes are much more rushing than usual.
translation: {SAY:winnie}要注意, 这些尸群比平时更迅速了.

original: {SAY:winnie}So bring proper stalling, and be ready to react at a moment's notice.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以要准备好合适的牵制手段, 以备随时反应.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So long as we're in the groove, we'll be a-ok!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}只要我们状态良好, 我们就会没事的!
{SAY:crazydave}让音乐之战开始吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Burple Bloom here is an interesting new plant.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这紫泡蓓蕾是一种有趣的新植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}They can produce hovering bubbles as long as there are zombies on the lawn.
translation: {SAY:winnie}只要草坪上有僵尸, 他们就能产生漂浮的气泡.

original: {SAY:winnie}Leave them alone for a while and they can produce a massive bubble swarm.
translation: {SAY:winnie}让他们待一段时间, 他们就会产生一个巨大的气泡群.

original: {SAY:winnie}And no, User Dave, do not play with them. They are highly poisonous.
translation: {SAY:winnie}而且住手, 戴夫, 别碰它们. 它们有剧毒.
{SAY:crazydave}噢.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I hear Rap music! Are we in for a rap battle?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我听到了说唱音乐! 我们要来一场说唱大战了吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Not quite, User Dave. Dance battle, however...
translation: {SAY:winnie}并不是, 戴夫. 是舞蹈大战, 但是...

original: {SAY:winnie}These Breakdancers can kick zombies forward with their moves.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些霹雳舞僵尸可以用他们的舞步把僵尸向前踢.

original: {SAY:winnie}Find a way to dispatch them quickly before they overwhelm our defense.
translation: {SAY:winnie}想办法在他们摧毁我们的防御之前迅速干掉他们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Who needs to breakdance with their head...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}谁需要用脑袋跳霹雳舞啊...

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}WHEN YOU CAN HAVE A POT ON YOUR HEAD INSTEAD???
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}特别是当你有一口锅在你头上的时候???

original: {SAY:winnie}Your logic still makes no sense as always, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你的逻辑还是跟以前一样毫无道理, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Along with the dance moves, it seems that we have a new spinning threat.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}除了舞蹈动作, 我们似乎有了新的漩涡威胁.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Finally! A real rap battle! Let me go search for my microphone!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}终于! 真正的说唱之战! 我去找我的麦克风!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{SAY:winnie}他什么时候不会这样没心没肺呢...

original: {SAY:winnie}... be careful of MC Zom-B's massive sound wave attacks.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 小心说唱僵尸的大规模声波攻击.

original: {SAY:winnie}While they do not do a lot of damage, it can stack up quickly.
translation: {SAY:winnie}虽然他们不会造成很大的伤害, 但伤害可以迅速累积起来.

original: {SAY:winnie}Now excuse me for a bit, I need to wrangle User Dave back to the fight.
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在请原谅我失陪一会儿, 我得让戴夫回到战斗中去.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}One era ago I said I wanted to see Football Zombie again...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}在上个时代, 我说过我想再见到一次橄榄球僵尸...

original: {SAY:crazydave}And now he's here! Time to get my Hypno-shrooms again!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在他来了! 我的魅惑菇又能派上用场了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}There's always time to watch football after all! Even when you're in your own childhood!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟总有时间看橄榄球比赛的! 即使是在你自己的童年时光里!

original: {SAY:winnie}Not quite the time yet, User Dave. We have to use the conveyor today...
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在还不是时候, 戴夫. 我们今天必须使用传送带...

original: {SAY:winnie}... which has a unique quirk this time. It will give three plants instead of one.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 这一次它有一个独特的功能. 它会给三株植物而不是一株.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Triple the plants, triple the power! What's stopping us now?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}三倍植物, 三倍火力! 现在还有什么能阻止我们?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Onward, neighbor! Then I can finally have my football watching buddies back!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}加油吧, 邻居! 这样我终于可以和我的橄榄球观众朋友们团聚了!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 派对旅行者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I did not expect you to go through my hordes so quickly.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我没想到你们这么快就突破了我的尸群.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}To buy more time for myself... I have decided to NOT give you any time at all!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}为了给自己争取更多的时间... 我已经决定不给你们任何时间!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}All my fastest zombies are about to converge on you! I wish you bad luck on dealing with them.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我所有跑得最快的僵尸都要向你们聚集了! 我祝你们在对付他们时不会走运.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have a grueling battle up ahead, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们将面临一场艰苦的战斗, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! With all these stalling and defensive plants available...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别担心, 佩妮! 有了所有这些拖延和防御的植物...

original: {SAY:crazydave}I'm sure our neighbor can think of something!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我相信我们的邻居会想出办法的!
{SAY:crazydave}祝你好运, 邻居!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It seems that you're rather persistent and resilient.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}看起来你们挺有毅力的.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Time to send out one of my strongest hordes available to stall you further!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候派出我最强大的尸潮继续拖住你们了!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I have also elected to give them some new options to their musical preferences.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我还选择给他们一些新的选择, 以满足他们的音乐喜好.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}This will SURELY buy me enough time to finish my work!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}这肯定会为我赢得足够的时间来完成我的作品!
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SPECIAL2:crazydave}是时候登台表演了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be careful, User Dave! All zombies now jam to the same current jam!
translation: {SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫! 所有僵尸都会配合着当前的音乐即兴演奏的!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Why can't Dr. Zomboss pick a better theme for a serious battle like this, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}僵王博士为什么不能为这样严峻的战斗选择一个更好的音乐主题呢, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}Focus, User Dave. Battle first, then music talk later.
translation: {SAY:winnie}专心点, 戴夫. 先打仗, 待会再聊音乐.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You are too late now! My invention is finally complete!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们现在太迟了! 我的发明终于完成了!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Let my timeline domination begin, beginning at where it all started!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}让我的时间线统治开始, 从一切开始的地方开始!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Do not even attempt to stop me, for I have already won this war!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}不要试图阻止我, 因为我已经赢得了这场战争!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士.
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}不会吧...
{TIRED:crazydave}会吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}We cannot wallow in misery now, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们现在不能沉湎于痛苦之中, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Our only hope is to travel back to all the timelines again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们唯一的希望就是再次游历所有的时间线.

original: {SAY:winnie}Then we can finally see what Dr. Zomboss had planned and reverted it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这样我们就能知道僵王博士的计划并打破它了.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}那赶紧追上他!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{SAY:winnie}哦, 现在他开始认真对待了...
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}潘妮! 潘妮!潘妮! 一个麦克风!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Karaoke time! At last my tangerine dreams will come true!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在是卡拉OK时间! 我幼时的橘色歌唱梦终于得以实现啦!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be careful! This dropped mic promises a banned battle of heavy petal proportions!
translation: {SAY:winnie}当心点, 戴夫. 这个遗落的麦克风指向一个挑战禁地, 一个有着重瓣摇滚的地方.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}让我们去看有用的图鉴吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Visit the Almanac to read more about everything!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}查阅图鉴, 以了解一切的信息!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Travel Log's got some kinda new thing! Check it out!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}旅行原木里有新东西! 去看看吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Banana Launcher wishes to challenge us this time, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这次香蕉火箭炮想向我们提出挑战, 戴夫.

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}That trickster? Challenge? This will be CRAZYYYYYYY!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}那个诡计专家? 挑战? 这将会非常疯狂!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. These levels will be quite tricky to deal with.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确. 这些关卡处理起来将相当棘手.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to use him to our advantage to win.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们将需要利用他的优势获胜.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Be as slippery as the banana! That's smart, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}像香蕉一样狡 \"滑\"! 太聪明了, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}... that is actually profound, User Dave. Points for that.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 双关玩的不错, 戴夫. 这一点加分.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies are preparing a heavy assault in Far Future...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸们正准备在遥远未来发动一场猛烈的攻击...

original: {SAY:winnie}Since you still have not earned your plant picking privilege back...
translation: {SAY:winnie}既然你还没有获得你的植物选择权...

original: {SAY:winnie}... I am picking this time. Hopefully this team will be enough.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 这次我来选. 希望这组卡能足够应付了.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}When will I earn it back then?
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}那我什么时候能挣回权力呢?
{SAY:winnie}当你不再做错误选择的时候.
{SAY:crazydave}... 那就是, 永远没有了?
{SAY:winnie}大概率是这样的.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have returned to the darkest era...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们回到了最黑暗的时代...
{SAY:winnie}墓碑在这里泛滥成灾.

original: {SAY:winnie}Seems like another challenge from the Banana.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来是香蕉的又一次挑战.
{SAY:crazydave}打扫时间?
{SAY:winnie}是的.
{SAY:crazydave}那就是时候拿出我的扫帚了!

original: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}NOT THAT KIND OF CLEA... damn it.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}不是那个意思... 该死.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Guuureetings! Zomboss be back with another trick with help from Banana.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好啊! 僵王博士在香蕉的帮助下带着另一个诡计回来了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Ice floes? Move zombies outta the lawn!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}浮冰? 会把僵尸移出草坪的!
{SAY:zombossicon}能应付的植物? 不准用!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Simple plans be best plans! Brains? Ours!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}简单的计划是最好的计划! 脑子? 势在必得!
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}你做了什么呀, 僵王博士...

original: {SAY:crazydave}We just need to outsmart Mr. Boss guy once more! How hard can it be?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们只需要再一次智胜博士先生! 能有多难呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is enough trickery for one trip, I think.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我认为这次旅行的诡计够多了.
{SAY:winnie}是时候回去了, 戴夫.

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}I get to know more about our CRAZYYYYYYY Banana! Nice!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}我对我们的疯狂香蕉有了更多的了解呢! 太好了!

original: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Lord help us all with these two crazies...
translation: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}上帝保佑我们吧, 这两个疯子...

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey there neighbor! We're going on a fun trip today!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 邻居! 我们今天要进行一次有趣的旅行!
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}我们要去打保龄球!

original: {SAY:crazydave}With our new bulbs... This is gonna be even better!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}用我们的新球... 这样会更加精彩的!
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}现在给我拿个冠军!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}第一轮打的真不错, 邻居!

original: {SAY:crazydave}There will be more rounds later on.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}之后还会有更多轮.

original: {SAY:crazydave}With new twists and turns for every timeline!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你在每个世界打保龄球时都会遇到些波折!
{SAY:crazydave}再接再厉!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}You have come a long way here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}你已经走了很长一段路了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But can you handle even more tricks?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但你能应付更多的把戏吗?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Protect those Wall-nuts, with our bulbs and Wall-nuts!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}保护那些坚果墙, 用我们的泡泡和坚果!
{SAY:crazydave}为啥?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}因为我疯掉了!!!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Now we have a lovely flower line to mark where you can place your bulbs!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}现在我们有一个可爱的花坛来标记你可以放置泡泡的地方!
{SAY:crazydave}太好了.
{SAY:crazydave}你在问佩妮在哪?

original: {SAY:crazydave}She's not up for talking for now. She's busy with her oily stuff.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}她现在没空说话. 她正忙着加油呢.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}现在, 少说废话, 多打保龄!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}This is it. The end of the road.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}终于到了. 路的尽头.

original: {SAY:crazydave}The last of the zombies to bowl over.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}最后要被打倒的僵尸们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Some says if you rush hard enough at some point... you get some other plant?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}有人说, 如果你足够努力... 你会获得其他的植物?
{SAY:crazydave}可能只是传说罢了.
{SAY:crazydave}不管怎样, 祝你好运!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}哇, 邻居! 你做得真好!

original: {SAY:crazydave}I have never seen so many Strikes before!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我还从来没有看过这么多次的连击呢!

original: {SAY:crazydave}That was fun, ain't it? To let some stuff out with bowling.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}很有趣, 不是吗? 去打保龄球发泄一下.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But we need to get back to finding Mr. Boss guy now.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但我们现在得回去找博士先生了.
{SAY:crazydave}是时候继续时光旅行了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We will need to learn more about our plants.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们需要进一步了解我们的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}That will help us in the long run when we are up against the zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从长远看来, 这对我们对抗僵尸很有帮助.

original: {SAY:winnie}This time it is all about Citron.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次就全靠充能柚子了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Sour and tangy... yet, he packs quite a punch!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}味道又酸又刺鼻... 但是, 他发出了一次重击!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Surely he'll be a great guy to bond with! Let's do this!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}想必我们能很快的了解他! 让我们开始吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are facing a huge horde of Gargantuars, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 这次我们将要面临大群的巨人僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we bring out the Tier 3 Citron.
translation: {SAY:winnie}建议我们应该使用三阶的充能柚子.

original: {SAY:winnie}His ability to nearly one-shot a Garg is nothing to scoff at.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他一炮近乎消灭一只巨人的能力不容小觑.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}那可真是太疯狂啦!
{SAY:crazydave}一些究极的火力就在这里!

original: {SAY:winnie}The power of concentrated orange juice, User Dave. And infused plasma.
translation: {SAY:winnie}浓缩橙汁的力量, 戴夫. 和注入的等离子体!
{SAY:crazydave}哎呀!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}再次遭遇巨人僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}At least they are not endangered anymore.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是这次至少他们没有处于危险之中.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But they are frozen! Of all the eras how did they get frozen during the Beach?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是他们被冻住了! 都这么多时代了他们怎么还会在海滩上被冻住?
{SAY:winnie}不清楚.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I'm not pleased with you using my zombies as dummies for target practice.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我看不惯你们把我的僵尸当作傻瓜一样用来做打靶练习.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Hence, time to turn the tables. NOW your plants will be my zombie's targets.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}因此, 风水轮流转. 现在轮到我把你们的植物当做我的僵尸的靶子了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}My special zombie that has the power I harnessed from your plant will surely ensure my total victory.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我的特殊僵尸已经学会了你们植物的能力, 这将确保我的最终胜利.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}啊哦.
{SAY:winnie}那就豁出去了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Don't be scared! What can he do with a ton of plasma and orange juice anyway?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这有什么好怕的! 毕竟他该如何应对一吨等离子体和橙汁呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I think that's enough power to last me a good while!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我想这足够我用一段时间了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Agreed. I think we can conclude the training for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我赞同. 我觉得现在是时候结束我们的训练了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Back to time travelling we go! Where are we going next?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}回到我们的时空旅行! 我们接下来要去哪?
{SAY:winnie}只有时间的长河会知道.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! This is 4000 years ago... now at nighttime! Again!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇塞!又回到了4000年前... 而且现在还是晚上!

original: {SAY:winnie}Correct, User Dave. My sensors detect something special around here...
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 而且我的探测仪还检测到周围有什么特别的东西...

original: {SAY:winnie}Though I am quite unsure what it is.
translation: {SAY:winnie}虽然我不确定是什么.

original: {SAY:winnie}For now we should take a look around... at the incoming zombie horde.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们应该去四处转转... 并且面对来袭的僵尸大军.

original: {SAY:winnie}We can never escape from the zombies, it seems.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来, 我们永远无法摆脱那些僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}那么, 又到了我们平常那样疯狂的时候了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! My sensors detect an abnormal amount of sandstorms!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警告, 戴夫, 我的探测仪检测到周围有超乎寻常的大量沙尘暴!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Should I be worried about more dust in my eyes?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我是否应该担心更多的沙尘会进入我的眼睛?

original: {SAY:winnie}Even worse, these sandstorms are also abnormal as well!
translation: {SAY:winnie}更糟糕的是, 这些沙尘暴有点古怪!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We'd better keep our eyes on them, then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么, 我们最好留意这些沙尘暴!

original: {SAY:crazydave}... preferably without getting dust in our eyes of course.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}... 当然, 最好不要让沙子进入眼睛.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Ah, it seems like we have found another new plant here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}啊, 看来我们在这里发现了一株新的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}The Crystall-shroom will fire a chilling crystal piercing through all zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这非凡的冰晶菇会发射一种可以穿透一整条路的冷却冰晶.

original: {SAY:winnie}We must escort her throughout our stay here to obtain her for our arsenal.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们必须要保全她, 以便让她入驻我们的种子栏.
{SAY:crazydave}刺骨的冰晶? 这听起来棒极了!

original: {SAY:winnie}... that is the best you can do?
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 你就这?
{SAY:crazydave}或许是?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间乘客们,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It seems that you seek to obtain our crystal technology.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}看来你们想获得我们的冰晶技术.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}No matter! Prepare for trouble, as I make it double!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}无所谓! 准备好迎接麻烦吧, 我把它翻了倍!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Good luck, Protectors. Regards, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}祝你们好运, 守护者. 谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这一点也不妙.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Our plant, made with Mr. Boss guy's technology?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们的植物, 难道是由那个家伙的技术制造的吗?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}我脑袋要炸啦!!!!!

original: {SAY:winnie}We may need more time to investigate this... predicament.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们需要更多的时间来调查这个... 困境.

original: {SAY:winnie}For now, we have zombies and storms to defend from.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是现在, 我们要防御僵尸和沙尘暴.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I can feel this burning sense of incoming dread...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我现在能感觉到由恐惧带来的灼烧感...
{SAY:crazydave}你能感受到吗, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}I am not quite sure... perhaps it is because of the previous ordeal?
translation: {SAY:winnie}我不太确定... 是不是因为我们之前已经经受了很多?

original: {SAY:crazydave}No. Must be something I eat, then.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哦不. 那或许因为是我吃了什么东西.
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Desert Dwellers, to one of my deadliest attacks.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 沙漠居民们, 准备好迎接我最致命的一击吧.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}While you were busy contemplating my lie, I have taken all of the crystal power from your plant already.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}当你们在思考我的谎言时, 我已经从你们的植物中提取出了冰晶能量!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Now perish, as I whittle away your defense bits by bits!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}现在灭亡吧, 我会一口一口的击溃你们的防御的!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Resistance is simply futile. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}反抗都是徒劳. 真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}哦不...
{SAY:crazydave}邻居, 你还在等什么呢?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}为了我们的植物朋友!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Mr. Boss guy has been defeated again!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}博士先生又败北了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Defeating that BOSS zombie has returned Crystall-shroom her full power, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}打败僵王博士使冰晶菇恢复了所有的力量, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}She can now join our quest to stop Dr. Zomboss once and for all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}她现在可以加入我们一起阻止僵王博士.

original: {SAY:crazydave}What a ride! So long, Ancient Egypt!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}多么美好的旅程啊! 再见, 上古埃及!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It looks like we are here to learn more about the plants we have.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看来, 我们到这里的目的是为了更多的了解我们的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}Electric Blueberry is here to assist us through the upcoming challenges.
translation: {SAY:winnie}电击蓝莓将会协助我们迎接接下来的挑战.

original: {SAY:winnie}She can deliver thunderstorms that zap zombies to death.
translation: {SAY:winnie}她能制造雷暴, 使僵尸化为灰烬.

original: {SAY:winnie}She also will specifically target special zombies first, and Gargantuars last.
translation: {SAY:winnie}她会首先锁定特殊的僵尸, 最后锁定巨人僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}This gal is buzzing with energy, Penny! Let's welcome her with open arms then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这个小家伙看起来精力充沛呢, 潘妮! 让我们张开双臂迎接她吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! Looks like there is going to be a flying party over there!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿! 看起来这里将要举办一场飞行派对!

original: {SAY:winnie}Starfruit and Spikeweed might not be enough to deal with this, however.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 星星果和地刺似乎不足以应对这些僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}No problemo! Electric Blueberry will light the zombies up!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}没问题的! 电击蓝莓会将这些僵尸劈掉!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time to make this party shine even more, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候让这个派对更加闪耀了, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have arrived at the last challenge.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们已经抵达最后的挑战了.

original: {SAY:winnie}A huge horde of Gargantuars are coming to attack.
translation: {SAY:winnie}一大群的巨人僵尸将会来进攻.

original: {SAY:winnie}Remember that Electric Blueberries target Gargantuars last.
translation: {SAY:winnie}记住, 电击蓝莓会最后锁定巨人僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Assist these endangered fellows then! Ensure they have a bright future!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那就帮助这些濒危的小家伙吧! 给他们一个光明的未来!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Why must you torture us with puns?
translation: {SAY:winnie}为什么你老是喜欢使用双关语折磨我啊?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have achieved a victory, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们取得了一场胜利, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Thanks to these little berries - they pack a LOT of power!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这得多亏了这些小莓莓 - 他们积攒了大量能量!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. This have been enlightening to all of us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 这对我们所有人都有所启明.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Wowzers, Penny! You have embraced the fun of puns!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哇哦, 潘妮! 你似乎已经接受了双关语的乐趣!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{SAY:winnie}看来是这样.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The night worlds seem to be much harsher, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 这夜间的环境看起来会更加的严酷.

original: {SAY:winnie}We need more allies. That is why we are here today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们需要有更多的盟友. 这就是我们今天在这里的原因.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So we can search for Mr. Boss guy quicker?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以我们能更快的找到那个博士先生吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes. But we need to defend against zombies better first.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的. 但我们要先击退这些迎面而来的僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensor indicates that the Ice-shroom has been lost in time for a long while...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测仪显示寒冰菇已经消失于时光中很久了...

original: {SAY:winnie}... but now we found him, in Jurassic Marsh. He only appears at night, though.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 但是现在,我们在侏罗纪沼泽发现了他. 但是他仅仅在晚上出现.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to get through these zombies first before starting the search.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是首先我们应解决这些僵尸, 才能开始追踪.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Day or night, those devolved caveman zombies are no match for our modern plants!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不管是白天还是晚上, 这些住在洞穴里的原始家伙都不是我们现代植物的对手.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Uh oh... other zombies have joined the fight this time...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}啊哦... 这次有其他的僵尸加入战斗...

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to be on high alert this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次我们需要保持高度警惕.
{SAY:crazydave}那就赶紧拉响警报吧!
{SAY:crazydave}同时把我们的植物也集合起来!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们找到他了! ... 算是吧.

original: {SAY:winnie}We have not found his \seed packets\", though."
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 我们还没有找到他的 \"种子包\".

original: {SAY:winnie}In the meantime, he has agreed to help us defend against the zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}与此同时, 他愿意帮助我们抵御僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We're gonna have a great time with his cool power!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}他的冷酷能力将会让我们轻松不少!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}萤火虫!
{EXCITED:crazydave}自从80年代后我就没见过他们了!
{SAY:crazydave}... 不过不是僵尸横行的80年代.
{SAY:winnie}的确相当壮观.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Nether Dodo has been quite a pain so far.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}迄今为止, 幽冥渡渡鸟一直是个大麻烦.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}I believe that some payback is due.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我相信一定会有报应的.

original: {SAY:winnie}And what is better than turning it against the zombies?
translation: {SAY:winnie}还有什么比用幽冥渡渡鸟对付僵尸更好的办法呢?

original: {SAY:crazydave}A deadly, unstoppable zombie against the horde... who's gonna win?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}一个致命的, 不可阻挡的僵尸对抗大群的僵尸... 最后谁会胜利?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}One final battle... good luck. Be careful of icy winds.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}最后一战... 祝你好运. 当心刺骨寒风.
{EXCITED:crazydave}不过, 我会想念这些萤火虫的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Excuse me while I go ahead and catch some of these to bring them home!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}等我一下, 我想要抓一些萤火虫回家!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We did it! Ice-shroom has been fully recovered - permanently now.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们做到了! 寒冰菇现在已经完全找回了 - 永远!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}And I got myself a couple of these lightly bugs! Win-win!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}而且我还弄到了一些发光虫子! 一举两得!
{SAY:winnie}我想是这样.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are done with the Quest for now... time to head back.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们现在完成任务了... 是时候该离开了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave? Why are we stumbling into this timeline branch?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我说戴夫啊, 我们是怎么进入到这个时间的分支的?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Because... look at these cute little plants I made!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}因为...呃...看看我制作的小植物, 他们多么可爱!

original: {SAY:crazydave}And since they need an introduction to zombie fighting...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}因为他们需要了解如何打僵尸...

original: {SAY:crazydave}I used this branch to create a training ground!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我利用了这个时间的分支创造了一个训练场!
{SAY:winnie}我看. 这或许会很有趣...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Let's start with the Mini Pea then! Show them what you can do!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么就是你了! 迷你豌豆射手! 让我们看看你的威力如何吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}These mini plants not only can be planted on top of others...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}这些迷你植物不仅可以种在其他植物上...

original: {SAY:crazydave}They also get Plant Foods if the main plant is given them!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}而且当那株植物获得叶绿素时, 这些迷你植物也能额外获得一颗!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Try to use that power today, neighbor!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以说, 今天赶紧试试这种力量吧, 邻居!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Lily Pad is taking a break today, neighbor!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}邻居, 今天莲叶去摸鱼了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}So instead I have invited Mini Sunflower to this beach party!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以我邀请了迷你向日葵来参加这次海滩派对!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Use her to make this party shine even more as she takes no space!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}利用她让这个派对更加闪耀, 因为她几乎不占地方!

original: {SAY:winnie}This will not go wrong. At all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以这不会出错, 一点也不会.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Our Mini Snow Pea here still has his chilling power!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}我们的迷你寒冰豌豆仍然还具备他的冷却能力!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Plant him close to the zombies so he can snuff out those torches!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}把他放在靠近僵尸的地方, 这样他就能熄灭那些火把了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Finally we have our baby Potato Mine!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}终于轮到我们的土豆地雷宝宝了!

original: {SAY:winnie}He does not do a lot of damage though...
translation: {SAY:winnie}尽管他并不能造成很大的伤害...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Who cares? Look at his tiny eyes!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}谁在意呢? 看看他们的小眼睛!
*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now get out there and bomb those zombies, neighbor!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在去轰炸那些僵尸吧, 邻居!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Neighbor, now that you have learned about the newest plants...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}邻居, 现在你已经了解了最新的植物...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Use them against these big zombies over there!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}使用他们对抗这里的大僵尸吧!
{SAY:crazydave}为什么这样做?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}因为我很疯狂!!!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}干得好啊, 邻居!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now that we have seen the power of the mini plants...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}既然我们已经看到了迷你植物的力量...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Think of the possiblity! Maybe we can even bring back tiny zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}想想这种可能, 我们或许可以同时带回来一些小僵尸!
*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, seems like our detour has taken us back to the beginning.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 看来我们的旅途又回到了起点.
{SAY:winnie}我们的房子... 我们的前院...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Great! ... do you think I can eat the one Taco that I ate again?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}太棒了! ... 你觉得我还能再吃一次我吃过的玉米卷吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}There are more pressing matters than that, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我们还有更重要的事情.
{SAY:winnie}最值得注意的是: 这附近有大量僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Ah... I miss the good old days. Just our friendly neighborhood zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}啊... 我真怀念过去的美好时光. 只有我们人畜无害的僵尸们!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombie attack seems to be stretched out into night time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸的攻击似乎一直持续到了晚上.

original: {SAY:winnie}Fortunately we get some leftover sun from defending the day.
translation: {SAY:winnie}幸运的是, 在白天的战斗中还有剩余的阳光.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Night time, party time! We even have a few stuff leftover from our holiday break!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}夜晚时间, 派对时间! 我们还有在假日时间剩下的东西!

original: {SAY:winnie}So long as you make an attempt to kill the zombies... as usual.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你只需要像往常那样, 击溃僵尸...
{SAY:winnie}那我就不会介意了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Cleopatra Zombies have stumbled into this era, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 埃及艳后现在已经来到了这个时代.

original: {SAY:winnie}They can summon zombies with their... unique dance moves.
translation: {SAY:winnie}她们可以通过她们... 奇特的舞姿来召唤僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Bah! Cheap imitation of our good old Dancing Zombies.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}切! 咱曾经舞王僵尸的廉价模仿.

original: {SAY:crazydave}You should have seen his disco-tastic moves!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你真该看看他的迪斯科舞步!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final day of our mini adventure.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们迷你冒险中的最后一天.

original: {SAY:winnie}My data analysis suggests that this will be a MASSIVE attack.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的数据分析表明, 这将是一场大规模的战斗.
{SAY:crazydave}那么这次有什么不同吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Let us just say... we are gonna have quite some BIG problems.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这么说吧... 我们将会遇到巨大的问题.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We have been through quite a lot already! How bad can this even be?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们已经经历很多了! 这次能有多糟糕呢?
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这才叫巨人僵尸的狂奔!

original: {SAY:winnie}And yet, we have emerged victorious... as usual.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 我们取得了胜利... 一如既往.
{SAY:crazydave}接招吧, 博士先生!

original: {SAY:winnie}Speaking of whom... we should go back to chase him now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}说到那厮... 我们现在是时候回去追他了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Good bye once more, my beloved neighborhood!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}又再见了, 我亲爱的街坊!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We'll come back soon for more good old days!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们很快就回来享受更多的美好时光!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}欢迎来到移花接木竞技场!

original: {SAY:winnie}You only have a small number of plants and some Escape Roots.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你只有少量的植物和一些逃脱树根.

original: {SAY:winnie}Move the plants around with Escape Roots and defeat the zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}用逃脱树根移动植物, 打败僵尸.
{SAY:winnie}祝你好运.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}In some arenas you may get to use additional chosen plants.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在某些场合中, 你可以使用额外选择的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}All given plants will have no packet recharge.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所有给定的植物将没有冷却时间.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, you have limited sun, so use them wisely.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 你的阳光数会被限制, 所以要明智地使用.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Well done. You have successfully finished all 8 arenas.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}干得漂亮. 你已经成功完成所有8个关卡.

original: {SAY:winnie}I hope this has been a fun training experience for you.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我希望这对你来说是一次有趣的培训经历.

original: {SAY:winnie}It is time we went back to the time stream.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们是时候回到时间的长河了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors have detected another new plant, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我的探测仪发现了另一种新植物, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}More plants! More friends! What do we have this time?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}更多的植物! 更多的朋友! 这次会是什么呢?
{SAY:winnie}暗影叶, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}He can provide a power boost to those in the Shadow Families.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他可以为那些暗影家族的成员提供能量提升.
{SAY:crazydave}所以说是那种... 无脑渎神且超模的加强?

original: {SAY:winnie}Ah, no. The boost Moonflower provides to her collaborators.
translation: {SAY:winnie}啊, 不是. 是月光花也能做到的那种.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to fight our way through the dark City to retrieve him.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们必须在黑暗之城中杀出一条血路去寻找他.
{SAY:crazydave}听起来是个有趣的冒险!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Something tells me something may sneak in this time...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}直觉告诉我这次可能会有什么东西溜进来...
{SAY:crazydave}蹦极僵尸?
{SAY:winnie}不确定.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Better not be them - I hate them.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}最好别是他们 - 我讨厌他们.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}我作为戴夫被绑架真是太可怕了! 真是亵渎!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are once again in a locked coordinate in time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们这次又遇到了时空错乱.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, the plants we have... shadow family without Moonflower.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 我们能用的植物... 整个暗影家族但没有月光花.
{SAY:winnie}这将会很有意思.
{SAY:crazydave}所以说... 没有蹦极僵尸?
{SAY:winnie}没有.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Gardening Adventurers, to another one of my attacks.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 园艺冒险者们, 光临我的另一个攻势.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}However, this one will not be normal, for I have called upon zombies from other timelines.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}然而, 这次可不一般, 因为我召唤了来自其他时间线的僵尸.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}My state-of-the-art portals will aid them during the attack as well.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我最先进的传送门也会在攻击中帮助他们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Good luck, Protectors. Let's see how far you can go before inevitably surrendering your brains.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}祝你们好运, 守护者们. 让我们见识一下在不可避免地交出你们的脑子之前你们能撑多久.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}时间开始断裂了.

original: {SAY:winnie}My data suggest that Kiwibeast will arrive to temporarily aid us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的数据显示野兽猕猴桃会来临时援助我们.

original: {SAY:winnie}He may be small and cute, but once damaged enough, he will go super angry.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他可能又小又可爱, 但一旦被伤害到一定程度, 他就会变得超级愤怒.

original: {SAY:winnie}Then he can deal damage to ALL zombies on screen!
translation: {SAY:winnie}然后他可以对屏幕上的所有僵尸造成伤害!

original: {SAY:winnie}Protecting him will be quite useful against this massive horde.
translation: {SAY:winnie}保护他对对付这个庞大的尸群很有用.
{SAY:crazydave}我都给你说了蹦极要来了!

original: {SAY:winnie}We already have the Zombie Parrots to deal with, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们已经有僵尸鹦鹉要对付了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}It is unlikely that Zomboss will need Bungee Zombies again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士不太可能再需要蹦极僵尸了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Oh. Right. I just really hate being Dave-napped!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哦. 也对. 我只是很讨厌被绑架!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 神殿守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}If I cannot have the temple's secret, I shall plunge both you and it into darkness instead.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}如果我得不到圣殿的秘密, 我就把你们和圣殿一起扔进黑暗中.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Darkness... and a lot of portals that lead to Dark Ages.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}黑暗... 和大量通往黑暗时代的传送门.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Then, we will publish, and you will perish!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}然后, 我们会宣告你们的死讯!
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}A massive attack is on the horizon, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}一场大规模的攻击即将来临, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Should we succeed, we will recover our shadowy friend.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果我们成功了, 我们就能找回我们的影子朋友.

original: {SAY:crazydave}A dark battle to retrieve our dark plant... fitting!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}一场夺回黑暗植物的黑暗之战... 非常合适!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}We did it! We foiled Mr. Boss guy again!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们做到了! 我们再次挫败了博士先生!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Now help me with the tea preparation, Penny. We must make Shadow Leaf feel welcome!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}现在帮我沏点茶, 潘妮. 我们必须让暗影叶感到宾至如归!
{SAY:winnie}如果你坚持的话.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Oh no... Spring Bean has gone crazy!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}哦不... 弹簧豆疯掉了!
{SAY:crazydave}像我一样?

original: {SAY:winnie}Worse! He has gone ahead and crafted a whole quest about him!
translation: {SAY:winnie}更糟! 他精心制作了一个关于他的任务!
{SAY:crazydave}更多的任务? 更多的冒险!

original: {SAY:winnie}This is not a joke, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这可不是玩笑, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}These challenges will be unlike anything we have faced.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些挑战将不同于我们曾经面临的任何挑战.

original: {SAY:crazydave}How hard can a plant quest be?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}一个植物任务能难到哪去呢?
{SAY:winnie}胡扯.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫...
{SAY:crazydave}怎么了?

original: {SAY:winnie}... your plant has the same terrible plant picking skill as you.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 你的植物有和你一样糟糕的植物挑选手艺.
{SAY:crazydave}额...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Crazy genes running in both me and my plants?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我和我的植物都有疯狂的基因?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}This... is gonna be quite a dilemma.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这... 将是一个两难的困境.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Finally... we seem to get a break.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}终于... 我们可以休息一会了.
{SAY:winnie}一个有趣而轻松的谜题.

original: {SAY:winnie}Break all the iceblocks in time... seems simple enough.
translation: {SAY:winnie}及时打破所有的冰块... 貌似十分容易.
{SAY:crazydave}破冰者, 集合!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well... and ice pushers too! Can't forget them.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}嗯... 还有推冰手! 可不能忘了他们.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}And now we are back to business.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}现在我们回到正题上来.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! Do we have to kill zombies on this tiny line?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 我们非得在这么小的地方上杀僵尸吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Quite the opposite, User Dave. We have to prevent zombies from trampling on these.
translation: {SAY:winnie}恰恰相反, 戴夫. 我们得防止僵尸踩到这些东西.
{SAY:crazydave}不过为啥呢?

original: {SAY:winnie}... we are talking about time travel here, right?
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 我们说的是时光旅行, 对吧?
{SAY:crazydave}有道理.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I do not think we will like this next one...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我不认为我们会喜欢接下来这一关...

original: {SAY:winnie}This is a very big restriction, after all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}毕竟, 这是一个非常离谱的限制.

original: {SAY:crazydave}There must be something more into this! How else will we beat this?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这里面一定另有隐情! 我们还能怎么过关呢?
{SAY:winnie}祈祷?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}才不是呢! 谴责!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}又来了...
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在我们经历了这么多之后...
{SAY:winnie}终于来了. 最终之战.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Hey there moldies! Part of Spring Bean's challenge, huh?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}嘿, 霉菌们! 你们是弹簧豆的计划的一部分, 对吧?

original: {SAY:winnie}I am sure it cannot be worse than previous battles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我相信这不会比以前的战斗更糟糕.
{SAY:crazydave} 胡扯!
{SAY:winnie}真是一针见血.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫...

original: {SAY:winnie}Can we retrain your plants to be less crazy?
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们能让你的植物不那么疯狂吗?

original: {SAY:crazydave}It takes a special kind of crazy to be this good at puzzles!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}只有特别疯狂的人才能这么擅长破解谜团!
{SAY:crazydave}我为你感到骄傲, 小豆子!

original: {SAY:winnie}Anddddd we have lost him. Let us just get outta here.
translation: {SAY:winnie}弹簧豆已经无可救药了. 我们还是离开这里吧.

original: {SAY:winnie}Pretty sure our neighbor here will share the same sentiment.
translation: {SAY:winnie}相信我们的邻居也会这么想的.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}又一次旅行, 又一个植物任务.

original: {SAY:winnie}These challenges featuring Strawbursts will be... interesting.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次聚焦爆浆草莓的挑战将会... 十分有趣.
{SAY:crazydave}看看他们如此疯狂的脸, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:crazydave}I bet their challenges will also be CRAZZYYYY as well!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我觉得这次挑战也将会是一次疯狂的挑战!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. We can only hope to survive with our wits intact.
translation: {SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 我们只能希望以完整的智慧生存下来.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! We are facing numerous ranged zombies here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警告, 戴夫! 我们将面临大量的远程僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}With Strawbursts' fragile states, this might be tricky.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这对于爆浆草莓来说, 显然很棘手.
{SAY:crazydave}脆弱... 但是也很强大! 不要担心, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Our berry friends will be safe and sound!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们的草莓朋友一定会安然无恙!

original: {SAY:winnie}I hope so, User Dave. I hope so.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我希望如此, 戴夫. 我希望.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Looks like Dr. Zomboss has deployed a new trick for this final battle.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看来僵王博士对这次最后的战斗部署了一个新的战略.

original: {SAY:winnie}Piercing needles will be fired occasionally, destroying any armed Strawburst.
translation: {SAY:winnie}时不时会发射一次锋利的刺, 并且摧毁所有处于装弹状态的爆浆草莓.

original: {SAY:winnie}Keep an eye out for them, and fire all berries immediately if needed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}留意那些尖刺, 如果需要的话, 立刻释放处于装弹中的草莓.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we can collect these needles for researches, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}潘妮, 你觉得我们可以用这些针做研究吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}And just what are you gonna do with those anyway?
translation: {SAY:winnie}你打算用这些针做什么?
{SAY:crazydave}... 用不坏的牙签?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have emerged victorious again, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我们又赢了.

original: {SAY:winnie}... I should really try to find new ways to declare victory.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 我真的应该用一种新的方式来表达我们的胜利.

original: {SAY:crazydave}That was some berry fun time, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这是这些草莓的庆祝时间, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}You did not even try with this pun, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你甚至没有尝试过这个双关语, 戴夫.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}另一个任务, 另一株需要精通的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}This time, Sun Bean wished to be understood.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次, 阳光豆希望被理解.

original: {SAY:winnie}You will need to utilize his power to win these challenges.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你需要利用他的力量来赢得这些挑战.

original: {SAY:crazydave}The power of the sun, packed in a small bean! CRAZZYYYY!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}阳光的力量, 就装在一颗小小的豆子里! 太疯狂了!

original: {SAY:winnie}We went WAY past that a long time ago, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们很久以前就不这么想了, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Sun is going to be scarce this time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这一次阳光将变得稀缺.

original: {SAY:winnie}Most of our sun producing plants have decided to take a break.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们的大部分阳光生产植物都决定休息一下.
{SAY:crazydave}哎呀!

original: {SAY:winnie}Not all hope is lost yet. Perhaps those Kings will come in handy.
translation: {SAY:winnie}并不是所有的希望都破灭了. 也许这些国王僵尸将派上用场.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Oh! Maybe they'll knight me so I will be protected from zombies! Great idea, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哦! 也许他们会封我为骑士, 让我免受僵尸的伤害! 好主意, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Now even Sun Bean has gone AWOL.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}现在连阳光豆都擅离职守了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Those 6 on the lawn are what we have for this level.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们这一关只有场上的这6颗了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}When tough times arise, who's gonna answer the call?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}当困难来临时, 谁来响应号召?

original: {SAY:winnie}Reinforcement will come when we least expect.
translation: {SAY:winnie}增援会在我们最意想不到的时候到来.

original: {SAY:crazydave}... does that mean I should make mints into plants?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}... 那是不是说我应该把薄荷做成植物?

original: {SAY:winnie}... that sounds like a bad idea and a disappoint-mint to me.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 这听起来是个坏主意, 给我微 \"薄\" 的希望.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But think about it, Penny! They might be the breath of fresh air we need!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是设想一下, 潘妮! 他们可能就是我们需要的新鲜空气!
{SAY:winnie}... 也许吧, 那么. 也许吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The night has come down, yet Sun Bean is still here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}夜幕降临了, 但阳光豆还在这里.

original: {SAY:winnie}It will be a sitting plant against the final attack... unless we protect it!
translation: {SAY:winnie}在最后的进攻中, 这株植物只能坐以待毙... 除非我们保护它!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Let's stand our ground and save it!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}让我们坚守阵地并拯救它吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is the end of the challenges. We have prevailed!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}挑战到此结束. 我们获胜了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We now have an even better bean!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们现在有了更好的豆子了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}And no half-baked zombie attack can hold us back from that!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}任何不完善的僵尸攻击都无法阻止我们了!
{SAY:winnie}的确, 戴夫. 的确.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I have chosen to launch a massive small-scale invasion across all timelines, once again.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我已经再次决定好发动一场跨越所有时间线的大规模集中入侵了.
{SAY:zombossicon}强调的是大规模.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Try to stop me... if you dare.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}试着阻止我... 如果你们敢的话.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Seems like we are gonna need to bring out the big plants.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看起来这次我们要派出强大的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we make use of the Melon brothers' immense firepower.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我建议我们利用西瓜兄弟的强大力量.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Great idea, Penny! Their seedy melons will surely destroy any zombies easily!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}好主意, 佩妮! 他们带籽的瓜肯定能轻易摧毁任何僵尸!
{SAY:winnie}我们走着瞧.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Did you enjoy the puzzle I made?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们喜欢我设下的谜团吗?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Well, no matter what your answer is, I have prepared another for you.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}不论你们接下来怎么回答我, 我都已经为你们设好了另一个谜团.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}My machines have temporarily disabled nearly all your plants... again...
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我的机器已经暂时瘫痪了几乎你们的所有植物... 又一次...

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Will you survive? I sure hope not.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们会活下来吗? 我当然不希望.
{SAY:zombossicon}谨启, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这将会很... 有意思.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}That was one fine sandwich! What did I miss?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}那三明治真不错! 我错过了什么?

original: {SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss being... well, Dr. Zomboss. So not much.
