translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士... 额, 僵王博士又开始了. 所以也没啥.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, time to continue with the zombie bashing!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那么, 是时候继续暴揍僵尸了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 园丁们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Looks like you're about to foil my plans once again.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}看来你们又要破坏我的计划了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I have no choice but to send more Gargantuars to end your little travelling scheme.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我别无选择, 只能派出更多巨人僵尸来结束你们这小小的旅行计划.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Farewell, my nemesis. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}永别了, 我的宿敌. 真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}还有最后一次攻击.

original: {SAY:winnie}I can send in some help this time, but I will need time to get ready for that.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次我可以送过来一些帮助, 但这需要些时间.
{SAY:crazydave}这就是你的用武之地了, 邻居!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Try to hold them off while Penny sets up her timey help!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}在潘妮为你提供帮助之前, 试着拖住他们!
{SAY:winnie}是的.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间守护者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}That was awkward, to say the least.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}至少可以说, 这有点尴尬.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}But, I have confidence that my next scheme will destroy you.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}但是, 我相信我的下一个计划会摧毁你们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}For now, I shall retreat. Enjoy your victory. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}现在, 我要撤退了. 享受你们的胜利吧. 真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们赢了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Only the battle, User Dave. Not the war.
translation: {SAY:winnie}只是一场小交锋, 戴夫. 还不是大战争.

original: {SAY:crazydave}That's still grounds for celebration - thanks to our melony friends!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但这仍然值得去庆祝 - 感谢我们的西瓜朋友们!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We must have... cake! Time to hit the kitchen!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们一定要有... 蛋糕! 是时候去厨房了!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}The Future! Do you think we'll see future-Dave as well?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}未来! 你觉得我们能遇到未来的戴夫吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}After all, it's 4000 years! I'm sure he'll survive in his robotic glory!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}毕竟都4000年了! 我相信他会活在机器人的荣耀中!
{TIRED:winnie}但是我们还不确定...
{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 你听到了什么吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}I am detecting a sudden influx of power.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我探测到有一股能量突然涌入.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps future technology has allowed the zombies to have access to portals.
translation: {SAY:winnie}或许未来的科技已经能允许僵尸使用传送门.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Portals? More CRAAAAY-ziness! These zombies are persistent, aren't they?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}传送门? 太疯狂了! 这些僵尸可真顽固, 不是吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Mechs seem to be a common theme in the Far Future.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}机甲似乎是遥远未来的常见主题.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared - they might be even tougher than most Gargantuars.
translation: {SAY:winnie}做好准备 - 他们有可能比一般的巨人僵尸还要耐打.
{TIRED:crazydave}比巨人僵尸更难对付? 呀!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Better bust out our best offensive plants then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}最好是拿出我们最强力的攻击植物!

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}After all, the best offense is a good defense... and we need to strike back somehow!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}毕竟, 最好的进攻就是防守... 无论如何我们都需要反击!
{SAY:winnie}令人奇怪的影响深刻.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 小心!

original: {SAY:winnie}Spider Bots are coming down on our defense!
translation: {SAY:winnie}有一些蜘蛛机器人正在逼近我们的防线!

original: {SAY:winnie}They are tougher than the average Imps too!
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们还比一般的小鬼更抗揍!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Get my swatter and my shoes then - we're going on a spider hunt!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那就把我的苍蝇拍和鞋子拿来 - 我们要去对付这些蜘蛛了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}欢迎回来, 园丁,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}In this year your brains were collected ages ago.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们的脑子在很多年前的这一年就被拿走了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Collect them again soon, Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}将再一次将它们拿走, 埃德加·僵王博士.

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Watch out neighbor, I'm pretty sure he wasn't talking about my BRAINS!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}你可要小心啊, 邻居, 我确信那个家伙没有在说我的脑子!

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I would say there's evidence to the contrary.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}我想说有相反的证据.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Today's forecast: Rain of spiders, with massive ripples of time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今天的天气预报: 蜘蛛雨, 同时伴随着大量的时间波动.

original: {TIRED:winnie}The next zombie wave will come when the previous wave has been damaged enough.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}当上一波被打到一定程度时, 下一波僵尸就会来临.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Do not hit the Bug Bots too quickly, or we risk dealing with far too much at once.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}不要急着清理那些爬虫机器人, 不然我们将会面临一并解决超多僵尸的风险.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Why don't the zombies just come all at once instead of coming wave by wave, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那为什么僵尸要一波一波一波的来, 而不是一次全都来呢, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}That is... Well. You are surprisingly astute this time. I wonder why too.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这... 好吧. 看来你这次竟然异常的聪明. 不过我也想知道为什么.

original: {SAY:winnie}But perhaps we will never know how Dr. Zomboss thinks.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但也许是我们永远也不知道僵王博士是怎么想的吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert! The zombies from other eras have joined in the battle as well!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}警报! 来自其他时代的僵尸也加入了战斗!

original: {SAY:crazydave}That's not a new thing though, right Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这可不是什么新鲜事了, 对吧, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}No, but they now have access to portals as well!
translation: {SAY:winnie}不, 这次他们也可以从传送门中出现!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be wary of ALL the timelines this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次要警惕所有时间线的僵尸!

original: {SAY:winnie}And just for that, I am bringing out my temporary seed slots for today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}正因如此, 我今天要给你我的临时种子槽.

original: {SAY:winnie}Make use of ALL 9 seed slots. We will need all the help we can get.
translation: {SAY:winnie}充分利用所有的九个种子槽. 我们将需要更多的帮助.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time for some portal parties like the good old days then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候像过去那样举办一场传送门聚会了!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}潘妮, 这里怎么有这么多的机甲路障啊!
{SAY:crazydave}他们仅仅只是盛气凌人地... 站在那里!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Since we have quite the budget this time, I suggest we bring out Caulipower.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因为我们这次的预算很充裕, 我建议我们带上超能花菜.

original: {SAY:winnie}The hypnotizing shots will turn these stunned Mechs against their former allies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}催眠射线会让这些矗立的机甲攻击他们以前的盟友.

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}Now THAT is some CRAAAAZY science and magic!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}那才叫疯狂的科技与魔法啊!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}You can decide to launch one mower early now.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}你现在可以决定是否提前释放一台小推车了.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Just press and hold a mower when the time is right.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}只要在合适的时候长按小推车.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Sometimes that's the most strate-logical thing to do!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}有时这是最符合战略的做法!

original: {SAY:winnie}Speaking of which, we will need a lot of sun to break these statues.
translation: {SAY:winnie}说到这里, 我们需要充足的阳光来打破这些雕像.

original: {SAY:winnie}I suggest bringing in both kinds of Sunflowers to keep up with these high demands.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我建议我们把这两种向日葵都带上, 以满足这些高需求.

original: {SAY:winnie}Especially against today. One huge mech war, incoming.
translation: {SAY:winnie}尤其是今天. 我们要面临一次大规模的机甲之战.
{NPC_EXIT:winnie}{SPECIAL2:crazydave}嘿! 不要抢我台词!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Whew! That was one heck of a giant wave of machines!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}咻! 真是一股巨大的机械浪潮!
{SAY:winnie}确实.

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensors have detected another era worth visiting.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测仪检测到了另一个值得一去的时代.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们还在等什么呢? 让我们出发吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The future's not what it used to be! There's more of it!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}未来已经不是之前那样了! 好像多了些什么!

original: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies may be drawing strength from the time fissure, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我相信僵尸可能从时间裂缝中汲取了力量.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will likely encounter more powerful zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们很可能会遇到更强大的僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}Thankfully, I have detected a new solution: Power Tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}谢天谢地, 我发现了一个新的解决方案: 能量地砖.
{SAY:crazydave}你说这些发光的地砖?
{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 是能量地砖.

original: {SAY:winnie}If you use a Plant Food on a plant on a tile...
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果你在这些地砖上使用叶绿素的话...

original: {SAY:winnie}All plants on the tiles of the same color will also receive a Plant Food.
translation: {SAY:winnie}相同颜色地砖上的所有植物都会同时获得叶绿素.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may want to maximize the use of these tiles in order to win.
translation: {SAY:winnie}为了胜利你可能要尽可能多的使用这种地砖.

original: {SAY:winnie}Certain plants may have more powerful Plant Food effects than others.
translation: {SAY:winnie}某些植物的叶绿素效果可能比其他植物的更强大.

original: {SAY:winnie}As such, it is not a bad idea to experiment with them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因此, 对它们进行试验并不是一个坏主意.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Multiplying the number of Plant Food effects?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}成倍增加的叶绿素的效果?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}真是太疯狂啦!!!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I used to hypnotize the old Dancing Zombie back at night.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我以前在晚上会催眠舞王僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Then we could dance together with his crew while defeating the other zombies!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}然后我们可以和他的同伴一起跳舞, 同时打败其他僵尸!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Those were the good old days. Or nights.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那些可真是美好的日子啊. 或者说是美好的夜晚.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared to relive the past, User Dave. Right here in the future.
translation: {SAY:winnie}准备好重温过去吧, 戴夫. 就在未来的世界里.
{SAY:crazydave}你的意思是...

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes. Disco Mechs and Hypno-shrooms are both here for a show.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 迪斯科机甲和魅惑菇将会上演一场好戏.
{SAY:crazydave}那就继续跳舞吧, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Speaking of the old night, there's also Football Zombie as well!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}说到以前的夜晚, 我还想到了橄榄球僵尸!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll see a version of him, somewhere around here?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你觉得我们会在这附近遇到他的另一个版本吗?
{SAY:winnie}我不能确定.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. He was fun to watch football with!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}啊. 看他打球赛一定会很有趣!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Granted, he only spoke \NO BRAINZ\" when hypnotized, but still!"
translation: {SAY:crazydave}确实, 他只有在被催眠时才会说 \"没有脑子\", 但也是很有趣!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Lookie here, Penny! Dandelions! Quick, make a wish!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}看那里啊, 潘妮! 是蒲公英! 快, 许个愿吧!

original: {SAY:winnie}I do not recommend making wishes with these highly explosive seeds, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我不建议用这些非常容易爆炸的种子许愿.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, we can unleash a huge barrage of them with Hurrikales' wind blasts.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 我们可以用飓风甘蓝的巨大风暴来让他释放大量弹幕.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware that Dandelions will take a while to recharge their seeds afterward.
translation: {SAY:winnie}注意, 蒲公英需要一些时间来重新装填弹药.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Great idea, Penny! We can make a million wishes with Hurrikale!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}好主意, 潘妮! 我们可以用飓风甘蓝许上百万个愿望!

original: {SAY:crazydave}I'll be right back with a few giant fans as well!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我也会马上带几个超级粉丝回来!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Please note that Gargantuar Prime's laser can singe these endangered plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}注意, 机甲巨人的激光会烧焦这些濒危的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}I recommend bringing in Pumpkins for extra protection.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我建议带南瓜头以加强对他们的保护.

original: {SAY:winnie}Alternatively, any sort of stun can disrupt their laser mid-firing.
translation: {SAY:winnie}另外, 任何类型的眩晕都可以打断他们的激光发射.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I detect massive shifts in time, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我发现时间发生了巨大的变化.

original: {SAY:winnie}Thyme Warps seem to be the cause of these temporal tampering.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那些逆时草或许就是原因所在.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, we may use them to warp zombies in a 3x3 area back to the start.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 我们可以使用他们让3x3范围内的僵尸因时间扭曲回到起点.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware that these zombies' health will be restored to full for each warp.
translation: {SAY:winnie}请注意, 时间扭曲的同时这些僵尸的血量将会回满.

original: {SAY:winnie}This ability should help us deal with some close range portals today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这个能力在今天可以帮助我们对付一些近距离传送门.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Time masters, you say? Maybe you can trade notes with them, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你是说时间大师? 也许你可以和他们交换意见, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:crazydave}You are a time machine after all!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟你是台时光机!

original: {SAY:winnie}That... is not a bad idea. Excuse me while I study them further.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这... 是个不错的主意. 失陪一下, 我要进一步研究一下.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}More timeline fractures have been detected from Thyme Warps.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}由于逆时草的影响, 越来越多的时间线被扭曲.

original: {SAY:winnie}My scans show that these frozen Tier III ones can affect the entire board!
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的扫描显示这些冰封的三阶逆时草可以影响整个地面!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware though that Gargantuar Primes' laser can break open the iceblocks.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过要注意, 机甲巨人的激光可以击碎这些冰块.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may not want the zombies to be warped at the wrong time and stack up.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你可能不希望僵尸在错误的时间点被扭曲并堆积起来.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We have a bigger problem though, Penny! Another HUGE mech attack!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}潘妮, 我们还有另外一个更棘手的问题! 又一场大规模的机甲进攻!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Neighbor! Bring all your BIG plants out - this will be a tough battle!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}邻居! 带上你所有的重火力植物 - 这将会是一次艰苦的战斗!
{SAY:winnie}嗯, 你也听到了. 祝你好运.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Thyme Warp's overwhelming power will be interesting to harnest.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}逆时草的压倒性力量利用起来非常有意思.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to keep an eye on him. For now, this era is clear.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们仍然需要留意那个家伙. 现在, 这个时代已经安全了.
{SAY:winnie}奇怪的是没有僵王博士的干扰... 真是可疑.

original: {SAY:winnie}I strongly suspect he had already set up something ahead of us...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑他赶在我们前面设置了一些东西...

original: {SAY:winnie}Ah well. You know where to go next, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}好吧. 戴夫, 你也知道接下来要去哪了.
{SAY:crazydave}80年代?
{SAY:winnie}80年代.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Then time to hit the time stream, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是时候进入时间的长河了, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies have developed a new technological invention to fight us, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 僵尸似乎发明了一种新的科技来对付我们.

original: {SAY:winnie}These runes will prevent us from planting ground plants on them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那些符文会让我们无法在上面种植地面植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}Not only that - once activated, they will shield all zombies on those tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不仅如此 - 一旦被激活, 它将保护上面的所有僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to be careful around them - I fear that this shielding will be impossible to break through.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在它们周围我们要小心 - 因为我担心这些保护无法被突破.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Think of the horror Penny - a shielded Shield Zombie! How will we even win?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}想想有多恐怖吧, 潘妮 - 一只被保护的屏障僵尸! 我们该怎么取胜呢?

original: {SAY:winnie}I am afraid I do not have a good answer for this.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这个我恐怕没有合适的答案.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I spy with my crazy eye a U.F.B.! An unidentified flying brain!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我用我的疯眼侦查到了一架 U.F.B.! 一艘 \"不明-飞行-脑\"!

original: {SAY:winnie}Something more formidable than a brain lies within.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不明飞行脑之中的某样东西比起脑子外形更加令人可畏.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Woah! What's this? It's blocking our path!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}哇哈! 这是什么? 它把咱们路堵住了!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}We may need to find another way to bypass this.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我们可能得另想办法绕过这个.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Perhaps we can come back after we're done with other eras?
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}也许我们可以在游历其他时代之后再回来?

original: {EXCITED:winnie}We may use Travel Log for checkpoints in our adventure.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我们可以使用旅行原木作为我们冒险旅途中的存档点.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey Penny! What's with all these gears?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 潘妮! 这些装束是怎么回事?

original: {SAY:winnie}There has been some rumors circulating about mystery creatures, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}最近流传着一些关于神秘生物的谣言, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}These so-called Yeti Zombies are spotted roaming around certain areas.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些所谓的雪人僵尸被发现在某些地区游荡.

original: {SAY:winnie}And there are quite a few bounties placed on them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们身上有不少赏金.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are not quite sure how the rewards can be used...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们不太确定如何使用这些奖励...

original: {SAY:winnie}But it is worth checking out nonetheless - hence these gears.
translation: {SAY:winnie}尽管如此, 它还是值得一试 - 因为有这些夸张的服装.

original: {SAY:winnie}I have also detailed a map on known Yeti sightings as well to aid us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我还在地图上详细列出了已知的雪人目击地点, 以帮助我们.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}We are going on a Yeti hunt on top of our current timestream escapade?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}我们现在要在时间流上冒险的同时进行雪人狩猎吗?
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}这也太奇怪了!!!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey Penny! What's with all these radars?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 潘妮! 这些雷达是怎么回事?

original: {SAY:winnie}Turkeys have somehow invaded the entire universe, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}火鸡不知怎么地入侵了整个宇宙, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}All timelines are currently polluted by them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}目前所有的时间线都被它们污染了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Bounties have been distributed as an incentive to get people to kill them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}击杀它们会有悬赏.

original: {SAY:winnie}I am certain this is correlated to Tumble Raid's appearance.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我确信这与风滚小分队的出现有关.

original: {SAY:winnie}Since these bounties can help us purchase packets to unlock them...
translation: {SAY:winnie}因为这些奖励可以帮助我们购买种子包来解锁它们...
{SAY:winnie}我们不妨调查一下.
{EXCITED:crazydave}所以说是... 火鸡时节了?

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}Time to get my hunter hat then, Penny!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}是时候戴上我的猎人帽了, 潘妮!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Brrrrr. It's colder than a polar bear eating an ice pop!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}哦哦哦. 这比北极熊吃冰棍还冷!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. It appears we have arrived in the Frostbite Caves.
translation: {SAY:winnie}确实. 看来我们已经到达了冰霜洞穴.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We've traveled so far back in history ... we've arrived in PREhistory!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}我们穿越了很久的历史 ... 我们来到了史前时代!

original: {SAY:winnie}A historic moment indeed, User Dave. But more importantly...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这确实是历史性的时刻, 戴夫. 但更重要的是...

original: {EXCITED:winnie}My sensors indicate there is an ice floe on the lawn.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我的探测仪显示草坪上有一块浮冰.

original: {SAY:winnie}Data suggests it will block both plants and zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}数据显示, 它可以阻挡植物和僵尸.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Though I predict hungry zombies will find a way around it.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}不过我预测饥饿的僵尸会找到办法绕过它.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry. We'll plant wisely and stop those zombies COLD!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别担心. 我们要明智地种植, 让那些僵尸不准 \"冻\"!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Don't look now, Penny, but those plants have a bad case of freezer burn!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}现在别看, 佩妮, 那些植物都冻坏了!

original: {TIRED:winnie}It's the freezing winds from this time period. They've immobilized the plants.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这是这个时期的寒风. 它们把植物固定住了.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}I suggest we call on Hot Potato. She can melt those ice blocks.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我建议我们叫上热土豆. 她能融化那些冰块.

original: {SAY:crazydave}I'm warming up to the idea already!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这个主意让我十分温暖!

original: {SAY:winnie}As we should be, considering we have a new challenge up ahead.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这是应该的, 考虑到我们面临着新的挑战.

original: {SAY:winnie}These lovely flowers will perish if the zombies step on them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些可爱的花如果被僵尸踩到就会枯萎.

original: {SAY:winnie}As such, you should try to protect them from being trampled.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因此, 你应该尽量保护它们不被践踏.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Then what are we waiting for then? Time to kick some frozen butts!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那我们还等什么? 是时候去踢些冷屁股了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}This level is a locked coordinate in time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}这关是时空错乱.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You must take these plants to win.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}你只能用这些植物制胜.
{EXCITED:winnie}否则, 你就有扭曲现实的风险.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}永远不要扭曲现实! 你会想出办法的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}I hope you can make use of these plants though!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}不过我希望你能好好利用这些植物!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Especially Hot Potato. Her damage is enough to defeat the Dodo Riders.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}特别是热土豆. 她的伤害足以击败渡渡鸟骑手.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You might want to save some iceblocks for Hot Potatoes in this battle.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}在这场战斗中, 你可能需要为热土豆留一些冰块.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}This level is a locked coordinate in time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}这关是时空错乱.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You must take these plants to win.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}你只能用这些植物制胜.
{EXCITED:winnie}否则, 你就有扭曲现实的风险.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}永远不要扭曲现实! 你会想出办法的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}I hope you can make use of these plants though!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}不过我希望你能好好利用这些植物!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Especially Hot Potato. Her damage is enough to defeat the Dodo Riders.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}特别是热土豆. 她的伤害足以击败渡渡鸟骑手.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You might want to save some iceblocks for Hot Potatoes in this battle.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}在这场战斗中, 你可能需要为热土豆留一些冰块.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}We may also exploit these Dodos' limited flights to better position our plants.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}我们也可以利用这些渡渡鸟有限的飞行机制来更好地放置我们的植物.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Me Zomboss. Me write you another threatening note.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}我, 僵王博士. 我给你们写了另一封威胁信.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You in trouble. Biiiiig trouble. Gargantuan trouble, in fact!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们有麻烦了. 大麻烦. 准确说是, 巨人的麻烦!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar smash! Smash your tiny, shivering plants!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}地獭巨人即将出马! 来粉碎你们那些颤抖的小植物!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar deliver prehistoric plague of Imps!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}地獭巨人僵尸会抛掷史前的烦人小鬼群!
{SAY:zombossicon}祝你们过得不愉快. 真诚的, 僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Waves of Hunters are invading our lawn this time.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这次一波又一波的猎人入侵了我们的草坪.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Maybe this funny looking plant can help us, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}也许这株看起来很奇怪的植物可以帮助我们, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}Do not underestimate Dusk Lobber's potential, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不要低估幽暮投手的潜力, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}She cannot be detected by most zombies and ice winds.
translation: {SAY:winnie}她不能被大多数僵尸和冰风影响.

original: {TIRED:winnie}This is a very useful ability, but beware of the occasional Gargantuars.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这是一个非常有用的技能, 但要小心偶尔出现的巨人.

original: {TIRED:winnie}I postulate evolution will never come to that zombie.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我认为进化永远不会出现在那种僵尸身上.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Not in a million, billion, gazillion years.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}没个一百万年, 十亿年或者十亿年都不行.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}There seems to be a lot more ice wind today, Penny!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}今天似乎有更多的冰风, 潘妮!

original: {TIRED:winnie}I-i-i guess we should start collecting more fire plants, User Dave.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我-我-我想我们应该开始收集更多的火系植物, 戴夫.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Fire P-p-pea can provide decent damage as well as warmth to our plants.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}火焰豌-豌-豌豆既能给我们的植物提供温暖, 也能带来可观的伤害.

original: {TIRED:winnie}However, b-b-beware of the oncoming Weasels today.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}但是, 小-小-小心今天要来的冰鼬.

original: {TIRED:winnie}They are fast, so be sure to b-b-bring some defensive walls.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}它们速度很快, 所以要带-带-带上防御植物.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! Death by a thousand weasels? Watch out, neighbor!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}哎呀! 被一千只鼠鼬绞杀? 小心点, 邻居!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Brrrr... I am r-r-running low on anti-freeze.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}哦哦哦... 我的防冻剂快用完-完-完了.

original: {TIRED:winnie}C-c-can you break s-s-some iceblocks for me so I c-c-can make more?
translation: {TIRED:winnie}你能-能-能帮我打破一-一-一些冰块吗? 这样我就能-能-能多做一些了.

original: {TIRED:winnie}I n-n-need to warm m-m-myself u... ACCCHEW!
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我得-得-得让自-自-自己暖和一下, 啊... 嚏!
{TIRED:winnie}... 抱-抱-抱-歉.

original: {TIRED:winnie}T-t-try to use the Hunter Z-z-zombies to m-m-make more iceblocks.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}试-试-试着让猎人僵-僵-僵尸制-制-制造更多的冰块.

original: {TIRED:winnie}I d-d-detect that there are n-n-no Hunters in the f-f-final wave...
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我检-检-检测到最-最-最后一波没-没-没有猎人...

original: {TIRED:winnie}... s-s-so be q-q-quick with the objective.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}... 所-所-所以要快-快-快速完成目标.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}These endangered plants are looking funny, Penny!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这些濒危的植物看起来真好笑, 潘妮!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Looks like some Spring Beans are always crouching this time!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}看来这次弹簧豆会总是蜷缩着!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}I am sure our neighbor can protect them all the same, though!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}不过我相信我们的邻居还是能保护他们的!
{TIRED:winnie}但愿吧.

original: {TIRED:winnie}I am still a bit too c-c-cold to find any extra information this time.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这次我还是太冷-冷-冷了, 找不到任何额外的信息.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I'm gettin' dizzy from all these zombie-moving sliders!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这些僵尸换位的滑块让我头晕!

original: {TIRED:winnie}And it will only g-g-get worse. We got company!
translation: {TIRED:winnie}而且情况只会-会-会更糟. 敌人来了!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Do they come to buy my plants?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}他们是来买我的植物的吗?
{SAY:winnie}不-不-不. 那可是僵尸啊. 专心点, 戴夫.

original: {TIRED:winnie}We m-m-may need to deploy the newly acquired Stunion.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我们可能需要使用新获得的眩晕洋葱.

original: {TIRED:winnie}S-s-stunned Hoarders cannot release any Weasels - even when killed.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}被眩晕的匿鼬僵尸不能释放任何冰鼬 - 即使被击杀.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Now excuse m-m-me, I will need to continue warming up my s-s-system.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}不好意思失-失-失陪一下, 我要继续给我的系-系-系统预热.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}These Cave Zombies sure are hard headed.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这些洞穴僵尸确实很头硬.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}They just won't take \no brains\" for an answer!"
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}他们就是不想承认\n他们没有脑子!

original: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. Neanderthal zombie skulls are 33.2 percent harder than other zombie skulls.
translation: {SAY:winnie}确实. 尼安德特僵尸头骨比其他僵尸头骨坚硬33.2%.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Ah well. At least we survived. Let's get outta here!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}啊行. 至少我们活下来了. 我们离开这里吧!

original: {SAY:winnie}Agreed. Thankfully my system is useable again now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}同意. 谢天谢地, 我的系统现在又可以使用了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Brrr... I can never g-g-get used to the cold.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}唔... 我永远也不能适-适-适应寒冷.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Or why you seem to be fine in that attire.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}不过为什么你穿成这样看起来还挺好.
{SAY:crazydave}老实说我也不知道.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}What I DO know... is that we have more zombies to defeat!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}我所知道的是... 我们现在要对付更多的僵尸!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Regardless of the cold... Or the cold comfort of victory!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}先别管冷了... 或者是冷冰冰的捷报!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这刺骨的寒风很... 阿-阿-阿嚏!

original: {TIRED:winnie}... how I was able to even s-s-sneeze is beyond my g-g-grasp.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}... 我该如何打喷嚏都已经超出我的理-理-理解范围了.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Full lawn double icewind s-s-seem to be b-b-blowing every other wave...
translation: {TIRED:winnie}双倍强度并且遍布整个草坪的暴风似-似-似乎每一波都会吹-吹-吹一次...

original: {TIRED:winnie}T-t-try to avoid wasting H-h-hot Potato with t-t-this information.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}得-得-得知这些情报后应尽-尽-尽量避免浪费烤-烤-烤土豆.

original: {TIRED:winnie}N-n-now, excuse m-m-me. M-m-more anti-freeze for m-m-me.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}现-现-现在, 先走一步-步-步. 我-我-我需要加更-更-更多的防冻液.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Would it b-b-be too far-fetched to say that only a lava floor can warm me up?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}如果说只有岩浆池才能让我感到温暖, 那会-会-会不会太牵强了?

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! We have Lava Guava for today this time!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}不要担心, 潘妮! 这次我们有岩浆番石榴!

original: {SAY:crazydave}His lava pool will surely warm you right up!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}他的岩浆池能够让你立刻感到温暖!
{SAY:winnie}谢-谢-谢了, 戴夫.

original: {TIRED:crazydave}No problem! Someone has to combat the cold for you!
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}小菜一碟! 总得有什么东西为你御寒吧!
{TIRED:crazydave}现在, 是时候与僵尸战斗了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}我是僵王博士. 僵王博士创造了某些东西.
{SAY:zombossicon}一些... 邪恶的东西.
{SAY:zombossicon}一只强大的僵尸!
{SAY:zombossicon}准备好迎接失败的洗礼吧! 谨启, 僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}这十分的恐怖.

original: {TIRED:winnie}The Nether Dodos are a force to be reckoned with.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}幽冥渡渡鸟是一股不可忽视的力量.

original: {TIRED:winnie}They CANNOT be detected unless they fly.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}除非它们飞行, 否则是不会察觉到它的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Can we keep one and train her how to fly then?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}那么我们可以养一只然后再训练它如何飞行吗?

original: {TIRED:winnie}No. We do need to find a way to force them to fly though.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}不, 我们需要找到一种方式让它不得不飞行.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Don't worry! I'm sure our neighbor can figure something out with these plants!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}放心吧! 我相信我们的邻居用这些植物一定能解决!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{TIRED:winnie}哦不等等...
{TIRED:winnie}...

original: {TIRED:winnie}Huh. These are not really bad choices.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}咻, 这也许并不是最糟糕的选择.
{TIRED:winnie}...
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}戴夫?
{SAY:crazydave}怎么了, 潘妮?
{TIRED:winnie}我说戴夫啊, 你这以后还是别选植物了.

original: {TIRED:winnie}That is for giving me a scare.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}这是给我的警告.
{EXCITED:crazydave}噢. 拜托?

original: {TIRED:winnie}That won't work on me this time.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}下次还是让我来选植物吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is a lot of icecubed zombies right there.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这里有很多冰块僵尸.
{EXCITED:crazydave}这一点也不好!
{TIRED:winnie}刺骨的寒风似乎着了魔.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Icy a lot more, too. Looks like Turquoise Skull have arrived in the past.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}甚至原住民也被冻住了, 看来碧骷髅僵尸也来到了这个时代.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}在极寒冰窟中存在上古的魔法? 这太荒谬了!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好! 僵王博士给你们带来了挑战.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Zomboss blows up mine and berries... They perish... Then you die!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我将会引爆地雷和草莓... 他们会消失... 你们就失败啦!
{SAY:zombossicon}再见了傻子们! 谨启, 僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}You heard that Penny! We have to protect them!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}你听到了吗, 潘妮. 我们需要保护他们!

original: {TIRED:winnie}Reminder that some plants' Plant Food effects may prove to be very useful.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}提醒一下, 有些植物在使用叶绿素之后在这里的效果非常棒!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SPECIAL2:crazydave}我的妈呀! 那太疯狂啦!

original: {TIRED:winnie}And it will just get worse from here.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}从现在开始情况会变得更糟糕.

original: {TIRED:winnie}The toughest challenges are far from over.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}最困难的挑战还远远未结束.

original: {TIRED:winnie}For now we can leave this place. Go to somewhere warmer.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}现在, 我们需要离开这里, 去一个更温暖的地方.

original: {TIRED:winnie}Like Wild West... there's another energy spike from there.
translation: {TIRED:winnie}比如狂野西部, 我的探测器显示那里还有另外一个能量峰值.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Another chance to finally face Dr. Zomboss? Well then, let's time travel!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}又是一次对付僵王的机会? 那么, 让我们再来一次时光旅行吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED: winnie}User Dave, I've detected an incoming ice cube.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}戴夫, 我发现了一块刚到货的 \"冰立方\".
{EXCITED:crazydave}分明是一块向我挥来冰锥的断臂.

original: {SAY:winnie}Analysis suggests this creepy cube unlocks a chilly challenge.
translation: {SAY:winnie}分析表明, 这块令人毛骨悚然的冰立方能够解锁一项寒风刺骨的挑战.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You know what I say? Brrrrr-ing it on!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你居然听懂了我在哆嗦着什么? 放-放-放马过来吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}User Dave. I have detected a new rift has opened. We are now able to access an \Arena.\""
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}戴夫. 我发现一条新的时空裂缝已经打开. 我们现在可以进入 \"竞技场\".

original: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Arena?! That sounds like an arborena of gardening warfare!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}竞技场?! 这似乎成功地让我们在这场花园大战中停下了脚步!

original: {SAY:winnieicon}Arena will allow us to demonstrate our planting prowess for prestige and prizes.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}竞技场能让我们展示自己的种植能力来获得奖励.

original: {SAY:crazydaveicon}That's a lot of peas! That's how I know it's good.
translation: {SAY:crazydaveicon}豌豆真多! 我从这里就可以知道这很棒了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You are truly amazing! Most deserving of the name... Senor Pinata!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}小东西真别致! \"超级陶罐\" 也不是浪得虚名的嘛!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Have you seen my taco Senor Pinata? It was about this big...
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你可曾见过我的玉米卷超级陶罐吗? 它大概这么大...

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That's it. Please disrupt this anomaly before User Dave gets too attached.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}够了. 请在戴夫过于着魔之前打破这次异常.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}User Dave, this does not look like a party.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}戴夫, 这看起来并不像一个派对.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}It could still be a surprise party, with gifts and everything!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}这仍然可以是一个充满惊喜, 礼物以及其他一切的盛宴!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll see Penny, I think these zombies are different.
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}你会看见的, 潘妮. 我觉得这些僵尸与众不同.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}There is an impending attack on your house in modern times!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}在现代, 你的房子即将受到攻击!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}I bet it's not an attack... I bet it's a party! Oh, I hope it's a Pinata Party!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}我打赌那肯定不是一场对我们的攻势... 我敢肯定那就是一场盛宴! 噢, 我希望那是 \"彩陶盛宴\"!

original: {SAY:winnieicon}It's not a party, there are zombies from all different time periods ready to strike!
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}这不是盛宴, 来自各个时空的僵尸已经准备开始进攻了!

original: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Who knows what else they could have brought with them?
translation: {EXCITED:winnieicon}谁能知道他们还携带了什么其他的黑科技呢?

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Sounds like a party to me! Better hurry up, we don't want to miss out!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}听起来是一场属于我的派对! 最好跟紧点, 我们可不想错过这场盛会!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}The party is over for now, but those zombies will be back some day.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}僵尸的 \"狂欢盛宴\" 暂告一段落, 但他们终将卷土重来.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}同时也会带着... 更多的彩陶!

original: {SAY:winnieicon}Defending against multiple parties in a row could lead to a massive \pinata\" anomaly."
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}连续完成多场彩陶盛宴, 将会引出一只特别的超大号彩陶玩偶.

original: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I can't wait for the next Pinata Party, and the one after that!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}我已经迫不及待的想参加从此往后的彩陶盛宴了!

original: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}But those pinatas just remind me of my sad lost taco. Let's go!
translation: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}可是他们只会让我回忆起那丢失的玉米卷. 所以一起向前进发吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Missing a \Pinata\" Party will reset the build up to the massive \"pinata\" anomaly."
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}漏了任何一场彩陶盛宴将会打断搭建超超大彩陶玩偶的过程.

original: {SAY:winnieicon}I won't pretend to understand why, but the data does not lie.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}我不会思考为何这样, 我只知道数据不会骗人.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Just let us know of any more Pinata Parties you detect!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}让我们更深入的了解你探测到的彩陶吧!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}For a party they can be pretty sneaky.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}对于参加派对这事来说, 这做法不太光明磊落.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}What did I tell you Penny? A surprise Pinata Party!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}我怎么给你说的, 潘妮? 一个令人惊喜的彩陶盛宴!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Does not compute. It appears a level 3 diagnostic check is in order.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}不要估算得太简单. 一次三重校验即将开始.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Pinatas! Let's bust some open and see what we get!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}彩陶! 敲碎一些彩陶, 看看我们能有什么收获!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}哇哈! 欢迎来到丛林!

original: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, this is no ordinary jungle.
translation: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 这可不是一般的丛林.

original: {SAY:winnie}A scan of my records indicates that this is the fabled Lost City.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的扫描记录表明, 这是传说中的失落之城.

original: {SAY:winnie}Historical texts state that the Sun was worshipped here.
translation: {SAY:winnie}历史文献记载, 阳光在这里被崇拜.

original: {SAY:winnie}Resources should be plentiful with these Gold Tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}有了这些黄金地砖, 阳光应该挺丰富的.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Lost City? This is it Penny! We've found it!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}失落之城? 终于啊, 潘妮! 我们找到了!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Where else would I find my lost pan, except in a Lost City?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}除了失落之城, 我还能在哪里找到我丢失的锅呢?

original: {SAY:winnie}Your continued fixation defies all logic or reason, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你的执着完全违背了逻辑和理智, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate even more movements incoming from above.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我的探测仪显示还有更多的活动从上方传来.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Maybe it's presents. Presents from the sky!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}也许是礼物. 天降的礼物!

original: {SAY:winnie}The chances of that statement being true are statistically irrelevant.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从统计学角度出发, 这种说法是否成立的可能性毋庸置疑.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should be cautious of an increasing number of unexpected guests.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们应该对越来越多的不速之客保持警惕.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}原来你们在这啊, 小霉菌们!

original: {SAY}Please, neighbor, can you help protecting them?
translation: {SAY}拜托了, 邻居, 你能帮着保护它们吗?

original: {SAY}Just don't plant on them, and they'll be fine!
translation: {SAY}只要别在上面种植物, 它们就会没事的!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, my analysis shows that time is starting to bend itself.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 我的分析显示, 时间已经开始弯曲了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Zombies from any timeline may appear before or after their initial appearances.
translation: {SAY:winnie}任何时间线的僵尸都可能在他们首次亮相之前或之后出现.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will have to be more careful from here on out.
translation: {SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 我们必须更加小心.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}谁在乎呢? 我疯掉了!!! 前进!
{SAY:winnie}...

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are gonna have a tough battle ahead.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们将面临一场艰苦的战斗.

original: {SAY:winnie}The number of plants we get are limited today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}今天我们用到的植物将被限制.

original: {SAY:winnie}Our micro managing will have to be good.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们的细节处理必须做好.

original: {SAY:winnie}The shovel will be your best friend.
translation: {SAY:winnie}铲子将是你最好的朋友.

original: {SAY:winnie}React quickly against fast zombies, and we will get through this.
translation: {SAY:winnie}对速度快的僵尸做出快速反应, 我们就能度过难关.

original: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Sorry to crash your expedition, Adventurers of the Lost Temple...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}很抱歉打断你们的探险, 失落神殿的冒险者们...

original: {SAY:zombossicon}But unfortunately for you, the Porter Gargantuars are about to ruin your day.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}但不幸的是, 脚夫巨人僵尸们将要毁了你们的一天.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Prepare to submit your brain, and become ancient history.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}准备好交出你们的脑子, 并成为古老的历史.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}他又跑了! 真没礼貌.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will chase him later - giant problems are incoming!
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们稍后再追他 - 巨大的问题要来了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}A brand new challenge is upon us!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}我们面临着一个全新的挑战!

original: {SAY:winnie}We have no more sun drop from the sky today.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们今天没有更多的阳光从天上掉下来.

original: {SAY:winnie}Therefore, we have to survive with whatever we have left currently.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因此, 我们必须靠现有的一切生存下去.

original: {SAY:crazydave}No more sun drop? Near the Temple of Sun?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}没有阳光掉落? 还在太阳神殿旁边?

original: {SAY:winnie}Irony always strikes at the worst time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}讽刺总是在最糟糕的时候出现.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}记得要经常看图鉴.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may find that certain details about plants and zombies that you missed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你可能会发现你错过的关于植物和僵尸的某些细节.
{SAY:winnie}就例如, 弱点之类的.

original: {SAY:winnie}... just in case you are from the vanilla timeline.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 以防你是来自原版时间线的小白.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Temple is secured for now, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}神殿目前安全了, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Lost City will remain intact. No zombies will dare try to discover it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}失落之城将会完好无损. 没有僵尸敢去探索了.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Time for the next era! What will it be?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}是时候去下一个时代了! 会是什么呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Back to the jungle! Looking as lost as ever!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}又回到了丛林! 看起来和以前一样失落!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be careful of the stronger adventuring zombies, though.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过, 要小心那些更强的冒险者僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}THEY should be careful of the plants instead!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}相反, 他们应该小心那些植物!

original: {SAY:crazydave}After all, exploring the jungle can be dangerous!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟, 探索丛林是很危险的!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}We have a brand new challenge up ahead, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}我们面临着一个全新的挑战, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}These marked tiles will prevent us from planting on them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些有标记的地砖将防止我们在上面种植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}We need to destroy them by letting the zombies trample on the tiles.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们需要通过让僵尸踩地砖来摧毁它们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Maybe we can ask these bug friends for help then!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}也许我们可以向这些昆虫朋友寻求帮助!
{SAY:winnie}应该说是, 昆虫恶魔.
{SAY:crazydave}都差不多! 那我们就开始吧!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! Imp Porters have arrived.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}警报, 戴夫! 脚夫小鬼来了.

original: {SAY:winnie}They can pitch tents that spawn zombies whenever they reach a Gold Tile.
translation: {SAY:winnie}每当他们到达黄金地砖时, 他们就会搭起帐篷, 帐篷会产生僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are about to be bombarded by them, so stay on your guard.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们马上就要被他们轰炸了, 所以你要保持警惕.

original: {SAY:winnie}Try to make use of some lane wipe abilities that the conveyor will bring us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}试着好好利用传送带给我们的一些有清理一路僵尸能力的植物吧.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Say, Penny, where DO these plants come from anyway?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你说, 潘妮, 这些植物到底是从哪里来的?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Surely something must have put the plants on the conveyor, right?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}肯定有什么东西把植物放到了传送带上, 对吧?

original: {SAY:winnie}I have no answer for this question, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这个问题我没有答案, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}For now, we will have to live with plants delivered towards us from the unknown.
translation: {SAY:winnie}目前, 我们将不得不用来历不明的植物做防御了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ouchie! The jungle sure has a lot of bugs!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}哎呦! 丛林里的虫子确实有很多!
{SAY:crazydave}无论是从字面上还是僵尸的角度上!

original: {SAY:winnie}I have detected the presence of some unique trap tiles on the lawn.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我在草坪上发现了一些独特的陷阱地砖.

original: {SAY:winnie}When triggered by a plant or a zombie, a swarm of bugs will appear to bite both!
translation: {SAY:winnie}当被植物或僵尸触发时, 一群虫子将会出现并叮咬两者!

original: {SAY:winnie}Intensive Carrot may assist us this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}复活萝卜可能这次会帮助我们.

original: {SAY:winnie}His ability to revive and overheal fallen plants is powerful.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他复活和治愈倒下植物的能力非常强大.

original: {SAY:winnie}We can also use plants that do not trigger traps like Iceberg Lettuce and Stunion.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们也可以使用不会触发陷阱的植物, 如冰冻生菜和眩晕洋葱.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Where's bug spray when you need it?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}当你需要杀虫剂的时候, 它在哪里?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}The ground is shifting as we speak, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}在我们说话的时候, 地面正在发生变化, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Expect the Bug Traps to be moved around frequently this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}预计这次这些害虫陷阱会经常被移动.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Forget bug spray! This fly swatter will do!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}忘了杀虫剂吧! 有这只苍蝇拍就可以了!

original: {SAY:winnie}... you are going to need more than one, User Dave. A bigger one, too.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 你将需要不止一只, 戴夫. 或者说是需要一只更大的.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 丛林守卫者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You seem to have struck gold with these newly found Gold Tiles.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们似乎用这些新发现的黄金地砖发现了宝藏.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}But prepare yourself to be fooled by my latest attack!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}但准备好被我最新的手段所愚弄吧!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}My zombie army shall crush you and claim what are rightfully ours: Your brain, and the secret of the temple.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我的僵尸军队会碾碎你们, 夺走属于我们的东西: 你们的脑子, 还有神殿的秘密.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Seems like a huge siege is coming towards us.
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}似乎一场巨大的围攻正在向我们袭来.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We'll make use of these Tiles and stop them in their track!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们要利用这些地砖来阻止他们前进!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}The temple has been salvaged once more, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}神殿再次被拯救了, 戴夫.
{SAY:crazydave}接招吧, 僵尸们!

original: {SAY:winnie}We may need to go back to the Dark Ages now... my sensors feel a disturbance.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们现在可能需要回到黑暗时代... 我的探测仪感觉到有干扰.
{SAY:crazydave}那好吧, 咱们起飞!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ah, back to the City of the Lost!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}啊, 回到失落之城了!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be wary though User Dave, as we will encounter far stronger zombie hordes this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是要小心, 戴夫, 因为这次我们会遇到更强大的僵尸群.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But our plant group has also expanded as well! Time to take them head on!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但我们的植物大军也扩大了! 是时候和他们正面交锋了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}My sensors detected that Sun Focant has made a return.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}我的传感器探测到阳光窃贼们回来了.

original: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we should keep an eye on them, lest they snatch our sun away.
translation: {SAY:winnie}也许我们应该留意他们, 以免他们偷走我们的阳光.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Forget about that! I forgot how many bugs there are in this jungle!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别管他们了! 我都忘了丛林里有多少虫子了!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Come on then, I will help you look for your bug spray. Again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}那来吧, 我会帮你找你的杀虫剂. 又一次.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey, look at that Penny! Some mimes!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 快看啊, 潘妮! 一些哑剧演员!

original: {SAY:crazydave}It's good to find entertainment in the middle of nowhere, right?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}在荒无人烟的地方找乐子挺好的, 对吧?

original: {SAY:winnie}Be cautious, User Dave. These Mime Zombies are no ordinary mimes.
translation: {SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫. 这些哑剧演员僵尸可不一般.

original: {SAY:winnie}If left alone long enough, they will destroy the leftmost plants on their lanes.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果长时间不管他们, 他们会摧毁他们路线上最左边的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, they seem to enjoy eating plants from a distance as well.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 他们似乎也喜欢从远处吃植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}They may be distracted and unable to attack while eating, so we should take advantage of that.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们在进食时可能会分心, 无法发动攻击, 所以我们应该利用这一点.
{SAY:crazydave}你是对的, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We should do that by getting a front row seat to their shows! For free!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们应该去前排看他们的演出! 还免费!
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Bugs, bugs and more bugs! Have you found my bug spray yet?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}虫子, 无穷无尽的虫子! 你找到我的杀虫剂了吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}Not yet, User Dave, but I think we have more pressing matters.
translation: {SAY:winnie}还没有呢, 戴夫, 但我想我们有更紧迫的问题.

original: {SAY:winnie}I detected that these Bugs might be imposters, mimicking as regular Bug Zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我发现这些虫子可能是冒牌货, 它们会模仿普通的飞虫僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}They may drop some unexpected surprises, so watch out.
translation: {SAY:winnie}它们可能会抛下一些意想不到的惊喜, 所以要小心.
{SAY:crazydave}你是说小鬼冒牌货?

original: {SAY:winnie}No, User Dave. No Imps are involved, I believe.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不是的, 戴夫. 我相信其中并不包含小鬼.
{SAY:crazydave}噢.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}These Mimes seem to be everywhere, Penny!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}这些哑剧演员似乎无处不在, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Today they seem to have chosen the \trapped in a box\" act!"
translation: {SAY:crazydave}今天他们似乎选择了 \"被困于盒\" 的表演!
{SAY:winnie}打个比方, 还是真的?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well, a giant icecube is like a cold box, right?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}嗯, 一块巨大的冰立方就像一个冰盒子, 对吧?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 时间冒险者们.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}It is time to enact my second big attack.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候发动我的第二次大进攻了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}How do you like my newest performers? Have their shows been entertaining and deadly?
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们觉得我的新演员们怎么样? 他们的节目是否既有趣又致命?

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Surely, you will also enjoy a final show from my improved Mimes!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}当然, 你们也会好好欣赏我改进后的哑剧演员的最后一场表演的!

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I sincerely hope it will be a show to die for. Literally!
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我真诚地希望这将是一场值得为之而死的表演. 字面意思上!
{SAY:zombossicon}署名, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}More Mimes! And they are preparing something big for us to watch, Penny!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}更多的哑剧演员! 他们正在为我们准备一场盛大的表演, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes. We may need all our knowledge to best these Mimes in their own game.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是啊. 我们可能需要我们所有的知识才能在这些哑剧演员的游戏中打败他们.

original: {SAY:winnie}I have successfully disabled the recharge nerf for this battle only, at least.
translation: {SAY:winnie}至少, 我已经成功地关闭了这场战斗的冷却削弱.

original: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}To out-mime a mime? Sounds CRAZYYYYY! Let's do it then!
translation: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}为了超越哑剧演员? 听起来太疯狂了! 那咱们开始吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That is the last of the zombie attack here.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这是最后一次僵尸袭击了.

original: {SAY:winnie}May the temples be restful once more, and may we never see another mime again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}愿神殿再次宁静, 愿我们再也不会看到哑剧了.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Aw, but I have been enjoying their acts!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}噢, 但我很喜欢他们的表演!

original: {EXCITED:winnie}And I don't. Plus, we have Dark Ages to defend as well.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}但我不喜欢. 再加上, 我们还要捍卫黑暗时代呢.
{SAY:crazydave}那好吧, 就像他们说的那样, \"再见\"!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}哇塞! 这里已经是晚上了!

original: {SAY:winnie}The City at night... it is quite a sight.
translation: {SAY:winnie}夜晚的城市... 这真是一幅壮观的景象.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, zombies are still here. They think that attacking at night is easier.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 这里仍有僵尸. 他们认为在夜间袭击会更容易.

original: {SAY:winnie}The mystery of the temple must be protected from these shuffling adventurers.
translation: {SAY:winnie}神殿的秘密必须被保护, 免受这些蹒跚的冒险者的伤害.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, time to deliver a whooping butt kick to these undeads!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}好吧, 是时候给这些活死人一脚了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Sun is scarce as Gold Tiles haven't appeared yet.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}阳光会比较稀缺, 因为黄金地砖还没有出现.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will need to spend sun carefully to survive the night.
translation: {SAY:winnie}为了度过今晚, 我们需要小心地使用阳光.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Are you sure it's not because of some timey wimey forces?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你确定不是因为时间的力量吗?
{SAY:winnie}... 也不是.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}These sneaky undeads have found a new way to fight against us.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}这些鬼鬼祟祟的活死人找到了对付我们的新方法.
{SAY:crazydave}派出更多飞机?

original: {SAY:winnie}... that would have been more realistic, but no.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 那样会更现实些, 但不是.

original: {SAY:winnie}They will try harder to steal our sun though - so be quick.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过, 他们会更努力地窃取我们的阳光 - 所以要眼疾手快.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Those no-good sun stealing zombies! We'll show them who's the fastest!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那些居心叵测的偷阳光的僵尸! 我们要让他们知道谁是最快的!

original: {SAY:winnie}... we are not in the West, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 我们不是在西部, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Details, details! We got zombies to defeat, so who cares?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}别在乎那些细节了! 我们有僵尸要打, 所以谁在乎呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The hunt for the sun has begun.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}搜寻太阳的行动已经开始.
{SAY:crazydave}我的傻潘妮啊, 现在可是晚上啊!
{SAY:winnie}... 不是那种太阳啦.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}你说, 潘妮...
{SAY:winnie}怎么了, 戴夫?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll ever succeed in stopping Mr. Boss guy?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你觉得我们能成功阻止博士先生吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}... strange that a time machine cannot answer some time-related questions, huh.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 真奇怪, 时光机不能回答一些与时间有关的问题, 不知道.
{SAY:winnie}我想, 只有时间会告诉我们答案.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But we're literally surfing in the time stream!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但我们本来就是在时间的长河上冲浪啊!
{SAY:winnie}专心点, 戴夫. 先保护植物吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}And so peace has returned to the quiet jungle night.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}就这样, 宁静的丛林之夜又恢复了平静.

original: {SAY:winnie}Time to hop back to the space-time continuum.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是时候跳回时空连续体了.
{TIRED:crazydave}已经结束了?

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Cheer up, User Dave. Don't be so meta and gloomy like Gloom-shroom.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}振作起来, 戴夫. 不要像忧郁菇那么消极和悲观.
{TIRED:crazydave}你说的也对... 该走了.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}We have arrived at the Lost City once more, User Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}我们又一次来到了失落之城, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}And looks like the lights are still out, Penny!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}看起来灯还没亮, 潘妮!

original: {SAY:winnie}Correct. Be aware of the increasing strength in zombie hordes around here.
translation: {SAY:winnie}对的. 注意这里的僵尸群越来越强大了.

original: {SAY:winnie}They have deployed even bigger Sun Focants this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次他们部署了更大的阳光窃取者.

original: {SAY:crazydave}The bigger they are, the harder they fall though!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}他们有多大, 就有多难击倒!
{SAY:winnie}你说的没错, 戴夫.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Looks like Dr. Zomboss has more surprises up his sleeves.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看来僵王博士还有更多惊喜呢.

original: {SAY:winnie}He had deployed even more trap tiles this time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次他布置了更多的陷阱地砖.

original: {SAY:winnie}Combined with Imp Porters and we may have a difficult battle up ahead.
translation: {SAY:winnie}再加上脚夫小鬼, 我们可能会面临一场艰难的战斗.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Say Penny, do you think these Imps are tired of carrying those backpacks?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}你说, 潘妮, 你觉得这些小鬼们会不会背腻了这些背包?

original: {SAY:crazydave}Can we convince them to switch side for a better job then?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}那我们能说服他们换一份更好的工作吗?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}How big can these Sun Focants even get, Penny?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这些阳光窃取者能有多大啊, 潘妮?
{SAY:winnie}非常大.

original: {SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss seemed to not pull any punches at all.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士似乎毫不留情.

original: {SAY:winnie}... why he thought to not make those skulls actually function, I do not know.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 为什么他不让这些头骨发挥作用呢, 我也不清楚.

original: {SAY:crazydave}When we finally meet him, I want to know his secret!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}当我们终于见到他时, 我想知道他的秘诀!
{SAY:crazydave}想象一下巨大的植物, 潘妮!
{SAY:winnie}好可怕.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Do you ever think about whoever sends us these plants, Penny?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}你有没有想过是谁送我们这些植物的吗, 潘妮?
{SAY:winnie}我试着不去想.

original: {SAY:winnie}I do not think I can handle an existential crisis on top of time shenanigans.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我不认为我能在时间闹剧发生的同时处理一场生存危机.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Silly Penny! What is there to worry about?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我的傻潘妮! 有什么好担心的?
{SAY:winnie}... 谢了.
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {SAY:winnie}Never mind that. Let us focus on this battle for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}别管了. 让我们现在把注意力集中在这场战斗上.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss has crafted a fairly elaborate plan for today.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵王博士为今天制定了一个相当详尽的计划.

original: {SAY:winnie}There are boosted zombies that will avoid our plants below the lawn.
translation: {SAY:winnie}有增强的僵尸会行走于草坪的下面, 避开我们的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}We can only hold them back by spending sun on the statue.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们只能在雕像上花太阳来击退他们.

original: {SAY:winnie}Try to balance between your defense and keeping those zombies at bay.
translation: {SAY:winnie}试着平衡你的防御和拖延僵尸.

original: {SAY:crazydave}A spending race, Penny? This seems exciting!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}一场消费竞赛吗, 潘妮? 这看起来很令人兴奋!
{SAY:crazydave}准备好生产阳光吧, 邻居!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Weird that Dr. Zomboss did not show up. Again.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵王博士居然没出现, 真奇怪. 又一次.

original: {SAY:winnie}But as usual, we remain victorious, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但和往常一样, 我们仍会胜利, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Splendid, Penny! What timeline will we end up next then?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}好极了, 潘妮! 我们下次会到什么时间线呢?
{EXCITED:winnie}只有一个办法能知道.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮! 这有个简直闪瞎我的狗眼不知道是什么鬼的东东!

original: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate this amulet points the way to a long-lost challenge.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的探测仪检测到, 这个护身符指引着我们进行一项久违的挑战.
{EXCITED:crazydave}麻利点, 让我们尽快开始探索吧!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}现在, 我们打破了传统.

original: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Facebreaker is a blast from the past, right to your face!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}\"非酋终结者\" 在过去饱受诟病, 太看脸了!
{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}是破罐者, 戴夫. 破罐者.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}In that case, it must be right to your vase!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}这么说, 那就太看罐了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}If you need a refresher on how this works...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}如果你想回忆一下这个游戏怎么玩...

original: {SAY}You need to place these Mines carefully to defeat the zombies on the lawn.
translation: {SAY}你需要仔细考虑原始土豆地雷的位置, 让他们消灭所有僵尸.

original: {SAY}A Conehead takes 2 Mines to kill. A Buckethead takes 3.
translation: {SAY}一个路障僵尸需要两个地雷. 一个铁桶僵尸需要三个.

original: {SAY}You can also only plant at most 2 mines per lane.
translation: {SAY}你也只能在每行最多种植两个地雷.

original: {SAY}Some helpful zombies will trigger the mines for you.
translation: {SAY}一些有用的僵尸会帮你触发地雷.

original: {SAY}If you can't kill all the zombies, you can restart the puzzle.
translation: {SAY}如果你没能击杀所有僵尸, 你可以重新开始.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}In order to battle against zombies better, we'll need to train our mind.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}为了更好地与僵尸作战, 我们需要训练我们的思维.

original: {SAY}I have crafted a set of puzzles in order to hone your skills.
translation: {SAY}为了磨练你的技能, 我精心安排了一个迷阵.

original: {SAY}You need to place these Mines carefully to defeat the zombies on the lawn.
translation: {SAY}你需要仔细考虑原始土豆地雷的位置, 让他们消灭所有僵尸.

original: {SAY}A Conehead takes 2 Mines to kill. A Buckethead takes 3.
translation: {SAY}一个路障僵尸需要两个地雷. 一个铁桶僵尸需要三个.

original: {SAY}You can also only plant at most 2 mines per lane.
translation: {SAY}你也只能在每行最多种植两个地雷.

original: {SAY}Some helpful zombies will trigger the mines for you.
translation: {SAY}一些有用的僵尸会帮你触发地雷.

original: {SAY}If you can't kill all the zombies, you can restart the puzzle.
translation: {SAY}如果你没能击杀所有僵尸, 你可以重新开始.

original: {SAY}There are 8 challenges - try to beat them all in a row. Good luck.
translation: {SAY}有8个挑战 - 尝试一口气全通过. 祝你好运.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们在哪, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这似乎是它自己的口袋维度...

original: {SAY:winnie}I suspect that new challenges await us in front of this area.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑在这个领域有新的挑战在等着我们.

original: {SAY:winnie}These battles will surely be unlike any of the others we have faced so far.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些战斗肯定不同于我们迄今为止所面临的任何其他战斗.
{SAY:crazydave}所以... 用疯狂戴夫的话说... 迷你游戏?
{SAY:winnie}完全正确.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们在哪, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension parallel to the main path...
translation: {SAY:winnie}这似乎是它自己平行于主线的口袋维度...

original: {SAY:winnie}I suspect this is like our main travel path...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑这很像我们的主线冒险...

original: {SAY:winnie}... but we will be facing against insurmountable adversaries.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 但我们将面对不可战胜的对手.

original: {SAY:winnie}These battles will surely be far more challenging and daunting.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这些关卡肯定会更具挑战性, 也更令人望而生畏.

original: {SAY:winnie}I sincerely suggest that we only explore this branch...
translation: {SAY:winnie}我真诚地建议我们在主时间轴上取得足够的进展后...

original: {SAY:winnie}... once we have progressed far enough in the main timeline.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 再来探索这个分支.
{SAY:crazydave}所以... 用疯狂戴夫的话说... 困难模式?
{SAY:winnie}完全正确.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! A random length of sewer pipe!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}潘妮! 一条下水管道!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be careful. That pipe is part of a municipal mulch of endless engagement!
translation: {SAY:winnie}小心, 那个下水管道里会爬出无穷无尽的僵尸!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}There's still more levels in open worlds.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}其他开放的世界中还有更多的关卡.

original: {EXCITED:winnieicon}And there are still plants and rewards to earn too.
translation: {EXCITED:winnieicon}而且仍然有植物和奖励可以获得.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}It may look like the end of the road...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}它可能看起来像是路的尽头...

original: {SAY:crazydave}But the road always goes on in the space-time continuum.
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但这条路总是在时空连续体中继续.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}In the meantime, try to practice advanced planting techniques in the Endless Zones.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}同时, 尝试在无尽地带提升先进的种植技术吧.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Penny is right. It's important to stay sharp.
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}潘妮是对的. 保持敏锐很重要.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}You never know when you might find zombies on your lawn.
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}你永远不知道什么时候会在你家草坪上发现僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}或者在你的草坪上发现我.
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}或者在你的草坪上发现我的锅.
{TIRED:crazydave}说真的, 你拿捏不住.

original: {SAY:crazydave}But if you do find my pot on your lawn...
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但是如果你在你的草坪上发现了我的锅...

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Could you put it in the pantry?
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你能把它放在厨房吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It is hard to believe that this trial is all over.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}很难相信这场磨炼已经结束了.

original: {SAY:winnie}And even though this path has not been easy at all, to put it lightly...
translation: {SAY:winnie}尽管这条路一点也不容易, 简单地说...
{SAY:winnie}你做得很好.

original: {SAY:winnie}Give yourself a pat on the back, or get yourself something nice even.
translation: {SAY:winnie}捶捶自己的背, 或者给自己一些更好的东西.

original: {SAY:winnie}You deserve it after all that has been said and done.
translation: {SAY:winnie}毕竟你做了那么多, 这是你应得的.

original: {SAY:winnie}Unfortunately I do not have any reward for this achievement.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不幸的是, 我没有为这个成就设置任何奖励.

original: {SAY:winnie}Regardless, take care of yourself, and good luck with the rest of the journey.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不管怎样, 照顾好自己, 祝你在接下来的旅程中好运.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Pirates. Why does it have to be Pirates?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}海盗. 为什么非要是海盗呢?

original: {SHOUT:crazydave}But Pirates! Hang on to your parrots and peg legs!
translation: {SHOUT:crazydave}但是那可是海盗啊! 带好你的鹦鹉和假腿!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Arrr matey! Seems like these zombies have some skills!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我的好伙计啊! 看来这些僵尸还挺有本事的!

original: {SAY:crazydave}Arr be ok though. Arrr have cannons!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}不过我们会没事的. 我们可是有大炮的!

original: {SAY:winnie}... they are just decorations. Otherwise we would have shot down the other ship.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 它们只是装饰罢了. 否则我们早就可以击落对面那艘船了.
{SAY:winnie}或者被反击.
{SAY:crazydave}哦.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}吓死我了! 到处都是小鬼!
{SAY:winnie}他们被装进桶里了!
{SAY:crazydave}他们会感到不舒服吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}They are zombies. They do not feel much.
translation: {SAY:winnie}他们是僵尸. 他们感觉不到什么.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}尊敬的船长,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Be advised that your sailing vessel is of insufficient size.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}请注意, 你们的帆船尺寸不足.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士.
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}啊? 那是什么意思?
{TIRED:winnie}我们需要一艘更大的船.

original: {SAY:crazydave}For the plant limit we are imposed upon by timey wimey forces?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}是因为我们被时间的力量所施加的植物限制吗?
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*
{TIRED:winnie}显而易见.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It looks like the zombies have found a new way to block our progress.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看来僵尸们找到了阻止我们前进的新方法.

original: {SAY:winnie}Much like how empty barrels are rolling towards our plants to block their shots.
translation: {SAY:winnie}就比如将空桶滚向我们的植物来阻挡他们的射击.

original: {SAY:crazydave}So... time to do a barrel roll?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}所以... 是时候滚一滚了?
{SAY:winnie}*机器叹气*
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}他们的黑旗升起了!

original: {TIRED:crazydave}Maybe they want to invite us on their ship?
translation: {TIRED:crazydave}也许他们想邀请我们上他们的船?
{SAY:winnie}恰恰相反, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}We should prepare ourselves for the mightiest pirate onslaught so far.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们应该为迄今为止最强大的海盗袭击做好准备.

original: {SAY:winnie}You may need to start using more expensive plants...
translation: {SAY:winnie}你可能需要开始使用更昂贵的植物...

original: {SAY:winnie}... as cheap plant defense may not be able to last long.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 因为用廉价的植物做防御可能不是长久之计.

original: {SAY:winnie}Practice with this Melon-pult against this heavy onslaught.
translation: {SAY:winnie}试着使用这个西瓜投手来对付这个猛烈的进攻吧.
{SPECIAL2:crazydave}既然那样... 进攻!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}I'm ready to go. Pirates are great, but I think I'm getting homesick.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}我准备好走了. 海盗很棒, 但我想我开始想家了.
{TIRED}不是, 等等, 我是说晕船了.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}请把窗户摇下来.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}No time for that. We have a Mr. Boss guy to meet!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}没时间这么做了. 我们要去见博士先生呢!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I see more seas! Arrrr there more zombies?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我看到了更广阔的海域! 还有更多的僵尸吗?

original: {SAY:winnie}More pirate zombies have appeared, and with greater strength.
translation: {SAY:winnie}更多的海盗僵尸出现了, 而且力量更强大.

original: {SAY:winnie}By that I mean a LOT greater.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我的意思是要强大得多.

original: {SAY:winnie}Seems like these zombies now use barrels in another creative way to thwart us.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来这些僵尸现在会用另一种有创意的方式来阻止我们.

original: {SAY:crazydave}We arrr gonna make them walk the planks! Then we claim the sea! Again!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们会让他们走向死亡的跳板! 然后我们就可以称霸海域! 再一次!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}A time attack challenge has been imposed on us.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们面临着一个时间挑战.

original: {SAY:winnie}We must beat the zombie horde today quickly, or admit defeat.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们今天必须迅速击败僵尸群, 否则就得认输.

original: {SAY:winnie}Coincidentally, some Seagull Zombies have chosen new animal companions...
translation: {SAY:winnie}巧合的是, 一些海鸥僵尸选择了新的动物伴侣...

original: {SAY:winnie}Ones whose speed we should watch out for, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们应该注意他们的速度, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:crazydave}How are we going to make them walk the plank then if they are flying, Penny?
translation: {SAY:crazydave}如果他们在飞, 我们怎么让他们走向死亡的跳板呢, 潘妮?

original: {SAY:winnie}... good question, User Dave. Good question.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 问得好, 戴夫. 问得好.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Yo ho, yo ho, a pirate's life for me!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哟嚯, 哟嚯, 我的海盗生活!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*
{TIRED:winnie}专心点, 戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}We will never know what to expect from the zombies.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们永远都不知道僵尸会带来什么.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Oh but I know what they can expect from me!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}但我知道他们能给我带来什么!

original: {SAY:crazydave}The best pirate of the seas! Yar har!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}海上最好的海盗! 呀哈!
{TIRED:winnie}*机器叹气*

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}A low sun challenge once again? MADNESS!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}又一次低阳光挑战? 疯了吧!

original: {SAY:winnie}Do not fret yet, User Dave. We have Toadstool on our side for now.
translation: {SAY:winnie}先别着急, 戴夫. 现在我们这边还有金蟾菇.

original: {SAY:winnie}We also have a few starting Plant Foods as well.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我们开局也有一些叶绿素.

original: {SAY:winnie}Use them wisely to defeat or stall a huge number of weak zombies at once.
translation: {SAY:winnie}明智地使用它们, 一次性打败或拖住大量虚弱的僵尸.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, we have a bigger and more explosive problem.
translation: {SAY:winnie}然而, 我们有一个更大更有爆炸性的问题.

original: {SAY:winnie}It seems like zombies have taken issue with our fake cannons comment.
translation: {SAY:winnie}看来僵尸们对我们的假大炮评论有意见.

original: {SAY:winnie}Now they have armed themselves with cannonballs on their ship!
translation: {SAY:winnie}现在他们在船上装备了炮弹!

original: {SAY:winnie}... which are summoned by even more barrels.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 它们会被更多的桶所召唤.

original: {SAY:winnie}At this point I have to question the logistics of their entire thing.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在这一点上, 我不得不质疑他们整个计划的后勤保障.

original: {SAY:crazydave}Who cares? Our pirate battle will be legendary!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}谁在乎呢? 我们的海盗之战将成为传奇!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}After gathering more data on those cannonballs...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在收集了更多关于这些炮弹的数据之后...

original: {SAY:winnie}I have a few suggestions on how to counter them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我有一些关于如何对付它们的建议.

original: {SAY:winnie}Defensive walls can block a few more shots than the typical plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}防御类植物可以比一般的植物阻挡更多次的炮击.

original: {SAY:winnie}Plants that are cheap or have quick recharge can also work as cannon fodder.
translation: {SAY:winnie}造价便宜或冷却快速的植物也可以作为炮灰.
{SAY:winnie}... 别介意这个双关.

original: {SAY:winnie}Be aware though that cannonballs can also hit some underground and hidden plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但要注意, 炮弹也可以击中一些地面和隐藏的植物.

original: {SAY:winnie}We are up against another huge barrage of cannonballs this time, so good luck.
translation: {SAY:winnie}这次我们又要面对一大堆炮弹, 祝你好运.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}That's a lotta Parrots, Penny! How will our endangered plants fare against them?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}有好多鹦鹉啊, 潘妮! 我们濒危的植物将如何对抗它们?

original: {SAY:winnie}I have a feeling these Chard Guards can handle themselves just fine.
translation: {SAY:winnie}我觉得这些甜菜护卫能很好地应付.

original: {SAY:winnie}Although, it is worth keeping in mind that Wall-nut First Aid also works on them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}不过, 值得注意的是, 坚果急救术对他们也有效.

original: {SAY:winnie}Replenish their leaves if needed, and we will survive this battle.
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果需要的话就补充叶片, 我们就能挺过这场战斗.

original: {SAY:crazydave}That's some wise words Penny! Now get out there, neighbors!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}这话说得真有道理, 佩妮! 现在出手吧, 邻居们!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We have more pirate battles to win after all!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟我们还有更多的海盗战要赢!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这次感觉肯定有什么不对劲...

original: {SAY:crazydave}Well, whatever it is, we have another black flag coming in!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}嗯, 无论是什么, 又来了一面黑旗!
{SAY:crazydave}象征着战争, 然后呢?
{SAY:winnie}战争.
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}尊敬的船长,

original: {SAY:zombossicon}You have once again escaped from another one of my traps.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}你们又一次从我的陷阱中逃脱了.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Be advised that unless you submit your brain to us, we'll have no choice but to ramp up our army.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}请注意, 除非你们把脑子交给我们, 否则我们将别无选择, 只能扩建我们的军队.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士.

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The sea is ours to sail! Yarr har har!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这片海域任由我们傲游了! 呀哈哈!

original: {SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss has escaped our captivity once again.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士再次逃过了我们的围追堵截.

original: {SAY:winnie}No sign of him on the zombies' boat.
translation: {SAY:winnie}僵尸的船上没有他的踪迹.
{SAY:crazydave}噢.

original: {SAY:winnie}However, I do find another energy spike in Frostbite Caves.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但是, 我确实在冰霜洞穴发现了另一个能量峰值.
{SAY:winnie}这可能值得研究一下.
{EXCITED:crazydave}是时候再次进入时间流了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Finally, one of these pirates dropped some booty!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}终于啊, 有一位海盗掉落了点战利品!

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I am detecting something more challenging than treasure inside.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}我在战利品里面探测到有比金银珠宝更具挑战性的东西.
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}所以说...没有金子?
{TIRED:winnie}有可能.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}潘妮, 看我头上!
{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}这个是旅行原木!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}What's that, Travel Log? You provide guidance, progress and rewards?
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}旅行原木, 你的作用是啥? 你能给予我指导和奖励吗?

original: {SAY:winnieicon}The Log is not, in fact, speaking, User Dave.
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}实际上, 旅行原木不会说话, 戴夫.
{SAY:crazydaveicon}谢了, 旅行原木! 我会照你说的做的!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Visit the Travel Log to claim your quest reward.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}拜访旅行原木来领取你的任务奖励.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}User Dave. Penny Tech upgrade complete. I now have new gadgetry, including a Zomboss Positioning System, or ZPS.
