translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}戴夫. 潘妮升级完成. 我现在有了新的设备, 包括僵王定位系统, 或简称ZPS.

original: {SAY:winnieicon}Picking up signal... User Dave, I fear... User Dave?
translation: {SAY:winnieicon}正在接收信号... 戴夫, 我有些害怕... 戴夫?
{NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY:crazydaveicon}(噪声)...美味的黄油!...(噪声)

original: {NPC_EXIT:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Silence, you nutritional ninny! Remove your shaggy paws from my hyper-radio this insta-...(click)
translation: {NPC_EXIT:crazydaveicon}{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}闭嘴, 你这个笨蛋! 把你那毛茸茸的爪子从我的超级收音机上拿开...(咔哒)

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:winnieicon}Oh, dear. Dr. Zomboss has abducted User Dave. I must charge my new fuel cells and pursue with haste into the rift!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:winnieicon}哦, 天啊. 僵王博士抓走了戴夫. 我必须填充我的新燃料快点追到裂缝里去!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Take these gems and buy some coins!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}收下这些宝石来买些硬币吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}We will need this one seed packet to start tiering Peashooter properly. Buy it!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}我们将需要用这个种子包给豌豆射手换阶. 买下它吧!

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}Nice work! Hey Penny, what does this button do?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}干得漂亮! 嘿, 潘妮, 这个按钮有什么用呢?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}Most interesting, there are special items in there!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}最有意思的是, 里面还有许多特殊物品!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Check the Twiddydinkies often for new costumes! They come out once you earn a new plant.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}经常查看戴夫的花里胡哨小玩意的新服装! 一旦你获得了新的植物, 它们就会出来.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Want some new stuff? Check out my Twiddydinkies! I sell cool plants and costumes in there!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}想要一些新东西吗? 看看我的花里胡哨的小玩意吧! 我在那里卖很酷的植物和服装!
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}欢迎来到混杂岛屿!

original: {SAY}You'll get more levels from time to time here, so be on the lookout.
translation: {SAY}在这里你会不时地得到更多关卡, 所以要保持警惕.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL1}嘿, 邻居!
{PLAYFUL}我能借那瓶辣椒酱吗?

original: {BRINGOUT_TACO}{SAY}{LONG}I've been holding onto this taco for forever!
translation: {BRINGOUT_TACO}{SAY}{LONG}我已经拿着这个玉米卷很久了!
{EAT_TACO}{SPECIAL2}哦! 那真是...太美味了!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Thank you neighbor! Hey, I found a note!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}谢谢你, 邻居! 嘿, 我发现了一张纸条!
{NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你们好, 房子的主人们...

original: {SAY:zombossicon}After my grand defeat, I have decided to amass my army again for an even greater attack.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}在我惨败之后, 我决定再次集结我的军队, 进行更大的进攻.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}I have been polluting the timelines thoroughly with my zombie hordes.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}我用我的僵尸大军们彻底侵略了各个时间线.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Soon, my unstoppable army will be coming your way to collect your brain.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}很快, 我势不可挡的僵尸大军会来取走你们的脑子.

original: {SAY:zombossicon}Submit your brain now, or face the consequences. This is your last warning.
translation: {SAY:zombossicon}现在交出你们的脑子, 否则后果自负. 这是给你们的最后一次警告.
{SAY:zombossicon}真诚的, 埃德加·僵王博士

original: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:crazydave}Cool! Mr. Boss guy wants us to travel through time with him!
translation: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:crazydave}太酷了! 博士先生想让我们和他一起穿越时空!

original: {SAY:crazydave}We're going to need my time machine!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}我们将需要我的时光机!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Her name is Penny and I'm Crazy Dave. But you can call me Crazy Dave.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}她叫佩妮, 我叫疯狂戴夫. 但你可以叫我疯狂戴夫.

original: {SAY:winnie}Finally, another User who can process my queries. Let me postulate.
translation: {SAY:winnie}终于啊, 另一个我可以答疑的用户. 让我设想一下.

original: {TIRED:winnie}We will need to travel through time to defeat Zomboss and his armies... again...
translation: {TIRED:winnie}我们需要再次穿越时光去打败僵王博士和他的军队...
{SAY:crazydave}她太聪明了! 现在我们启程吧!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 潘妮...
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}怎么了, 戴夫?
{SAY:crazydave}我们在哪里? 这是什么?

original: {SAY:winnie}Hmm... I have detected certain powerful rifts in the timeline...
translation: {SAY:winnie}嗯... 我在时间线上发现了一些强大的裂缝...

original: {SAY:winnie}In these rifts, the zombie attacks are much tougher than the usual ones.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在这些裂缝中, 僵尸的袭击比通常的要凶猛得多.

original: {SAY:winnie}But defeating these massive hordes may rescue powerful and special plants.
translation: {SAY:winnie}但击败这些庞大的尸潮可能会救出强大而特殊的植物.
{SAY:crazydave}那好吧, 为了植物而战!!!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们做到了!

original: {SAY:winnie}There will be more rifts like these in the future, so keep an eye out for them.
translation: {SAY:winnie}未来还会有更多这样的裂缝, 所以请仔细留意.

original: {SAY:winnie}You will never know where they come up next.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你永远不知道它们接下来会出现在哪里.
{SAY:crazydave}就像我的锅一样!
{SAY:winnie}...

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}From now on, these rifts can be reaccessed by looking at the travel log.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 这些裂缝可以通过查看旅行原木来重新进入.

original: {SAY:winnie}So, remember that these battles are purely optional.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以, 要记住这些战斗是不是必要的.

original: {SAY:winnie}As such, you should not try too hard.
translation: {SAY:winnie}因此, 你不需要太费力.

original: {SAY:winnie}We can retreat from these attacks if they prove to be too difficult...
translation: {SAY:winnie}如果实在太困难, 我们可以从这些战斗中撤退...

original: {SAY:winnie}... and return once we have more plants at our disposal.
translation: {SAY:winnie}... 等我们有了更多的植物再回来.

original: {SAY:winnie}Or when you have gotten better at defending our lawn.
translation: {SAY:winnie}或者当你能更好地保护我们的草坪时.

original: {SAY:winnie}A minor reminder is that some Travel Log tabs are limited to 8 quests only.
translation: {SAY:winnie}一个小提示是, 旅行原木的一些标签中最多只能同时存在8个任务.

original: {SAY:winnie}Try to beat the existing quests first to open more on said tabs.
translation: {SAY:winnie}试着先完成现有的任务再在此标签中开启更多.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Good news! Penny found a map across space time!
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}好消息! 潘妮找到了一张跨越时空的地图!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}To be precise this is a space-time map where we can find plants that can help us and...
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}准确地说, 这是一张时空地图, 我们可以找到可以帮助我们的植物和...

original: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Less explaining, more exploring! And kicking some zombies' butts!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}少解释, 多探索! 并且多多胖揍僵尸!
{SAY:winnieicon}...

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}A lawn of vases is like a box of chocolates.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}草地上的一只只罐子如同一盒盒巧克力.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Some are awesome! Others taste downright ugly!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}有些好吃至极! 但有些则让人反胃!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}But all vases are much harder on your teeth!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}但是所有这些罐子对你的牙齿来说都要硬得多!

original: {SAY:winnie}Be careful with HOW you break vases.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在砸罐子的时候小心点.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}All green vases will contain plants. All brown vases will contain NOT plants.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}绿色罐子里有植物. 棕色罐子里没有植物.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You might want to break everything first, to know what are in those vases.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}或许你可以一开始直接砸碎所有罐子, 这样你就知道罐子里面有什么了.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Then, you can start planning after a restart.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}然后, 你就可以在重来之后仔细计划.

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}I still miss my Vasebreaking buddy though...
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}我仍然十分想念那个和我一起砸罐子的人...

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Think he's around in the time stream?
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你觉得他也会在历史长河中旅行吗?
{EXCITED:winnie}不太可能, 戴夫.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}不要再砸罐子时固化思维.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Make good use of every plant given to you.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}合理利用每一棵植物.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}There may be more than one way to deal with a problem, after all.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}毕竟可能存在不止一种过关策略.

original: {SAY:winnie}So, try! Experiment! Especially with HOW you break vases.
translation: {SAY:winnie}所以尽情尝试吧! 尽情实验吧! 尤其是在罐子的打开方式这方面.

original: {SAY:winnie}Sometimes you want to break all plant vases first. Sometimes, not so much.
translation: {SAY:winnie}有时你会想直接打碎所有绿色罐子. 有时不会.

original: {SAY:winnie}Sometimes, you want to target all lanes at once. Sometimes, one lane at a time.
translation: {SAY:winnie}有时你会想直接建立所有行的防线. 有时也可以一行一行来.
{SAY:winnie}这对你来说有帮助吗?

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies are not really subtle this time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这些僵尸看起来不是很狡猾.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You may plan accordingly around the Gargantuar vases as well.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}你可以根据这个巨人僵尸罐子来计划你的策略.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}做得好, 邻居!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Now off we go. To the time stream!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}我们走吧. 去时空旅行!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We're gonna break some vases and save some days!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}我们要去打碎罐子来打发时间了!

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Special Gold Tiles are deployed for this level only.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}一些特殊的黄金地砖只会在这一关出现.

original: {SAY:winnie}Planting on them will give you 125 sun, but they will not generate any more sun.
translation: {SAY:winnie}在上面种植植物会直接得到125阳光, 但后续不会生产阳光.
{EXCITED:winnie}好好利用它们吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I have some extra notes for this round of Vasebreaker.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我有一些关于这一关的提示.

original: {SAY:winnie}You will need to destroy all the iceblocks to succeed.
translation: {SAY:winnie}你需要摧毁所有的冰块来获胜.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}Vases can block Troglobites from pushing iceblocks onward, however.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}罐子可以阻挡穴居人僵尸推冰块.
{EXCITED:winnie}所以小心行事吧.
{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这关也有一些特性!

original: {SAY:winnie}When a zombie is pushed to the rightmost column, 1500 damage will be dealt to it.
translation: {SAY:winnie}当一只僵尸被击退到最后一列时, 它会受到1500点伤害.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}This only activates for ONE zombie per lane though. Plan accordingly.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}每行只有一只僵尸会受到影响. 所以好好利用这个特性吧.

original: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! Is it time for another dance party?
translation: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇哦! 又是舞蹈派对时间了?

original: {SAY:winnie}Yes, User Dave. It seems that jams will still be available for these Vasebreakers.
translation: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 看起来rap音乐在破罐者里也是有效的.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}In this one, there are hidden traps stunning the zombies once underneath the vases.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}在这一关中, 罐子底下有隐藏的陷阱, 它们可以暂时停止僵尸行动一次.

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}Are they stunned by our dancing prowess?
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}它们是被我们的舞蹈迷晕了吗?
{EXCITED:winnie}显然不是.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}Use your gems to speed up the progress like last time.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}像上次一样使用钻石来加速进程.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}Zen Garden is not just for growing plants for coins.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}禅境花园不只是用来获得硬币的.

original: {EXCITED:winnie}You can also get some boosted plants as well.
translation: {EXCITED:winnie}你也可以在这里强化一些植物.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Boosts will only last for a single level, however.
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}然而, 强化只能在最近的一关使用.

original: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}If you wait a while, your Marigold will grow.
translation: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}如果你等一会, 你的金盏花将会长大.

original: {PLAYFUL:winnie}But you can speed up the process with Gems!
translation: {PLAYFUL:winnie}但是你可以用钻石加速金盏花长大的速度!
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}我看见你找到了一株幼苗.

original: {SAY:crazydave}If you water it, it will grow into a Marigold!
translation: {SAY:crazydave}如果你给它浇水, 它将会长成金盏花!

original: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll get some coins after the plant fully grows!
translation: {EXCITED:crazydave}植物长大后, 你将获得一些硬币!

original: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Zen Garden is now officially open! Grow me a green thumb, neighbor!
translation: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}禅境花园已正式开放! 我认为你是很会种花养草的人, 邻居!
退出
重试

original: We could not verify your cloud connection. Please check that you are signed into Google Play Game Services to protect progress and preserve progress across devices.
translation: 我们无法验证你的云端连接.请检查你是否登入了 Google Play 游戏服务,以保护进度并在不同设备上维护进度.

original: We could not verify your cloud connection. Please check that you are signed into iCloud to protect progress and preserve progress across devices.
translation: 我们无法验证你的云端连接.请检查你是否登入了 iCloud,以保护进度并在不同设备上维护进度.

original: We were unable to connect to the server.  Please try again sometime later.
translation: 无法连接服务器.请稍后再来试试.

original: Sorry, it looks like there's a network data issue. Arg! Click to exit Arena.
translation: 抱歉,似乎有一些网络数据问题.呃!点击退出竞技场.

original: An internet connection is required to play Arena. Please connect to the internet and \Retry\" to try again, or \"Exit\" to leave Arena."
translation: 游玩竞技场需要互联网连接. 请在连接到互联网后点击 \"重试\" 以再次尝试, 或点击 \"退出\" 离开竞技场.

original: Your internet connection has been lost. Tap \Exit\" to continue (your reward streak may be lost)."
translation: 已丢失互联网连接.点击 \"退出\" 以继续 (你可能会失去连胜奖励).

original: The current tournament has expired!  Return to collect your winnings!
translation: 当前赛程已经终止了!快返回领取你的奖励吧!
连接已断开

original: Sorry, it looks like there's a network data issue.
translation: 抱歉,网络数据似乎有亿点问题.
连接已断开
啊哦!

original: Nightshades are shadow plants that stab zombies when unpowered.
translation: 暗影龙葵是暗影植物且在非暗影状态下刺击僵尸.

original: Stabs zombies; regrows leaves and has ranged attack when powered

original:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}can swallow multiple zombies at a time
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}spits out zombie-slowing olive oil
{FLAVOR}
Olive Pit lies buried deep underground, thinking furiously. What about? Hard to say. Maybe airplanes? Do helicopters count as airplanes?
translation:
{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}可以一次性吞下多只僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以喷出令僵尸减速的橄榄油
{FLAVOR}
油橄榄坑在地底的深处剧烈地思考着. 怎么回事啊? 很难说. 也许是天上有架飞机? 直升机应该算飞机吧?

original: Olive Pits drill into the ground and wait to consume zombies foolish enough to walk over them.
translation: 油橄榄坑可以钻入地下,等待僵尸傻傻地过来,然后出其不意地将其拖入地下.
吞没多只僵尸

translation: 这个植物不能在坚不可摧的准备时种植.
世界植物
防风草

original:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot attack zombies too close to him
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on water

{FLAVOR}Being a crab means he doesn't have much to do most of the time. Sure, he enjoys loafing around the beach and burying himself under the sand, but with his giant claws for hands, he can't really do much without tearing everything into pieces. Still, he tried, and while making a scrapbook for him and his friends seems impossible without him snipping every image, he's glad that he finally found a hobby he can enjoy.
translation:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}不能攻击太近的目标
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}作为一只螃蟹, 意味着他大部分时间没有太多事情要做. 当然, 他喜欢在沙滩上闲逛, 把自己埋在沙子下, 但凭借他巨大的爪子, 如果不把一切撕成碎片, 他什么也做不了. 尽管如此, 他还是尝试了, 如果他没有剪下每一张照片, 那么为他和朋友制作剪贴簿似乎是不可能的, 但他很高兴自己终于找到了一个可以享受的爱好.

original: Parsnips snip at zombies, then charge down the lane at the last moment.
translation: 防风草可以用铁钳攻击僵尸, 在被吃掉时会义无反顾地冲向前线.

original: Snips zombies, charges down lane when defeated
translation: 用钳子夹击僵尸, 生命值归零后向前冲刺

补丁应用失败

暂 停
奖励目标:
花生

original: {FLAVOR}Peanut knows that some folks have an aversion to him. He tries to be sensitive to their concerns and give them the space they need. Still, he can't help but miss the good old days - back when he was the most popular nut around.
translation: {FLAVOR}花生知道有些人对他挺 \"过敏\". 他试着了解它们的顾虑, 并且给予对方足够的空间. 即便如此, 他仍然会情不自禁地怀念以前的时光 - 回到那个人人爱花生的时代.

original: Peanuts block zombies and shoot peanuts flying at random angle.
translation: 阻挡僵尸, 并向随机角度发射花生.

original: Blocks zombies and shoots peanuts flying at random angle
translation: 阻挡僵尸, 并向随机角度发射花生
豌豆荚

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Wild West 20\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Having studied Quantum Spatial Mechanics in Clown College, Pea Pod has been amusing families of all ages.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}WW-20\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}在职业小丑学院的空间量子力学专业毕业后, 豌豆荚是家族中人见人爱的开心果.

original: Pea Pods can be planted in the same space for up to 5 times the destruction.
translation: 豌豆荚能在同一个格子种植, 最高可达原先 5 倍的火力.

original: Monstrous Peashooter head emerges and shoots 5 giant peas.
translation: 从地下钻出大豌豆头, 发射五颗大豌豆.

original: Can be planted on the same spot up to 5 times
translation: 同一地点最多可种植5次
豌豆射手

original: {FLAVOR}\What is it like being famous?\" asked the Peashooter while sipping his bottled water, \"I can't talk right now, I'm finishing my merchandising deal. Hold my fir coat.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}\"问我成名的滋味如何?\" 豌豆射手慢悠悠地啜了一口热茶, \"这个我现在不能告诉你, 我正在整理我的商业合同. 这是我的外套, 保管好!\"

original: Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.
translation: 豌豆射手是你的第一道防线. 他们向僵尸发射豌豆.

original: Fires off a stream of peas, adding up to a lot of damage.
translation: 发射一大波豌豆, 造成巨大伤害.
向敌人发射豌豆
迷你豌豆

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on top of other plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\So basically, I'm very small.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在其他植物上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"所以一般来说, 我很小.\"

original: Mini Peas shoot tiny peas at zombies.
translation: 迷你豌豆向僵尸发射微小豌豆.
向敌人发射微小豌豆
燃料
潘妮的维修站

original: Creates a {HEALTH} health shield every {TIME} seconds!
translation: 每 {TIME} 秒创造一面生命值为 {HEALTH} 的护盾!

original: Creates {NUMBER} shields with {HEALTH} health every {TIME} seconds!
translation: 每 {TIME} 秒创造 {NUMBER} 面生命值为 {HEALTH} 的护盾!

{FLAVOR}Pepper-mint likes heat. He's down with flames, he digs on fire, he's a total madman for oxidization and ignition. If he sees you rubbing two sticks together, he'll come over and ask about it. He can't help himself."
translation:
{KEYWORD}火辣薄荷家族植物:
{STAT}火焰豌豆射手
{STAT}断魂椒
{STAT}热辣海枣
{STAT}热土豆
{STAT}地狱火蕨

{STAT}火龙草

{FLAVOR}火辣薄荷喜欢热气. 他对火的热爱已经到了疯狂的地步. 只要他看见你在摩擦两根棍子, 他就会情不自禁地过来看看.
强化火焰植物
甜椒投手

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost, warms nearby plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Some say Pepper-pult is a hot head. Some find his fiery disposition off-putting. But the truth is, he's just very focused and determined. He loves what he does. He appreciates everything he has. \I came from the weedy side of the lawn,\" Pepper-pult explains. \"I worked hard to pull myself up by my roots. I'm a self-made pepper and I don't take a single thing for granted.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}有人说, 甜椒投手有点容易头脑发热. 有些人觉得他暴躁的性格令人反感. 但事实是, 他只是比较专注和执着而已. 他爱他所做的事情. 他感谢自己拥有的一切. \"我来自草坪的野草区,\" 甜椒投手解释. \"我努力扎根令自己立足. 我是一个自力更生的甜椒, 我认为任何事都不是理所当然的.\"

original: Pepper-pults lob flaming peppers at zombies and keep nearby plants warm.
translation: 甜椒投手向僵尸投射甜椒, 并温暖周围的植物.

original: Lobs massive explosive peppers at random targets on the lawn, while melting nearby ice.
translation: 在草坪上的随机位置投掷大甜椒, 同时融化周围冰块.

original: Lobs flaming peppers at zombies and warms nearby plants
translation: 向僵尸投射甜椒, 并温暖周围的植物
香水菇

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Night Jurassic Marsh 16\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Perfume-shrooms emit a pure, concentrated mist of aerosolized love.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}JM-16\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}香水菇会放出纯净浓缩的爱情之雾.

original: Perfume-shrooms instantly enchant all dinosaurs in a lane, charming them into working against the zombies.
translation: 香水菇魅惑一条线上的恐龙对抗僵尸.
魅惑恐龙对抗僵尸
最高等级
僵尸 {CONDITION} 增益

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}Goo Peashooter is a goopy shooter. See? See how that works? It's a play on words. Words are often playful, folks!
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}他是黏液豌豆射手, 而不是 \"粘\" 液豌豆射手. 看到了吗? 看到了吗? 语言这东西真的很博大精深!

original: Goo Peashooters shoot poison peas at zombies, poisoning them as well as slowing them down.
translation: 黏液豌豆射手可以向僵尸发射毒豌豆, 让他们中毒并受到毒缓效果.
发射毒豌豆
尖刺秋葵

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}Pokra's scrappy, she's a fighter, she's not afraid to jab below the belt to get the job done. She won't, because that would be cheating, but she's not afraid to. \Just so we're clear,\" she says with a resolute glint in her eye."
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}戳击秋葵魄力十足. 她是个能打的斗士, 为了赢得胜利, 她毫不惧怕使用些肮脏卑鄙的手段来痛击她的对手, 但她不会这样做, 因为她不想藐视规则. 但她用得起, 也丝毫不会畏惧. \"先把话挑明了才行,\" 她一边说着, 眼角边闪着坚毅的亮光.

original: Pokras deliver piercing, zombie-stalling jabs that add up to a powerful spike launch, then they rest momentarily before starting again.
translation: 尖刺秋葵会向僵尸戳出不断递增数量的毒缓尖刺, 叠到一定程度会发射强大的大型毒缓刺, 然后重新开始一次循环.
戳击速度逐渐加快
PopCap Games 出品
土豆地雷

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Minesetter\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Believe it or not, SPUDOW! did not happen overnight. Having been forced to try out new catchphrases and focus testing as many variations as possible (Tubular? Really?), Potato Mine weeded out the competition to stick with what he knows best.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}布雷者\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}信不信由你, 嘣! 并非一夜之间发生. 在被迫尝试新的流行语并集中测试尽可能多的变化 (Tubular? 真的吗?) 后, 土豆地雷淘汰了竞争对手, 以坚持自己最了解的知识.

original: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.
translation: 土豆地雷一经接触就会爆炸, 但他们需要时间来做好准备. 把他们放在僵尸前面一些的位置吧.

original: Explodes on contact, but takes time to arm itself
translation: 在僵尸接触时爆炸, 但需要时间来做好准备
迷你土豆地雷

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on top of other plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}The tiny bucktooth is both Mini Potato Mine's pride and pain. Bragging rights within the Mine family are always nice, but the dental care cost is MASSIVE.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在其他植物上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}小小的龅牙是迷你土豆地雷的骄傲, 同时也是痛苦. 他能在地雷家族中炫耀他的龅牙是好的, 但花费大量的钱在护理龅牙上是痛苦的.

original: Mini Potato Mines explode on contact, dealing minimal damage to nearby zombies.
translation: 迷你土豆地雷一接触就会爆炸, 对附近的僵尸造成极小的伤害.

translation: 接触时爆炸并造成极小的伤害

{FLAVOR}From seedling to sapling, to full grown foliage, Power Lily's experience as a life coach has shown her the best way to empower and support plants everywhere.

{FLAVOR}Primal Pea may be primitive, but that doesn't stop him from enrolling and excelling in several software development correspondence courses.

{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}种下后需等待12秒才能攻击

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}damages flying zombies as well
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Secret Level 19

{FLAVOR}Primal Potato Mine doesn't consider himself to be primal. As far as he's concerned he's state-of-the-art. And who knows? Maybe he is.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}也会对飞行僵尸造成伤害
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}S-19

{FLAVOR}原始土豆地雷并不认为自己很原始. 相反, 他认为自己很先进. 谁知道呢? 也许事实就是如此呢?

original: Primal Potato Mines do damage over an area. They must be armed before exploding on contact.
translation: 原始土豆地雷会对一定范围内的僵尸造成伤害. 但在爆炸之前他们必须要做好准备.
爆炸并造成范围伤害

original: {FLAVOR}Primal Sunflower is new to all this sun-giving business, so be patient with her. She's an early adopter of the all-you-can-stuff-yourself buffet style of sun production.
translation: {FLAVOR}原始向日葵才刚学会生产阳光, 所以最好别对她那么苛刻吧. 她可是自助型阳光生产的早期开拓者.

original: Primal Sunflowers pop out large suns instead of regular ones.
translation: 原始向日葵可以产生大号的阳光.
立刻提供大阳光

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}takes 200 damage from a smash instead of being crushed instantly\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\Grunt,\" explains Primal Wall-nut. \"Grunt oog grunt-grunt,\" he goes on to say. \"Ook-urg grunty grunt grunt,\" he concludes. A nut of many opinions, is Primal Wall-nut."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}将巨人僵尸的每次砸击转化为 200 伤害\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"咕哝,\" 原始坚果墙解释道, \"咕哝哝咕哝咕哝,\" 然后他还接着说 \"好的, 咕哝咕哝咕哝,\" 他总结道. 原始坚果墙确实是个拥有很多观点的坚果呢.

original: Primal Wall-nuts are weaker than your average Wall-nuts, but they can withstand many smashes from Gargantuars.
translation: 原始坚果的生命值比坚果低, 但能很好的拖延巨人僵尸.

translation: 阻挡僵尸, 尤其是巨人僵尸

translation: 派对永不停歇. 只需当心自己不被赶走即可!
挑战提基文明传承者!

original: It's a never-ending hootenanny. Can you handle it?
translation: 这是一场永无尽头的乡间音乐会. 你能合理收场吗?

挑战厄运金字塔!

original: Eternal Eighties zombies assail you! You're not gonna take it!
translation: 没完没了的魔音僵尸始终在抨击着你! 你不能将这些批评意见全盘采纳!
挑战精选唱片集!

original: Experience your Terror from Tomorrow, today. It's time for battle!
translation: 今天,就来感受明日的恐惧吧! 是时候开战了!
挑战明日的恐惧!

original: In this frozen fracas, it's chill or be chilled!
translation: 如何在冷酷的战斗中抉择, 冰杀对手亦或就此冻死!
挑战冰封战场!
提基文明传承者 = {NUMBER}
大孤峰 = {NUMBER}
厄运金字塔 = {NUMBER}
无尽地带: 达到了最高分
逝者的宝藏 = {NUMBER}
已解锁 {NUMBER} 扇钥匙门
已获得 {NUMBER} 颗星星

original: Endless zombies are out to ruin your day. Don't lose your way!
translation: 无穷的僵尸糟蹋着你的每一天. 不要就此迷路!
挑战鲜花神殿!

original: It's zombies from now, then, and later, all at once! DOOOOM!
translation: 古往今来的僵尸会涌向你从今往后的每个时刻! 这就是劫数!

original: Challenge Highway to the Danger Room!
translation: 挑战通往无尽的高速!

original: Scallywags, avast! How long can you last?
translation: 无赖, 停止靠近! 你可以坚持守卫多久呢?
挑战逝者的宝藏!

original: On the next prompt, please select ALLOW to receive ads that are relevant to you.\r\nWhichever option you choose, we're so excited to have you playing the game!
translation: 在下一个提示中, 请选择允许接收与您相关的广告.\r\n无论您选择哪个选项, 我们都非常高兴您能玩这个游戏!

original: To enable this setting and receive third-party ads that are relevant to your interests, please enable Tracking in your Apple iOS settings.
translation: 若要启用此设置并接收与您的兴趣相关的第三方广告, 请在您的Apple iOS设置中启用跟踪.
启用第三方定向广告
iOS设置

original: We rely on third-party partners to deliver personalized in-game ads.\r\nIf disabled, you still will see third-party ads, but these ads may not be as relevant to you. You can change your preference by visiting your settings. See EA's Privacy Policy for more details.
translation: 我们依靠第三方合作伙伴来提供个性化的游戏内广告.\r\n如果禁用, 您仍会看到第三方广告, 但这些广告可能与您不相关. 您可以通过访问您的设置来更改您的首选项. 请参阅EA的隐私政策了解更多详情.
开

original: Targeted Advertising Provided by Third Parties
translation: 由第三方提供的定向广告
隐私政策
关
把关卡中的淘金僵尸替换掉!
马勃菌

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}repeated Puffball explosions add to the poison\r\n{FLAVOR}\r\n\You think cuz I'm Puffball that I'm puffy, that I'm soft, that I'm insubstantial?\" fumes Puffball. \"You need to change that thinking. PRONTO.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}用处: {STAT}重复的马勃菌爆炸能加深毒性\r\n{FLAVOR}\r\n\"你以为我是蓬松球, 我就臃肿 我就柔软, 我就虚无缥缈?\" 马勃菌生气地说. \"你需要改变这种想法. 赶紧的.\"

original: Puffballs explode when planted, stunning and poisoning zombies in three columns.
translation: 马勃种下后爆炸, 昏迷并中毒三列僵尸.
使僵尸中毒并眩晕
小喷菇

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}only available at night time\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Puff-shroom is hip to all the latest social networks. He loves to surf Sporebook, FungusedIn and ShroomstaGram. But sometimes he misses the simple camaraderie of a good ol' fashioned Lawn Area Network party.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚使用\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}小喷菇喜欢所有时下最流行的社交网络. 他沉迷于 \"孢子书\", \"领菇\" 和 \"菇片墙\" 中. 但是他有时会怀念老式草坪上网络聚会的简单友情.

original: Puff-shrooms are short-range shooters that last for a limited time.
translation: 小喷菇能够短距离射击, 但只能存在一段时间.

original: Short-range shooter, lasts for a limited time
translation: 短距离射击, 持续时间有限
南瓜头

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Not available yet\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Pumpkin may be a hollowed-out shell, but he still has a rich inner life filled with feelings, fantasies and surprisingly disappointing opinions.
translation: {KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}暂未开放\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}南瓜头可能是一个挖空的外壳, 但他仍然有丰富的内心生活, 内心充满了感情, 喜欢幻想令人惊讶和失望的意见.

original: Pumpkins can be planted on top of other plants to provide a tough additional layer of armor.
translation: 南瓜头可以被种植在其他植物上, 以提供一个坚韧的额外装甲层.
包起来并且保护
强化

translation: 无法完成购买.\r\n请再试一次.

translation: 您已经有一个正在进行的请求产品交易.

translation: 哎呀, 你没有足够的硬币!

translation: 无法在目录中找到要求的 SKU.

translation: 你未连接到互联网, 或者至应用商店的连接存在问题!

original: Some purchase were not refreshed correctly, please try again.
translation: 有一些购买内容好像还没有刷新好, 请再试一次吧.

original: Free plants are not shared with all profiles.
translation: 免费植物不会共享到所有档案.

original: Plants purchased with Coins are not shared with all profiles.
translation: 使用硬币购买的植物不会共享到所有档案.

original: Plants purchased with Gems are not shared with all profiles.
translation: 使用钻石购买的植物不会共享到所有档案.

translation: 使用薄荷糖购买的植物不会共享到所有档案.

translation: 使用门票购买的植物不会共享到所有档案.

original: {KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}boosts Appease-mint Family plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Pea Vine boosts Appease-mint Family plants, and he himself is an Appease-mint Family plant, so therefore... hang on... don't tell me... I can do this. I said DON'T TELL ME.
translation: {KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}增强豌豆薄荷家族植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}豌豆藤蔓可以增强豌豆薄荷家族的植物, 而他自己也是株豌豆薄荷家族的植物, 所以说... 等等... 别告诉我... 我自己能捋清这团关系... 哎, 我都说了我自己能捋清!

original: Pea Vines planted on top of Appease-mint Family plants provide a significant damage boost to those plants.
translation: 当豌豆藤蔓种在豌豆薄荷家族植物身上时, 会给他们提供巨大增益.
增强豌豆薄荷家族植物

original: {FLAVOR}Pyre Vine considers his holdings, his fortune, his vast hoard of wealth. He feels it should please him, and yet nevertheless he is anxious and fearful.
translation: {FLAVOR}火焰藤蔓考虑着他的股份, 他的巨款, 他聚藏的大量财富. 他觉得这些应该能让他高兴起来, 尽管如此, 他还是忧虑着.

original: Pyre Vines can be planted on top of other plants to provide protection from cold plus an additional close range flame attack.
translation: 火焰藤蔓可以种在其他植物上, 可以御寒并额外添加近距离火焰攻击.

{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}被增强后发射可以穿透并减速的射线.

{FLAVOR}Despite being such a poisonous and profoundly inedible fungus, Shadow-shroom is nonetheless a total cutie-pie.

{FLAVOR}尽管他是一颗有毒并且不能食用的真菌, 但他仍然是一个可爱的小家伙.

original:
{KEYWORD}Usage: {STAT}best used on sun producer plants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}doesn't amplify Moonflower sun production

{FLAVOR}\Peek-a-boo!" giggles Shine Vine, staring directly at you, the player. "Consider that fourth wall SHATTERED!""
translation:
{KEYWORD}用途: {STAT}最好用于阳光生产类植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不会增加月光花的产量

{FLAVOR}"找到你了!" 闪耀藤蔓乐呵着, 直直的盯着你这名玩家. "考虑到第四堵墙已经分崩离析了!"

original: Shine Vines are vine plants that amplify the sun production of sun producer plants, create some sun on their own, and use a sun-stun burst as a last-second defense when attacked.
translation: 闪耀藤蔓是藤蔓植物, 可以增多阳光生产植物的阳光产量, 同时自己生产阳光, 被僵尸啃咬时还可以用阳光力量眩晕僵尸并产出阳光.
提高内部植物的阳光产量
每 {TIME} 秒令僵尸后退 {DISTANCE} 单位距离!
缩小
缩小
缩小紫罗兰

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}shrinks imps to oblivion\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Shrinking Violet started out shy, but it's remarkable how discovering a magical talent for zombie-reduction can change your whole outlook.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}会把小鬼缩小到消失\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}缩小紫罗兰开始很害羞, 但令人惊奇的是, 在发现自己可以缩小僵尸的天赋之后, 她就彻底变了.

original: Shrinking Violets instantly shrink zombies in an area upon contact, forcing them to take more damage and reducing the bite damage they inflict.
translation: 缩小紫罗兰在被接触后会立即缩小周围的僵尸, 使他们收到更多的伤害, 并减少他们造成的啃食伤害.

original: Shrinks zombies and makes them weaker
translation: 缩小僵尸, 使他们更脆弱
缩小
跳过增益
投掷豌豆

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}Sling Pea keeps a keen eye on the whole battle space. He's alert and attentive. \If something slips through,\" he muses quietly, \"it would be my fault. And I just couldn't forgive myself if that happened.\""
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}投掷豌豆一直在观察着整个战场. \"如果有人偷偷溜走了, 我是不会原谅自己的. 因为这是我的失职.\" 他永远都如此机敏. 又如此专注.

original: Sling Peas fire 5 peas in a burst, targeting the zombies closest to your house each time.
translation: 投掷豌豆可以一次发射五颗豌豆, 每次都会瞄准离房子最近的僵尸.
向全场发射五颗豌豆, 攻击每行最靠左的目标

original: A new pot is available for sprouts!
translation: 一个供幼芽生长的新花盆已解锁!
火龙草

original: {FLAVOR}Although the most powerful dragon in the plant kingdom, he still dreams of wings and seeing the world beneath him.
translation: {FLAVOR}尽管他是植物王国中最厉害的龙, 但他仍然梦想着有一对翅膀并且看看自己脚下的世界.

original: Snapdragons breathe fire into 6 adjacent tiles in front of it.
translation: 火龙草向它前面6个相邻的地砖喷火.

original: Creates a 3x3 patch of fire that does massive damage.
translation: 产生一片范围为 3x3 的火, 造成巨大的伤害.

original: Breathes fire in an area in front of it
translation: 向前方一片区域呼出火焰
大嘴豌豆

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}\I'm a picky eater, I'll admit it,\" admits Snap Pea casually. \"I'll eat a zombie, no problem, but there's just something about heads. I feel like they're looking at me.\""
translation: \r\n{FLAVOR}大嘴豌豆说: \"好吧, 我承认, 我确实有点挑食. 我是喜欢吃僵尸, 没问题, 但他们的脑袋就让我感觉挺不适的. 感觉就像是他们在盯着我看一样.\"

original: Snap Peas dive underground, burrow towards zombies, then pop up underneath to swallow them in one gulp. Snap Peas then return to their starting spot, chew on the entire matter for a while, and finally spit the zombies' heads out at attackers.
translation: 大嘴豌豆可以先钻入地下, 跑到僵尸下面, 一口吞下一只僵尸. 然后会开始咀嚼僵尸, 咀嚼完后会将僵尸的头吐出来攻击另一只僵尸.

original: Eats zombies and spits out their heads
translation: 吃掉一只僵尸, 咀嚼一段时间后吐出他的头

{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}has splash chill at Tier 2 and freeze at Tier 3
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost

{FLAVOR}As a professional table tennis player, in the off-season he also enjoys skiing, playing the bongos, and spelunking.

{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}2阶能造成范围冷却, 3阶能造成范围冰冻

original: Snow Peas fire chilling peas to slow zombies down.
translation: 寒冰射手能发射冰豌豆减速僵尸.

original: Fires a stream of frozen peas and creates a sheet of ice that chills everything in its lane.
translation: 发射一堆冰冻豌豆, 并创造一条冰道, 冷却这条道上的所有东西.

original: Shoots chilling peas that damage and slow zombies
translation: 发射伤害并减速僵尸的冰冻豌豆

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can only detect targets 4 tiles in front
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be planted on top of other plants

{FLAVOR}Having committed several hate crimes on multiple counties, states and interstates, Mini Snow Pea was banned from 47 different countries, 108 different timelines and left a really bad image of blue-type plants all year round. \It's not a hate crime if you enjoy doing it!" she said."
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能探测前方四格内的僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在其他植物上

{FLAVOR}迷你寒冰豌豆在好几个省, 市, 县犯下了几起仇恨犯罪, 在47个国家, 以及108个不同的时间线禁止入境, 常年给蓝色植物留下不好的印象. "如果你喜欢这样做那就不是仇恨犯罪啦" 她说.

original: Mini Snow Peas fire mini chilling peas.
translation: 迷你寒冰射手发射迷你寒冰豌豆.
发射迷你寒冰豌豆

original: {FLAVOR}Solar Tomato wishes folks would just stop and enjoy the sunshine sometimes. \Stop,\" she says. \"Enjoy the sunshine. I said stop! Hold it right there! Don't move! I MEAN IT!!!\""
translation: {FLAVOR}阳光番茄希望大家能够时常驻足享受从天空中洒下的缕缕阳光. \"停!\" 她说. \"享受那阳光! 我说了, 停下来! 就给我停在那儿不准动! 不! 准! 动!!!\"

original: Solar Tomatoes stun zombies in a 3x3 area, causing each zombie to drop 50 sun.
translation: 阳光番茄可以眩晕 3x3 范围内的僵尸, 并让每只僵尸生产 50 阳光.
使僵尸眩晕并掉落阳光
冰晶菇

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to frost\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Everyone sees her as a mysterious cone-shaped creature from the coldest isles. Some believe she is from another planet, while others even suspect that there's a giant body hiding underneath. \Haha! I enjoy being a mystery. Isn't it fun to do the most basic thing and then hide away, leaving them juggling all their conspiracies about me?\" ...and there she disappeared again, leaving behind a flash and why did we come to this sand field again?"
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}每个人都把她视作来自最寒冷的地方的神秘锥形生物. 有的人认为她来自另一个星球, 另外一部分人甚至怀疑她在地下有巨大的身体. \"哈哈! 我喜欢做一个神秘者. 做最基本的事然后隐藏起来, 任由他们讨论我的阴谋论不是很有趣吗?\" ...然后她又消失了, 留下一瞬残影 - 为什么我们再次来到这片沙地?

original: Crystall-shrooms fire chill-piercing crystal shards and hide into the ground when zombies are close.
translation: 冰晶菇发射穿透冷却子弹, 当有僵尸出现在她面前时就会缩到地下.

translation: 发射穿透冷却子弹, 有僵尸出现在面前时缩到地下

original: Spikerocks destroy multiple rolling zombies and damage zombies that walk over them.

translation: {FLAVOR}\"我最喜欢的运算方法?\" 孢子菇自言自语道, \"我想我有必要说, 嗯, 加法. 等等, 不对... 是乘法.\"

original: {KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Spring Season 7\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}As the other half of the Wheat duo, Wheat Cluster embraces her farsightedness wholeheartedly unlike her brother. Sure, she can't read as well as many other plants, but on the physical spectrum? She has an absurd advantage in skee-ball and will always claim ALL the tickets from that game whenever she goes to an arcade. This has also led to her bans from many arcades, unfortunately.

{FLAVOR} \Big is good," says Strawburst. "Though small's pretty choice as well. And you should never discount medium. I just like sizes, really.""

眩晕洋葱

original: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone knows Stunion as the battle-hardened warrior with the potent breath. But he's so much more than that. He's an accomplished pianist. He speaks five languages fluently. Heck, he's the leader of a Cub Shallots group in his spare time. Dude's got layers. Go on, peel 'em back. You'll see.
translation: {FLAVOR}哦, 当然, 每个人都知道眩晕洋葱作为战士以他强大的气团在战场上驰骋多年. 但他可远不止这点本事. 他是一个多才多艺的钢琴家. 他会说五种流利的语言. 哎呀, 他在业余时间还是青葱年少组织的组长. 这位老兄层次很多哦. 来吧, 一层层剥开. 你会看到的.

original: Stunions instantly breathe a stunning cloud of gas on nearby zombies in the lane.
translation: 眩晕洋葱会立即向附近的僵尸呼出眩晕气体.

original: Immediately breathes a large cloud of stunning gas to the right, across three lanes.
translation: 立即向右方三行内呼出大量可以晕眩僵尸的气体.

original: Stuns nearby zombies in the lane
translation: 眩晕靠近他的僵尸

original:
{STAT}NOTE: {STAT}yes, it can be stacked on the same zombie, dummy.
{KEYWORD}Tiering Unlock: {STAT}Cells of the Sun 2

{FLAVOR}As the eldest of the bean brothers, Sun Bean often finds his siblings exasperating. Chili Bean is a little crude, Laser Bean is too far out, and Spring Bean is just plain lazy. Still, he loves them just the same. That's how it is with family.

{STAT}注意: {STAT}是的, 可以在同一只僵尸身上重复使用, 小傻瓜.
{KEYWORD}阶级解锁: {STAT}SNB-2

{FLAVOR}作为豆子兄弟里的老大哥, 阳光豆总觉得他的弟弟妹妹们不靠谱. 辣椒豆总是很粗俗, 激光豆太前卫, 弹簧豆就是个懒虫. 尽管如此, 他依然深爱着他的家人们.

original: Sun Beans infect zombies with a sun plague. As a zombie takes damage it generates sun.
translation: 阳光豆可以用阳光之力感染僵尸. 被感染的僵尸受到攻击会掉落阳光.

original: {FLAVOR}After the release of her first major YouTuber video \Zombies On Your Lawn,\" Sunflower's YouTuber channel has been bursting with fun. She is currently putting the final touches on her reality show TV pitch \"Sunflower Thinks She Can Dance.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}在 YouTuBe 上发布了她的第一个视频 \"有僵尸在你的草坪上\" 之后, 向日葵的频道可以说是如日中天. 目前, 她正在为自己的真植秀节目 \"向日葵炫舞秀\" 做最后的润色.

original: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!
translation: 向日葵可以为你生产额外的阳光, 非常重要. 尽量多种一些吧!

{FLAVOR}Oh sure, Sun-shroom is known for his ever-present grin and sunny disposition. But truth be told, even he has his dark days. It ain't easy keeping things light when you live in the shadows.

{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚关卡使用

{FLAVOR}众所周知, 阳光菇拥有迷人的微笑和开朗的性格. 但老实讲, 即便是他也有过黑暗的日子. 身处黑暗还得把东西一直照亮实属不易.

original: {FLAVOR}Sweet Potato really is as sweet as she looks. Her favorite animal is the unicorn. Her favorite color is (and this is a direct quote) \all the colors of the rainbow.\" When she writes the letter \"i\", she draws a little heart where the dot belongs. Frankly, if it were anyone else, this amount of syrup would be sickening. But on her, well, it just seems right."
translation: {FLAVOR}甜薯就像她看起来那样甜. 她最喜欢的动物是独角兽. 按她的原话说她最喜欢的颜色则是 \"彩虹的所有颜色\". 当她写字母 \"i\" 的时候, 她喜欢把点画成一颗心的形状. 坦白来讲, 对别人来说她的甜度简直无法忍受. 但是对她来讲, 这只是刚刚好而已.

original: Sweet Potatoes attract zombies from other lanes when they are close by.
translation: 当僵尸接近甜薯时, 他们会被吸引到甜薯的那行.

You can also force sync your data for your current player ID to ensure you are up-to-date with what is stored on our servers.\r\nTo see your current player IDs, go to Settings -> Download Preferences.\""

original:

{FLAVOR}Tangle Kelp likes to go deep. He majored in philosophy. Grab a root beer with him, and he'll go on and on about Nietzsche's \Thus Spoke Zucchini" or hold forth on Kant's "Critique of Petunia Reason." It's cool and all, but sometimes you just want to keep the conversation light. Sometimes you just want to talk about the temperature of the water."

{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}对体型过大的僵尸只能造成伤害

{FLAVOR}缠绕水草喜欢沉思. 他主攻哲学. 如果拉着他喝上一杯草根啤酒, 他就开始不停地讲尼采的 "查拉图斯特拉如是说", 要么就是死磕康德的 "纯理性批判", 听起来的确很高大上, 不过有时你只不过想聊点轻松的话题, 比如水底的温度是多少.

original: Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that approaches them underwater.
translation: 缠绕海带是一株水生植物, 可以把靠近他的第一只僵尸拖下水.

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resists cold and warms plants around it\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\The trick to proper whipping is all in the wrist,\" says Wasabi Whip. \"Well, not the wrist, exactly, since I don't have any. You have to, like... BE the wrist.\""
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}抵挡严寒, 并且可以温暖附近的植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"鞭打僵尸最重要的技巧在手腕上,\" 炙鞭山葵说. \"额... 也不是手腕啦... 因为我好像并没有手腕. 总之你就是要记住, 得把自己当成手腕.\"

original: Winter-mints chill all zombies present on the board when planted and provide a temporary boost to all Winter-mint Family plants on the lawn.

金缕梅女巫

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}targets Wizard Zombies first\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}As one of the most powerful magic users in the Plant Kingdom, she's often chosen to participate in the magical duels between plants and zombies. She's not really too stable though - as she's known for quickly snapping at other plants. She also enjoys petting any cat within her sight... and talk shows, for some reason. Is that a Witch thing?
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}优先锁定巫师僵尸\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}作为植物王国中最强大的魔法使用者之一, 她经常被选中参加植物和僵尸之间的魔法决斗. 不过, 她并不太稳定 - 因为她以快速捕捉其他植物而闻名. 她还喜欢抚摸她视线范围内的任何猫... 和脱口秀节目. 女巫也干那种事吗?

original: A new holiday party level every day until 12/29.

original: Holiday surprises (and ugly sweaters) every day.
translation: 佳节来临! 每天都有无穷惊喜(和丑毛衣)哦!

original: Holly Barrier excels at keeping Feastivus fools at bay!

original: Try new special-edition Holly Barrier in today's party!

original: Enjoy the first day of the year, and all the days after as well!

original: Go on, have another helping. Happy holidays!

original: Have yourself a sticky little Feastivus. Get Sap-fling now, keep him forever.

original: Try special-edition Sap-fling in today's party!
translation: 在今天的彩陶中试试不一般的树脂投手吧!

original: Win a Snowball power up and get double Snowballs. All Feastivus long.

original: Chill out in style. Win them only during Feastivus.
translation: 美美地, 让他们冷冷的! 这可是节日限定奖励哦!

original: Edibles on the attack. Prizes to win. Messes to make.
translation: 食物大军来袭! 奖励就在前方, 横扫这片战场.

original: The limited-time fall Food Fight is on!

不给糖, 就捣乱! 僵尸的头全打断!

original: Play now to win limited-time Plants vs. Zombies Heroes costumes!

original: Nothing short of amazing. Limited time.

original: Beware the rainbows and win your pot of gold!

original: Play the Luck O' The Zombie event!

original: Limited time. Holiday hits and presents!

original: Hot Dog Imp is grilling up trouble.

original: Celebrate The Springening with Dandelion and friends!

original: Put some BOOM in your blooms!
translation: 爆炸的焰火, 绽放的花朵!

original: Take a crack, win a prize! Celebrate The Springening with cheer!
translation: 用丰厚的奖励, 迎接暖春节的到来吧!

original: Play Eggbreaker in today's garden party.
translation: 在今天的花园派对游玩 \"破蛋者\" 吧!

original: Happy April Fools' Day! Not everything may be as it appears!
translation: 愚人节快乐! 记住, 眼见不一定为实哦!

original: Put your bunny ears back on.
translation: 戴上你的兔子耳朵吧!

translation: 只需要一半的价钱, 就能重新游玩暖春节派对

translation: 于今日的彩陶盛宴感受那令人着迷的甜薯!

original: The home of many great battles, designed and handcrafted by the community themselves! Battle against the wits of other players - can you come out on top?
translation: 许多有趣战斗的集合, 由社区玩家们亲自设计和制作! 与其他玩家斗智斗勇 - 你能从中脱颖而出吗?
我是僵尸
我是僵尸

original: Use your zombies wisely to decimate plant defenses and secure victory in this reversed mode!
translation: 明智地使用你的僵尸来摧毁植物防御, 并在这个反转模式中获得胜利!
混杂岛屿
混杂岛屿

original: Anything and everything can happen here!
translation: 在这里任何事情都可能发生!
困难模式
困难模式

original: This will give you so much peril that you'll wish you had never entered this place. Turn back while you can.
translation: 这将给你带来巨大的危险, 你会希望你从未进入过这个地方. 趁你还能回头.
这个世界包含:
狂野西部
黑暗时代

original: Take a trip back to the '60s and hang ten on the ocean waves! Tides are changing and those gnarly zombies make it not-so-safe to go back in the water!
translation: 乘着浪回到 60 年代, 感受大海的呼唤! 不断变化的海岸线, 饥渴的僵尸都让下水游泳危险重重.

original: Head down the dusty trail for a showdown with the outlaw zombies of yesteryear! Gather up your plants for the big Brain Rush of 1850!
translation: 踏上尘土飞扬的小路, 让逃亡于此的僵尸尝尝厉害! 植物, 在此集结! 参与 1850 年那场淘脑潮!

original: Bring out your undead to the year 948! Harvest mushrooms in the dark of knight and get medieval on zombies from the days of yore!
translation: 与僵尸一起来到如尸般腐臭的948年! 在这儿, 无处不笼罩着黑暗骑士的阴霾. 你将在这儿获得蘑菇, 在来自 \"往日岁月\" 的僵尸进攻下走过中世纪!

original: The ground thunders under the awful feet of terrible lizards! Dinosaurs prowl the past, provoking prehistoric zombies into a frenzy of ancient antipathy!
translation: \"轰! 轰!\", 那是史前巨蜥脚步落在地上的声音. 周围是凶猛的恐龙在徘徊, 连僵尸也在原始的欲望下变得更为疯狂.

original: Zombies infest one of Earth's earliest civilizations! Tackle mummified monsters and more under the scorching sun of Egypt, circa 2500 BC!
translation: 僵尸侵袭了地球上最早的几个文明之一! 在约公元前 2500 年的埃及烈日下对付木乃伊僵尸吧!

original: Stock up on hairspray and rewind to the 1980s! With synthesized music and voraciously radical zombies, this heinous dance party will, like, totally tax you to the MAX!
translation: 抹上发胶, 回到 80 年代, 跟随着合成音乐与僵尸一起摇摆! 来吧, 这场舞会保准让你 High 到极点!

original: In the year 2323, the zombies will have brain extraction down to a science! Can the plants of the future save you from the undead of tomorrow?
translation: 2323 年, 僵尸的脑子提取技术已然成为一门新兴的科学! 未来的植物能否将你从明日的僵尸口中解救出来?

original: Explore the frozen wastes of prehistory and chill out with the coolest zombies ever. Beware the winds or your plants will be frozen veggies.
translation: 探索史前的冰冻废墟, 与最 \"冷酷\" 的僵尸一起 \"冷静\" 下来. 小心吹来的寒风! 它能把你的植物冻成冰块!

original: Discover the vanished city of gold, where sun is plentiful and misplaced zombies abound! Use special tiles for extra sun, for these treasure-seekers are no idol threat!
translation: 探索失落的黄金之城, 那里阳光充裕, 并且到处都是迷路的探险家僵尸! 不仅如此, 你还可以使用特殊的地砖来获得额外的阳光!

original: The end is the beginning! Return to moments before you left in a contemporary contest stocked with zombies of every egregious era, as you face them all in a huge minigame bash!
translation: 结束就是开始! 回到你离开之前的时刻, 在一个充满了每个令人震惊的时代的僵尸的当代竞赛中, 你面对他们都在一个巨大的迷你游戏狂欢!

original: The year is 1679, the golden age of zombie piracy! Keep your booty close and your plants closer as zombies take to the seas to plunder your brains!
translation: 公元 1679 年, 海盗僵尸的黄金时代! 僵尸虎视眈眈, 盘算着出海掠夺你的脑子. 请在你的植物身后躲好!

旋转芜菁

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}hovers above ground or water\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Sometimes Rotobaga hears the other plants gossiping about each other. \Did you notice that so-and-so has been putting on weight?\" they might say. Or, \"I hear that so-and-so is dating so-and-so. Can you believe it?\"  But Rotobaga isn't the kind of plant to engage in idle gossip. She's not interested in talking about anyone behind their leaves. She does her best to just rise above it."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}有时候旋转芜菁会听到植物们互相八卦. \"你注意到没? 某某某发胖了.\" 他们还会说, 像这样的话题: \"我听说某某某正在和某某某约会, 你能相信吗?\" 但是旋转芜菁不是这种爱八卦的类型. 对于在别人背后议论八卦, 她更有兴趣事情是尽力超越别人.

original: Rotobagas shoot a stream of projectiles along the four diagonals, in each direction that has a target.
translation: 旋转芜菁可以在四个对角中的任意一个有敌人的方向发射子弹.

original: Fires a rapid stream of shots in all four diagonal directions.
translation: 向四个对角线方向快速发射大量子弹.

original: Shoots along the diagonals, up to four directions at a time
translation: 沿对角线射击, 最多同时射击四个方向
继续

original: When a yeti appears on the map, go after him quickly! If you can spot and defeat him in the level, he'll drop fabulous prizes!
translation: 当雪人僵尸出现在地图上, 就快去追他! 如果你在关卡内找到并击败他, 就会掉落绝妙的奖励!
雪人僵尸出现了!
一只野生的宝藏雪人
宝藏雪人现身了

original: Gets instant Plant Food effect when planted on the lawn.
translation: 将在种植在草坪上时立即获得叶绿素效果
强化
要使用强化吗?
禅境花园
十成的稀有!

original: Tap a plant. The bee will speed it up!
translation: 点击一株植物. 蜜蜂会加速它的生长!
持续 {BOOST_DURATION}
强化 {PLANT_NAME}?
稍后
现在

original: Opens up another pot to plant sprouts and earn sweet loot and boosts!
translation: 开启另一个花盆, 种植幼芽, 赚取丰厚奖励和强化!
想要购买空位吗?
卖掉你的植物?

original: Are you sure you want to shovel this plant?  It will lose its boost.
translation: 你确定要铲掉这株植物吗? 铲掉之后, 强化就会消失!
你确定吗?
{NUMBER} 钻石
完成
是一份强化!

original: Here's some coins while you work towards a boost!
translation: 在你获取强化的路上, 还会奖励你一些硬币!
试着再种一株幼芽.

original: Return to Zen Garden often to boost your plants!
translation: 常回禅境花园看看, 强化你的植物!

original: Sunflower is now boosted! The boost lasts for one level.
translation: 向日葵已强化! 本次强化只在这一关内生效.

original: She's ready for water. Keep her growing to get a boost!
translation: 可以给她浇水了. 让她成长, 获得强化!

original: It's a Sunflower! She's thirsty for water.
translation: 这是一株向日葵! 她好像很渴.

original: Marigold's growing up! And she has coins for you.
translation: 金盏花长大了! 而且她有硬币要给你.

original: A batch of coins and she's done!
translation: 她生产了一堆硬币!
把幼芽种进去

original: You may plant another sprout now!
translation: 你现在可以多种植一株幼芽了!

original: Return to Zen Garden often to earn coins!
translation: 经常回禅境花园看看, 获取更多硬币!

original: It's a Marigold! She needs water.
translation: 这是株金盏花! 她需要浇水.

original: The Marigold is ready for water.
translation: 已经可以给金盏花浇水了.
种植多株幼芽?

original: You may plant multiple sprouts to add a bonus to your chance to get an uncommon or rare plant.
translation: 你可以种植多株幼芽, 以增加得到罕见或稀有植物的概率.
没有奖励
没有空花盆了!
{HOURS} 时
{HOURS}时 {MINUTES}分
{HOURS}时 {MINUTES}分 {SECONDS}秒
{MINUTES}分
{MINUTES}分 {SECONDS}秒
{SECONDS}秒

original: The bee will take your plant, but it hasn't grown enough to be worth any sprouts.  Sell anyway?
translation: 蜜蜂会买下你的植物, 但是那植物还没有长到值任何幼芽的程度. 还是要卖吗?
僵尸
滚桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Barrel Roller Zombie is part of a super underground secret awesome club. You probably haven't heard of it. Also, his left arm is slightly longer than his right arm.
translation: {FLAVOR}滚桶僵尸是超级地下神秘俱乐部的一分子. 你估计没听过这俱乐部吧? 没办法, 它太神秘了. 此外, 他的左胳膊比右胳膊稍微长一点.

original: His rolling barrel crushes plants and provides excellent protection.
translation: 他那滚动着的桶可以碾压植物, 并为他提供良好的保护.
蓬巴杜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Zombie recently noticed that he was wearing only one flip-flop. He THINKS he lost the other one while doing the limbo at a bonfire party the other night. But to be honest, that entire night is a little hazy ... and that flip-flop could be anywhere.
translation: {FLAVOR}蓬巴杜僵尸最近注意到自己只穿了一只拖鞋. 他估计是那天晚上在篝火晚会打杂的时候搞丢了一只. 但是,那天晚上雾蒙蒙的 ... 而且拖鞋可能在任何地方.
普通的海滩流浪汉僵尸.
蓬巴杜路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Go to the beach, they said. Put a cone on your head, they said. So, yeah, that's what Pompadour Conehead did. He's at his best when following simple instructions.
translation: {FLAVOR}蓬巴杜路障僵尸很喜欢完成别人给他施的简单指令. \"到沙滩去\", 他照做了. \"把路障放到你头上\", 他也照做了.

original: His starfish cone gives him thrice the toughness of a normal pompadour zombie.
translation: 他的海星锥帽使他的防御力是普通蓬巴杜僵尸的三倍.
蓬巴杜铁桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Buckethead tried to learn to play the ukulele. He figured it would be easier to learn than the guitar on account of how small it is. But his stiff fingers ... they just weren't made for it. Now he just bangs on his bucket. And he's not half-bad either.
translation: {FLAVOR}蓬巴杜铁桶僵尸在学习演奏尤克里里琴. 他觉得这尺寸可比吉他容易弹多了. 但他那又小又僵的手指嘛 ... 很明显不适合这玩意儿. 现在他只会敲他的桶. 而且他也敲得不赖.

original: His scallop shelled bucket gives him great resistance to damage.
translation: 他的贝壳铁桶可以帮助他很好地抵御伤害.
珊瑚笼僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}armor cannot be pierced by poison and certain instants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}her speed increases once she's free
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, freeze, stalling perfume and butter

{FLAVOR}The cage? She got caught once by an aquarium due to being mistaken for a mermaid. She ate the owner then broke out of there on her own - caged and all. The coral? She stumbled onto a reef on her way back. The octopus? She got inspired by her favorite comic character. Psst... tell no one it's a cosplay prop.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}铁笼免疫毒和灰烬植物的穿甲伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}当她被释放后速度增加
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却, 冰冻, 失速和黄油有抗性

{FLAVOR}那个铁笼? 她曾经因为被误认为美人鱼而被水族馆抓住. 她吃掉了主人, 然后自己逃了出来 - 但没有摆脱笼子. 那些珊瑚? 她在回来的路上被礁石绊倒了. 那些章鱼? 她受到她最喜欢的漫画人物的启发. 嘘... 别告诉任何人, 这是角色扮演的道具.

original: Her toughened metal cage makes her VERY resistant to damage.
translation: 她的钢化金属笼子使她对伤害有很强的抵抗力.
比基尼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Is it weird that we haven't seen any female zombies before? Some say yes. Some say no. Either way, Bikini Zombie is used to breaking new ground. She's not afraid to go where no woman zombie has gone before. You could call her a pioneer. You could call her a hero.
translation: {FLAVOR}在之前我们从未看到过女性僵尸, 是不是很奇怪? 有人说是的. 有人说不是. 不管怎样, 比基尼僵尸开辟了新局面. 她不惧怕到以前没有女性僵尸涉足的地方. 她可以称为先驱者, 也可以称为英雄.
普通的比基尼僵尸.
比基尼路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}See that starfish on Bikini Conehead's cone? She put that there herself. She gets a lot of compliments on it too. And sure enough, now it seems like everyone is accessorizing with starfish. She's a trendsetter, that one.
translation: {FLAVOR}看到比基尼路障僵尸脑袋上的海星了吗? 是她自己放在那儿的. 这让她取得了许多赞美. 果然, 现在似乎每个人都开始往头上放海星了. 但是她才是那个时尚弄潮儿, 唯一的那个.

original: Her starfish cone makes her thrice as tough as a basic bikini zombie.
translation: 她的海星锥帽使她的防御力是普通比基尼僵尸的三倍.
比基尼铁桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Bikini Buckethead had big ambitions. She wanted to do more than just lurch around on a beach all day. Her life's dream: to perform internationally with a synchronized swimming team. Sadly, the nose plug was her undoing. If she only had a nose ...
translation: {FLAVOR}比基尼铁桶僵尸有着雄心壮志. 她想做的可不仅仅是整天在海滩上闲逛. 她一生的梦想, 便是与一支水上芭蕾队一起参加国际表演. 可遗憾的是, 她的鼻塞让这个还未萌芽的梦想破灭了. 如果她有一个鼻子的话 ...

original: Her scallop shelled bucket provides great protection from damage.
translation: 她的贝壳铁桶可以帮助她很好地抵御伤害.
渔夫僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}plants next to him are tossed off the lawn
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to stun

{FLAVOR}Everyone is tired of Fisherman Zombie's fishing stories. He's always bragging about the size of his catch. Time and time again, he claims to have caught 	he big one." But the fact of the matter is, no one has seen him actually catch a fish. Not once. It's more than a little suspicious."
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}将旁边的植物拉出草坪
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}易被眩晕

{FLAVOR}啊... 大伙都听腻了渔夫僵尸在那儿讲自己的钓鱼事迹了. 他总喜欢吹牛说自己钓到的鱼有多大. 但实际上, 都没有人看过他钓到鱼, 一次都没有. 好像是有点可疑.

original: Casts his line to pull far plants to him.
translation: 抛出钓鱼绳, 把远处的植物拉到他跟前.
海滩旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Talk about a disgruntled zombie. Beach Flag Zombie is fed up. None of the other zombies seem to appreciate just how difficult it is for him to swim while holding a flag. Not once have they thanked him for doing the hard work that needs to be done. So it shouldn't come as a surprise: He's been interviewing for jobs elsewhere.
translation: {FLAVOR}要说一个心怀不满的僵尸. 海滩旗帜僵尸实在是受够了. 其他的僵尸似乎都不知道他举着旗子游泳有多困难. 他们一次也没有感谢过他做的这份苦差事. 因此, 他其实一直在面试其他地方的工作, 你应该不会觉得很意外吧.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge wet \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群僵尸即将随着潮水起落而来袭.
深海巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with driftwood
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Mermaid when damaged

{FLAVOR}This big guy loves the water. When he's deep down in it, he feels light as a feather. He feels like he's flying. Most importantly, during those precious moments, he feels as if the weight of Imp Mermaid Zombie has been lifted from his shoulders.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用漂流木砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出人鱼小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}这个大家伙很喜欢水. 在水里, 他感觉自己如鸿毛般轻盈, 如鱼儿般自由. 最重要的是, 在这段宝贵的时光中, 他再也不用承受人鱼小鬼僵尸的重量了.

original: Titanic zombie who isn't shellfish with his might.
translation: 形如泰坦的僵尸, 并对自己的力量毫不吝啬.
小鬼人鱼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Imp Mermaid Zombie couldn't decide whether to wear the top made out of coconut shells or the top made out of seashells. She went with the slinky coconut-shell number because, really, the seashells are soooo last wave.
translation: {FLAVOR}人鱼小鬼僵尸不知道自己上半身是该戴椰子壳呢, 还是贝壳呢? 最后她还是选择了椰子壳, 因为她觉得戴贝壳太俗气了.

original: Washes in past your defenses, then flounders forward.
translation: 可以被冲到防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
章鱼僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to butter\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}It started innocently enough. One day, Octo Zombie decided to get a pet octopus. But he loved that octopus so much, he got another and another ... and another. Next thing you know, he was volunteering at an octopus rescue shelter. And now, well, no one wants to tell him, but he's pretty much the undersea equivalent of a cat lady. You should see how many are living at his house. It's quite startling.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}易被黄油影响\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}事情的起因其实很无厘头. 某一天, 章鱼僵尸决定养一只章鱼宠物. 但却由此喜爱得不得了, 他就养了一只又一只的章鱼 ... 不断. 接下来你明白的, 他成了章鱼庇护所的志愿者. 而且现在, 好吧, 没人想直接告诉他, 他简直快成了海底世界的猫夫人了. 你真该看看他房子养了多少只, 真是相当惊人.

original: Throws octopi at your plants to bind them up. Bound plants are passive until their octopus is destroyed.
translation: 扔出章鱼包裹你的植物. 被包住的植物无法行动, 直到章鱼被摧毁.
潜水僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to stalling perfume\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Snorkel Zombie has a hard time getting the Bikini Zombies. He's tried offering them flowers, jewelry, and even chocolate-covered brains. But nothing seems to work. They just can't seem to see past the snorkel on his face.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对失速有抗性\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}潜水僵尸追求比基尼僵尸的时候真是心累. 他试过送花, 珠宝甚至巧克力酱的脑子. 但是毫无成效. 其实主要是因为透过潜水眼镜根本看不清他的脸啊.

original: Snorkel zombies can submerges underwater to avoid most attacks.
translation: 潜水僵尸能在通过水中潜泳躲避大部分攻击.
冲浪僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can crush a plant with his board
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}ashed Surfers will not drop their surfboards

{FLAVOR}Surfer Zombie took up surfing just last year. At first, he only did it because he thought it would make him look cool. But he was a natural. Now he can hang 10 with the best of them. Now he's headed to the pro circuit. Now he IS cool.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以用冲浪板摧毁一株植物
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}化成灰的冲浪僵尸不会掉落他们的冲浪板

{FLAVOR}冲浪僵尸去年才开始玩冲浪的. 起初他玩冲浪只是想让自己看上去很酷. 但他确实是个天才. 现在他可是进入前10强的好手, 而且进入职业巡回赛成为选手, 的确是够酷.

original: Surfs past plants on the water, then carries board on land.
translation: 冲浪僵尸在水面上掠过植物, 此后在陆地上举板前行.
#蛋糕坦克

original: #caketank is the hot new trend. It is trending all over the place. Look under your bed. It's trending there, too.
translation: #蛋糕坦克是一个新的热门趋势, 热门到已经是霸榜的存在了. 对了, 看看你的床下. 它在那儿也很热门哦.

original: #caketank advances to a set position on the lawn, then emits shocking birthday surprises as its various layers take damage.
translation: #蛋糕坦克会走到草坪上的一个固定位置, 在受到伤害层数减少后, 将会蹦出生日惊喜.
骆驼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Each Camel Zombie is an excellent ballroom dancer, practicing every day by holding up mysterious signs with strange symbols. They call it \The Camel Dance.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}每一位骆驼僵尸都是一名出色的舞蹈家, 每天都通过举着神秘符号来练习. 他们将其称之为 \"骆驼舞\".

original: Arrives in step with other Camel Zombies in a group of three zombies or more.
translation: 与其他骆驼僵尸在三个及以上的僵尸群中齐头并进.
骆驼僵尸

original: Leader of the many hump camel group.
translation: 包含多个驼峰的骆驼队中的领头驼.
骆驼僵尸

original: Leader of the one hump camel group.
translation: 包含一个驼峰的骆驼队中的领头驼.
骆驼僵尸

original: Just another camel in the group.
translation: 骆驼队中的一只普通骆驼.
骆驼僵尸

original: Leader of the two hump camel group.
translation: 包含两个驼峰的骆驼队中的领头驼.
小鬼炮

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chill\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}The Imps joined the Order of the Cannon Fraternity, Kappa Pea, and quickly rose through the ranks due to the constant firing of their leadership.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}小鬼僵尸们加入了 \"大炮的使命\" 兄弟会, 在这里很容易获得晋升的机会, 因为根据传统, 每次战役大炮都会射出当时的最高领袖.

original: Shoots Pirate Imps to mid-lawn. Eventually it can explode and rain down imps if not destroyed quickly.
translation: 向草坪中央发射小鬼僵尸. 一段时间后炸膛并喷射出大量小鬼.
游乐园僵尸

original: Carnie Zombie loves the freedom of the open road and would never ever cheat you.
translation: 游乐园僵尸真的很喜欢开阔道路的自由感.

original: A hard and honest worker at a hard and earnest carnie.
translation: 一个费力而真诚的移动式游乐园中努力而正直的员工.
游乐园旗帜僵尸

original: Exciting banners promise fun new experiences for your brain!
translation: 那面令人激动的旗帜向你保证 - 我们一定会为你的脑子带来全新的趣味体验!

original: Carrying the flag comes with extra benefits and a uniform upgrade.
translation: 看起来只是多拿了面旗帜, 但你没注意到的是他的新制服和一些额外的好处.
僵尸鸡

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to freeze, stalling perfume and stun
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Hypno-shroom can hypnotize this without being eaten

{FLAVOR}Ba-qwack!
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冰冻, 失速和眩晕抗性低
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}魁惑菇不受伤就可以魁惑它们

{FLAVOR}嘶嘶-嗑-咦!

original: Once released onto the lawn chickens run full speed to peck at your brains.
translation: 一旦在草地上释放便全速前进以图啄食你的脑子.
牧鸡僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot release chickens while stunned, buttered or frozen\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler Zombie has finally solved the riddle of what came first.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}无法在眩晕, 黄油或者冰冻的情况下释放鸡群\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}鸡贼僵尸发布了第四篇鸟类学论文, 又呕心沥血研究了四年强子对撞机, 终于发现了让油炸鸡块起死回生的秘密.

original: Releases a flock of chickens once his baling wire is broken.
translation: 一但他的栓绳断掉, 就会放出一堆鸡.
埃及艳后僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}People expect Cleopatra to be a queen with sophisticated hobbies- like being a craft master, an omnious prophet or even a wine snob. Instead, we got a dance master with a penchant for cryptic hieroglyphs - talk about something subverting expectations.
translation: {FLAVOR}僵尸们期望埃及艳后是一位有着很多爱好的王后- 比如是一位工艺大师, 一位无所不知的预言家, 甚至是一位葡萄酒品酒师. 然而, 她只是一位喜欢神秘象形文字的舞蹈大师 - 真是颠覆了我们的期望.
召唤后备的太阳神僵尸.
路障小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}When the Imp first met a Conehead Zombie, he discovered himself another whole controversial mystery of the universe.
translation: {FLAVOR}当这只小鬼僵尸第一次遇见路障僵尸时, 他自己发现了另一个充满争议的宇宙之谜.

original: Is thrown past most of your defenses, then strides to your house.
translation: 被仍到你的防线后排, 然后大步走向你的房子.
牛仔僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cowboy Zombie thinks he's the roughest, toughest, meanest zombie varmint in the west, south and east. He's anxious to test his skills in the central coast region.
translation: {FLAVOR}牛仔僵尸觉得自己的坚忍, 强壮, 冷血无论是在西部, 南部还是东部都无人能及. 现在, 他已经迫不及待想去中部证明自己了.
普通的牛仔僵尸.
路障牛仔僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}The sheriff of these here parts. Please pull over the horse and pull out your driver's license, registration, and proof of brains.
translation: {FLAVOR}是这一带的治安官. 请把马靠边停, 拿出你的架马证, 注册资格证, 以及你的有脑证明.

original: His cowhide cone gives him thrice the toughness of a regular cowboy.
translation: 他的牛皮锥帽使他的防御力是普通牛仔僵尸的三倍.
铁桶牛仔僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}A five-time winner of the temporal chili cook-off. Those Egyptian zombies don't know their chili, but Cowboys love their beans. The more you eat, the more you brains.
translation: {FLAVOR}他曾五次获得辣椒烹饪大赛的冠军. 那些埃及僵尸虽然不知道他们的辣椒, 但牛仔僵尸喜欢他们的豆子. 吃得越多, 脑子越好.

original: His chili pot hat makes him greatly resistant to damage.
translation: 他的辣椒壶铁桶让他非常耐打.
矿车僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cart-Head Zombie could probably move a lot faster if he did a handstand and rolled, but he's not thinking that far ahead.
translation: {FLAVOR}矿车僵尸如果把头倒过来, 用矿车前进的话, 速度可能会快得多, 但他没有想到那一步.

original: Cart-head Zombie's cart-shaped chapeau provides extra-wheeled head protection.
translation: 矿车僵尸的矿车为他提供了额外的头部防御.
旗帜牛仔僵尸
{FLAVOR}孤独的领路者.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge dusty \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群尘土飞扬的僵尸即将来袭.
牛仔大动员僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Arrows point to the brain on Cowboy Rally's Flag, as if to say, \Hey, everyone, I would like to emphasize this image.\" It's canny design."
translation: {FLAVOR}瞧, 有两个箭头在指着它旗帜上的脑子, 仿佛是在说: \"嘿! 看到这个脑子了吗! 我在强调它哦!\" 这个设计很棒吧.

original: Cowboy Rally Zombie marks the appearance of a sizable stampede of zombies.
translation: 牛仔集结僵尸和他的旗帜象征着超大波的僵尸即将来袭.
西部巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with brand
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Bull Rider when damaged

{FLAVOR}Likes candy.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用烙铁砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出僵尸牛骑手

{FLAVOR}喜欢吃糖.
有品牌意识的巨大僵尸.
农民僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Someone shouted, \Bring out your undead!\" And then Peasant Zombie found himself here. He simply doesn't remember anything that happened before that."
translation: {FLAVOR}只听到了一句: \"亡灵, 接受召唤吧!\", 随后, 农民僵尸就发现自己来到了这个地方. 而在此前的所有记忆, 他怎么想也想不起来了.
普通的下层平民僵尸.
路障农夫僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Conehead Peasant is just happy to have a cone over his head. Times are tough, man. He knows a lot of zombies don't even have that.
translation: {FLAVOR}路障头农民僵尸脑袋上的路障让他觉得挺不错了. 现在的日子可不好过. 他知道很多僵尸都没有这个东西呢.

original: His stony turret cone makes him thrice as tough as normal peasants.
translation: 他的石制角楼使他的防御力是普通农民僵的三倍.
铁桶农夫僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}None of the other zombies seem to understand just how versatile Buckethead Peasant's choice of headwear is. Sure, his bucket makes for a great battle helmet. But just last night, he cooked a truly divine brain stew in it. And next time you see his band, check out what he's using for a kick drum.
translation: {FLAVOR}其他僵尸才不会明白他头上那个桶有多么万能. 首先, 它在战场上可以用作一个结实的头盔. 而就在昨晚, 它才刚刚被用来炖了一桶神圣的脑子. 对了, 下次铁桶农民僵尸开始演奏的时候, 注意一下他把什么当作鼓了.

original: His forged bucket provides great protection from damage.
translation: 他的锻制铁桶可以帮助他很好地抵御伤害.
骑士僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Knight Zombie was just as surprised as anyone when Zombie King promoted him. He'd never say this out loud, but he's not sure he deserves the position. He's not sure he has what it takes to wear the armor. But like they say, \Fake it 'til you make it.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}当僵尸王提拔他时, 僵尸骑士和其他人一样惊讶. 他从来不会大声说出来, 但他不确定自己是否配得上这个职位. 他不确定自己是否有能力穿上盔甲. 但就像他们说的, \"装模做样直到你成功吧.\"

original: His king appointed helm provides amazing protection from damage.
translation: 他那由国王授予的头盔保护他免于受到伤害.
黑暗旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}They keep telling Peasant Zombie that there is no greater reward than being granted the banner to carry into battle. But when he sees other Peasant Zombies being granted cones, buckets, and even helms, he thinks maybe they're making that up so they don't hurt his feelings.
translation: {FLAVOR}所有人都在告诉农民僵尸, 被国王授予一面旗帜带入战场是至高无上的恩赐. 但当他看到别的农民僵尸都拿到了路障, 铁桶, 甚至头盔的时候, 他觉得自己被骗了. 他们说这些话可能只是不想让他难过.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge dark \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群黑暗的僵尸将蜂拥而至.
黑暗时代巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with hammer
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Monk when damaged

{FLAVOR}When Dark Ages Gargantuar wants to find pantaloons that fit him, he has to shop at the \Enormous & Towering" store. He hates it though. It's embarrassing. He just wants to shop for clothes where all the other zombies shop."
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用锤子砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出小鬼僧侣僵尸

{FLAVOR}每当黑暗时代巨人僵尸想要找到一条合身的内裤时, 他都必须得去 "顶天立地" 服装店. 他不太喜欢这样, 因为这让他觉得自己很尴尬. 他唯一的愿望就是去正常僵尸的商店里买衣服.

original: Immense zombie who brings the hammer down.
translation: 挥舞着巨锤的巨型僵尸.
小鬼僧侣僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Frankly, Imp Monk Zombie decided to don the robes because of the sweet haircut that went with them.
translation: {FLAVOR}坦白地说, 小鬼僧侣僵尸决定穿上长袍的原因, 是因为它和他的发型搭配起来很可爱.

original: Summoned past most of your defenses, then shambles onward.
translation: 可以被召唤到防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
火龙小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Imp Zombie knows he's too old to wear a dragon costume like a kid on Halloween. But he doesn't care. Let the others judge. His spirit animal is a dragon, and he feels closer to his true self when he's dressed like this.
translation: {FLAVOR}小鬼僵尸知道自己已经长大了, 不应该再像个小孩子一样, 在万圣节穿着火龙装扮了. 但他并不在乎, 穿自己的衣, 让别人说去吧. 他的灵魂动物就是龙, 只有穿成这样, 他才会觉得离真实的自己又更进一步.

original: Claws forward like a normal zombie, but is immune to fire damage.
translation: 像普通僵尸一样前进, 但对火焰伤害免疫.
小丑僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}slows down while juggling\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone loves to laugh at Jester Zombie's clownish routines. But what no one knows is that he has a Master of Fine Arts from the Chewliard Performing Arts School. Heck, he's been on stage with some of the finest classical theatre companies this side of the lawn. But sometimes you just gotta go where the paycheck is.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}杂耍时减速\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}大家都喜欢嘲笑弄臣僵尸那小丑般的动作. 但是, 没人知道他是一位来自丘利亚德表演艺术学院的艺术硕士. 哎, 他曾一直和一些最优秀的古典戏剧公司在草坪的这一边演出. 但那地方可拿不到高薪.

original: Returns most projectiles that are shot at him.
translation: 扔回大多数攻击他的子弹.
国王僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}As Shakespeare once wrote, \Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown.\" And Zombie King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable."
translation: {FLAVOR}正如莎士比亚写的一样: \"戴着皇冠的人躺的地方可不会舒服.\" 僵尸国王完全同意. 戴着皇冠睡个好觉是非常困难的. 那玩意儿硌得他很不舒服.

original: Grants knight helms to nearby peasant zombies.
translation: 可以将周围的农民僵尸变成骑士僵尸.
巫师僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}All the zombies agree, Wizard Zombie's powers of transmutation are impressive. But what they don't get is ... why sheep? Everyone knows it would be more helpful if the Wizard used his powers to turn plants into, say, more zombies. But yeah, no one is going to say that to his face.
translation: {FLAVOR}所有僵尸都一致觉得, 巫师僵尸的变形能力令人印象深刻. 但他们唯一不理解是... 为什么要把那些植物变成羊? 有没有一种可能, 如果把那些植物变成更多僵尸, 会对僵尸更有帮助? 但没人敢当着他面告诉他.
将植物变作愚钝的绵羊.
侏罗纪僵尸

original: Jurassic Zombie is NOT primitive. See, he's wearing a tie and everything!
translation: 侏罗纪僵尸一点也不原始. 瞧, 他还打着领带什么的呢!

original: Regular beard-having zombie from the unimaginable past.
translation: 来自难以想象的过去的普通长胡子僵尸.
侏罗纪路障僵尸

original: Jurassic Conehead Zombie is trying to get the jump on the whole \traffic cone\" idea. He figures it'll be a HUGE market in about 150 million years."
translation: 侏罗纪路障僵尸正在试着大量售卖 \"交通路障\". 他觉得这在1.5亿年之后会成为一个巨大的市场.

original: Cones, or old leftover horns bundled together with string so that they look sort of like a cone, provide some middling protection.
translation: 路障, 或者说是用老旧的龙角捆在一起让这东西更像圆锥体的玩意儿, 能提供中等防御.
侏罗纪铁桶僵尸

original: The real question, the burning mystery, is: where did he find blue fur for his outfit?
translation: 世界未解之谜: 他在哪里找到的蓝色皮毛给他做装备的?

original: Crude drawings of buckets provide as much protection as the real thing.
translation: 没想到画工粗糙的铁桶画像能和真正的铁桶提供的防御一样多.
侏罗纪化石僵尸

original: Contrary to his name, Jurassic Fossilhead's fossil head isn't actually a fossil. That skull's maybe a week and a half old, tops.
translation: 侏罗纪化石头僵尸的脑袋上戴着的其实并不是什么化石. 那块骨头估计才放了一个多星期而已.

original: Fossil skulls not only provide a huge amount of damage absorption, but are also extremely classy.
translation: 化石头骨不仅可以承受大量伤害, 而且还很优雅美观.
琥珀僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}If you were to extract DNA from the Amberhead Zombie and combine it with the DNA of a frog, you'd probably be breaking the law at some point.
translation: {FLAVOR}如果你把琥珀僵尸的DNA提取出来和青蛙的DNA结合, 那多半会犯法.

original: Amberhead Zombie's head-engulfing ball of amber provides hardened protection.
translation: 琥珀僵尸的脑袋被一块琥珀包裹住, 使其可以承受大量伤害.
僵尸琥珀

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}the remnant will slowly reassemble itself for another attack
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to shrinking and poison
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot drop itself if ashed, zapped, blown up or devoured

{FLAVOR}It's so well preserved that he doesn't look a day older since 216,000,000 BC.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}残余物会慢慢地重新集结, 准备再次进攻
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫缩小和中毒
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}如果被烧死, 劈死, 炸死, 吃掉的话就不会掉落残余物

{FLAVOR}它保存得如此完好, 以至于自公元前2.16亿年以来, 他看起来一天也没有老化.

original: This animated statue deals less bite damage, but will drop its remnant onto tiles with no plants.
translation: 这个活化的雕像造成的啃咬伤害较小, 但会把它的残余物丢到没有植物的方格上.
侏罗纪野人僵尸

original: Jurassic Bully is slow, stupid, and smells bad. But hey, at least he's punctual.
translation: 侏罗纪野人僵尸又慢, 又笨, 身上又臭. 但是人不可貌相嘛, 至少他很守时.

original: A trudging, damage-resistant zombie who is immune to light knockbacks and deals slightly more bite damage.
translation: 一只步伐沉重, 可以抵挡伤害的僵尸. 免疫轻微击退, 还能造成更多的啃食伤害.
侏罗纪石击僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Somebody tied rocks to Jurassic Rockpuncher's hands. Being unable to remove them (because he had rocks tied to his hands), he was left with no choice but to roll with it.
translation: {FLAVOR}有人把石头绑在了侏罗纪石击僵尸的手上. 他其实也不情愿, 但是他自己弄不下来啊 (因为手上有石头), 于是就只好作罢了.

original: Jurassic Rockpuncher pummels plants with rocks tied to his hands.
translation: 侏罗纪石击僵尸可以用手上绑着的石头砸碎植物.
侏罗纪旗帜僵尸

original: He's not only got a flag, but he's also got a can-do attitude and a fierce hunger for success. Success and brains.
translation: 他不单单有一面旗子, 还有那旗子代表的一种力所能及的态度和对成功和脑子的强烈渴望.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge epochal \wave\" of highly anachronistic zombies."
translation: 标示着一群与时代相违的僵尸即将到来.
侏罗纪集结僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Where did Jurassic Rally Zombie get his fancy new flag? Nobody knows. It's a mystery. The police should look into it. Or maybe we could get a fund together and hire a detective. It's a real puzzle.
translation: {FLAVOR}侏罗纪集结僵尸的旗帜是从哪儿拿来的? 这是个千古谜题, 没有人知道. 警察应该来进行深入研究. 或者我们应该成立一个特别基金会, 然后雇一个侦探来寻找真相.

original: Jurassic Rally Zombie marks the arrival of large group of zombies.
translation: 侏罗纪集结僵尸和他的旗帜象征着超大波僵尸即将来袭.
侏罗纪巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with bone
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Jurassic Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to light knockbacks

{FLAVOR}Jurassic Gargantuar wonders how there can be zombies millions of years before the advent of humanity. He doesn't let it get in the way of his plant-bashing, though.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用骨头砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出侏罗纪小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫轻微击退

{FLAVOR}侏罗纪巨人僵尸一直在想, 明明还有几百万年人类才诞生, 怎么现在就有僵尸了? 但这并不妨碍他去砸碎植物.
中生代马拉基语的史前使用者.
侏罗纪小鬼

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can form a band together to quickly march towards your defense\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}This nasty little nipper can make a serious dent in your defenses if left to his own devious devices.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以组成一支部队一起迅速向你的防线进发\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}如果你任由他使用自己的诡计, 这个讨厌的小东西就会严重破坏你的防线.

original: A weaker, smaller, much more vicious version of the typical Jurassic zombie.
translation: 一个更弱, 更小, 但速度更快的侏罗纪僵尸.
迪斯科机3000

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, stalling perfume, stun and poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to all knockbacks and butter

{FLAVOR}After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却, 失速, 眩晕和中毒
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫所有击退和黄油

{FLAVOR}在解决了侧燃悬挂系统引发的一些问题之后, 迪斯科机3000仍是目前为止最为恐怖的毁灭舞步机器人.

original: Drops in disco Jetpack Zombies when dropping the beat.
translation: 播放音乐时会召唤迪斯科喷气背包僵尸.
木乃伊巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with sarcophagus
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Imp Mummy when damaged

{FLAVOR}True fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用石棺砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出小鬼木乃伊

{FLAVOR}冷知识#1: 木乃伊巨人僵尸其实是用来衬托金字塔有多大的, 虽然好像没啥用. 冷知识#2: 狮身人面像其实并没有失去鼻子, 那其实是... 巨人僵尸的.

original: Massive zombie from a royal line of mummies.
translation: 来自埃及王室的巨大木乃伊.
小鬼木乃伊僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and scratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.
translation: {FLAVOR}小鬼木乃伊僵尸喜欢在墓地周围闲逛, 跳上骨灰盒, 用指甲划棺材. 那刺耳的声音会令你永生难忘.

original: Thrown over most of your defenses, then slinks onward.
translation: 可以被甩到你的防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
霓虹僵尸

original: He's cutting down on his head-banging so as not to bang his head clean off.
translation: 他最近在尝试减少弹吉他时摇头的次数, 以免不小心把头摇掉下来.
普通的音乐爱好者僵尸.
8位僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}has reduced bite damage
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stun

{FLAVOR}Being made out of light and positional co-ordinates has no effect on this erzatz zombie's ravenous hunger for tangy brains.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}啃咬伤害较低
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫眩晕

{FLAVOR}虽然这只僵尸只是光线与位置坐标相调制的产物, 但这丝毫不影响他对脑子的贪婪欲望.

original: Pixelated zombie generated by super cool arcade machine. Comes in regular, cone and bucket flavors.
translation: 像素版僵尸是由街机游戏机创造出来的. 可能会出现普通僵尸, 路障僵尸, 和铁桶僵尸.
街机僵尸

original: When it's a choice between quarters for games and quarters for laundry, Arcade Zombie is prepared to make the ultimate stinky sacrifice.
translation: 该把多少钱花在洗衣店的游戏机上, 又该花多少钱去洗衣服? 街机僵尸已经准备好做出他的终极决策了.

original: Pushes an arcade cabinet that spits out 8-Bit Zombies.
translation: 推着一台可以产生8位僵尸的游戏机.
霓虹路障僵尸

original: Neon Conehead Zombie used to be a big believer in de-evolution, but then he forgot what it meant.
translation: 霓虹路障僵尸曾经是 \"退化学说\" 的忠实拥护者, 结果后来他连那是什么东西都忘了.

original: Cones provide protection and focus the sound of righteous tunes.
translation: 路障可以阻挡伤害, 还能汇聚正义曲调的声音.
霓虹铁桶僵尸

original: Neon Buckethead Zombie had to go all the way to the dump to find a headband he really liked.
translation: 霓虹铁桶僵尸大老远跑到垃圾场去找那个他真正喜欢的头带.

original: Buckets absorb damage because that's just what they do.
translation: 他头上的铁桶可以承受伤害, 因为... 它们本就该这样.
音响僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can be summoned on the lawn
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to freeze and stun
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}boom box has no effect on Spikeweeds, Spikerocks, Burple Blooms, Phat Beets and Electric Currants

{FLAVOR}Boombox Zombie doesn't want to buy, sell or process anything; he just really wants to consume your brains.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以在草坪上被召唤
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}易受冻结和眩晕
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}音响对地面植物, 魔音甜菜和电流醋栗无效

{FLAVOR}音响僵尸并不想买, 卖或者加工任何东西; 他只是真的很想吃了你的脑子.

original: Holds aloft a boom box that tranquilizes all plants with its heartfelt tunes.
translation: 他会高举收音机, 然后用它播放自己发自内心的曲调感染植物.
霹雳舞僵尸

original: Delivers only the freshest moves at bargain basement prices.
translation: 最新潮的舞步, 最划算的价格!

original: Kicks zombies forward when transported by the power of rap.
translation: 因饶舌乐之力起舞的时候, 可以把僵尸向前踢动.
霓虹旗帜僵尸

original: Fluorescent colors and little yellow plastic strips are the marks of a truly hip, groundbreaking new style of zombie wave flag.
translation: 荧光颜料和窄塑料带是真正时髦的标志, 是震惊四周的大波僵尸旗帜的新款式.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge mixtape-making \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标志着由混音带引起的一大波僵尸的来袭.
重金属巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with guitar
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}bashes sonic blast when metal music plays
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches Impunk when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to stalling perfume and stun

{FLAVOR}Hair Metal Gargantuar only knows one chord, but you'd better believe he'll play it all night and then some.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电吉他砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}当重金属音乐炒热场子时会击打出音波
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出小鬼朋克僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}易受失速或者眩晕影响

{FLAVOR}重金属巨人僵尸虽然只知道一个和弦, 但他还是会经常弹电吉他弹一整晚.
他所支配的力量是那节奏混乱的摇滚乐.
闪动僵尸

original: Glitter Zombie inspires zombies everywhere to boogie their brains out, whether it's just one moment or maybe forever, or at least until the lights come on and they're kicking everybody out.
translation: 闪动僵尸鼓励各处的僵尸把脑子都摇出来, 也不管还能不能找回来, 不过至少在灯光亮起之前, 他们都会乱作一团.

original: Trails glamorous rainbows that protect zombies behind her when she's feeling the beat.
translation: 在感受到节拍时, 拖出一道充满魅力的彩虹, 彩虹会保护她身后的僵尸.
朋克小鬼僵尸

original: Impunk's lyrics have been described as \banal,\" \"incoherent,\" and \"totally expressive of the Zompunk movement at its finest.\""
translation: 大家说朋克小鬼僵尸的歌词 \"平淡乏味\", \"语无伦次\". 并且 \"完全表达出了僵尸朋克运动的最佳状态\".

original: Tossed past most of your defenses, then rocks out to your detriment.
translation: 可以被抛到防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
说唱僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}shockwave does not affect ground and shadow plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}MC Zom-B doesn't want you to know it, but his fancy bling is really just gold-plated zinc he got from his grandma.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冲击波不影响地面和暗影植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}说唱僵尸并不想让你知道, 但他的漂亮小挂坠真的只是从他祖母那里得的镀金锌挂饰.

original: Spins microphone to create shockwaves that do area damage when he's dropping his sick, sick rhymes.
translation: 当他说唱起他的极度炫酷的韵律时, 旋转麦克风产生的冲击波会造成区域性伤害.
说唱僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}microphone does not affect ground and shadow plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Y'know, if I had a nickel for every time I had to write an entry for a duplicated zombie, I'd have two nickels, which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冲击波不影响地面和暗影植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}你知道吗, 如果我每次为重复的僵尸写一篇文章都有五分钱, 我就会有两个五分钱, 虽然不是很多, 但它发生了两次就很奇怪.

original: Spins his gold microphone to damage nearby plants when he's in his prime.
translation: 当他的主场开始时, 旋转他的金话筒以损害附近的植物.
朋克僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Magnet Shrooms pull off his head\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Punk Zombie's piercings represent his individuality and his belief in personal freedom, or maybe just that he fell face-first into a sewing machine.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}磁力菇可以吸走他的头\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}朋克僵尸的鼻子穿孔代表了他的个性以及他对个人自由的信仰... 额, 似乎仅仅是因为他有一次掉进了缝纫机里.

original: Moshes plants back a space when his jam is playing.
translation: 当他的主场开始时, 他就会将碰到的植物往左踢一格.
探险家僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cold attacks extinguish torch\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}His impressive friendly mutton chops have always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.
