translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冰冻伤害可以熄灭火把\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}了解他的人都知道, 他总是把他的食物存在背包里几个星期, 确保他在探险时能有足够的东西吃.

original: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants upon contact.
translation: 携带一个火把, 一接触就能立即摧毁你的植物.
火光僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}freezing attacks extinguish the torch (including Winter Melon and Cold Snapdragon)\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Torchlight Zombie has no fear of the dark. That's not because he's always got a torch, however, but rather because as a zombie he has no capacity for fear in the first place.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冻结伤害可以熄灭火把 (包括冰西瓜和冰龙草)\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}火光僵尸之所以不惧怕黑暗, 并不是因为他总是拿着火把, 而是因为作为一只僵尸, 他从一开始就没有害怕的能力.

original: Holds a bigger torch that immediately incinerates plants upon contact. His inner fire also prevents him from being chilled.
translation: 拿着一个更大的火把. 一接触到植物就立即焚烧. 还能防止他受寒.
橄榄球僵尸

original: Football Zombie is a third-round draft pick and shows a lot of promise, but come on, his salary demands are beyond ridiculous for someone who still doesn't know what football is. Ten million brains per year? For FIFTY YEARS?
translation: 橄榄球僵尸在第三轮选秀中脱颖而出, 展示出很大的潜力, 但拜托, 对于一个仍然不知道橄榄球是什么的人来说, 他的工资要求已经超出了荒谬的程度. 每年1000万脑子? 连续五十年?

original: A heavy-duty zombie who charges your defensive line.
translation: 一只可以冲破你防线的健硕僵尸.
机甲橄榄球僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, stalling perfume, stun and poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to light knockbacks, freeze and butter

{FLAVOR}Now past his prime, Mecha-Football Zombie is ready to be put back into the game. Until he gets some brains, concussions aren't a concern.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却, 失速, 眩晕和中毒有抗性
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对轻微击退, 冰冻和黄油免疫

{FLAVOR}尽管他的黄金时代已然过去, 机甲橄榄球僵尸时刻准备着回到比赛当中. 即便是脑震荡也无法阻碍他赢得一些脑子.

original: Pushes plants across the lawn instead of eating.
translation: 向前推进草地上的植物而不是啃食掉.
未来僵尸

original: Future zombies look good in red shirts. Future fact #23: Nothing bad happens to red shirts.
translation: 未来僵尸穿红色衣服还挺好看的. 未来趣闻#23: 穿红衣服是肯定不会遭遇不测的.
普通的未来连衣裤僵尸.
未来路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Has tried to calculate the volume of his mathematically perfect cone, but he always ends up dreaming about brain pi.
translation: {FLAVOR}他曾试图计算出自己头上那完美圆锥体的体积, 但最终还是沉迷在脑子π当中.

original: His poly-polymer cone gives him thrice the toughness of regular future zombie.
translation: 他的聚合物路障使他的防御力是普通未来僵尸的三倍.
未来铁桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Other zombies call him old-fashioned for being nostalgic for the year 2008.  It was a simpler time when brains were brains, zombies were zombies, and those punk plants kept to themselves.
translation: {FLAVOR}因为怀念2008年的那些日子, 其他僵尸都称他为老古董. 啊, 那个时候, 一切都是如此单纯, 脑子就是脑子, 僵尸就是僵尸, 而那些植物, 还是一如既往的植物.

original: His techno-bucket greatly increases his protection from damage.
translation: 他那富有科技感的铁桶让他非常耐打.
全息僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}The force field gets its unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
translation: {FLAVOR}他头上的力场从频率谐波和自由剂量的紫色涂料中得到其独特的紫色.

original: Holo Head Zombie's head-mounted force field provides hyper-protection.
translation: 全息僵尸脑袋上的力场为他提供了超乎寻常的保护.
未来旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Sometimes Future Flag Zombie regrets having to be at the bleeding edge of zombie wave advancement technology.
translation: {FLAVOR}未来旗帜僵尸经常因被迫处在促进僵群前进的风口浪尖而后悔.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge future-proof \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群掌握未来的僵尸即将来袭.
机器集结僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}If you look carefully, you'll notice that Robo-Rally Zombie's flag is a sophisticated piece of hovertech combined with a stick.
translation: {FLAVOR}如果你仔细观察, 你会发现机器集结僵尸的旗帜是空气悬浮器和一根棍子.

original: Robo-Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of an above-average number of zombies.
translation: 机器集结僵尸与其旗帜标示着一群多于平均数目的僵尸即将来袭.
精英巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with arms
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}randomly burns tiles with laser eyes
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}launches 2 Bug Bots when damaged
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, stalling perfume, stun and poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to all knockbacks and freeze

{FLAVOR}The imp pilots of the Gargantuar Prime series are handpicked by Dr. Zomboss himself. They are the imp elite.  The small, the mean, and the fearless! But mostly the ones who can drive a stick shift.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用自己的胳膊砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}激光眼随机扫射地面
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到一定伤害后扔出两个机械蛛虫
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却, 失速, 眩晕和中毒有抗性
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫所有击退和冰冻

{FLAVOR}精英巨人僵尸驾驶位上的小鬼僵尸是由僵王博士亲自挑选的. 他们是小鬼中的精英. 既小, 又卑鄙, 还无所畏惧! 但其实只是大多数僵尸都进不去驾驶室.

original: Has it all: heavy armor, laser eyes, smashing arms, and Bug Bot deployment system.
translation: 这个机器无所不能: 重型盔甲, 激光眼, 粉碎一切的手臂, 还有机械蛛虫部署系统. 样样精通.
机械蛛虫小鬼僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}He always wanted to \see the world,\" \"be his own boss,\" and \"meet and consume interesting brains.\" He still doesn't understand how he got stuck in this cramped Bug Bot job 24/7."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}他总是想 \"看看外面的世界\", \"做自己的老板\", \"拥有有趣的灵魂\". 但他至今仍不明白自己是怎么被困在这个拥挤不堪的机器蛛虫里7天24小时不停工作的.

original: Lands on the lawn past your defenses, then hops forward.
translation: 可以落到防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
喷射器僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chill and freeze\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}The Jetpack Zombie was an early adopter during the brain acquisition tech explosion of 2113. Little did he know he would be stuck with version 1.0 of the simple jetpack.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却和冰冻\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}喷射器僵尸是2113年 \"脑子获取技术大爆炸\" 期间的早期新技术采用者. 他一点也不知道他会被1.0版本的简单喷射背包卡住.

original: Float over all but the tallest plant barriers.
translation: 可以飞跃除高大植物外的其他植物.
迪斯科僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}A zombie who 'lives' for drama, he's an original cast member of the stage musical \Disco is BACK! For Revenge!\" His signature dance move is \"The Weed Whacker.\""
translation: {FLAVOR}一个为戏剧 \"活着\" 的僵尸, 他是原创舞台剧 \"迪斯科的回归! 为了复仇!\" 的其中一位演员, 他的招牌舞步是 \"一剪没\".

original: Floats over all but the tallest plant barriers, in style.
translation: 除了最高的植物障碍物外, 还能潇洒地飘过所有的植物障碍物.
喷气宇航僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chill and freeze\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Blastro's rocket-pack is strictly ornamental; his hovering ability comes from a deep meditative state and from being full of helium.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却和冻结\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}喷气宇航僵尸的火箭背包有过精密的装饰; 他翱翔的能力来源于深度的冥想与氦气.

original: Floats over ALL plants with his state-of-the-art jetpack.
translation: 用他最先进的喷气背包飞过所有的植物.
电磁盾僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to stalling perfume, stun and poison
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}can only create shields 9 times

{FLAVOR}Shield Zombie developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对失速, 眩晕和中毒有抗性
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}只能创造9次电磁盾

{FLAVOR}屏障僵尸利用 "啃咬创客" 活动的资金开发了他的系统. 但推动 "推动植物" 的目标没有实现.

original: Protect himself and nearby zombies from incoming attacks with a force field.
translation: 用电磁盾保护自己和附近的僵尸免受攻击.
偏向器僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}shield regenerates over time\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Deflector Zombie saw what Shield Zombie was doing and said to himself, \BRAAAAAAINS,\" because that's really the only word zombies know."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}屏障会缓慢恢复生命值\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}偏向器僵尸看了电磁盾僵尸的行为后, 对他说了一声 \"脑 - 子!\", 因为这是僵尸唯一会说的词.

original: Deflector Zombie protects himself with a powerful force field that stretches across 5 rows.
translation: 偏向器僵尸可以用一个延伸到五行的能量立场保护自己与其他僵尸.
超级巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with traffic sign
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Conehead Imp when hurt
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to all knockbacks

{FLAVOR}All the time spent on dumpster diving has finally paid off for him. Although he didn't find any brains, he did get a sweet new ride that still worked! Then he proceeded to rip it apart for an armor set anyway, because Zomboss already invented teleportation and who even drives anymore? Wait...
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用交通标志砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出路障小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫所有击退

{FLAVOR}他花在翻垃圾箱上的所有时间终于得到了回报. 虽然他没有找到任何脑子, 但他得到了一辆仍然可以工作的可爱的新车! 然后他还是把它拆开做了一套盔甲, 因为僵王博士已经发明了瞬移, 现在谁还开车呢? 等等...

original: This heavily-armored giant is about to unleash mayhem on your lawn.
translation: 这个全副武装的巨人即将在你的草坪上大开杀戒.
罗马凯撒僵尸

original: History records that Roman Caesar Zombie was a leader of impressive size and grandeur, looked up to by all his subjects.
translation: 据史料记载, 罗马凯撒僵尸是位身材高大, 威风凛凛的领袖, 深受所有臣民的敬仰.

original: Roman Caesar Zombie tosses imperial salad dressing onto plants, making them irresistibly delicious to zombies. He also promotes Roman Zombies, giving them stronger helmets.
translation: 罗马凯撒僵尸可以向植物投掷帝国沙拉, 让僵尸无法抗拒它们的美味. 他还能提拔罗马僵尸, 赐予他们更强大的头盔.
有氧运动僵尸

original: Cardio Zombie is all about health, healthiness and healthy lifestyles. He refuses to consume carbs, downing nothing but high-protein brains for every meal. In his opinion, other zombies really need to up their game. NO EXCUSES!
translation: 有氧运动僵尸只在乎健康, 锻炼, 还有绿色的生活方式. 他拒绝摄入任何碳水, 每顿饭只吃高蛋白的脑子. 他觉得其他僵尸真的需要多注意一下这种东西. 别找借口!

original: Advances to a set spot on the board, then tosses buffing brains at other zombies until he's chased away or retreats on his own.
translation: 可以前进到场地上的一个固定位置, 然后向其他僵尸抛出富含胆固醇的脑子, 直到他被打败或自己撤退为止.
Z机甲

original: Z-Mech is taking time out from his PvZ Heroes and PvZ Garden Warfare duties to bring his unique brand of destruction to Plants vs. Zombies 2. Don't worry, though; he's cleared it with his manager.
translation: Z机甲好像在植物大战僵尸: 英雄和植物大战僵尸: 花园战争的时空里玩腻了. 现在, 他想来植物大战僵尸2的世界看看. 不必担心, 他已经和他的经理沟通过了.

original: Deploys a set of summoning and teleportation technologies to harass, damage and otherwise imperil plants on the board.
translation: 利用召唤与传送技术来袭扰, 破坏或用其他方式危及场上植物.
幽冥渡渡鸟僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chill
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}flies over Primal plants and certain hazards such as seeds, sap, Gold Tiles and mines

{FLAVOR}She literally came from hell - if you count hell being a dark underground cave full of deadly icicles. Although she looks crazy and destructive, she is just as silly and fun-loving as other zombie animals - playing under the snow, talking with her zombie fellows (she only knows how to speak Dodo-ean though)... the list goes on. For some reason she is deeply afraid of elder plants - nobody knows why, though.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}会缓慢飞过原始植物和种子, 树脂, 黄金地砖和地雷之类的东西

{FLAVOR}她真的来自地狱 - 如果你把地狱算作充满致命冰柱的黑暗地下洞穴的话. 虽然她看起来疯狂且具有破坏性, 但她和其他僵尸动物一样愚蠢且爱玩 - 在雪下玩耍, 和她的僵尸同伴们聊天 (虽然她只会说渡渡语)... 这样的例子不胜枚举. 出于某种原因, 她非常害怕年长的植物 - 不过, 没人知道为什么.

original: The meanest dodo in the underground. Can't be detected by most plants unless she flies!
translation: 地底最卑鄙的渡渡鸟. 除非她飞起来, 否则大多数植物都不会发现她!
洞穴僵尸
洞穴路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cave Conehead Zombie was the first zombie to invent the cone. He lashed the horn of a mammoth to a slab of petrified wood ... and boom! A cone! The invention of the cone changed everything for the zombies. EVERYTHING.
translation: {FLAVOR}洞穴路障僵尸是世界上第一只发明路障的僵尸. 他把猛犸象的角和一块石化的木板绑了起来, 然后 \"砰\"! 一个路障就此诞生了. 路障的诞生标志着僵尸的崭新时代已然来临.

original: His mammoth horn cone makes him thrice as tough as normal cave-dwellers.
translation: 他的猛犸象角路障使他的防御力是普通的洞穴僵尸的三倍.
洞穴铁桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cave Buckethead Zombie likes rocks. He likes rocks A LOT. He strapped a rock to his head and called it a bucket. None of the other Cave Zombies know what a \bucket\" is, but they like his style."
translation: {FLAVOR}洞穴铁桶僵尸喜欢石头. 超级喜欢. 他把一块石头绑在头上, 把它叫作 \"铁桶\". 其他洞穴僵尸都不知道什么是 \"铁桶\", 但他们喜欢他的风格.

original: His stone \bucket\" hat provides great protection from damage."
translation: 他的石质 \"铁\" 桶可以帮助他很好地抵御伤害.
冰块僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}armor cannot be pierced by poison and certain instants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stun and gas effects

{FLAVOR}One day, a Cave Zombie fell head-first into a glacial stream. It had been a bad day already, so he lay there in the frigid water for a long time contemplating the insignificance of his life. When he finally stood up, he discovered that his head was encased in ice. At last, his life had meaning! He was unique! He was Blockhead Zombie! At least, that's his story and he's sticking to it.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}头盔能免疫毒和灰烬植物的穿甲伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫眩晕和气体效果

{FLAVOR}有一天, 一只洞穴僵尸掉进了一条冰河里. 这对于他来说是糟糕的一天, 他躺在冰冷的水中很长一段时间, 思考着他那毫无意义的生命. 而当他站起来时, 他发现自己的头被冰块包裹着. 至少他的生命终于有意义了! 他成为了独一无二的冰块头僵尸! 至少他自己是这么说的.

original: The ice block on his head provides decent protection from damage.
translation: 他的头上的冰块可以帮助他很好地抵御伤害.

original: {FLAVOR}Cave Zombie was busy painting handprints on cave walls when he was told to start fighting plants. He's not sure why he's fighting plants, but he hopes he can get back to painting soon. He was feeling inspired. He had plans for some big pieces. Art school was finally paying off.
translation: {FLAVOR}洞穴僵尸正忙着在他的洞穴墙壁上画手印, 在这时, 僵尸和植物的战争爆发了. 他虽然不知道为什么要和植物战斗, 但他希望能尽快来完成他的艺术作品. 想到这些, 他备受鼓舞. 他有一些宏大的计划. 因为一家艺术学校终于决定收他为徒了.
普通的穴居僵尸.
渡渡鸟小鬼僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to stalling perfume\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Dodo Rider believes dodos are the future of transportation. He believes a public dodo-riding system is not only a wise expenditure of tax dollars but would help the vast majority of zombies get where they need to go more efficiently. Everyone keeps telling him there's no future in dodos, but he refuses to listen.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对失速有抗性\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}渡渡鸟骑手坚信渡渡鸟是未来的交通工具. 他相信, 搭建一个公共渡渡鸟骑乘系统是一种对纳税开支的明智手法, 有助于绝大多数僵尸快速到达他们想到的地方. 所有人一直在告诉他渡渡鸟没有未来, 但他就是不听.

original: Dodo bird with an imp rider. The dodo can flap and jump over barricades as well as troublesome plants.
translation: 渡渡鸟僵尸有着一只小鬼作为骑手, 渡渡鸟可以飞越障碍物与棘手的植物.
洞穴旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cave Flag Zombie has been in the flag-carrying business for a long time. It's been his life's work. He's good at it. But sometimes, just sometimes, he longs for a change. He wonders if he could be good at something else. He wonders if he could leave it all behind and start fresh. He's pretty sure he's having a mid-life crisis.
translation: {FLAVOR}洞穴旗帜僵尸做扛旗工作很久了, 已经成为了他一生的事业. 他擅长这工作, 但有时候 (真的是有时) 期望改变. 他希望可以擅长其他的, 希望可以把所有都抛开, 开始休息. 他十分确定他正在经历中年危机.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge frosty \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群冷若冰霜的僵尸即将随风而至.
树懒巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with icicle
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}fires off 3 Yeti Imps when damaged

{FLAVOR}Somewhere along the line, Sloth Gargantuar contracted a bad case of Yeti Imps. He used soap, medicinal powders, and a salve made from sloth slobber in an attempt to get rid of them ... to no avail. But the truth is, he's grown used to their presence. The darn things are itchy. They're always squabbling. They nag him endlessly. But at this point, he'd probably miss them if they ever cleared up.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用冰柱砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出3个雪人小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}某时某地, 地懒巨人僵尸被一群雪人小鬼缠住了. 他试过用肥皂, 药粉, 甚至是树懒口水制成的药膏, 但结果都无济于事 - 他没有办法摆脱他们. 不过现在他已经习惯了. 虽然那些小鬼经常弄得他痒痒的, 而且还从早到黑都在不停地吵架, 有时候甚至还在他的背后说三道四, 但如果有一天他们真的不见了, 他估计会很想他们吧.

original: Massive sloth skinned zombie with a case of the imps.
translation: 肩负数只小鬼并身着巨大树懒皮的僵尸.
猎人僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Shhhhh ... Hunter Zombie didn't actually kill that sabertooth tiger. He found the skin at a thrift store. Also, he's a vegetarian. Tell no one.
translation: {FLAVOR}嘘 ... 猎人僵尸其实并没有杀死过剑齿虎. 他只是在一个旧货店里发现了这身虎皮. 另外, 他是一个素食主义者. 别告诉任何人.

original: Zombie that can throw snow balls at range to cool down plants until they freeze into blocks.
translation: 朝临近植物投掷雪球的僵尸, 该行为持续至植物冻结为止.
雪人小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Yeti Imp recently took up knitting. He started with a scarf, moved on to mittens and eventually knitted an entire bodysuit out of hair he shaved off of Yeti Zombie. He just loves knitting. When those needles are in his hands, he feels a sense of calm he's never felt before.
translation: {FLAVOR}雪人小鬼僵尸最近开始学习编织. 他从一条围巾开始, 然后是手套, 最后甚至用雪人僵尸的毛发做了一整件的紧身衣. 他喜欢编织, 当针在他手中时, 他能感到一种从未有过的平静感.

original: Thrown over most of your defenses, then ambles onward.
translation: 可以被甩到你的防线后排, 然后缓缓前进.
穴居僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Troglobite has been pushing ice blocks across the tundra day in and day out for as long as he can remember. It's cold and exhausting work, and frankly, he's ready for a vacation. He'd like to go somewhere sunny and warm for a change. He'd like to relax in the sand. He hears Big Wave Beach is nice this time of year.
translation: {FLAVOR}穴居僵尸从他能记事起, 就在日复一日地把冰块推过冻土. 这是份又冷又累的活. 说真的, 他想度个假. 他想在一个晴朗又温暖的地方换换口味. 他喜欢在沙子中放松. 他还听说每年这个时候的巨浪海滩就是个不错的选择.

original: Strong zombie that can push blocks of ice across the lawn.
translation: 体魄强健的僵尸, 能推动场上的冰块并向前行进.
冰鼬
囤鼬僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot release weasels while stunned or buttered\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song \Pop! Goes the Weasel.\" And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know that Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}无法在眩晕或者黄油状态下释放雪鼬\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}囤鼬僵尸一直在声明 \"砰! 冰鼬出来了.\" 这首歌是她写的. 千百年来, 她一直在申请自己的版权费, 但是没有僵尸理她. 他们知道囤鼬僵尸不可能会写歌, 更不可能写出一首朗朗上口的歌, 一首关于抱得太紧而发出的声音的歌.

original: Zombie hiding in a log with a pack of snow weasels. Weasels are released when her log is shattered.
translation: 躲在木头里的僵尸和一群雪鼬. 当她的木头被打碎时, 冰鼬将被释放.

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to stun
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Hypno-shroom can hypnotize this without being eaten

{FLAVOR}Skweek-ka-REE!
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}易眩晕
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}魁惑菇不受伤就可以魁惑它们

{FLAVOR}嘶嘶-嗑-咦!

original: Once released, weasels run full speed even over ice floes to nibble your brains.
translation: 一旦释放, 冰鼬就会全速前进, 越过浮冰去吃掉你的脑子.
小鬼梨小鬼僵尸

original: They carry no memory of the zombie they'd been before.
translation: 他们没有一点变成小鬼之前的记忆.

original: Zombies converted into Imps by Imp Pear become Imp Pear Imps.
translation: 由小鬼梨转化而成的小鬼被称作 \"小鬼梨小鬼\".
在关卡内替换 {ZOMBIE} 只僵尸!
冒险者僵尸
路障冒险者僵尸

original: No one ever presumes that he's Dr. Unlivingstone. Just once, though, he wishes that someone would.
translation: 从来没有人设想过他是死利文斯通博士. 他多希望有人会这样想啊, 哪怕只有一次.

original: His expedition cone makes him thrice as tough as normal adventurers.
translation: 他用来考察的路障使他的防御力是普通冒险僵尸的三倍.
铁桶冒险者僵尸

original: Buckethead Adventurer's greatest discovery was that one morning, without warning or reason, there was a bucket on his head.
translation: 铁桶冒险者僵尸最大的发现是, 一顶铁桶于某日清晨毫无征兆地出现在了他的头顶处.

original: His rugged bucket provides considerable protection from damage.
translation: 他那结实的铁桶提供了使他免于受伤的可靠保护.
飞虫僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}will not release zombie if defeated by Bonk Choy or Spore-shroom
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}will not release zombie if dealt a very high amount of damage in one hit

{FLAVOR}Bug Zombie and Bug make a great team, partly because Bug gives Bug Zombie great mobility, but mostly because they share an intense disinterest in horses.
translation:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}如果被拳击白菜或者是孢子菇击杀则不会释放僵尸
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}如果在一次攻击中造成非常高的伤害, 则不会释放僵尸.

{FLAVOR}飞虫僵尸和他们的昆虫是一组很棒的团队. 一方面昆虫能给予飞虫僵尸很快的速度, 但更多的原因是飞虫僵尸答应以后带它们去看它们感兴趣的马.

original: Bug carries zombie in over ground defenses and lifts him over barriers.
translation: 昆虫可以带僵尸越过你的防线和较矮的屏障.
碧骷髅僵尸

original: Unlike the more famous crystal skulls, turquoise skulls are totally non-mysterious and common as dirt.
translation: 与更著名的水晶头骨不同, 碧绿的骷髅完全不神秘, 而且就和泥土一样常见.

original: Uses skull to steal sun, then unleashes energy in a destructive beam.
translation: 使用手中的头骨窃取阳光, 然后释放带有破坏性的能量光束.

original: Adventurer Zombie just went looking for a jolly good show, and somehow ended up in the Lost City. \Hmm. Yes. Quite.\" is all that he would say on the matter."
translation: 冒险家僵尸试图寻找一个令僵愉快的好节目, 并以某种方式离开失落之城. \"嗯, 没错. 差不多.\" 他的节目表演完了.
普通的机灵胡须僵尸.
铲子僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}blocks straight projectiles
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}bashes Tall-nuts instead

{FLAVOR}Excavator Zombie once heard a song about having a hammer. He liked the idea, but decided it was too mainstream for him - so he got a shovel. Now he's confident that he's clearly the coolest zombie, the others are just too jealous to admit it.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}完全阻挡正向的子弹
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}会铲击高坚果

{FLAVOR}铲子僵尸曾经听过一首关于锤子的歌. 他很喜欢这个创意, 但是对于他来说又有点过于主流了 - 所以他带了个铲子. 现在他很自信自己明显是最酷的僵尸, 其他僵尸就是太妒忌而不愿承认而已.

original: Digs up plants and throws them behind him.
translation: 挖出植物扔在身后.
失落旗帜僵尸

original: Flag Adventurer Zombie is always shouting \Tally ho!\" as he leads the charge. At least, he's shouting it in his head."
translation: 旗帜探险家僵尸带队的时候总是带队喊号子. 至少, 他已经习惯这样了.

original: Marks the arrival of an intrepid \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标志着一大波失落僵尸的到来.
脚夫巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with big extinguished torch
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Lost City Imp when damaged

{FLAVOR}Porter Gargantuar dreams of the discovery that will make him powerful and influential. Maybe then the Imps will be the one carrying him around. It's always nice to have dreams.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用熄灭的火把砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出失落小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}失落巨人僵尸的梦想是在探寻之旅中变得强大和有影响力. 可能这是为什么小鬼僵尸总是能牵着他到处跑. 有梦想总归是好的.
狂热探索的大型僵尸.
失落小鬼僵尸
脚夫小鬼僵尸

original: Imp Porter is stronger than he looks. He's also more charming, smarter and has a better education.
translation: 背包小鬼僵尸其貌不扬但是实力杠杠的. 而且他更有魅力, 聪明, 受过良好的教育.

original: Drops pack on Gold Tile; pack becomes tent from which zombies emerge.
translation: 在黄金地砖上搭建帐篷, 帐篷中会源源不断出现僵尸.

original: {FLAVOR}Nepotism got Lost City Imp where he is. He's Bug Zombie's second cousin thrice removed, but he parlayed that connection into a sweet gig getting carried around in a little box.
translation: {FLAVOR}裙带关系使得失落小鬼僵尸得以存在. 他是昆虫僵尸隔了三辈的二表弟, 但是他成功地利用这种关系而进入甜美演出团, 从而乘着一个小箱子到处游走.

original: Gets tossed past most defenses, then explores on foot.
translation: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后寸步前进.
阳伞僵尸

original: Wealthy beyond reason, the Parasol Zombie lived a life of luxury - when what she craved was a life of adventure. She funded the expedition to the Lost City and set out to see its wonders for herself, never forgetting to bring her trusty parasol. \In case it rains,\" she explained - but it only came out sounding like \"Brains.\""
translation: 天气根本不是原因, 当她所打造的是冒险生活的一种时, 失落洋伞僵尸是为了奢华的生活品质而活着的. 她资助了失落城市探险队并且出发去察看探险的结果, 从不会忘记带着她的爱物 - 遮阳伞. \"带伞是以防遇到下雨,\" 她曾这样解释 - 但是 \"下雨\" 听起来只会像是在说 \"美味的脑子\".

original: Parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.
translation: 阳伞完全阻挡抛投的子弹.
飞行员僵尸

original: He faked his pilot's license and figured nobody would notice. But they did.
translation: 他伪造了自己的飞行员执照, 以为没人会发现. 但他们发现了.
可以从防线后方降落.
哑剧演员僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can eat further forward and backward, but deals less bite damage
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}will deal heavy damage to the leftmost plant after 30 seconds if he's not eating
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}susceptible to butter

{FLAVOR}Mime Zombie hates being stuffed into a box. If you ever see him stuck in one he will fervently express his distaste in the most clear and concise way possible: angrily waving his hands around. We presume so, because he didn't say anything.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以啃食前后一格的植物, 但啃食伤害只有一般僵尸的30%
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}如果进场后30s内没有啃食, 对最后方的植物造成1000伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫毒素效果
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}黄油对他的效果更强

{FLAVOR}哑剧演员僵尸讨厌被塞进盒子里. 如果你看到他陷入困境, 他会用最清晰, 最简洁的方式热情地表达自己的厌恶: 愤怒地挥舞双手. 我们这么猜测, 因为他什么都没说.

original: This mime has several tricks up his sleeves.
translation: 这个哑剧演员僵尸有很多花招.
遗物猎人僵尸

original: Relic Hunter has hunted some pretty impressive relics in his day. Idols, antiques, curios... he's hunted 'em all.
translation: 遗迹猎人在他的时代, 的确曾探寻到相当厉害的遗迹. 玩偶, 古董, 古玩... 他真的是无所不猎.

original: Swings in past defenses, then quickly shuffles forward.
translation: 荡过部分防御, 然后快速前进.
失落路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Given the rarity of traffic in the jungle, it's a mystery how Conehead Adventurer managed to acquire his headgear. Maybe he ordered it online?
translation: {FLAVOR}鉴于丛林中交通的稀缺性, 路障冒险家如何设法获得他的头饰是一个谜. 也许他是在网上订购的?

original: His makeshift cone gives him twice the toughness of a normal explorer zombie.
translation: 他的临时路障使他的韧性是普通探险家僵尸的两倍.
铁桶冒险者僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Armed with his sturdy kettle and even sturdier moustache, Kettlehead Adventurer is ready to ruin your day and possibly make a stew.
translation: {FLAVOR}铁桶冒险者带着他结实的水壶和更结实的胡子, 准备毁掉你的一天, 并有可能做一锅汤.

original: His kettle-bucket gives him great resistance to damage.
translation: 他的水壶给他带来极大的抗伤害能力.
冒险者僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Adventurer Zombie was certain he was the first to rediscover the Lost City. He was less certain after he ran into another 50 Adventurer Zombies at the gift shop.
translation: {FLAVOR}冒险家僵尸确信他是第一个重新发现失落之城的人. 当他在礼品店碰到另外50个冒险家僵尸后, 他就不那么肯定了.
普通的冒险者僵尸.
脚夫巨人僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Lost City Imp when damaged\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Porter Gargantuar actually provided the bulk of the funding for the expedition. And most of the bulk all around, come to think of it.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出失落小鬼僵尸\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}脚夫巨人僵尸实际上为这次远征提供了大部分资金. 仔细想想, 大部分的资金都来自于此.
狂热探索的大型僵尸.
阳伞僵尸

original: Parasol Zombie desperately wants to get to the opera before the curtain rises. She's not going to make it, though, because it's thousands of miles away on another continent.
translation: 阳伞僵尸拼命想在大幕拉开前赶到歌剧现场. 但她不可能成功, 因为她在另一个大陆上的数千英里之外.

original: Parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.
translation: 阳伞完全阻挡抛投的子弹.
机甲路障僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, stalling perfume, stun and poison
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to light knockbacks, freeze and butter

{FLAVOR}Zombie engineers considered the orange cone the height of zombie protective technology. It wasn't until they perfected the design for the Robo-Cone that someone remembered the bucket.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却, 失速, 眩晕和中毒有抗性
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫轻微击退, 冰冻和黄油

{FLAVOR}僵尸工程师认为橙色路障的造型可以给予僵尸完美的防御. 于是经过完美的设计和严谨的制造, 成品展现在大家的面前. 这时, 有人想起了铁桶.

original: The armor-plated cone offers phenomenal protection for its pilot.
translation: 路障装甲为驾驶员提供超级高的保护.
气球僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stalling perfume, stun and butter\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Balloon Zombie has no idea where the balloon came from, but he's going with it and he's open to seeing where it takes him.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对失速, 眩晕和黄油免疫\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}气球僵尸不知道气球是哪里来的, 不过他会跟着那气球. 他很乐意看看气球会把他带到哪里.

original: Balloon makes zombie stay high up in the air, helping him get over most barriers and ground defenses.
translation: 气球允许僵尸在停留在空中, 并越过大部分障碍和地面防御.
读报僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to chill\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}You can't really blame him for getting so upset; he was THIS close to finishing the crossword (23 down was \Brains.\")"
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冷却\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}你真不能怪他那么沮丧, 他就差那么一点点就能完成那个填字游戏了 (23号纵行是 \"Brains\".)

original: Newspaper protects zombie, who is then enraged when it is destroyed.
translation: 报纸为僵尸提供保护, 破碎后僵尸会暴怒.
燧石小鬼僵尸

original: Flint Imp (not his name though) was the first one to get into fashion, and has two left feet - but that's another story. On the other day, he was looking for some decoration for his dress and found some shiny rocks. By curiosity, he tied those to the dress and somehow wrapped his hand around a bunch of straws too. Who knew it would be the perfect ingredients for a failure fashion disaster?
translation: 燧石小鬼 (尽管这不是他的名字) 是第一个进入时尚界的人, 并且有两只左脚 - 但这是另一码事了. 有一天, 他在为自己的衣服找装饰, 发现了一些闪闪发光的石头. 出于好奇, 他把这些衣服绑在衣服上, 不知怎么的, 他还用手包住了一束麦秆. 谁能想到这会是失败时尚灾难的完美要素?

original: A stylish imp with a highly flammable clothing - only triggered on his own.
translation: 一个穿着高度易燃服装的新潮小鬼 - 只会自燃.
木乃伊僵尸
路障木乃伊僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Conehead Mummy Zombie prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy Zombie always stays ahead of fashion.
translation: {FLAVOR}路障头木乃伊僵尸更喜欢圆锥形而非金字塔形. 这在当时可时尚了, 他总是喜欢走在时尚最前线.

original: His cobra cone headdress makes him thrice as tough as normal mummies.
translation: 他的眼镜蛇路障使他的防御力是普通木乃伊僵尸的三倍.
铁桶木乃伊僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Mummy Zombie graduated Magna Zom Louder from Zombie Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.
translation: {FLAVOR}铁桶木乃伊僵尸毕业于僵尸学院. 在那儿他学会了用横膈膜呻吟.

original: His sandy bucket greatly protects him from damage.
translation: 他的沙漠铁桶保护他免受外界伤害.
金字塔僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Pyramid-Head Zombie isn't aware that his pyramid is pyramid-shaped. He's a little slow in that respect.
translation: {FLAVOR}金字塔僵尸的反应有些迟钝, 就比如他不知道他的金字塔是金字塔形状的.

original: His pyramid-shaped headgear provides triangular noggin protection.
translation: 他的金字塔形状头饰提供了如三角形般稳定性的防御.

original: {FLAVOR}Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!
translation: {FLAVOR}他是木乃伊还是僵尸? 答案是: 他是只裹着厕纸的僵尸. 他之所以要这样是因为他想保护他那白皙的皮肤. 真相果然只有一个!
普通的木乃伊僵尸.
旗帜木乃伊僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Egyptian Flag Zombie is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.
translation: {FLAVOR}埃及旗帜僵尸虽然落后, 但是他永远认为自己是第一名. 很明显, 他住在尼罗河畔.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge sandy \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群僵尸即将随黄沙而来.
埃及大动员僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Sometimes, a regular Flag Mummy Zombie simply isn't enough to inspire the desired amount of terror and disgust. In these instances, upgrading to the Egypt Rally Zombie isn't the sensible choice, it's the only choice.
translation: {FLAVOR}有时候, 一个普通的埃及旗帜僵尸根本不足以激起人们的恐惧和厌恶. 在这些情况下, 升级为埃及大动员僵尸不是一个明智的选择, 而是唯一的选择.

original: He celebrates with increased vigor and truculence the arrival of a new wave of bandaged baddies.
translation: 他以更大的活力和好斗来庆祝新一波缠着绷带的坏蛋的到来.
周刊僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Sunday Edition Zombie REALLY loves the comics section, which is why his rage is so all-consuming when it is torn to tatters before he's finished reading it.
translation: {FLAVOR}周刊报纸僵尸真的很喜欢里面的漫画部分. 怪不得在他还没读完的时候给他打破他会那么生气.

original: The newspaper protects zombie, who becomes enraged when it is destroyed.
translation: 报纸为僵尸提供保护, 报纸破碎后僵尸会暴怒.
暗影僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to poison\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Side effects of the tablet include: Can't touch brainz, can't take a shower (not that he needs one) and hallucinating his distant cousins from Ancient Egypt. Man, this is one hell of a strong tablet he stole from Wizard Zombie.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫中毒\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}这种盾牌的副作用包括: 碰不到脑子, 不能洗澡 (并不是说他需要) 并产生了来自古埃及的远房表亲的幻觉. 老天, 这是他从巫师僵尸那里偷来的强力盾牌啊.

original: His magical tablet provides protection as well as magic that helps him avoid eating plants.
translation: 他的魔法平板在提供保护的同时帮助他避免吃植物.
鹈鹕僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to butter\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}The Pelican Zombie upgraded from the Seagull Zombie and has no regrets. No egrets, either. Just a pelican.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫黄油\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}鹈鹕僵尸是海鸥僵尸的升级版, 毕竟乌鹊南飞, 虽然没有乌鹊, 因为它就是个鹈鹕.

original: Pelican Zombie dashes over water without a plank and floats over low plants like Potato Mines and Iceberg Lettuces.
translation: 鹈鹕僵尸可以在没有木板的情况下冲过水面, 漂浮在低矮的植物上, 如土豆地雷和冰冻生菜.
法老僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}armor cannot be pierced by poison and certain instants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}moves like a hungry zombie once free
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill, freeze, stalling perfume and butter

{FLAVOR}The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}石棺免疫毒和灰烬植物的穿甲伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}石棺被打破后会如饥饿的僵尸般行动
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却, 冰冻, 失速和黄油有抗性.

{FLAVOR}在罗特国王的第二个堂兄被撤职后, 他凭借 "消失的石棺法案" 取得了权力. 但在一次出行中, 他不幸被山羊撞下悬崖, 早早地结束了自己年轻的生命. 他的所有故事都记录在他的石棺后面, 但似乎没有任何人能看到.

original: His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie.
translation: 他的石棺给予了他超高的防御, 却大幅限制了他的速度.
钢琴僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to stalling perfume
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to freeze

{FLAVOR}Pianist Zombie only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对失速有抗性
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}钢琴僵尸只会两首歌, 而且这两首都是哼哼地呻吟.

original: His rolling piano crushes plants while his music causes dancing Cowboy zombies to switch lanes.
translation: 他的滚动钢琴压碎了植物. 而他的音乐则使跳舞的牛仔僵尸变换位置.
海盗僵尸
路障海盗僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Conehead Pirate is a simple zombie. When asked what his favorite dish is, he'd think for a moment, straighten his ascot, and say, \Rrurrarrbrains.\" Perhaps he could borrow a cup, neighbor?"
translation: {FLAVOR}路障海盗只是一只平凡的僵尸. 当你问他最喜欢的菜是什么时, 他会想很长一段时间, 然后整理一下他的领带, 然后说: \"脑 - 浆.\" 邻居, 他能从你这里借一杯吗?

original: His Jolly Roger cone makes him thrice as tough as normal pirates.
translation: 他的骨头路障使他的防御力是普通海盗僵尸的三倍.
铁桶海盗僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Pirate Zombie is looking for his bucket. Have you seen it? It's where? Up where? Speak up, he can't hear you.
translation: {FLAVOR}铁桶头海盗僵尸正在寻找他的桶. 你看见过他的桶吗? 在哪儿? 大声点儿, 他听不到.

original: His sturdy wooden bucket provides excellent protection from damage.
translation: 他结实的木桶可以帮助他很好地抵御伤害.
弹头僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Cannonhead Zombie tried to relive his childhood life once again, but he was too old to fit inside a cannon and shoot himself over the sea. Merely wanting to know the feeling, he's been sticking with it for too long, and now he can't really take it off anymore... At least, that's his headcannon when he talks about himself anyway.
translation: {FLAVOR}弹头僵尸试图再一次重温他的童年生活, 但他年纪太大了, 无法钻进大炮向海上射自己了. 只是为了重温那种感觉, 他已经被卡在里面太久了, 现在他真的脱不下来了... 至少, 那就是他刚刚提到的炮弹.

original: Cannonhead Zombie's cannon-like headwear provides augmented protection.
translation: 弹头僵尸的像炮弹一样的头盔提供了增强的保护.
酒桶僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}barrel can withstand Cherry Bombs and other instants (except Jalapeno)
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}zombie beneath can wear an additional armor
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can attack some underground and hidden plants

{FLAVOR}Don't ask how a Barrelhead is invulnerable against every known status effect (they drank the whole container in one go).
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}桶可以承受一次樱桃炸弹或其他灰烬植物的伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}里面的僵尸可能携带了额外的头盔
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以攻击到一些地面和隐藏的植物

{FLAVOR}不要问一个酒桶僵尸是如何无惧于任何已知的状态影响的 (他们一口气喝光了整桶酒).

original: The barrel provides great protection as well as immunity against all status effects, but drastically reduces bite damage.
translation: 木桶提供了巨大的保护以及对所有状态效果的免疫力, 但大大降低了啃咬的伤害.
海盗滚桶

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Jalapeno can destroy both the Imps and the barrel\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}What could it be? Could it be gold? Or some sort of other kind of treasure? Who knows!
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}火爆辣椒可以同时摧毁木桶和小鬼僵尸\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}里面有什么呢? 金子? 或者某种宝藏? 谁知道呢!

original: Contains Imp Pirate Zombies that launch out when destroyed.
translation: 被破坏后会蹦出海盗小鬼僵尸.
海盗船长僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Pirate Captain Zombie isn't actually a captain. His dry cleaning got mixed up with someone else's, but he thought he looked cool with an eye patch.  Plus, the parrot already knew his name, so he just went with it.
translation: {FLAVOR}海盗船长僵尸并不是个真正的船长. 他干洗的衣帽和别人弄混了, 但他觉得戴着眼罩看起来很酷. 此外, 这个鹦鹉也认识他, 所以就跟着他走了.

original: His parrot pet can fly away with your stolen plant and then return to him.
translation: 他的鹦鹉宠物可以带着偷你的植物飞走, 然后回到他身边.
僵尸鹦鹉

original: {KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}cannot grab most ground plants, rooted plants or burning plants\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}He's a third generation aviation revolutionary. He wants to serve his pirate brethren like his father and his grandmother, Salty Anne, before him.
translation: {KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}不能抓取大多数地面植物, 生根植物或燃烧植物\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}他是第三代飞行革命家. 他想要服侍他的海盗同胞, 就像他的父亲和祖母 \"咸安妮女王\" 一样.

original: Quickly flies from the Captain to carry away a plant from any lane.
translation: 来自船长僵尸的小鸟儿, 每次能偷走任意一行植物.

original: {FLAVOR}Keeping up with the latest pirate trends is always tricky, but remember, he was planking before it was cool.
translation: {FLAVOR}跟进最新的海盗趋势总是很棘手, 不过记住, 他早在趋势炫起来之前就趴着了.
甲板上普通的僵尸.
旗帜海盗僵尸
{FLAVOR}不需要过多介绍的僵尸.

original: Marks the arrival of a huge salty \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 标示着一群僵尸即将随着咸潮上溯而来袭.
海盗旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Jolly Roger Zombie and his flag are fused together into a single brain-munching unit. Their teamwork is an inspiration to ghouls everywhere.
translation: {FLAVOR}海盗旗帜僵尸和他的旗帜可以完全融合成食脑军团. 那旗子可以鼓舞各地的僵尸.

original: Jolly Roger Zombie marks the arrival of lots and lots of zombies.
translation: 海盗旗僵尸标示着非常非常多的僵尸即将来袭.
海盗巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with shark
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}fires off Pirate Imp when damaged

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar Pirate likes short walks off the plank, moonlit raiding parties, and the smell of cannon fire. A true romantic.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用鲨鱼砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在受到一定伤害后扔出海盗小鬼

{FLAVOR}海盗巨人僵尸喜欢在甲板上散一小会儿步, 喜欢看月光之下的突击队, 喜欢闻闻炮火的气味. 真是一个浪漫主义者.

original: Enormous zombie who redefines the shark attack.
translation: 这只巨大的僵尸使用鲨鱼进行攻击.
海盗小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}He was a bootblack, with a side trade as a pickpocket on the streets of London, but all he stole were oversized footwear. \Time to steal some booty!\" was his catchphrase."
translation: {FLAVOR}他是一个擦皮鞋的, 兼职伦敦街扒手, 但是他偷的都是大号的鞋子. 他的口头禅是 \"是时候偷些战利鞋了!\".

original: Prefers the compact space of barrels, both cannon and rolling.
translation: 喜欢呆在紧凑的空间内, 比如炮管和滚桶.
斗篷僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}There are three things that he hates the most. One, losing his most prized possession - his grate. The poncho is there just to protect it from getting rusty. Two, losing his mechanical horse. Three, being compared with his brother. Seriously - he's not the one who eats plants like there's no tomorrow.
translation: {FLAVOR}有三件事是他最痛恨的. 第一, 失去他最珍贵的财产 - 他的炉排. 那件披风只是为了保护他不生锈. 第二, 失去他的机械马. 第三, 被人拿来和他的哥哥比较. 说真的 - 他不是那个像没有明天一样吃植物的人.

original: Sometimes has a hidden armored plate.
translation: 有时候会携带一只铁板.
淘金僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}appears on the left side of the lawn after dynamite explodes\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his days looking for gold.  'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate brains... and, wait, where's his other shoe?\" "
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}雷管爆炸时可以出现在草坪的另一端\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\"从前有只僵尸, 整天都在找金子, 一直找到老. 终于, 他在一个雨天吃到了脑子... 等等, 他的另一只鞋呢?\"

original: Launches over your defenses when his fuse burns down.
translation: 雷管的引线烧尽时会越过你的防线.
太阳神僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say \Ra\" a lot."
translation: {FLAVOR}太阳神僵尸虽然叫 \"太阳神\". 但他和 \"太阳神·拉\" 并没有任何关系. 他只是经常 \"拉拉拉\" 地叫. 并且喜欢太阳罢了.

original: Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping.
translation: 尝试偷走你的阳光, 但只是好好保存.
罗马僵尸
罗马路障僵尸

original: Was there enough traffic in Ancient Rome to justify cones? Historians differ. It's a real debate.
translation: 古罗马时期的交通真的有必要用到路障吗? 历史学家莫衷一是. 真是场无休止的争论...

original: A traffic cone made of marble provides some protection.
translation: 一个由大理石制成的路障为他提供了一些保护.
罗马铁桶僵尸

original: They had buckets just like this back in Ancient Rome. Believe it.
translation: 他们古罗马时期就已经有这种桶了. 可别不信.

original: A fancy bucket with a bit of flair distinguishes this zombie.
translation: 一个花哨的桶外加一点艺术天赋, 让这只僵尸与众不同.
百夫长僵尸

original: Did you know that in Ancient Rome, a centurion commanded a century? Isn't that wild?
translation: 你知道吗? 在古罗马, 一位百夫长能指挥百夫. 是不是很野?

original: A higher grade of Roman Zombie.
translation: 一种更高级别的罗马僵尸.
半身像僵尸

original: Bust Head Zombie belongs in museum with a big sign that says something like, \WARNING: THIS IS A ZOMBIE!\""
translation: 半身像僵尸应当被放置在博物馆内, 并且有一个大标语, 上面写着 \"警告: 这是一只僵尸!\"

original: A bust head means this Roman zombie can take a serious beating.
translation: 头上的雕像意味着这只罗马僵尸很抗打.
投石机僵尸

original: Surprise! That exploding vase has a zombie in it! Isn't that surprising?
translation: 那会个爆炸的罐子里, 居然有只僵尸! 惊不惊喜, 意不意外?

original: A ballista from Ancient Rome, the Zcorpion Zombie launches an exploding vase at the nearest plant in its lane.
translation: 来自古罗马的投石机, 投石机僵尸会向所在行内最近植物发射会爆炸的罐子.
他并不明白 \"十一抽杀\" 是什么意思.
你的普通罗马军团僵尸.
罗马旗帜僵尸

original: In Ancient Rome, flags were often used on the battlefield to direct troop movements. Though come on: how much direction do you really need to shuffle leftward?
translation: 在古罗马, 旗帜常用来在战场中指挥军队行动的方向. 虽然但是..僵尸反正都是向左走, 真的还需要指挥吗?

original: The flag indicates more zombies are on their way!
translation: 这面旗帜预示着更多僵尸即将来袭!
角斗士巨人僵尸

original: He's got a column and he's not afraid to use it.
translation: 他可不害怕使用他手上的柱子.

original: Wears a helmet. Throws an imp AND a net. Just a real piece of work.
translation: 戴着头盔. 可以扔出一只小鬼僵尸和一张网. 这是他 \"僵\" 生的意义.
治疗师僵尸

original: Hot tip: take this one out as fast as you can if you don't want your life turned into a pit of abject misery and despair.
translation: 提示: 如果你不想人生落入充满凄惨与绝望的深渊, 就尽快干掉这家伙.

original: Uses weird Roman magic to heal zombies.
translation: 使用奇怪的罗马法术来治疗僵尸.
罗马小鬼僵尸

original: Like all Zombie Imps, Roman Imp keeps turning up where you least want him.
translation: 和其他小鬼僵尸不一样, 罗马小鬼僵尸总是会出现在你最不希望他出现的时候.

original: Small. Impy. Wears a former lion.
translation: 是个穿着旧狮皮的小鬼.
僵尸美杜莎

original: Hailing originally from Greece but thriving in Rome, Zombie Medusa takes advice from her snakes based on their charisma and shared personal hisssstory.
translation: 僵尸美杜莎生于希腊, 盛名于罗马. 在一起度过了那么长的时间后, 她常常向自己头上那群魅力嘶 - 射的蛇寻求建议.

original: Zombie Medusa pushes petrified zombies in stone blocks as well as stoneifying zombies and zomboids that face her.
translation: 僵尸美杜莎可以推动石块中的石化僵尸, 也可以将她眼前的拟尸变成石头.
罗马盾牌僵尸

original: The shield protects him from bad reviews and hurtful remarks.
translation: 盾牌可以保护他免受负面评论和恶意言论的侵袭.

original: A dull-witted, unusually shy Roman zombie who's also carrying a shield.
translation: 一个迟钝的, 特别害羞, 还拿着盾牌的罗马僵尸.
一对罗马盾牌僵尸

original: When three Roman shield zombies are too many, how about two? Two's a good number, right? It's even, it's prime... it's got everything!
translation: 3个罗马盾牌僵尸太多了, 那么 2 个怎么样? 2 是个好数字, 对吧? 它是偶数, 质数...它就是一切!

original: A pair of Roman shield zombies.
translation: 一组罗马盾牌僵尸.
罗马盾牌僵尸三件套

original: This number of shield zombies is three higher than zombies can count.
translation: 盾牌僵尸小队的数目比僵尸能数到的最大数字还要多 3 个.

original: Three Roman shield zombies in a row.
translation: 3个罗马盾牌僵尸成一排
海鸥僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Seagull Zombie has racked up the frequent flier miles and dreams of going to the top colleges in the world on a cerebral gastronomy vacation.
translation: {FLAVOR}海鸥僵尸已经成功达到了累计飞行里程积分, 他现在正盘算着去世界顶级大学, 享受一个脑子盛宴假期.

original: Crosses watery gaps without a plank and flies over low plants like Potato Mines and Iceberg Lettuces.
translation: 可以在没有甲板的路上飞行, 忽略土豆地雷和冰冻生菜等低矮植物.
飞索僵尸

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can appear in large number during a raid\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}He swashes. He buckles. But, he also writes home every third Sunday and sends brains and treasure via post. He's a good zombie at heart.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在海盗登船事件中会大量出现\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}他一丝不苟, 他气势咄咄, 你以为他是个冷酷的家伙? 其实他每三周就会给家里写信, 寄些脑子和战利品. 作为僵尸他有一副好心肠.

original: Swings in on a rope to land midway onto your lawn.
translation: 荡着绳子并在你草坪的中间降落.
造墓者僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}He dreams about playing fetch, running for the brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.
translation: {FLAVOR}他十分享受抛脑子游戏. 他也常常在尚未完成 \"坐下\", \"握手\" 训练前跑到在院子里挖坑. 他始终在寻找自己的尾巴.

original: Throws out bones to create tombstones on the lawn.
translation: 可以通过把骨头扔掉草坪上来创造出坟墓.
雪人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}does not eat plants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}runs away after a short while
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}drops a gem when defeated

{FLAVOR}The rare and wondrous Yeti likes hiking up and down Mount Brainer.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不攻击植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}过了一会儿就跑掉了
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}击杀后掉落一颗砖石

{FLAVOR}稀奇古怪的雪人喜欢在布瑞纳山上下徒步旅行

original: A rare and curious creature - he is spotted in only specific areas.
translation: 一种稀有而神秘的生物 - 他只出现在特定区域.
普通僵尸
路障僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.
translation: {FLAVOR}在一个疯狂的夜晚之后, 路障僵尸醒来, 手里拿着一张神秘的收据, 上面写着一个圆锥形的路障和工业用强力粘合剂.

original: His traffic cone headpiece makes him thrice as tough as normal zombies.
translation: 他的路障使他的防御力是普通僵尸的三倍.
铁桶僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.
translation: {FLAVOR}曾经有一段时间, 铁桶僵尸因其创新的铁桶对头策略而被誉为僵尸天才. 不过已经过去好几年了, 僵尸想知道他还能有什么惊奇的发现. 他有什么秘密? 他没有.

original: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
translation: 他的铁桶让他非常耐打.
砖头僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.
translation: {FLAVOR}在看完 \"三只小猪\" 的故事之后, 他认为草帽和木头帽子不靠谱, 于是他戴上了砖头.

original: Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
translation: 砖头僵尸的砖头提供了真正的砖头一样的防御.

original: {FLAVOR}Basic Zombie hates the term \Basic.\" He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you."
translation: {FLAVOR}普通僵尸讨厌 \"普通\" 这个词, 他不认为自己是随处可见的敌人或平凡的僵尸. 他认为自己是独一无二的存在, 为了弥补这一点, 他会有所作为的, 即便是杀了你.
平凡的普通僵尸.
旗帜僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}A spelling impaired zombie named \Brian,\" Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important."
translation: {FLAVOR}旗帜僵尸, 名叫 \"Brian\" - 布莱恩, 是一只有书写障碍的僵尸. 因为其他僵尸一直在说着脑子的英文单词 \"Brain\". 他就以为所有的僵尸都在叫他的名字, 这让他变得很骄傲.

original: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or \wave\" of zombies."
translation: 他的旗帜标志着一大波僵尸即将到来.
集结僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Rally Zombie splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.
translation: {FLAVOR}集结僵尸挥动着他的纯皮旗帜, 他觉得只有纯皮才配得上他.

original: Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or \pile\" of zombies."
translation: 集结僵尸和他的旗帜象征着超大波僵尸即将来袭.
巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with pole
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Imp when damaged

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar is the embodiment of power, made real. He is a juggernaut of hunger, from which there is no escape. He is fear unleashed. Well, he's fear slightly leashed.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电线杆砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤后扔出小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}巨人僵尸毫无疑问是力量的化身. 他是一架饥饿的推土机, 在他面前你无路可逃. 他就是挣脱束缚的恐惧. 好吧, 他的恐惧有一点被束缚了.

original: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.
translation: 巨人僵尸真的挺难对付.
小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or zombadittude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.
translation: {FLAVOR}他的恶劣态度 (用他自己的话来说就是 \"僵尸态度\") 足以弥补他攻击距离的不足. 别刺激他.

original: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
translation: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后走向你的房子.
罐子巨人僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}crushes plants with pole
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}throws Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}does not outrange Chard Guard

{FLAVOR}The ceramic confines of the Vase Gargantuar's home has done nothing to his endless hunger, his immense power, or his vast destructive potential. However, his footspeed could be better.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电线杆砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}会主动被甜菜护卫弹走

{FLAVOR}困住罐子巨人僵尸的陶瓷在他的无尽饥饿, 无穷力量, 以及强大的罐子摧毁能力面前毫无用处. 不过, 他其实可以走的更快些的.

original: Phenomenally sized zombie stuffed into a tiny unliving space.
translation: 难以置信, 这种大小的僵尸可以被塞进罐子里.
素食者僵尸

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}can charge in while enraged, being tougher and faster
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}immune to stalling perfume, stun, butter and poison

{FLAVOR}Are the zombies becoming vegetarians? Do they even like eating plants? That's still a mystery of PvZ, but this guy will surely find and eat every plant he encounters! To him, the lawn is his all-you-can-eat buffet. Other zombies told him that he should try brains sometimes, but he was offended by that.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以在被激怒时冲锋, 变得更强硬和更迅速
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫失速香气, 定身, 黄油和毒素效果

{FLAVOR}僵尸成为了素食主义者? 他们甚至喜欢上了吃植物? 这仍然是PvZ的一个谜, 但这个家伙一定会找到并吃掉他遇到的每一株植物! 对他来说, 草坪就是他的吃到饱的自助餐. 其他僵尸建议他有时应该试试大脑, 但他对此很生气.

original: Charges into the battlefield, quickly eating everything on his way - even underground and hidden plants.
translation: 冲进战场并快速吃掉路上的一切 - 甚至包括地刺和暗影植物.
机器牛
骑牛小鬼僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}Had dreams of becoming a rodeo clown but found the clown make-up to just be too creepy.
translation: {FLAVOR}曾梦想成为一名小丑, 但发现小丑的妆容令人毛骨悚然还是放弃了.

original: Gets launched past all but the tallest plants, then proceeds on foot.
translation: 被投射到不够高大的植物后方, 然后步行前进.

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}resistant to chill
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT}Tall-nut blocks flying imp

{FLAVOR}He's not an angry bull. He loves flowers, playing in the fields, sitting under trees, and long walks across the pasture. He wants to settle down when he meets the right cow. Too bad he's a robot.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对冷却有抗性
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}高坚果会阻挡小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}他不是一只愤怒的公牛. 他喜欢花, 喜欢在田野里玩耍, 喜欢坐在树下, 喜欢在牧场上散步. 当他遇到喜欢的奶牛时, 他想安定下来成个家. 天哪, 要是他不是个机器就好了.

original: Can launch his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
translation: 可以投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
传奇斗牛僵尸

original: {FLAVOR}\Legend\" perhaps overstates Rodeo Legend Zombie's status in the rodeo world. Don't tell him that, though, unless you're desperate to hear an hour-long tirade about calf-roping."
translation: {FLAVOR}\"传奇\" 这个词可能夸大了传奇斗牛僵尸在世界牛仔竞技比赛中的地位. 不过, 不要跟他说, 除非你非常想听他一个小时的长篇大论.

original: Rodeo Legend Zombie smashes a plant and launches his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
translation: 传奇斗牛僵尸撞击植物, 并且投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
Z公司新雇员
Z 公司路障僵尸

original: ZCorp leads the field in large, cone-shaped pushpins for cranial safety.
translation: 在高强度路障的生产技术这方面, Z 公司处于全球领先的地位.

original: A typical ZCorp employee, except with more on his mind.
translation: 典型的 Z 公司员工, 只不过头上多了点东西.
Z 公司铁桶僵尸

original: ZCorp fully complies with all local, state and federal waste disposal ordinances.
translation: Z 公司完全遵守各个地方的废物处理条例.

original: An environmentally friendly recycle bin protects the employee's noggin from damage.
translation: 环保的可回收垃圾桶能保护这位员工的头, 使他免受伤害.
Z 公司顾问僵尸

original: She works for ZCorp AND consults for them. Great gig if you can get it!
translation: 她为 Z 公司工作, 给他们提供咨询. 如果你能就职的话会是份不错的工作!

original: ZCorp Consultant disrupts your paradigm and tableflips your bluesky/redocean.
translation: Z 公司顾问僵尸会打破你的桎梏, 翻转你的理论.

original: He was issued the standard ZCorp coffee mug at orientation.
translation: 在迎新会上, 公司给了他标准的 Z 公司咖啡杯.
一个被 Z 公司编入的典型员工.
Z 公司合同工僵尸
Z 公司合同工路障僵尸

original: ZCorp contractors may purchase ZCorp office supplies for a small fee.
translation: Z 公司的合同工可以低价购买 Z 公司的办公用品.

original: It's the combination of notebook and comically large pushpin that really gives this contractor the edge.
translation: 笔记本和大到滑稽的图钉, 正是这两样东西组成的联合体给这位合同工带来了微弱优势.
Z 公司合同工铁桶僵尸

original: ZCorp encourages its contractors to come up with out-of-the-box solutions for keeping their heads safe.
translation: Z 公司鼓励其合同工想出开箱即用的解决方案, 以确保他们的头部安全.

original: Recycle bins make excellent and environmentally friendly headgear.
translation: 他头上的回收垃圾桶不仅能保护脑袋, 更能保护地球的环境.

original: ZCorp is so inclusive, they even give contractors free coffee mugs.
translation: Z 公司一切费用全包, 甚至会为合同工提供免费的咖啡杯.
一个典型的 Z 公司承包商.
Z 公司旗帜僵尸

original: ZCorp developed its flag logo in-house and is very proud of it.
translation: Z 公司内部开发了自己的旗帜标识, 并为此感到非常自豪.

original: The flag is a tremendous way to create brand awareness while also indicating a lot more zombies are about to appear and eat your brains.
translation: 他的旗子可以很好地宣传它们的品牌, 同时也表明更多的僵尸即将出现, 想要吃掉你的脑子.
总部巨鬼僵尸

original: Head Office Impgantuar's door is always open. It is, however, highly inadvisable to take him up on that offer.
translation: 总部巨鬼僵尸的大门永远向你敞开, 不过, 我不建议你接受他的提议.

original: His giant noggin is a blunt instrument of smashing.
translation: 他那巨大的脑袋可以砸碎植物.
Z 公司技术支持僵尸

original: ZCorp HelpDesk is here to help, especially if what you need help with is having too many plants on your lawn.
translation: Z 公司技术支持僵尸提供技术支持, 尤其是当你草坪上的植物太多清理不过来时!

original: ZCorp HelpDesk drops in and throws an exploding laptop.
translation: Z 公司技术支持僵尸从天而降后会扔出一台爆炸的笔记本电脑.
法务部小巨人僵尸

original: Gargimp Legal delivers cease-and-desists the old-fashioned way: with a baseball bat.
translation: 法务部小巨人僵尸用一种老派的方式传递着禁止令: 棒球棍.

original: Tiny but fierce, the Gargimp Legal department is the best and the beast in the business.
translation: 法务部小巨人僵尸利用自己小而凶的面庞, 顺利在自己这行闯出了一片天下.
巨鲨潜袭者僵尸机器人

original:
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}mouth turbine can pull plants to it
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}summoned zombie sharks can consume plants

{FLAVOR}The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable exterior skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machine's horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is passionate about his projects.
translation:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}涡轮机嘴巴可以把植物拉向它
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}召唤出的僵尸鲨鱼能够吞噬植物

{FLAVOR}巨鲨潜袭者僵尸机器人是真正的 "爱之杰作". 僵王博士用心打磨这台水栖毁灭机甲的每一处细节, 日复一日地从凌晨研究到天黑. 他精心制作了巨鲨那几乎牢不可破的外表皮, 把每一颗牙齿打磨得又尖又利. 不仅如此, 他还煞费苦心地往它的胃里安装了一个用来切碎植物的风扇. 当这台杰作横空出世时, 僵王泪流满面, 兴奋不已. 不管你怎么评价这个邪恶天才, 不可否认的是, 他对他的工作充满热情.

original: The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.
translation: 来自黑暗深处的贪婪的屠杀引擎.
牛车狂战者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attacks can target mine carts\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}Ranchers and farmhands abandon your fields. Rumbling down the dusty trail, this wagon was engineered to strike fear into the heart of any horticulturist who should encounter it. Dr. Zomboss normally doesn't take any bull, but this time he made an exception.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}导弹攻击会瞄准轨道上的矿车\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}农场主和农民拖着自己煞白的脸, 纷纷弃田而去. 只见小径尘土飞扬, 牛车隆隆作响. 它的诞生, 就是为了将恐惧送到每个种植者的心中. 不到万不得已, 僵王博士不会冒险使用这个机器, 但这一次, 他破例了.

original: The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds.
translation: 来自荒原西部的毁灭战车.
黑龙驾驭者僵尸机器人

original:
{KEYWORD}Damage: {STAT}fire breathing attacks destroy plants
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon Zombies

{FLAVOR}With a rumble of destruction, Dr. Zomboss forged his Dark Dragon in the heart of a volcano. Then he tempered the beast in the chilled waters of Doom Lake. Finally  he fed its furnace with coal from the Mines of Morbidity. And the paint job - that was done by Carl.
translation:
{KEYWORD}攻击: {STAT}喷出火焰摧毁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}高射火球生成小鬼龙僵尸

{FLAVOR}轰隆一声巨响, 僵王博士在火山中心创造了这条黑龙. 之后, 他在毁灭之湖的刺骨冷水中驯服了这野兽. 最后, 再用多疾矿洞的煤炭喂满它的熔炉. 至于绘图工作嘛 - 那是卡尔完成的.

original: The desolator of all, from dark times.
translation: 黑暗时代的荒凉者.
机龙速袭者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}summons dinosaurs\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}With flagrant disregard for temporal tidiness and simple good taste, Dr. Zomboss figured it would be a good idea to build a big metal dinosaur.
translation: {KEYWORD}特殊: {STAT}召唤恐龙\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}带着对时间整齐度的公然漠视以及自己的好品味, 僵王博士觉得建造一只大型金属恐龙是个好主意.

original: A mechanical means of dinosaurian destruction.
translation: 恐龙的威力, 机械的身躯.
狮身终结者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attack can create tombstones\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}To add that extra bit of wickedness to the Sphinx-inator Dr. Zomboss chiseled his creation from the stonework of cursed tombs. You should not take this instance of reuse and recycle to mean he's going green. The only thing green about him is his tongue.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}大炮攻击后, 会创造出坟墓\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}为了给狮身终结者增添几分邪恶的感觉, 僵王博士用被诅咒的墓碑雕刻出了他的作品. 但是, 别看他现在回收再利用, 他其实一点都不环保. 别听信他的鬼话.

original: The destroyer of plants from the ancient sands.
translation: 来自古老沙场的植物毁灭者.
狂舞碎灭者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}speakers do passive damage (except to ground plants and Phat Beet) and send out shockwave attacks\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}In another world, in another time, Dr. Zomboss would receive the bounty of enthusiastic applause that is his due. Not here and now, though. Nope.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}扬声器会造成被动伤害 (除了地面植物和魔音甜菜), 还会发出冲击波攻击\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}在另一个世界, 另一个时间, 僵王博士也许能够得到他应得的热烈掌声. 不过不是现在, 绝对不是.

original: An intimate evening with some of Dr. Zomboss' most recent and painful explorations.
translation: 僵王博士会在这个激动僵心的夜晚让你感受痛苦.
明日破译者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}When Dr. Zomboss is nestled into the comfy folds of his futuristic cerebral control pod he almost finds it hard to be evil. Of course once he sees a lawn full of happy plants that puts him right back where he needs to be, hungry and evil.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}导弹攻击会摧毁能量地砖\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}当僵王博士依偎在控制仓中那舒适的, 如脑子般的褶皱中时, 他甚至都不想再邪恶下去了. 当然, 他一看到草坪上种满了快乐的植物, 顿时兴致全无, 回到了弥漫着饥饿与邪恶的归属之中.

original: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future.
translation: 能量地砖毁灭器, 遥远未来荣誉出品
獠牙驯服者僵尸机器人

original: {FLAVOR}Dr. Zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. But what Dr. Zomboss didn't realize until it was too late: He's allergic to mammoth fur. Now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin.
translation: {FLAVOR}僵王博士还清晰地记得他是怎么想到要创造一个可以喷雪的机械猛犸象的. 但当他想起自己对猛犸象的毛过敏时, 一切都太晚了. 现在, 每当他想出去溜溜这家伙, 都得吃很多的抗过敏药.

original: The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.
translation: 来自冰河时代的机械猛犸象.
飞船远航者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} drops zombies and bags o' sand\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}After repeated failures with variously robotic engines of destruction, Dr. Zomboss decided to go with a kinder, more eco-friendly lighter-than-air option to sow disaster and discord.
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT} 扔下僵尸以及沙袋\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}在经历了无数次因机器人被破坏而失败的不堪后, 僵王博士决定采用一种更友好, 更环保, 还比空气轻的手段来制造各种灾难和混乱.

original: The floating fortress from the skies above.
translation: 漂浮在天空中的堡垒.
甲板踏行者僵尸机器人

original: {KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}cannon can rain down imps past your defenses\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR}\Hoist the mizzenmast, batten down the hatches! 15 zombies on a dead man's boat, yo ho ho and a bucket of brains!\" Dr. Zomboss had to admit he was really getting into this whole pirate thing. Though he never thought he'd be on a boat on a boat."
translation: {KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}小鬼炮能发射出穿越防线的小鬼雨\r\n\r\n{FLAVOR} \"吊起桅, 甲板放北! 十五只僵尸朝你飞! 做得好, 赏有一桶脑!\" 僵王博士必须承认他已经沉迷于海盗生活了. 不过他做梦都没想自己会在一艘船上再开一个船.

original: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas.
translation: 在公海掠劫植物的私掠船.

original: \r\n{FLAVOR}\Developing plant zomboids in eerie mimicry of zombie life is well within the boundaries of human experience,\" Zoybean Pod insists with a calm, unvarying steadiness."
